34a7('dul ba): gis/ri mo ris shig/bcom ldan 'das kyis ri mo ris shig ces dka' stsal nas/des tshon rtsi dag kyang bsags/ri mo mkhan rnams kyang bos te/smras pa/shes
34b1('dul ba): ldan drag bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang gis/de'i phyir tshon 'di drag gis rgyal byed kyi tshul ri mo ris shig/de dag gis smras pa/khyim bdag ri mo bri na phyogs gang du ci
34b2('dul ba): zhig bri ba gsungs shig/des smras pa/shes ldan dag bdag gis mi shes kyis sdod cig dang /bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o//de dag gis smras pa/khyim bdag legs
34b3('dul ba): te de bzhin du mdzod cig dang /sdod do//de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song nas/zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das tshon rtsi dag kyang
34b4('dul ba): bsogs/ri mo mkhan rnams kyang bos na de dag gi mchid nas/khyim bdag phyogs gang du ci zhig bri ba smros shig ces mchi no/de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs
34b5('dul ba): brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/phyogs gang du ci zhig bri ba bka' stsal du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag gal te de lta na song la/re shig phyi sgor
34b6('dul ba): gnod sbyin lag na dbyug thogs 'drir bcug nas/sgo khong du ni tshe 'phral chen po dang /'khor ba'i 'khor lo chu lnga pa/khyamasu ni skyes pa'i rabs kyi phreng ba/dri gtsang khang gi
34b7('dul ba): sgor ni gnod sbyin lag na phreng ba thogs pa dag/rim gro'i khang par ni dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag chos rnam par gtan la 'bebs par byed pa/bkad sar ni
35a1('dul ba): gnod sbyin lag na zas thogs pa dag/mdzod kyi sgor ni gnod sbyin lag na lcags kyu thogs pa dag/churi khang pan ni klu lag na bum pa thogs pa
35a2('dul ba): brgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan po dag/khrus khang ngam/bsro khang du ni lha'i mdo las 'byung ba 'am/gzhan dmyal ba'i rabs/nad pa'i sman khang du ni de bzhin gshegs
35a3('dul ba): pa nad g.yog mdzad pa/chab khung sar nI dur khrod shin tu 'jig su rung ba/gnas gang gi sgor ni rus pa'i keng rus dang /mgo'i thod pa bri'o//btsun pa de ltar
35a4('dul ba): 'tshalo zhes khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/thams cad de kho na bzhin du 'drir bcugo/gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med
35a5('dul ba): zas sbyin gyis/rgyal byed kyi tshal ri mi bris pa de'i tshe/dge slong shes bzhin med par gnas pa kha cig gis der mye bus pas/du bas ri mo ma rung bar gyur nas/
35a6('dul ba): skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag dra me'i khang pa gnang gis/dge slong gang zhig
35a7('dul ba): le me dgos pa des/me'i khang par me bud par bya'i/khang bzangasu ni ma yin//khang bzangasu ma 'bud na 'gal chibs can du 'gyuraro//bcom ldan 'das kyis me
35b1('dul ba): khyad par mi bud par bya'o//khang bzang su ni mA yan zhes bka' stsal pa dang /dge sbyong gzhan nad pa drug cig 'khod pa de dag mes phongs par gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das
35b2('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/nad pa gang dag mos phongs pa de dag gis gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol lam/rdzing drung du me bus la mdag ma du ba med pa nang du gzhag par bya'o//dge
35b3('dul ba): slong rnams khang bzang su khrus byed pas ri mo byed nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khang bzangasu khrus mi bya'i/'on kyang rdzing gi grwa gcig tu ston pa'i spyan
35b4('dul ba): sngar me bab pa 'am/khrus kyi khong pa byas nas der khrus bya'o//'dam du gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/phyogs der so phag gi bcal 'brim par bya'o//
35b5('dul ba): chu 'khyil nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalnga pa/chu'i gtor khung gdod par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis chu'i stor khung gdod par bya'o//zhes bka' stsal po dang /
35b6('dul ba): chu'i stor khung gi kha 'gags par gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dus du su bsal bar bya zhing /chu'i stor khung gi kha nyid du khrus bya'o//sangs rgyas
35b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//mnyan yod na bram ze zhig gi bu ni bar gyur nas/de'i sman pa'i
36a1('dul ba): drung du song ste smras pa/bkra shis par gyur cig/bkra shis par gyur cig/sman pas smras pa/jo bo ci bzhed gsungs shig/des smras pa/kye dge
36a2('dul ba): ba chung zad kyang mi 'dod mod kyi/'on kyang kho bo'i bu nad 'di drang 'dis thebs kyis sman ston cig/sman pa de dad pa can zhig pas des smras pa/bram ze 'phags pa
36a3('dul ba): rnams kyi drung du bzhud la/lhung bzed kyi chu slongs te de khrus shig dang sos par 'gyur ro//des bram ze bkri shes par gyur cig ces smras nas chas te/rgyal byed kyi tshal du
36a4('dul ba): song ngo //drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni drug sde gang yang rung ba zhig gis/rgyal byed kyi tshol gyi sgo mi stongs pa yin te/tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi
36a5('dul ba): sgo na 'chag pa des/bram ze de mthong nas smras pa/bram ze chen po 'ongs pa leg so 'ongs pa leg so//khyod zla ba lta bu gnas pa yin na/ring mo zhig ste ga las 'ongs
36a6('dul ba): 'phrogs pa phyag 'tshalo//ring mo zhig ste mthong ba ni legs te/yang dang yang du mthong bas ni brnyas par 'gyur ro//dgos pa ci zhig la 'ongs/'phags pa bdag gi
36a7('dul ba): bu bro tshabs tshon po zhig gis thebs te/de la sman pas 'phags pa rnams kyi thad nas lhung bzed kyi chu bslangs te de bkrus pa dang /sos par 'gyur ro zhes bstan nas
36b1('dul ba): bdag lhung bzed kyi chu bslang ba'i slad du 'dir mchis kyis stsol cig/des smras pa/khyod ko lhung bzed kyi chu'i phyir 'dir 'ongs pa lta/'phags pa de lta lags te dgos
36b2('dul ba): pa nI de mchi so//gal te de lta ni sdod cig dang /kho bros lhung bzed kyi chu blongo zhes byas nas de nang du song ngo //des zan zos nas lhung bzed bkrus te der rus pa dang /
36b3('dul ba): sha'i kham tshad dang /nya'i gra ma dang /'bras chan gyi bral ma dang /phye dang /tshod shol dang /khur ba cung zad cig blug so//de nas phyir byung nas smras pa/bram ze
36b4('dul ba): lhung bzed kyi chu 'di re khyer cig/bram zes mthong nas smras pa/'phags pa bdag gi bu gum bla'i/chu 'di lta bu mi gtsang bas khrus bgyis pa ni mi rung //tshe dang ldan pa
36b5('dul ba): nyi dgas smras pa/khyod dad pa 'di lta bu dang ldan pas khyod kyi bu spos zin du zad//bram ze de 'phye ba la zhugs nas/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
36b6('dul ba): la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/dge slong dag lhung bzed nas lhag rol 'dor ba las gyur kyis/de'i phyir
36b7('dul ba): dge slong gi lhung bzed nas lhag rol dor bar mi bya'o snyam du dgongs te/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong da/de lta bas na/dge slong gis lhung bzed nas lhag
37a1('dul ba): rol dor bar mi bya'o//dor na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro//'on kyang ngas dge slong gis lhung bzed kyi chu sbyin par byed pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos
37a2('dul ba): bca' bar bya ste/dge slong lhung bzed kyi chu sbyin pa byed pa lhung bzed lan gsum bkrus te/lhung bzed kyi chu la gtsug lag gi tshogasu bcad pas mngon por bsngags
37a3('dul ba): nas sbyin par bya'o//dge slong lhung bzed kyi chu sbyin par byed pas kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te/mi 'jug na 'gal tshabs
37a4('dul ba): can du 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das monyan yod na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso//dge slong dag lhung
37a5('dul ba): bzed kyi gzhi la rkang pa bzhag ste/zan za ba bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni gtsang sbra med pa ste/lhung bzed kyi gzhi
37a6('dul ba): la rkang pa bzhag ste zan za'o zhes bya ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyisra bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra' stsal pa/dge slong dag
37a7('dul ba): bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni thog tu bab po//de lta bas na dge slong gis lhung bzed kyi gzhi la rkang pa bzhag ste zan bza' bar mi bya'o//dge slong lhung bzed
37b1('dul ba): rgyagazho la rkang pa bzhag ste ban pan 'gal chubs n+dan du 'gyuraro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa ts+tshan na spre'u nga gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs//ngan
37b2('dul ba): slong dag lham ma phud par zan zla ba/bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi sgo mthong nas/shAkya'i bu'i dge slong rnams ni gtsang sbra med pa ste/lham ma phud par zin pa
37b3('dul ba): zhes 'phya ba'i sgrubs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag bram ze dang /khyim bdug
37b4('dul ba): rnams 'phya ba ni thog tu bab po//de lta bas na dge slong gi lham ma phud par zan bza' bar mi bya'o//dge slong lham mr-i phud par zan zan 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//
37b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis lham ma phud par zan bza' bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/dge slong dag gis lham phud de zan bza' bar ba rnams pa dang /de
37b6('dul ba): dradrug na bar gyur pa'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das lnga gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nad pa gang dag yin pa de dag gis
37b7('dul ba): ni ma phud par zan bza' bar skye ste/'di la 'gyod par mi bya'i//sngam ni/lhung bzed med dang grags pa dang //dbyar gnas pa dang gnas med dang //lo lnga rnyed pa
38a1('dul ba): gcig pa dang //glo dang rgyab dang rked pa mgro gsangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
38a2('dul ba): dga' ra ba na bzhug so//nye dga' bos gcig cig rab tu phyung ba de la snga nas lhung bzed nye bar ma bzhago/ji tsam na dge slong rnams zas kyi dus la bab ste/rang rang gi
38a3('dul ba): lhung bzed bkrus nas lhung bzed kyi gzhi la bzhag ste/mchod rten le phyag 'tshal du dang ba dang /des bsams pa/lhung bzed 'di dag mad mo zhig 'dug pas
38a4('dul ba): gdon mi za bar gang gis ji ltar blangs pa des zos shing zos nas 'di nyid du 'jog go/de lta bas nas re shig bdag gis kyang blangs la slar bzhago snyam nas/des
38a5('dul ba): gnas brtan kun shes ko'u di n+ya'i lhung bzed blangs par brtsams pa dang /gzhan zhig gis de la smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa lhung bzed 'di ni gnas brtan kun shes
38a6('dul ba): buM ni kyai'i yin gyis 'di ma lon cig/des de bzhag nas/tshe dang ldan pa rta rdul dang /bzang po dang /rlungs po dang /mngo chen dang /glang po dang /dri ma med pa
38a7('dul ba): dradang /pA l+r-ing bdag dang /lag bzang dang /dge slong gzhan dag gcig gi lhung bzed dag blang bar brtsoms pa dang /dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan
38b1('dul ba): khyod lnga ltung bzed med na/snang bzed med pa khyod sus dub tu byung /des smras pa/mkhan po'i dgaso//dge slong rnams 'phya bar byed de/gnas ngan len kun tu spyod
38b2('dul ba): pa do ma yin pa gzhan smra zhig lhung bzed med pa rab tu 'byin ces zer ba'i skabs ni/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis
38b3('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/dge slong gis lhung bzed sdepa rab tu dbyung bar mi bya ste/rab tu 'byin na 'gal chibs can du 'gyuraro//rab tu 'byin par byed pas yo byas drug gis mi
38b4('dul ba): brel bar bya'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dis lnga tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor rgyus zhus pa/btsun pa re shig dge slong dag gis lhung bzed med po zhig bsten par rdzogs par
38b5('dul ba): bgyid na/basbyin par rdzogs pa zhes brjod par bgyi 'am/nye bar 'khor bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bya ste/bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa rnams ni 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro//btsun pa
38b6('dul ba): dge slong dag gis lhung bzed chung ngu 'am/lhung bzed chen po 'am/lhung bzed skya bos bsnyen byar rdzogs par bgyid na/bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi 'am/nye bar 'khor bsnyen
38b7('dul ba): par rdzogs pa zhes bya ste/bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa rnams ni 'gal tshangs can du 'gyuraro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod ni/rgyal bu rgya la byed kyi tshal mngon/
39a1('dul ba): rgyun kun dug ban pan nas/dang tshanam rnam par grags panag rgyun pa byung baDUr na nga ba dang /banas pa snor nas thos so//
39a2('dul ba): de lam gyi ngal bas dub nas rgyal khyod kyi tshal gyi lam ka shing zhig gi drung na lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khongasu chud cing 'dug pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' sdedro
39a3('dul ba): sham thabs bgos/lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir chas pa des de mthong nas smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa khyod su'i/des smras pa/
39a4('dul ba): 'phags pa bdag ni mgon med pa zhig ste/bdag la ci yang ma mchis//des smras pa/bzhin bzangs gal te de lta na ci ste rab tu mi 'byung /des smras pa/'phags pa khyod
39a5('dul ba): rab tu byung ba lags pas re shig drang por smra bar bgyi ste/bdag ni chom rkun par grags pa lags na su zhig bdag rab tu 'byin/bu bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa ni thugs
39a6('dul ba): rjes rab tu phye ba yin pas/du zhig rab tu mi 'byin/sems rton cig dang ngas rab tu dbyung ngo //'phags pa legs te rab tu 'byung ngo //des de rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs
39a7('dul ba): per byas nas//smras pa/bzhin pa'angs ri dgas kyis ri dgas misos kyis/mnyan yod rgya chen po rang gi spyod yul pa yul du bsod snyoms la rgyu la 'chi bar gyi//
39b1('dul ba): shig/de snga dro sham thabs bags/lhung bzed dang /chos gros thogs te/mnyan yod du bstod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang /de bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na/br-i zla dang khyim bdag rnams
39b2('dul ba): kyis ngo shes nas de na kha cig ni re shes ldan dgra 'di ni chom rkun par grags pa de yin ni/rab tu byung ngo zhes zer/gzhan dag na re dge sbyong shAkya'i bu po rnams kyi chos ni
39b3('dul ba): bzang ste/chom rkun par grags pa yang rab tu 'byin par byed do//'di dag ni nyin mo bsod snyoms pa'i cha byad kyis khyim dag tu grags btsod nas/nub mo rkur 'ong ngo zhes
39b4('dul ba): zer ba'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong dag chom rkun
39b5('dul ba): par grags pa rab tu 'byin pa las gyur te/de'i phyir dge slong gis chom rkun par grags pa rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal
39b6('dul ba): pa/dge slong dag bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni thog tu bab po//de lta bas na dge slong gis chom rkun par grags pa rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o//bcom ldan
39b7('dul ba): 'das kyis dge slong gis chom rkun par grags pa rob tu dbyung bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /dge slong dag gi chom rkun pa yin par mngon pa med pa dag kyang rab tu ma
40a1('dul ba): phyung bas de dag gis rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa/dge slong gi dngos po'i bar chad du gyur pa'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis
40a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chom rkun pa yin par mngon pa rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'i/mngon pa med pa ni rab tu dbyung
40a3('dul ba): bar bya'o//de lta bas na gang yang rung ba zhig gi drung du rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa zhig nye bar 'ongs na/des de la chom rkun par grags pa ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o//
40a4('dul ba): ma dris par rab tu 'byin na/'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro////bam po nyi shu pa//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
40a5('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//de'i tshe gnas shig na/dge slong mang po zhig gcig cig la gnas bcas te 'dug pa las ji tsam ni/de dag
40a6('dul ba): gis nas kyi slob dpon de dus las 'das pa dang /de dag gis su zhig la bdag cag gi 'phral gyi bya ba zhu bar bya ba dang /gang la gnas bcas te 'dug par bya ba mi shes
40a7('dul ba): nas/skabs de dge slong rnams la bsnyad do//dge slong rnams kyis bac+doMs la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong de dag gis dge slong zhig les
40b1('dul ba): su bsko ba spang ba dang /gnas khang sbyang ba dang /mal stan+da spang ba dang /rim gro pa spang bas btsal bar bya ste/ji ste rnyed na de lta na ljags/ji ste ma rnyed na dge slong de dag
40b2('dul ba): gi sra gnas der gso sbyong gnyis pa'i bar du 'dug par mi bya ste/'dug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur//dge slong gzhan dag gcig gnas shig tu gnas kyi slob dpon
40b3('dul ba): gcig cig dang /dbyor gnas par khas blang bar 'dod pa las/de dag gi gnas kyi slob dpo na de lnga dus las 'das nas/de dag gis kyang ji ltar bsgrub pa mi shes pa'i
40b4('dul ba): skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong de dag gis kyang dge slong zhig/las su bsgo
40b5('dul ba): ba spang ba dang /gnas khang spang ba dang /mal stan spang ba dang /rim gro pa spang ba bas btsal bar bya ste/gal te rnyed na de lta na legs/ji ste ma rnyed na/dge slong de
40b6('dul ba): dag gis gnas der dbyar snga mar gnas par dam bca' bar mi bya ste/gnas par dam 'cha' na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro//dge slong gzhan dag gcig gnas shig
40b7('dul ba): tu gnas kyi slob dpon gcig cig dang dbyar snga mar gnas par dam bcas pa las/de dag gi slob dpon de yang dus las 'das nas/de dag gis kyang ji ltar bsgrub pa mi
41a1('dul ba): shes pa'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong de dag gis
41a2('dul ba): kyang dge slong zhig/las su bsgo ba spang ba dang /gnas khang spang ba dang /mal stan spang ba dang /rim gro pa spang bas btsal bar bya ste/gal te rnyed na de lta na
41a3('dul ba): legs/ji ste ma rnyed na dge slong de dge gi der gnas par mi bya'i/gzhan du song la dbyar nye bar sbyor ba gnyis par dbyar gnas par khas blang bar bya'o//der gnas na
41a4('dul ba): 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//dge slong gzhan drag cig gnas shig tu gnas kyi slob dpon gcig cig dang dbyar gonas par khas blang bar 'dod pa las/de dag gi
41a5('dul ba): gnas kyi slob dpon de yang dus las 'das nas/de dag gis kyang ji ltar bsgrub pa mi shes pa'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das pa gsol pa dang /bcom
41a6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong de dag gis kyang /dge slong zhig las su bsko ba spang ba dang /gnas khang spang ba dang /mal stan spang ba dang /rim gro pa spang
41a7('dul ba): bas btsal bar bya ste/gal te rnyed na legs/ji ste ma rnyed na dge slong de dag gis der dbyar phyi mar gnas par dam bca' bar mi bya ste/gnas par dam 'tshe' na
41b1('dul ba): 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro//dge slong gzhan dag gcig gnas shin tu gnas kyi slob dpon gcig cig dang /dbyar phyi mar gnas par dam bcas pa las de dag gi slob
41b2('dul ba): dpon de yang dus las 'das nas/de dag gis kyang ji ltar bsgrub par mi shes pa'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das
41b3('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong de dag gis zla ba gnyis kyi bor du gcig la cig dri zhing so sor brtags pas gnas par bya'o//zla ba gnyis 'das nas dge slong zhig la su
41b4('dul ba): bsko spang ba dang /gnas khang spang ba dang /mel cha spang ba dang /rim gro ba spang ba btsal bar bya ste/gal te rnyed na de lta na legs/ji ste ma rnyed na dge slong de dag gis
41b5('dul ba): gnas der gso steng gnyis pa'i bar du 'dug par mi bya ste/'dug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//dge slong gzhan dag cig gnas shig tu dge slong gcig cig gis rab
41b6('dul ba): tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas pa las/de dag gi mkhan po de dus las 'das pa dang /de dag gis kyang ji ltar bsgrub pa mi shes shes bya ba thams cad slob dpon la ji lta
41b7('dul ba): bar snga ma bzhin du brjod par bya'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mngon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//ri bor
42a1('dul ba): don ma da na la 'dun du tshu rgyu sa/ g+sa d+hA sa / dgadan d+hAm/
42b1('dul ba): slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de bzhin 'bros par mi bya'i/'on kyang gtsug lag khang gi bdag po'i nye du dag la/
42b2('dul ba): gtsug lag khang gi bdeg po ni rgyal po'i khab du bzung na/ci khyed kyis bdag cag gis bsod snyoms kyi yo byad sbyar nus sam zhes dri bar bya ste/gal te de dag sbyor
42b3('dul ba): na de lta na legs/ji ste mi sbyor na/lo lnga'i bar du bsod snyoms bya zhing 'dug par bya'o//lo lnga 'das nas gal te gtsug lag khang gi bdag por slar btang na de lta
42b4('dul ba): na legs/ji ste ma btang ni gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las byas nas/gtsug lag khang de'i nye 'khor gyi gtsug lag khyang drag yongasu skyong bar byed pa rnams dang /
42b5('dul ba): rnyed pa thun mongs dang gso sbyong tha dad pa dag gis lo gzhan lnga'i bar du 'dug par bya'o//las ni 'di ltar bya ste/nye 'khor gyi gtsug log khang dag tu gnas mal
42b6('dul ba): bshams te gaN+DI brdungs nas dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/dge 'dun thams cad 'dus shing 'khod pa dang /dge slong cig gis
42b7('dul ba): gsol ba byas nas las byas te/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/gtsug lag khang che ge mo zhig gi bdag po rgyal pos bzung ste/gal te dge 'dun gyi
43a1('dul ba): dus la bar cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang ba mdzod cig dang /dge 'dun gyis gtsug lag khang de gtsug lag khang 'di dag dang rnyed pa
43a2('dul ba): thun mong dang gso sbyong tha dad par bgyi'o//'di ni gsol ba'o//las ni 'di ltar byas ste/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/gtsug lag khang che ge mo
43a3('dul ba): zhig gi bdag po rgyal pos bzung ste/de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis gtsug lag khong de gtsug lag khang 'di dge dang /rnyed pa thun mong dang gso sbyong tha dad par
43a4('dul ba): mdzad na/tshe dang ldan pa gang dag gtsug lag khang de/gtsug lag khang 'di dag dang rnyed pa thun mong dang /gso sbyong tha dad par mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang
43a5('dul ba): ma gsungs shig/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/dge 'dun gyis gtsug lag khang che ge mo zhig rnyed pa thun
43a6('dul ba): mong dang /gso sbyong tha dad par mdzad legs te/'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to//gal te rnam pa des lo bcu'i bar du gnas pa rnams la gtsug
43a7('dul ba): lag khang gi bdag po 'ongs na de lta na legs/ji ste ma 'ong na nye 'khor gyi gtsug lag khang dag tu gnas mal dang snod dang /yo byad dag bzhag nas/nang sgo bcad
43b1('dul ba): de 'gro byar bya'o//gang gi tshe gtsug lag khang gi bdag po slar r+ya btang bya de'i tshe nye 'khor gyi gtsug lug khang dgra nas rdzas ji ltar bzhag pa rnams phyir blangs te de nyid du sbyin
43b2('dul ba): par bya'o//gal te nye 'khor gyi gtsug lag khang na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis byin na de lta na legs/ji ste ma byin na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyu ro//sangs rgyas bcom
43b3('dul ba): ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso//drug sde rnams lus kyis khur khyer ba bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams
43b4('dul ba): kyis mthong nas 'phya bar byed de/'phags pa re shig bdag cag ni khyim pa khyim na gnas pa lags pas pha ma deng bu dang /bu mo dang /bran mo dang /bran po dang /las byed
43b5('dul ba): pa dang /zho shus 'tsho ba dang /rgyal po dang /lha dang /gshAn dog dang /dge sbyong dang /bram ze rnams kyi don du lus kyis khur 'khung 'tshal na/khyod ko su'i don du khur snoms/
43b6('dul ba): de dag cang mi zer bar 'dug pa'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag bram ze dang /khyim
43b7('dul ba): bdag rnams 'phya ba ni thog tu bab po//de lta bas na dge slong gis lus kyis khur bkur bar mi bya'o//dge slong lus kyis khur khyer na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyu ro//bcom
44a1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis lus kyis khur bkur bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /drug sde rnams kyis rgyab dang /rked pa dang /glo dang /mgos
44a2('dul ba): khur bkur bar brtsams te/nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyab kyis ma yin rked pas mo yin/glos ma yin/mgos khur
44a3('dul ba): bkur bar mi bya ste/khur na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//sdom ni/gnas dang yo byad drug dang nI//de nas de las phrogs pa dang //yid bcugs len pa lnga dang ni//
44a4('dul ba): btso blag sgo khong 'chag sa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//de'i tshe
44a5('dul ba): bram ze rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa zhig rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang /ji tsam na dge slong log ni lhung bzed thogs pa rab tu mong po khar bsil thogs nas/bsod snyoms
44a6('dul ba): le chus pa de dag des mthong nas des bsams pa/re shig de dag gang du 'gro dri'o snyam nas des de dag la dris pa/'phags pa gang du bzhud/de dag gis smras pa/bram ze
44a7('dul ba): bsod snyoms la 'gro'o//des smras pa/'phags pa dge slong thams cad bsod snyoms la rgyu 'am/de dag gis smras pa/bram ze dge slong shes nyen can gang dag yin
44b1('dul ba): pa de dag la ni bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams bsod snyoms gtsug lag khang du khyer te 'ongs nas 'bu'o//shes nyen med pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni bsod snyoms la 'gro'o//
44b2('dul ba): des bsams pa/dge sbyong shAkya'i bu pa rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ba dang khyad par ci yod kyis bdag gis 'dir yang de bzhin du bsod snyoms la 'gro bar bya'o snyam mo//des
44b3('dul ba): yang bsams pa/re shig dge slong gzhan zhig la yang ci 'di dag bsod snyoms kho na la gnas te rab tu byung ngam/'on te gnas gzhan yang yod dri bar bya'o snyam nas de
44b4('dul ba): dge slong zhig gi drung du song ba dang /des de la 'ongs pa legs zhes bya ba'i kun tu spyod pa kun tu spyad nas smras pa/bram ze khyod gang gis ci'i phyir 'di re 'ongs/des smras pa/
44b5('dul ba): 'phags pa khyod blta ba kho na'i phyir 'ongs te/re shig khyod ci la gnas nas rab tu phyung ba dri'o//des smras pa/bram ze leg so leg so//khyod kyi rtog pa ni bzang ste/'dug shig
44b6('dul ba): dang gtam bya'o//bram ze rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa des/rkang pa la phyag byas nas/de'i mdun du 'dug pa dang /des smras pa/bram ze bzhi po 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis
44b7('dul ba): legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba/bsnyen par rdzogs par dge slong gi gnasu bcad pa yin//bram ze bzhi gang zhe na/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag
45a1('dul ba): gos rnams kyi nang na/phyag dar khrod ni rung ba rnyed kyang bla ba ste/de la gnas na dge slong legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung bsnyen
45a2('dul ba): pa rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos por 'gyuraro//zas rnams kyi nang na bsod snyoms dang /gnas mal rnams kyi nang rna shing drung dang /sman rnams kyi nang ni bkrus te bor ba
45a3('dul ba): ni rung ba/rnyed kyang bla ba ste/de la gnas na dge slong legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos por 'gyur ro zhes bka'
45a4('dul ba): stsal to//bram ze bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la gnasu bcad pa ni bzhi po 'di dag yin te/'di dag la gnas nas bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul
45a5('dul ba): ba la rab tu byung bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos por 'gyuraro//bram zes smras pa/'phags pa su zhig gnas 'di dag gis 'tsho bar nus bdag rab tu 'byung snyam
45a6('dul ba): ste/'dis mchis na rab tu 'byung ba 'di yang dka' ba zhig pas/phyag 'tshalo michi'o zhes smras te song ngo //de nyid de'i rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi
45a7('dul ba): dngos po'i bar cad du gyur nas/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung/
45b1('dul ba): na dgra slong dag rab tu ma byung gakhon la gnas bAn+thi brjod pa las gyur gyis/de ltu ngas na dge slong kauT rab tu ma byung ba 'am/bsnyen pa ma rtogs pa la gnas bzhi brjod par/
45b2('dul ba): mi bya'i/gang gi tshe rab tu bsnyen par rdzogs pa de'i cho gnas bzhi brjod par bya'o//rab tu ma byung bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la gnas bzhi brjod na 'gal tshabs can du 'gro/
45b3('dul ba): gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/de de dang rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod
45b4('dul ba): par byed do//de rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/dga' mgur spyod pa byed pa las n+de bya ba snga ma bzhi no//rigs dang mnyem pa'i ming btags te/de bskyed bsrings nas chen por gyur
45b5('dul ba): to//de dus gzhan zhig ni pas spyod pa dang /des bsams pa/pheM mgu dkri' pUre gyur gyis rgyal byed kyi chel du song la rab tu 'byung snyam nas/de rgyal byed kyi tshul du song ngo //
45b6('dul ba): drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni drug sde gang yang rung ba zhig gis/rgyal byen gyi tsha l-I g+h+ri sgo mo stong pa yin na te/tshe dang ldan pa nye dga'i skyon 'dug po des de mthong nas smras pa/
45b7('dul ba): bzhin bzangs 'ongs po log so//khyod zla ba lta bur gnas pa yin na ring mo zhig lon te galas 'ongs/des smras pa/'phags pa ring mo zhig lon te mthong ba ni legs kyi/
46a1('dul ba): yang dang yang mthong ba ni brnyas par 'gyuraro//don kyang 'phyags pa rab tu byung bar 'tshal gyis rab tu phyung shig/bzhin bzang khyod kyis sems
46a2('dul ba): bskyed pa ni bzang ste/rab tu 'byung ba ni mchog/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang phan yon lnga mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung bar bya ba mos par bya ba'i rig so zhes bya
46a3('dul ba): ba nos/sangs rgyas rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos dam pa yang dag par zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis shes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no//de lta bas nu
46a4('dul ba): legs kyis rab tu phyung shig/de lta mod kyi 'di la yo byad drug dgos na khyod la yo byad drug yod dam/'phags pa yo byad drug po de dag ji lta bu zhig lags/bzhin
46a5('dul ba): bzangs lhung bzed dang chu tshags dang /chos gos gsum dang gding ba'o//'phags pa ma mchi so//bzhin bzangs kho bo la yang med de re shig song shig dang /kho bos
46a6('dul ba): yo byad drug btsalo//de pha spangs nas gnyen dag gi drung du song ba dang /de dag gis khye'u de ji ltar rab tu 'byung ba thos pas de dag gis de chung ma blangs//tshe dang ldan pa
46a7('dul ba): dgas yo byad drug rnyed nas de dus gzhan zhig na yo byad drug bzhag ste/mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang /des khye'u de srang du mthong nas/des smras pa
46b1('dul ba): bzhin bzangs kho bos yo byad drug po de dag rnyed de/tshur rab tu dbyung gis 'dong /des smras pa/'phags pa bdag gis kyang yo byad drug rnyed do//bzhin bzangs ci 'dra ba
46b2('dul ba): dag cig/'phags pa migra dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid do//bzhin bzangs de ji tha tshig/'phags pa bdag nye du rnams kyis chung ma blangs na/
46b3('dul ba): cing rab tu 'byung ngam/de nyid de'i rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po'i bar cad du gyur nas/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la
46b4('dul ba): gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas na gnang gis yo byad drug brnyas nas rab tu dbyung bar bya zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par bya'o//
46b5('dul ba): legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po rnyed dka' bas/yo byad drug po dog rim gyis btsal nas brnyas pa
46b6('dul ba): slar byin cig/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba dang /rkun po dag gis bcom nas/de dag gis phrogs pa de khyer te//
46b7('dul ba): rgyal byed kyi tshal du lhags nas btsong bar brtsamaso//dge slong bcom pa de dag kyang de nyid du 'ongs nas/dge slong de dag gis rang gi lhung bzed dang chos gos dag ngo shes te
47a1('dul ba): de dag gis pa na dang /shos ldan dag 'di dag gis bdag kyi spyang bamaud dang /chos gos dI sa kyis/rlan pa rnams zus
47a2('dul ba): shig zungs shig ces byas pa dang /de dag ku che'i sgra thos nas skrag ste blos//dge slong rnams kyis ring rang gi lhung bzed dang /chos gos blangs nas 'dug ste/ci 'dri
47a3('dul ba): bdag cag la rung ba yin nam/'on te rung ba ma yaun+te/mi shes pa'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das
47a4('dul ba): kyi skye bka' stsal pa/de ni gang gis phrogs pa de kho na'i yin pas de dag bsdigs par mi bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de ni gang gis phrogs pa de kho na'i yin zhes
47a5('dul ba): 'asulwa pa dang /dge slong gzhan dag cig ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba dang /rkun po rnams kyis mthong nas de dag gis de rnams gzhom par brtsams te/de dag gis
47a6('dul ba): de rnangs kyi lhung bzed dang /chos gos ji snyed la leg pas reg pa de snyed lta ba med par bor nas de rnams lhung bzed dang/chos gos kyis phongs par gyur pa'i skabs
47a7('dul ba): dede dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bkru' stsal pa/ji srid rkun po dag gis phrogs pa khyer nas/sbyor ba'i rgyun ma
47b1('dul ba): bcad pade srid du lta ba med par mi bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis ji srid du rkun po dag gis phrogs pa khyer nas sbyor bu rgyun ma bcad pa de srid du lta ba med par mi bya'o zhes
47b2('dul ba): bka' stsal pa dang /rkun po de dag gis phrogs pa de khyer nas/mnyan yid du zhugs te sred du btsong bar brtsomaso//dge slong de rnams kyis phrogs pa de ngo shes te/
47b3('dul ba): shes nas rkun po de rnams rgyal po'i pho brang du khrid de/de dag der bsad pa dang bcing ba dang /bcad pa dang /dbug pa la sogs pa/sdug bsngal gyi khyad par dag gis//
47b4('dul ba): nye bar gcir cing shin tu sdug bsngal bar byas pa'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal
47b5('dul ba): po'i pho brang du sbran par mi bya'i/'on kyang sngor chos bshad nus blang bar bya'o//gal te mi ste rA na rin phyed kyis blang bar bya'o//gal te de ltar yang mi ster nA rin tshang bar
47b6('dul ba): byin nas blang bar bya ste/dge slong dag gis lhung bzed dang /chos gos byas pa mthar phyin pa ni rnyed par doka'o//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//dge slong dag gis lci ba skam po
47b7('dul ba): dang /so shing mtshon rtsi'i shal ma la sogs pa bzhin du bor nas mi lta bar dong ba dang /de dag dge slong 'gas kyang 'gyod pas ma blangs pas de nyid du chud zos pa'i skabs
48a1('dul ba): de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bAkur sprul pa/yid btsugs pa lngas len pa/mdza'
48a2('dul ba): ba dang /yid du 'ong ba dang /bla ma dang /dran par bya ba dang /thos nas dga' bar 'gyu ro snyam nas/len pa ni legs par blangs pa yin te/'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o//
48a3('dul ba): gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis gtso blag gi las bya'o zhes bkra' stsal pa dang /dge slong drug gis sgo khang dang 'chag sa dag tu chos gos
48a4('dul ba): dge bac+doMs pas de dag rdul gyis kyang phig/rdzi char gyis kyang gsher po'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcomu ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan
48a5('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gtsug lag khang du btso blag gi las bya'o//dge slong dag gis gtsug lag khang du btso blag gi las bya bar brnams pa dang /chen
48a6('dul ba): sA la zo ba khrag lte bur snang ba bram ze dang khyim badrag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/'phags pa phyogs 'dir ra lug bsud dam ci/de dag gis smras pa/shes
48a7('dul ba): ldan dag bdag cag gis phyogs 'dir btse blag gi las byas pas tshon rtsi bo'o//de dag gis smras pa/'phags pa gal te tshon rtsi po na/he por ni sdug par snang gis
48b1('dul ba): byi dor bgyid du stsol cig/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/zhal zhal byug par bya/de dag gis thams
48b2('dul ba): cod du drugs po dang /rdo bral dag ma rungs par gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ji thal can ni bkru bar bya'o//gzhan du ni zhal zhal gyis byug par bya'o//
48b3('dul ba): rlom ni/shing rnams bskyed par gnang ba dang //na meng+ge//gos dag de n+te/kha ra ring po tshigs bca du//mra sa nas sdom du yang dan sbyin//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
48b4('dul ba): rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal ka lAn da ka gnas pa na bzhug so//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po porgya byin lus 'phags ril badren pa la bzhug pa de'i tshe/rgyal
48b5('dul ba): gzugs can snying pos der dus ston gcugs pas/der yul ma ga d+ha na gnas pa'i spyi ba'i tshogs thams cad 'du'o//lus 'phags ri rdo can shing med pa zhi ga pas/yul ma pa
48b6('dul ba): na gnas pa'i skye ba'i tshogs tshabs gdungs te/'phags pa kye ma khyed kyi 'dir shong bskyed rjod/de dag gis skyes pa/shes ldan dge bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /
49a1('dul ba): dum+b+ha ldan gan gis kyang bskyod pa d+h+r-i/ma ldan 'das kyis shing gastong par bya'o zhes bka' stsal par ba dag slong dag gos shing bskyod do nga
49a2('dul ba): bas ng+ge dag de bzhin du skams so//yul ma ga d+hA na gnas pa'i spyi ba'i tshogs phyi mo lhags pa dang /de bzhin du che bas gdung nas smras pa/'phags pa khyed kyis shing de
49a3('dul ba): dag ma bskyed dam/shes ldan drag bskyed na 'on kyang zhal ta ma byas pas ma rung ngo //'asngags pa gal te khyed kyang ba ma dag gis bskyod nas zhal ta byas par ma gyur na//khyed
49a4('dul ba): ma rung bar 'gyuraro//kye ma khyed kyi zhal tA byas 'dod/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
49a5('dul ba): shing bskyed nas yul bar dor ba ro mi bya'i/'on kyang zhal ta bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis shing bskyed nas yal ba der bA mi d+hi'i/'on kyang zhal te bya'o zhes bka' stsal gyi
49a6('dul ba): dge slong dag gis ji ltar zhal ta bya ba mi shes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sbrul pa/dus dus su chus bcu bar bya'o//dge slong dag de kho nA lhur len pas/dag pa
49a7('dul ba): phyog su nyams par gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lhur blang bar mi bya'i/la lar na lag pa/lo lar ni rkang pa bkru bar byi'o//la lar ni sa shing
49b1('dul ba): bdU ba /'gyur to// bad bzla bar gyu//la la na khrus //de dag tu/na b+h+yod kyidus k+Sha bas tshoganas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ga chus gzhug par
49b2('dul ba): /dge slong dag gis rbA suM bajug pa dang /de dag nags me shor pos tshog nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rlabs bskor bar bya'o/n+yAM ma shwo bar chabs gdungs
49b3('dul ba): nos/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/skyur lung gdod par bya'o//dbyur sbyang bzhin du chus gang skye 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'i stsal pa/dbyar gyi dus su rtsig
49b4('dul ba): ba shig la chu 'bo bar byag//dge slong dag gis ji srid shing de dag chen por ma gyur par de dag bor te dong ba dang /de dag de bzhin du skams nas/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis
49b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ngas dge slong shing bskyed par byed pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/dge slong shing skyed par byed
49b6('dul ba): pas/gal te me tog gi shing bskyed par gyur ni ji srid du me tog ma chags pa de srid du 'gro bar mri d+h-i//nyon te 'bras bu'i'o shing skyed par gyur na dzA srid du 'bras bu ma tshogs pa
49b7('dul ba): srid du 'gro bar mi bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong shing skyed par byed pas/ji srid du me tog dang 'bras bu ma chags po de srid du 'gro bar mi bya'o//zhes bka' stsal pa dang /
50a1('dul ba): dge slong rnams la bya ba rings pa dag gcig byung ste/de dag gis ji ltar bsgrub pa mi shes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/dro dag
50a2('dul ba): gis kun dga' ra ba pa 'am/dge slong sgros 'drin la bcol nas 'gro bar bya ste/'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o//gleng gzhi ni rgyal po'i khab na'o//rgyal po sa 'dzin
50a3('dul ba): gyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la/la ba rin po che zhig skye su bskur ba dang /de rgyal po gzugs can+do snying pos tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu la byino//tshe dang ldan pa
50a4('dul ba): bI lin da'i bu des gyon nas dgon pa'i gan su song ste 'dug po dang /rkun po rnams kyis/rgyal po sa 'dzin gyis/rgyal po gzugs can snying po la la ba rin po
50a5('dul ba): zhig bskur ba de des/'phags pa pi lin da'i bu la byin pa dang /des de gyon nas dgon pa'i gnas che ge zhig na 'dugo zhes ji lta ba bzhin du thos nas de dag phan tshun
50a6('dul ba): gros bya bar brtsams pa/shes ldan dag de skad ces grag na 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/kha cig gis smras pa/'di la ci zhig bsgrub tu yod/chur dong la dbrog mod/de dag
50a7('dul ba): dong ste sgo la dal gyis brdungs pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa pi len da'i bus smras pa/'di su zhig/de dag gis smras pa/'phags pa bdag cag ni rkun po'o//ci 'dod 'phags pa
50b1('dul ba): lnga la bya rin po che'o//bzhin bzangs dag gAste de lta na skar khung nas lag bA rkyong shig/de nas gtsug cig gis lag pa brkyang ba dang /tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bus la ba
50b2('dul ba): rin po che de/mo 'chad cig/ma 'tshigacig/'dren pa ni zad par ma gyur cig/ces de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas/skar khung nas de'i phyogs gcig byung ba dang /kun po
50b3('dul ba): rnams kyis drangs shing drangs nas phung por byas te drangs na zang bum btub nas/de dag gis mtshon gyis bcad par bajoms na yang mchod/mes bsregs par brtsams na
50b4('dul ba): yang 'tshig tu ma btub nas/de dag gis smos pa/'phags pa pi lin da ri bu bdag cag la ci zhig tho tsam/thong zhig des smras pa/skyes bu gti mug dag khyed kyis tho ma
50b5('dul ba): brtsams nangs ji ltar tho ba tsam//khyed kyi stobs dang /brtson 'grus dang /pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa des drangs na ngas ji ltar mi btang /de dag gis smras pa/shes ldan
50b6('dul ba): dgra 'phags pa pi lin da'i bu rdzu 'phrul chen po mthu chen pos ma btang phan chad 'dzin pa 'ongs na mi rung gis bros te 'dod do zhes de dag bros so//skabs de dge slong rnams kyis
50b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong dag de lta bu'i rin po che dag gyon nas dgon pa'i gnas
51a1('dul ba): na 'dug bya las gyur gyis/du phy-i dge slong glus d+he sgyu du na byid+mo dag dgon pa'i gan su bzung ba ma snyam du dgadus nas/dran dung
51a2('dul ba): rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag dge sbyong ba lin de'i dus la ba rin po che de 'dra ba gyon nas dgon pa'i gan su'i 'dug pa gang yin pa de ni ma legs pa zhig byas//
51a3('dul ba): de lta bas na dge slong gis la ba rin po che de lta bu gyon nas dgon pa'i gnas su 'dug par mi bya'o//'dug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro//'on kyang dge slong dgon pa'i
51a4('dul ba): gnas na gnas pa gang zhig la/lwa ba rin po che de lta bu 'dog pa des khyim dung zhag par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis la ba rin po che de 'dra ba khyim du bzhag par bya'o zhes
51a5('dul ba): bka' stsal pa dang /dge slong dgon pa'i gnas na 'dug pa gzhan zhig la ba chen po la 'os pa'i lwa ba grub pa des de khyim du bzhag pa dang /srog chags dag gis dmugs
51a6('dul ba): pa'i skams de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/na me ru kas btab ste bzhag par bya'o//gal te/
51a7('dul ba): de ma rnyed na shing kun nam/ba sha ka'i lo ma'am/a ri ta'i lo mas rin pa rim pa re btab nas gzhag par bya'o//rim pa rim par gdab tu ma 'byor nas/bcom
51b1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bkura' sprul pa/gus N+Di 'byor bya mod na mang du bat+tA bA nAs gro zhag re skyo nong dus dus bskum par bya'o//gleng gan no mnyan yod nano//gang gi tshe khyim bdag/
51b2('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyis rgyal byed kyi tsha la phyogs bzhi'i dge sbyong gi dge 'dun po phul pa de'i tshe/de dus dus su ston pa'i zhabs dang /dge slong gnas brtan gnas
51b3('dul ba): brtan rnams la phyag 'tshal du 'ong ngo //ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dgun ka dge slong rnams lhags pas sgribs nas/bskums te gnas khang dag ni nyal zhing 'dug
51b4('dul ba): khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ston pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal du rgyal byed kyi tshil du song ba des/dge slong de dag dge ba'i phyogs btang ste/de gzhan du 'dug pa
51b5('dul ba): mthong nas/des smras pa/'phags pa gcig tu brtson pa'i bstan pa la ci ste/dge ba'i phyogs btang ste bzhugs/de dag gis smras pa/khyim bdag lhags pas
51b6('dul ba): sbrebs so//de cang mi smra bar rkang pa la phyag byas te song ngo //des khyim du phyin nas gos lnga brgya dge 'dun la bskur ba dang /dge slong rnams kyis kha btsar bcad nas
51b7('dul ba): bcog dang tshon gzhan gyis ci dga' dgur kha bsgyur te gyon no//ji tsom na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yang ston pa'i nalnga la phyag 'tshal du 'ongs pas/dge slong
52a1('dul ba): rnams kyi gnas khang du bltas na gos de dag mi snang nas des smras pa/'phags pa gos de dag mi gda' na/khyed kyis gang du bzhag/de dag
52a2('dul ba): gis ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad pa dang /des smras pa/'phags pa khyed kyis chen po la 'os po'i gos de lta bu chud gsan to//kye ma khyed kyis kha tshar ring po nyid dang dkar por
52a3('dul ba): gzhag 'dod/de dag spobs pa med nas cang mi zer bar 'dug po'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
52a4('dul ba): stsal pa/de lta bas na gnang gis dge 'dun gyis gos sar pa kha tshar ring po dag bcang bar bya'o//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi las sgo bzhi pa rdzogs s+ho///
52a5('dul ba): bsdus pa'i sdom ni/lus dang gleng ba sangs rgyas dang //spang ba dag dang nga 'das dang //'tshams las phyi rol dge slong rnams//dus ston rgyu bar bcas pa'o//sdom ni ro ni
52a6('dul ba): bsreg par bya ba dang //shA ri yi bu'i mchod rten dang //der ni dus ston bya ba dang //dung dang nya phyis tshong ba'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal bu rmel byed kyi
52a7('dul ba): tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//mnyan yod na/khyim bdag cig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa la chung ma blangs te/de de dang lhan cig ces bya ba
52b1('dul ba): nas/bru bo zhig btsas te de bcas bya'i bcas sngon zhag bdun gtu nyi shun gcig tu rgya tshor byas nus rigs dang 'thun pa'i ming btags te/bsrings bskyod nas chen por
52b2('dul ba): gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhi no//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig ni/legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /de'i khams mi mnyam nas na bar gyur
52b3('dul ba): te/de rtsa ba dang sdong bu dang /me tog dang 'bras bu'i sman dag gis rim gro byas na/ma phan te dus las 'daso//de dge slong dag gis lhung bzed dang bcas chos gos
52b4('dul ba): dang bcas par lame dang nye ba zhig tu bor ro//ji tsam na lam de nas bram ze dang khyim bdag 'gro ba de dag gis de mthong ste/de na kha cig gis smras pa/shes ldan dag
52b5('dul ba): shAkya'i bu pa zhig dus las 'daso//gzhan dag gis smras pa/tshu sheg lta bar bya'o//do de dag gis mthong nas ngo shes te de dag gis smras pa/shes ldan dag 'di ni
52b6('dul ba): khyim bdag che ge mo'i bu yin te/dge sbyong shAkya'i bu pi mgon med pa rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung bas/gnas skabs 'dri 'dra bar gyur to//'di dag gi nang du rab tu
52b7('dul ba): gyung bar ma gyur na/nye du dag gis 'dir rim gro byas par 'gyur ba zhig/skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
53a1('dul ba): sbrul smra /nga na sgrubasan gan nas pan sgyu / d+hA//nam ldan 'das slo ga slong sha b+h+yo zhes smra
53a2('dul ba): pa dang /dge slong dag dza~M ltar rim gro b+ha ba ma shes nas/bcomya ldan+d+ra 'dis kyis bka' skyob pa/bsreg par d+ha'i//bcom ldan 'das kyis bzlog par
53a3('dul ba): gsungs pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis lus 'di la srin bu'i rigs brgyad khri yod do//zhes
53a4('dul ba): gang gsungs pa de dag ji lta bu lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nye bar la bar de skyes me thag tu de dag kyang skye la/shi ba'i tshe de dag kyang 'chi mo
53a5('dul ba): 'on kyang rmyi'i sgo rnams brtags te bsreg par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bsreg par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /shing mo 'byor nas/skabs de bcom ldan 'das
53a6('dul ba): la dge slong dag gis gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chu klung dag tu dar bar bya'o//chu klung med nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
53a7('dul ba): sa brkos te gzhug par bya'o//dbyar kha sa yang 'thas la shing yang srog chags can du gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/thibs po'i phyog sumano
53b1('dul ba): byang phyog pu bstan to sta sa hA'i bam po bzhag lA glo g.yas pas bskal te/rtswa 'am lo ma'i tshogs kyis g.yogs la yon sngo zhing rgyud chags gsum gyi chos mnyan pa
53b2('dul ba): byin nos/'dong bar bya'o//dge slong dag de bzhin du dang ba dang /bri ze dang khyim bdag dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni ro bskyal nas khrus mi byed par de bzhin 'dong ste/
53b3('dul ba): gtsang sbra med do zhes 'phya bar byed nas/skabs de bcom ldan 'das yi dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de bzhin du dong bar
53b4('dul ba): mi bya'i/'on kyang khrus bya'o//de dag thams cad bkru bar brtsams pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/thams cad khrus mi bya'i/gang dag reg pa de dag
53b5('dul ba): gis gos dang bcas te bkru bar bya'o//gzhan dag gi ni rkang lag nyi tshe bkru bar bya'o//de dag mchod rten la phyag mi 'tshal nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
53b6('dul ba): sprul pa/mchod rten dag la phyag 'tshal bar bya'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya ka lAn do ka gnas pa nA bzhug so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /
53b7('dul ba): mo'u dgal gyi bu gnyis kyi kun tu spyod pa ni/dus du su sems can dmyal ba yang rgyu zhing 'dong /bud 'gror yang 'dod/yi dgas dag tu yang 'dong /lha'i nang du
54a1('dul ba): yang 'dong /mau dag tu yang rgyu zhing 'dod do//de gnyis dus gzhan zhib na dmyal bar rgyu zhing 'dod ba lAs/mnar mod pa'i dmyal ba chen por
54a2('dul ba): son pa dang /der tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu/dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams
54a3('dul ba): ngal sos par gyis shig/tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bus/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin bgyi'o zhes/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ltar mnyan te/na mkha'
54a4('dul ba): la 'phags nas/chang shing rta'i srog shi ci byi rgyun dbab par brtsams pa dang /chu de mnar med pa'i me lce'i 'od kyis bar du bskams par gyur to//tshe dang ldan pa
54a5('dul ba): shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gzhes shig dang /bdag gis ngal sos par bgyi'o//des smras pa/legs kyis de bzhin du ngal
54a6('dul ba): sos par mdzod ces smras te/tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgol gyi bu chen pos bsdad pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ting nge 'dzin mos pa tsan+da zhes bya ba la snyoms par
54a7('dul ba): zhugs nas/des ma nar med pa chen po de bsil bar byas te/mnar med pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rgyun bcad//de nas de gnyis kyi rdzogs byed chos
54b1('dul ba): log par smyon pas/lus chen por gyur cing de'i lce la yang ga shol lnga brgyas rgod pa mthong ba dang /des smras pa/'phags pa shA ri'i bu dang mo'u dgal gyis bu gal te
54b2('dul ba): 'dzam bu'i gling du gshegs na/tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la bdag gi mchid nas ngas chos log par bstan pas skye bo'i tshogs sang pa bslus te/de las yang
54b3('dul ba): dag par blangs nas kun tu spyad pa des lce lnga gshol lnga brgyas rmod cing /khyed kyis ji lta ji ltar nga'i mchod rten la rnyed par byas pa de lta de ltar yang sdug bsngal ches mi zad pa
54b4('dul ba): gyur gyis/phyin chad mi byed par thong tsog cig mchi'o zhes gsung shig/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /mo'u dgal gyi bu dag gis rdzogs byed pa cang mi smra bas/khas blangaso//
54b5('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dong mo'u dgal gyi bu mnar med pa nas mi snang bar gyur te/rgyal po'i khab tu dong ngo //de gnyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa dang /kun du rgyu dbyug
54b6('dul ba): rdzogs spyi bud can dag cig phyir byung nas/de dag kha cig gis skyes pa/shos ljon dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di dag brdeg/kha cig gis smras pa/de bzhin kho nar
54b7('dul ba): brdeg na mo leg te/klan ka bo tsal nas brdeg par bya'o//de dag gis smras pa/de bzhin du bya'o//tshe dang ljon pa shA ri 'iri bu sngar song ba dang /de dag gis de la smras pa/
55a1('dul ba): 'phags pa shA ri'i bu kun tu 'tsho ba dag la dge sbyong yod dam/des tshigs bcud de smras pa/kun tu 'tshol dge sbyong med//shAkya rnams
55a2('dul ba): nang na yod//dgra bcom dag la chags ldan med//bus pa so so'i skyo bo 'ang med//de dag gis tshig su bcad pa de'i don khong du ma chud nas/de dag gis smras
55a3('dul ba): pa/shes ldan dge 'dis ni bdag cag gi bsngags pa smras kyis su yang ci yang ma smra bar 'gror chug shig ces byas te de songango //tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu
55a4('dul ba): phyi bzhin du 'ong ba/sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa nye bar gnas pas/ngal nas ngal nas 'ong ba de de dag gis mthong nas/'phags pa mo'u dgal gyi bu kun tu
55a5('dul ba): 'tsho ba dag la dge sbyong yod dam/des smras pa/shes ldan dag kun tu 'tsho ba dag la dag sbyong ga la yod de/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /'di la dge sbyong
55a6('dul ba): dang po yod/'di la gnyis pa yod/'di la gsum pa yod/'di la bzhi pa yod kyi/'odi las phyi rol pa la ni dge sbyong dang bram ze med de/pha rol rab tu
55a7('dul ba): smra ba rnams ni dge sbyong dang bram zes stong ngo //de lta bas na 'dir 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag por bsgragaso zhes gsung so//gzhan yang khyed kyi ston par
55b1('dul ba): mnur med pa chen por skyes te/chos log par bstan pas/lus chun por gyur yid lho la gshol lnga brgyas rmod do//des dA la than btag bdag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par
55b2('dul ba): spyod pa rnams la/ngas chos log par bstan pas skye bo'i tshogs ming po bslus te/de las yang dag par blangs shing kun tu spyad pa des lce la gshol lnga brgyas rmod
55b3('dul ba): tsong /khyed kyis ji lta ji ltar nga'i mchod rten la rjed par byed pa de lta da ltar nga la sdug bsngal ches mi zad par gyur to zhes gsungs shig ze ro//de dag rngam nas
55b4('dul ba): smras pa/shes ldan dag mako reg dran pa bdag cag la kha zer bar ma zad/bdag cag gi ston pa la yang mi snyan pa zer na/ji ltar bsgrub par bya/de na kha cig gis smras
55b5('dul ba): pa/'di la bsgrub tu ci yod/'di te por btal du zad mod gzhan dag gis smras pa/sngar yang bdag cag gi skyes pa yin te/de de bzhin du brdeg gis chur/khyed no re
55b6('dul ba): gla na ka btsal nas brdeg go zer ba de ni bdag cag dang bdag cag ston pa la kha byas pas don gyis grub pa zhes de dag gis de'i yan lag dang nying lag 'dam bu bzhin
55b7('dul ba): kho tsam nas dang //tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/tshe dang ldan pa mi'u dgal gyi bu ci thogs snyam bsam nas/des phyir log ste/bltas na ji tsam na yan lag dang /nying
56a1('dul ba): lag 'dam bu bzhin du bcom nus/sa la 'gyel ba na pong ste/des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu 'di ci nyes/des smras pa/
56a2('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la su zad mod gzhan ci zhig yin par 'gyur/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod/bcom ldan 'das
56a3('dul ba): kyis rdzu 'phrul can gyi mchog tu ma bstan tam/de ji ltar gyur/des smras pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bdag las kyis non pas/rdzu zhes bya ba yang mi dran na/rdzu
56a4('dul ba): 'phrul lnga smos kyang ci dgos/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu byis pa chung ngu bzhin du bla gos kyi nang du bcug nas gtsug lag
56a5('dul ba): khang du khyer ba dang /dge slong dag gis de lta bu'i mI sdig pa mthong nas/sngangs te 'dug nas/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la dris pa 'di ci zhig/des smras pa/
56a6('dul ba): dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu kun tu rgyu dbyug thogs spyi phud can rnams kyis 'di lta bur byas med ces smras te/nges de del gyis sa le bska'o//dge slong dag gis smras
56a7('dul ba): pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'dul can gyi mchog tu bstan pa ma yin namaHdes smras pa/bskrun na tshe dang ldan pa dag las rnams kyi
56b1('dul ba): mthu la ltos/gang gis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed/rkang pa g.yam pa'i mthe bos bskul rab tu bskul//kun tu rab tu bskul te/bcom
56b2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul chem dang mdzub nas kyi mchog tu bstan pa de/dalas kyis non nas/rdzu zhes bya ba yang mi dran na/rdzu 'phrul lta smos kyang ci dwagos/de na dge slong gang dag
56b3('dul ba): 'phags pa'i lam ma skyes pa de dag mi dga' zhing shin tu skyo nas dgon pa dang nags khrod dang /bas mtha'i gnas mal dag tu gnas nas/yid la byed pa bskyed par brtsams
56b4('dul ba): so//rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer kun tu/kun tu rgyu dbyug thogs spyi phud can rnams kyis/'phags pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po brdegs de/yan lag dang nying lag
56b5('dul ba): 'dam bu bzhin du bcom nas/de 'phags pa shA ri'i bus bu chung ngu bzhin bla gos kyi nang du bcug ste/'od ma'i tshal du khyer nas srog gi lhag ma cung zad cig lus te/ring po
56b6('dul ba): ma thogs par dus byed par 'gyuro zhes bya ba'i sgra de grags nas srog chag brgya stong du ma 'ad ma'i tshol du 'dus pa dang /rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i blon po dag gis/lha 'phags pa
56b7('dul ba): mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po kun tu rgyu dbyug thogs spyi phud can rnams kyis brdegs te/yan lag dang nying lag 'dam bu bzhin du bcom nas/'phags pa shA ri'i bus/de
57a1('dul ba): bus pa chung ngu bzhin du bla gos kyi nang du bcug ste/'od ma'i tshal du 'tshal te mchis na/srog gi lhag ma rgyung zad cig lus te/ring po ma
57a2('dul ba): thogs par dus bgyid par 'gyur ro zhes sbran pa dang /de thos nas khros te de rnams la smras pa/shes ldan dag kun tu rgyu dbyug thogs spyi phud can rnams tshol cig
57a3('dul ba): ces smras nas/de btsun mo'i 'khor dang gzhon nu dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi dag dang lhan cig 'od ma'i tshal du songango //de nas skye bo'i tshogs mang pos/rgyal po
57a4('dul ba): mthong nas lam phye ba dang /de mig mchi mas gang zhing snying rje rje skad du mi dga' ba'i tshig gis dal gyis dris pa/'phags pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'di ci zhig/
57a5('dul ba): des smras pa/rgyal po chen po la su bas mod/gzhan ni ci zhig tu 'gyur/'phags pa khyod/bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul can gyi mchog tu bstan pa ma yin
57a6('dul ba): nam/rgyal po chen po de de bzhin te bstan mod kyi/las kyi non pas 'on kyang rdzu zhes bya ba yang mi dran na rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/bcom ldan
57a7('dul ba): 'das ni gnyi su mi gsung ba ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du/bskal pa brgya phrag rnamasu yang //las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te//tshogs shing dus la
57b1('dul ba): bab pa na//lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin//ces gsungs pa de nye bar gnas par gyur to zhes byas pa dang /rgyal blo gos kyi mtha' mas mchi ma phyis te/sman pa thams
57b2('dul ba): cad bkug nas bsgo ba/shes ldan dag gal te 'phags pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po zhag bdun na sos par ma byas na//khyed kyi dbang thang bcad par bya'o zhes bsgo ste/blon po
57b3('dul ba): dag la yang gtad nas song //kun tu rgyu dbyug thogs spyi phud can rnams kyang thos nas bros//sman pa rnams kyis phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams pa/shes ldan dag rgyal
57b4('dul ba): pos ni de skad bka' stsal na/'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/'phags pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po ni bgres la/de'i yan lag dang nying lag thams cad 'dam bu bzhin du
57b5('dul ba): bcom pas/de ji ltar gso bar nus/yi de nyid mthu tsho ba rdzu 'phrul che ba yin pas/de nyid la skyabasu 'dong ngo //kha cig gis smras pa/legs kyis de bzhin du bya'o zhes
57b6('dul ba): de dag thams cad 'dug nas/tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i thad du song ste/rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas smras pa/'phags pa bdag cag la lhas 'di skad du//
57b7('dul ba): 'phags pa mo'u rgal gyi bu chen po zhag bdun na ma sos na//byed kyi dbang thang bcad zhes bka' stsal nA/khyod ni bgres pas sngon bzhin du bgyi bar bdag cag gi rngo mi thog
58a1('dul ba): ste khyod nyid rdzu 'phral che zhing mthu che bas ji ltar bdag cag gi dbang thang bcad par mi 'gyur ba de ltar mdzad du gsol/des smras pa/
58a2('dul ba): ldan dag gal te de lta na deng lo rgyal po ma skyes dgra la'aphags pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po bdag nyid zhag bdun na/rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la 'jug
58a3('dul ba): zhes gyis shig/de dag rab tu dga' nas/des de'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas/rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i thad du song nas/rkang pa gnyis la btugs te smras
58a4('dul ba): pa/lha 'phags pa mo'u dgul gyi bu chen po bdag nyid dgung bdun na rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la 'jug/rgyal po rab tu dga' nas smras pa/shes ldan
58a5('dul ba): dag gal te de lta na leg so//ji tsam na zhag bdun lon pa dang /'phags pa mo'u dgral gyi bu chen po rang nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis mi bde ba de med par byas te/rgyal
58a6('dul ba): po'i khaSh+TA tA bsod bsnyoms la zhug so//dgra bcom pa rnams kyi ye shes mthong ba ni bsams pas 'jug pas/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa mo
58a7('dul ba): dgal gyi bu chen po rab tu na de ci'i phyir bdag nyid rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs shes bsams pa la zhugs na/yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pa
58b1('dul ba): mthong ngo //ded dang mdza' ba'i bag chags kyis rgyud bsgos pas/de nyid kyi nyin gar nas na bar gyur te/des bsnams pa/tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po yang su mya dran
58b2('dul ba): las 'da' na/bdag ci ste 'dug/bdag ches sder mya ngan las 'da' bar ba'o snyam du bsams te/rgyal po'i khab nas grong na la dar song ste/de na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
58b3('dul ba): yul ma ga d+ha'i grong khyer na la da na drim gro pa dge sbyong gi cheng skul byed dang /nong tshabs chen pos mi bde zhing sdug bsngal te 'dug/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nad de nyid kyis
58b4('dul ba): yang su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po yang grong khyer shing thags can du song nas/de'i phyi dro yongasu mya ngan las 'daso//gang gi tshe tshe dang
58b5('dul ba): ldan po shA ri'i bu yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe dge slong phal cher dbang dang ldan pa sha stag brgyad khri yongasu mya ngan las 'daso//gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu
58b6('dul ba): chen po yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe yang /dge slong phal cher dbang dang ldan pa sha stag la bdun khri bdun stong yongasu mya ngan las 'daso//de nas dge sbyong gi ched skul
58b7('dul ba): byed kyis/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i ring bsrel la lus kyis mchod pa byas te/ring bsrel dang /lhung bzed dang /chos gos ngag khyer nas/rgyal po'i khang pa la ba der
59a1('dul ba): rgyu zhing song ste/rim gyis rgyu zhing song bran rgyal po'i khab tu phyin to//dege sbyong gi tshod sbrul byed lhung bzod dadu rgyas gos cham du phab nun/rkang pa
59a2('dul ba): gnyis bkrus te/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga na bo der song ste phyin pa dang /tshwa dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal byas te/phyogs
59a3('dul ba): gcig tu 'dug go/phyogaste gcig tu 'dug nas/dge sbyong gi tshod sbrul byed kyis/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smraso//btsun pa kun dga' bo mkhyen
59a4('dul ba): par mdzod cig/bdag gi mkhan po btsun pa shA ri'i bu ni yongasu mya ngan las 'das te/de'i ring srol dang /lhung bzed dang /chos gos kyang 'di lag so//de nas
59a5('dul ba): dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/dge sbyong gi ched skul byed khrid de/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyug
59a6('dul ba): 'tshal te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa dge sbyong gi
59a7('dul ba): ched skul byed 'di bdag gang na ba der mtshos te/mchis nas/bdag la 'di skad du btsun pa kun dga' bos mkhyen par mdzod cing //bdag gi mkhan po btsun pa shA
59b1('dul ba): ri'i bu yongasu mya ngan las 'das te/de'i ring bsrel dang /lhung bzed dang /chos gos kyang 'di lagaso zhes mchin/btsun pa bdag gi lus gdung bar gyur tsong /phyugs kyang
59b2('dul ba): bskrad/chos thos pa rnams kyang bskyud par gyur to///bam po nyi shu rtsa gcig pa//kun dga' bo ci dge slong shA ri'i bus/tshul khrims kyi phung po khyer te
59b3('dul ba): yongs mya ngan las 'das sam/btsun pa ma lag so//ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /shes rab kyi phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye
59b4('dul ba): shes mthong ba'i phung po khyer te/yongasu mya ngan las 'das sam/btsun pa ma lag so//gang yang ngas nyid kyi mngon par shes pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas de
59b5('dul ba): bshad pa'i chos 'di lta ste/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang
59b6('dul ba): chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dag khyer te yongasu mya dran lAs 'das sam/btsun pa ma lags te/btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa
59b7('dul ba): shA ri'i bus/tshul khrims kyi phung po 'tshal te yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa ma lags/ting 'dzin gyi phung po yang ma lags/shes rab kyi phung po yang ma lags/rnam
60a1('dul ba): bang grol ba'i phung po yang ma lags/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po 'tshal to/mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma lags/gang
60a2('dul ba): yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi mngon par shes pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te bshad pa'i chos 'di lta ste/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag
60a3('dul ba): bar spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lta dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
60a4('dul ba): dag 'tshal te yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma lags mod kyi 'on kyang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ni/tshul khrims dang ldan pa mang du thos pa/chog shes pa/'dod pa
60a5('dul ba): chung ba/rab tu dben pa/brtson 'grus brtsams pa/dran pa nye bar gnas pa/mnyam par bzhag pa/shes rab can/shes rab myur ba/shes rab mgyogs pa/
60a6('dul ba): shes rab rno ba/nges par 'byung ba'i shes rab can/nges par 'byed pa'i shes rab can/shes rab che ba/shes rab yangs pa/shes rab zab pa/shes rab mnyam pa
60a7('dul ba): med pa/shes rab rin po che dang ldan pa/yang dag par ston par bgyid pa/yang dag par len du 'jug par bgyid pa/yang dag par gzeng bstod par bgyid pa/yang
60b1('dul ba): dag par rab tu dka' bar bgyid pa/yang dag par ston pa dang /yang dag par len du 'jug pa dang /yang dag par gzeng bstod pa dang /yang dag par rab tu dgar ba'i bsngag
60b2('dul ba): pa brjod pa/'khor bzhi po la chos ston pa na dub pa ma mchis pa ste/bdag tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i chos dang /chos kyi longs spyod gang dag lags pa de dag rjesu dran na/
60b3('dul ba): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa de'i slad du/mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don to//kun dga' bo khyod mya ngan ma byed/blong bar ma byed/smre sngags 'don par ma
60b4('dul ba): byed cig/skyes pa dang byung ba dang byas pa dang /'dus byas pa dang /bsams pa dang /rten cing 'brel par byung ba de ni 'jigs pa'i chos can te/de dang ldan pa la 'jig par mi
60b5('dul ba): 'gyung ba de ka la yod de/de ni gnas mdo//kun dga' bo nges snga nas khyod la 'dod pa dang /sdug pa dang /dga' ba dang /yid du 'ong ba thams cad ni 'gyes pa dang /med
60b6('dul ba): pa dang /'bral ba dang mi ldan par 'gyur bar ma bstan tam/kun dga' bo dper na/ljon shing chen po rtsa ba dang bcas/snying po dang bcas/sdong po dang /lo ma dang /'dab
60b7('dul ba): ma dang /me tog dang 'bras bu dag dang ldan pa'i 'dab ma gang ches mtho ba de dang por ltung //rin po che'i ri chen po'i rtse mo gang ches mtho ba dag kyang dang por sti lo//de bzhin du
61a1('dul ba): sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong dag 'dun bcu gas pa'i rgyudun dang bu yongs mya ngan lngas 'das te/dge slong shA ri'i bu phyogs gang
61a2('dul ba): n+ya gnas pa'i phyogs de dang thugs rdul chu ngur bzhugs//'dim+b+ha b+h+yAM/dge slong shA ri'i bu gang ni pa'i phyogs de ngas stong pa ma rin par mthong ngo //de lta bas ni kun drag
61a3('dul ba): po khyod mya ngan mo byed/blong bar ma b+h+ring smre sngags 'don par ma byed cig/gang skyes pa dang byung ba dang /byas pa dang /'dus byas pa dang /bsams pa dang /rten ci
61a4('dul ba): 'brel bar byung ba de ni/'jig pa ji cen de/de dang ldan pa la 'jig par mi 'gyur ba de ga la yod de/de ni gnas med do//kun dga' bongs snga nas khyod la 'dod
61a5('dul ba): pa dang /sdug pa dang /dga' ba dang /yid du 'ong ba thams cad ni 'gyes pa dang /med pa dang /'bral ba dang /mi ldan par 'gyur bar ma bstun tam/kun dga' bo
61a6('dul ba): de lta bas ni/da lta 'am/nga 'dud kyang rung bdag nyid gling dang /bdag nyid skyabs dang /chos gling dang /chos skyabs dang /gling bzhan ma yin pa dang /skyabs gzhan
61a7('dul ba): ma yin par gnas par bya'o//ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dga' bo da ltar ram/de 'das kyang rung zhing dge bdag nyid gling dang /bdag nyid skyabs dang /chos glong dang /chos
61b1('dul ba): skyangs dang /skyong gzhan ma yin pa dang /skyabs gzhan ma yin pa la gnas pa de dag ni 'di lta ste/nga'i dge slong bsgrub pa 'dod pa rnams kyi mchogs 'gyur//dzIm+b+ha dge slong
61b2('dul ba): bongadag nyid gling dang /bdag nyid skyabs dang /chos gling dang /chos skyabs dang /gling gzhan ma yin pa dang /skyabs gzhan mi smin par gnas pa yin zhe na/'don dgra gling nang
61b3('dul ba): gI ma la lus kyi rje su lta zhing /'jig rten la brnab sems dang /yid mi bde ba btsul nas/rtun pa dang /shes bzhin dang /dran pa dang ldan par gnas shing
61b4('dul ba): phyi'i lus dang phyi dang nang gi lus dang /rlung gyi tshor ba dang /phyi'i tshor ba dang /phyi dang nang gi tsher ba drug dang /nang gi sems dang /phyi'i sems dang /phyi dang nang gi
61b5('dul ba): sems dag dang /nang gi chos dang /phyi'i chos dang /bye dang nang gi chos dag lo//chos kyi rje su lta zhing 'jig rten lnga bsgrub sems dang /yid mi bde ba brtul nas/
61b6('dul ba): rnan pa dang /shes bzhin dang /dran po dang ldan par gnas pa yin te/glan dga' bo dastAr /dge slong bdag nyid gling dang /bdag nyid skyabs dang /chos kyi
61b7('dul ba): dang /chos sbyangs dang /gleng gzhan ma yin pa dang /skyebs gnon ma yin par gnas po min//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' gi/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung
62a1('dul ba): pa la mngon par bskyod de/rjesu yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas
62a2('dul ba): song ngo //rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis ji ltar kun tu rgyu dbyug thogs spyi bud can rnams kyis 'phags pa myo'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i yan lag
62a3('dul ba): dang nyid lag dag 'dam bu bzhin du btsem pas/'phags pa shA ri'i bu rgyud de dang mdza' bo'i bag chags kyis bsgos pa yang grong na la ngar song ste snga dro yongasu mya
62a4('dul ba): ngan las 'das/tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po yang grong shing thags can du song ste/yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa thos so//bar ska der dge slong rnams
62a5('dul ba): the tshom skyes nas/the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos las ci
62a6('dul ba): zhig dgyis na/las de'i rnam par smin pas/kun tu rgya dbyug thogs spyi phud can rnams kyis 'di yan lag dang nying lag dag 'dam bu bzhin du bcom lags//
62a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag dge slong me'u dgal gyi bu 'di nyid byis las byas shing bsags pa/tshogs rnyed pa/rkyen yongasu rgyur ba/'od
62b1('dul ba): babA bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/gdon mi za bar 'gyur zhes bya ba nas/lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin ces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhino//de dge slong dag sten byung nga ri'ur
62b2('dul ba): zhig na/bram ze zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' mgur spyod par byed//de rtse bar byed
62b3('dul ba): dga' bar byed/dgar dgur spyod par byed pa las/dus gzhan zhig na chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur to//de lo zla ba brgyad dam dgu dad so nas khye'u zhing /
62b4('dul ba): btsas te/zhag bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu de bcas pa'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas ming btags te/bskyed bsrings nas chen por gyur to//phas do la chung ma
62b5('dul ba): blangs nas/de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' mgur spyod par byed cing de la yang rab tu cha goso//de la de'i mas rtag tu tshig yid du mi 'ong ba ngan
62b6('dul ba): par smras pa dag gis spyod pa dang /des khyo la bzlas nas/des de ci nas kyang mau la shin tu byams pa med pa dang /de'i bya dgu la phyi lang byed pa de lta de ltar bsluso//des
62b7('dul ba): smras pa/khang gang gi phyir de lta shin tu chags pas la phyi lang byed dam/de ngo tsha nas cing mi zer gA 'dug pa dang de'i chung mas bsams pa/re shig kha dug can
63a1('dul ba): 'di lang tsa yul yang rang gi khyo la chags pa cung zad mAM gtong zhing /bdag gi khyA la gla she bar byed snyam du rig nas/de'i glags tshol bar zhugs//
63a2('dul ba): so//ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na de'i ma skur ma dang sbyar te khrus byas nas/dri dang me tog dag gi rgyun te/nyi ma ma nub pa kho nar dus khyim mi dag la yang ma brtags
63a3('dul ba): par khyo dang lhan cig gsang ba spyod do//de nas mna'o ma des khyo do khrid nas ci nas kyang phyogs der son pa de ltar byas pa dang /ji tsam na pha dang ma gnyis gsang ba spyod
63a4('dul ba): pa mthong nas des bsams pa/kha dug can 'di bdag la ni khyod bud med la shin tu tshogasaso zhes gshe bar byeng na 'di da dung yang zhi ba med de/khyim mi dag la yong
63a5('dul ba): mi rtog par nyi ma ma nub pa nyid du gsang ba spyod do snyam du bsams nas khros te/gang zhig 'di gnyis kyi yan lag dang nying lag 'dam bu bzhin 'jom pa de 'ga'
63a6('dul ba): med dam zhes ngag gi las rtsub mo smraso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'ur gyur pa gang
63a7('dul ba): yin pa de ni/dge slong mo'u dgal gyi bu 'di nyid yin te/gang 'dis sems 'khrugs te pha dang ma la ngag gi las rtsub mo smras pa/de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas/tshe rabs
63b1('dul ba): lnga brgyar 'di'i yan lag dang nying lag 'dam bu bzhin du bcom ste/da ltar srid pa tha ma/gnas tha ma/lus tha ma/bdag nyid tha ma thob ste/rdzu 'phrul can gyi nang na mchog
63b2('dul ba): tu bstun pa'i bar du yang yan lag dang nying lag 'dam bu bzhin du bcom par gyur to//dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang
63b3('dul ba): gcig tu gnag/gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi yang gcig tu dkar/'dren ma rnams kyi yang 'dren ma'o//dge slong dag de lta bas nA las gcig tu gnag pa dag 'dren
63b4('dul ba): ma rnams spangs nas/las gcig tu dkar ba drag la brtsal bar bya ste/dge slong dag khyed kyi de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang //
63b5('dul ba): dge slong de dag yi rang te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis zhus pa/btsun pa
63b6('dul ba): kun tu rgyu dbyug thogs spyi phung can rnams kyis/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ni gtang /tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgrol gyi bu chen po ni brdegs pa la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das
63b7('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi/'das pa'i dus na yang ji ltar shA ri'i bu ni gtang la/mo'u dgal gyi bu ni brdegs pa de nyon cig dge
64a1('dul ba): slong dag sngon byung ba ri'i 'or zhig na khye'u dang /bu mo dag cig rtse ba de dag gis bram ze'i khye'u gnyis shig mthong nas/dri dag gis smras pa/bram
64a2('dul ba): ze'i khye'u pha bi dag brdeg/yang smras pa/re shig mi brdeg par ji dri ba zhig dris la/gul te sems mgu bar byos na ni mi brdeg/ji ste ma yin na brde ga//de dag
64a3('dul ba): gis bram ze'i khye'u cig la dris pa/dus gang du grang /des bsams pa/ji lta bu'i sems kyis 'di dag bdag la 'dri snyam na/des gor ma chag par 'di dag
64a4('dul ba): brdeg par 'dod par shes nas/des tshig su bcod de smras pa/grang ngam gal te dro yang rung //gang gi tshe na rlung langs pa//rlung gis btab na grang ba ste//rlung med
64a5('dul ba): pa yis grang ba med//de de dag gis btang nas//cig shos la dris pa dang /des smras pa/dgun grang med ces byas pa dang /de de dag gis brdegaso//dge
64a6('dul ba): slong dag ji snyam du sems/btang ba gang yin pa de ni shA ri'i bu 'di nyid yin//brdegs pa grang yin pa de ni me'u dgal gyi bu 'di nyid yin te/de'i tshe yang shA rI'i
64a7('dul ba): bu ni btang la/mo'u dgal gyi bu ni brdeg so//da ltar yang shA ri'i bu ni btang la mo'u dgal gyi bu ni brdegs//yang ji ltar shA ri'i bu ni btang la/mo'u dgal gyi bu
64b1('dul ba): ni brdeg pa de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba chu klung skams pa'i shol cig na/khye'u dang bu mo dag cig rtse ba de dag gis shing shal ma li'i me tog chu'i rgyun gyi khyer ba zhig
64b2('dul ba): dang /bram ze'i khye'u gnyis shig 'ong ba mthong nas zhes bya ba nas/de dag gis bram ze'i khye'u gcig la dris pa/chus khyer ba 'di ci zhig/des bsams pa/ci 'dra ba'i sems /
64b3('dul ba): kyis 'di dag bdag la 'di snyam na/gor ma chag par brdeg 'dod par zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhino//des kyang tshigasu bcad de smras pa/stobs dang ldan pas tshar bcad pa//
64b4('dul ba): nges par 'byung ba tshol ba yis//shal ma lI zhes mi bsam ste//skam gyi pad+ma yin par bsam//de dag gis btang nas/cig shos la dris pa dang /des smras pa/ma
64b5('dul ba): mthong ngam/shing shal ma li'i me tog yin mod ces byas pa dang /de de dag gis brdegaso//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems shes bya ba rgyas par snga ma bzhin ni//de dag
64b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na ji tsam dgyes par bzhugs nas/mnyam yod gang na ba der rgyu zhig gshegs so//rgyu zhing gshogs pa dang rim gyis mnyan yod du
64b7('dul ba): byon te/mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso//khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/'phags pa shA ri'i bu yongasu mya
65a1('dul ba): du/na las 'das te/de'i ring bsrel phra lags pa spyan dga' bo'i lags spyod do zhes thos//thos nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la gder
65a2('dul ba): song ste phyin nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/khyim bdag mgun
65a3('dul ba): med zas sbyin gyis/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smraso//'phags pa kun dga' bo mkhyen par mdzod cig/'phags pa shA ri'i bu ni bdag gi yun ring
65a4('dul ba): po nas sdug pa dang /yid du 'ong ba dang /bla ma dang /dran par bgyi ba lags na/de yongasu mya ngan las 'das te/de'i ring bsrel khyod kyi phyag na mnga' ba de dag bdag
65a5('dul ba): la stsol cig dang /de'i ring bsrel la ring bsrel gyi mchod pa bgyi'o//des smras pa/khyim bdag de ni bdag gi yang yun ring po nas sdug pa dang /yid du 'ong pa
65a6('dul ba): dang /bla ma dang /dran par bya ba yin pas/bdag nyid de'i ring bsrel la/ring bsrel gyi mchod pa byed do//de nas khyim bdag mgon med zos sbyin/bcom ldan
65a7('dul ba): 'das gang na bder song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'dra kye zhabs gnyis la mgo bos rgyu/'tshal to//phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nartse/khyim
65b1('dul ba): bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/'phags pa shA ri'i bu ni bdag gi yun ring po nas/
65b2('dul ba): sdug pa dang yid du 'od pa dang /bla ma dang /dran par bgyi ba lags te/de'i ring bsrel 'phags pa kun dga' ba'i sug pa na mchis pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la
65b3('dul ba): stsal du stsol pa gsol/bdag de'i ring bsrel la ring bsrel gyi mchod pa 'tshalo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo pho nyas bkug nas/'di skad
65b4('dul ba): ces bka' stsal to//kun dga' bo dge slong shA ri'i bu'i ring bsrel rnams khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la byin la/de mchod pa byang du chug shig/bram ze dang khyim bdag
65b5('dul ba): rnams ni don 'dis na dad pa can yino//kun dga' bo gzhan yang 'dra tsam gyis ni khyod kyis nga'i bstan pa la phan pa byas pa 'am/lan len pa ma yino//de lta bas na khyod
65b6('dul ba): kyis rab tu phyung shig/bsnyen par rdzogs par gyis shig/gnas byin cig/dge slong gi ched nye bar zhog shig/de dag la yang ji ltar thon pa bzhin 'don tu chug shig
65b7('dul ba): 'dzin du chug shig/slob shig dang 'di tsam gyis na khyod kyis nga'i bstan pa la phan btags pa dang lan lon pa yin//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun+da dga' bos/ston pa'i bkas
66a1('dul ba): khyim bdag mgon med zas skyon la/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rnying bsrel dag byin te/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpar
66a2('dul ba): gyur pa na/ldan 'ga' yang yo byA yum dang /mkhan po dang /slob dpon dang /gzhan bla ma'i gnas lta bu dag gi tshig mA bcag paso//de nas khyim bdug mgon med zas
66a3('dul ba): sbyin gyis/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i ring bsrel dag khyer nas/rang gi khyam ga la bder song ste phyin nas/de dag khyim gyi mchog gi nang du mthon po zhig tu bzhag nas nang
66a4('dul ba): mo dang bcas/mdza' bo dang /nye du dang /gu nu dang bcas te/mar me dang bdug pa dang me tog dang dri dang phreng ba dang /byug pa rnams kyis mchod pa bya bar brtsamaso//
66a5('dul ba): mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis ji ltar 'phags pa shA ri'i du yul ma ga dA'i grong na la dar yongasu mya ngan las 'das la/de'i ring bsrel dang //'phags pa
66a6('dul ba): kun dga' bos blangs nas/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la byin te/des de dag khyim du bzhag nas nang myi dang bcas/mdza' bo dang gnyen ba shes dang /phu nu dang
66a7('dul ba): bcas te/mar me dang /bdug pa dang /me tog dang /dri dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dag gis mchod pa thos so//de bzhin du yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis
66b1('dul ba): kyang zos nas/tsun mo phreng ldan ma dang /rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang /drang srong byin dang /rnying pa dag dang /ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma sau ga dang /gzhan yang dad pa can
66b2('dul ba): mang po dag dang /lhan cig de dag thams cad mchod pa'i yo byad dag khyer ti/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim bu dong nas/de rnams kyis mchod pa'i yo byad dag
66b3('dul ba): gis mchod par brtsams pa las der kha cig gis yon tan gyi tshogs dag thob bo//ji tsam dus gzhan zhi ga na/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ri 'or zhig tu bya ba
66b4('dul ba): cung zad cig byung nas/des der sgo bcad nas song ngo //skye bo phal po che dag de bzhin du 'ongs pa dang /ji tsam na sgo btsod pa mthong nas/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin
66b5('dul ba): gyis sgo bcad de song bas/des bdag cag gi bsod nams kyi bar chad byaso zhes de dag 'phya bar byed/gzhog 'phyas byed/smod par byed//de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas/
