66b6('dul ba): sbyin/ri 'or de nas 'ongs pa dang /de'i nang mis smras pa/khyim bdag skye bo'i tshogs chen po mchod pa'i yo byad thogs te 'ongs pa las/sgo bcad pa mthong nas des bdag cag gi
66b7('dul ba): bsod nams kyi bar cad byaso zhes 'phya bar byed/gzhog 'phyas byed/smod par byed//de 'di snyam du 'di nyid bdag gi bya ba yino snyam du shes nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba
67a1('dul ba): ngor song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/
67a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa 'phags pa shA ri'i bu la rab tu dad pa'i skye bo'i tshogs chen po mchod pa'i yo byad dag thob te bdag gi sdum par
67a3('dul ba): mchis pa las bdag bgyi ba chung zad gcig gi slad du chab sgo bkum nas gzhan du mchis pa dang /de dag khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sgro bcad de song ba/
67a4('dul ba): bdag cag gi bsod nams kyi bar chad byaso zhes 'phya bar bgyid/gzhog 'phyas bgyid/smod par bgyidado//de'i slad du gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/bdag
67a5('dul ba): gis 'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i mchod rten phyogs gnang yal can zhig tu bgyi sau la/der skye bo'i tshogs chen po bag yang su mchod pa bgyid du bstsal to//bcom ldan
67a6('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag de lta bas na gnang gis byos shig/bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang gis byos shig ces bka' stsal ba dang /des ji lta bur bya ba
67a7('dul ba): mi shes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar stsal pa/rims kyis bang rim bzhi byas la/de nas bum rten bya'o//de nas bum pa dang /bre dang /srog shing dang /gdugs
67b1('dul ba): gcig dang /gnyis dang /gsum dang /bzhi bya ba nas/bcu gsum gyi bar du bya zhing /char khab dag bzhag par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis mchod rten de lta bu bya'o zhes
67b2('dul ba): gsungs pa dang /des ci 'phags pa shA ri'i bu 'ba' zhig la mchod rten rnam pa de lta bu bya 'am/'on te 'phags pa thams cad la bye ba mi shes nas/skabs de bcom ldan 'das
67b3('dul ba): la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag ra shig de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten ni rnam pa thams cad rdzogs par bya'o//
67b4('dul ba): rang sangs rgyas kyi ni char khab mi gzhag par bya'o//dgra bcom pI ni gdugs bzhi'o//phyir mi 'ong ba'i ni gsumo//phyir 'ong ba'i ni gnyis//rgyun tu zhugs pa'i ni gcig/
67b5('dul ba): so so'i skye bo dge ba rnams kyi mchod rten ni byi bor bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa rnams kyi mchod rten ni rnam pa 'diso//so so'i skye bo'i rnams kyis ni 'di so zhes bka'
67b6('dul ba): stsal ba dang /de gang gis gnas gang du bya bo mi shes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa na/shA ra'i bu dang /mo'u dga'
67b7('dul ba): gyi bu dag 'dug pa de bzhin du yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten yang bya'o//gzhan yang gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi mchod rten ni/rgan rims bzhin
68a1('dul ba): sbreng bar bya'o//so so'i skye bo dge ba rnams kyi ni dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba'i phyi rol tu bya'o//khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gsol
68a2('dul ba): pagal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/bdag gis 'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i mchod rten gyi dus ston dag bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'o stsal pa/khyim
68a3('dul ba): bdagra gnang gis gyis shig/yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis ji ltar khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'phags pa
68a4('dul ba): shA ri'i bu'i mchod rten gyi dus ston gzugs par gsol pa las/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzugs par gnang ba thos nas/ma la bdag gis kyang de'i grogs
68a5('dul ba): bya'o snyam nas/des 'di ltar dril bsgrags nas/shes ldan mnyan yod na gnas pa'i grong khyer ba rnams dang /yul gzhan nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag
68a6('dul ba): nyon cig/'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i mchod rten gyi dus ston la bab pa'i tshe/zong thogs nas 'ong ba gang yin pa de la sho gam yang med/la gcan yang med/gru
68a7('dul ba): btsas kyang med kyis/de bag yongasu 'dir shog shig/bar skabs der rgya mtsho chen po nas tshong pa lnga brgya zhig gru po che'i nor grub ste/mnyan yod du phyin pa de dag
68b1('dul ba): gos ji ltar rgyal pos mnyan yodu dril bsgrags te 'di skad du gang zhig 'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i mchod rten gyi dus ston la khab pa'i tshe/zong thogs te 'ong ba de la sho gam yang
68b2('dul ba): med la gcan yang med/gru btsas kyang mod kyis de bag yang su 'dir shog shig ces bsgo ba thos nas re shri ka rgyal po 'di rang gi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu la gnas kyang /
68b3('dul ba): bsod nams dag gis ngoms mi shes te/sbyin pa dag sbyin/bsod nams dag byed na bdag cag gis ci'i phyir sbyin pa dag mi sbyin/bsod nams dgra mi bya snyam nas//
68b4('dul ba): de dag yid rab tu dang pa skyes te/dus ston de'i dus su/dung dang /nor bu dang /mu tig la sogs pa phul ba dang /dge slong dag gos ji ltar bsgrub pa mi shes nas/bcom
68b5('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/bud dung gang dag yin pa de dag ni shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma na bzhugs pa'i sku gzugs la dbul bar bya'o//gzhan yang chung shas shig ni/
68b6('dul ba): shA ri'i bu'i mchod rten dI'i bcos legs bya bar bzhag la/lhag ma ni dge 'dun tshogs pas bgo bar bya'o//de de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi ma yin gyi/shA
68b7('dul ba): ri'i bu'i mchod rten gyi yin te/de lta bso na 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o//sdom ni/gleng dang dran pa nyid dang ni//skabs dbye ba dang sgra mi bya//lung 'bog pa dang gso sbyong
69a1('dul ba): runadang dgab da 'jog par byed pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal bu rgyul byed kyi tshol mgon mod zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na
69a2('dul ba): bzhug so//dge slong drug sde dag gos nyes pa mthong ba dang /nyes par thos pa dang /nyes par dogs pas dge slong dag la glengaso//dge slong dag la nyes par mthong ba dang //
69a3('dul ba): nyes par thos pa dang /nyes bar dogs pas glengs pa na de dag bag tsha bzhin du gnaso//de dag bag tshwa bzhin du gnas pas rid pa dang /skem pa dang /rnyes pa dang /lus
69a4('dul ba): las su ma rung bar gyur te/lung ston pa dang /klog pa dang /kha thon dang /rnal 'byor dang /nang gi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dag shor nas/skabs de dge slong dag
69a5('dul ba): gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge sbyong dag/dge slong la nyes par mthong ba dang /nyes
69a6('dul ba): par thos pa dang /nyes par dogs pas gleng ba las gyur gyis/de lta bas na dge slong gis dge slong la nyes par thos pa dang /nyes par dogs pas gleng ba mi bya'i/dge
69a7('dul ba): slong gis nyes par mthong ba dang /nyes par thos pa dang /nyes par dogs pas dge slong la gleng bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyu ro//gleng bar byed pa ji ltar dran par
69b1('dul ba): byed pa dang /skabs 'byed par byed pa dang /mi smra bar byed pa dang /lung 'bog par byed pa dang /gso sbyong 'jog par byed pa dang /dgag dbye 'jog par byed pa yang de dang 'dra ste//
69b2('dul ba): sdom gyi tshig su bcad pa thams cad snga ma bzhin du rjod par bya'o//sdom ni/sangs rgyas mtshan nas smos pa dang //tshe dang ldan pa kun mi spyad//'phel thabs can la
69b3('dul ba): me dang dang //'dul ba mdor na bsdus pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bA ra na se/drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na bzhugs//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
69b4('dul ba): dge slong lnga po dag la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la/'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes tshul bzhin yid la byas pa na/mig
69b5('dul ba): skyes so//shes pa dang /rig pa dang /blo dang /rtogs pa skyeso//dge slong dag ngas sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la/'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o//'di ni sdug
69b6('dul ba): bosngal 'gog pa'o//'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba 'phags pa'i la mo zhes tshul bzhin yid la byas pa na mig skyes so//shes pa dang rig pa dang /blo dang /
69b7('dul ba): rtogs pa skyeso//dge slong dag ngas sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la//sdug bsngal 'phar ba'i bden pa de mngon par shes pas yongasu shes par bya'o zhes tshul bzhin yid la
70a1('dul ba): byas pa na/myig skyeso//shes pa dang /rig pa dang /blo dang rtogs pa skyeso//dge slong dag ngas sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la/sdug bsngal kun
70a2('dul ba): 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa de mngon par shes pas spang bar bya'o zhes tshul bzhin yid lo byas pa na/mig skyeso//shes pa dang /rig pa dang /blo dang /rtogs pa skyeso//
70a3('dul ba): dge slong dag ngas sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la/sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa de mngon par shes pas mngon sum du bya'o zhes tshul bzhin yid la
70a4('dul ba): byam pa mig skyeso//shes pa dang rig pa dang /blo dang rtogs pa skyes//dge slong dag ngas sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la/sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam 'phags pI/
70a5('dul ba): bden pa de bsgom par bya'o zhes/tshul bzhin yid la byas pa na mig skyes//shes pa dang rig pa dang /blo dang rtogs pa skyes//dge slong dag ngas sngon ma thos pa'i chos
70a6('dul ba): rnams la/sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa de mngon par shes pas yongasu sheso zhes tshul bzhin yid la byas pa na mi go skyeso//shes pa dang /rig pa dang /blo dang rtogs
70a7('dul ba): pa skyes so//dge slong dag ngas sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la/sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa de mngon par shes pas spang so zhes tshul bzhin yid la
70b1('dul ba): byas pa na mig skye so//shes pa dang rig pa dang /blo dang rtogs pa skyeso//dge slong dag du sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la/sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa de mngon/
70b2('dul ba): par shes pas mngon sum du byas so zhes tshul bzhin yid la byas pa na mig skyeso//shes pa dang rig pa dang /blo dang rtogs pa skyeso//dge slong dag ngas sngon ma thos bI chos
70b3('dul ba): rnams la/sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba 'phags pa'i lam de mngon par shes pas bsgomaso zhes tshul bzhin yid la byas pa na mig skyes//shes pa dang rig pa dang /
70b4('dul ba): blo dang rtogs pa skyeso//dge slong dag nga la ji srid du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di dag la/de ltar lan gsum du bzlas te/rnam pa bcu gnyis pa'i mig skyes par ma gyur//
70b5('dul ba): shes pa ma yin rig pa ma yin/blo ma yin/rtogs pa ma skyes pa de srid dung 'jig rten lha dang bcas/bdud dang bcas/tshangs pa dang bcas/dge sbyong bram ze'i skye dgu
70b6('dul ba): dang bcas/lha dang mi dang bcas pa 'di las grol ba dang /dros par byung ba dang /bral ba dang rab tu grol ba dang /phyin ci log dang bral ba'i sems kyis mang du gnas par
70b7('dul ba): ma gyur/de srid du nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso snyam du shes par ma gyur gyi/dge slong dag gang nas bzung ste/nga
71a1('dul ba): la 'phags pa'i bdun pa bzhi po 'di dag la de lta lan gsum du bzlas te/rnam pa bcu gnyis pa'i mig skyes/shes pa dang rig pa dang /blo dang
71a2('dul ba): rtogs pa skyes pa de nas bzung ste/nga 'jig rten lha dang bcas/bdud dang bran ste/tshangs pa dang bcas/dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas/lha dang mi dang bcas pa
71a3('dul ba): 'di las grol ba dang /nges par byung ba dang /rab tu grol ba dang /phyin ci log dang bral ba'i sems kyis mang du gnas par gyur/de nas bzung ste bla na med pa yang
71a4('dul ba): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso snyam du shes par gyur to//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/tshe dang ldan pa ke'u drin n+ya dang /
71a5('dul ba): brgyad khyi chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang dral ba skyes par gyur te//de nus bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa ko'u din rkye la bka' stsal pa/kon+da
71a6('dul ba): de rgyu khyod kyis chos kun shes sam/bcom ldan 'das kun 'tshal to//ke'u de na n+ya khyod kyis chos kun shes sam/bde bar gshegs pa kun 'tshal to//tshe dang ldan
71a7('dul ba): bko ru na rgyas chos kun shes pa de'i phyir/tshe deng ldan pa ko'u din n+ya ming kun nas kau'u den n+ya zhes bya bar chagaso//tshe dang ldan pa ko'u dan n+yas chos kun shes pa na/
71b1('dul ba): sngozla ba'i gnod sbyin rnams kyis sgra byung zhing dbyung sa rdzasu bsgrags pa/grags pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /skye mang po la bde ba dang /'jig
71b2('dul ba): rten la thugs brtse ba dang /lha da myi rnams kyi don dang /phan pa dang bde bar mdzad pa'i slad du/'jig rten no dge sbyong ngamu bram ze'am/lha 'am/bdud dam/tshangs pa gang
71b3('dul ba): gis kyang chos dang 'thun par ma skor ba'i chos kyi 'khor mo chos dang 'thun pa ldan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bad+mo gnyis pa 'di yul b+hai ra na sa drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi
71b4('dul ba): nagasu bskor bas lho'i rigs dag ni mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur/lha ma yin gyi ris dge ni yongasu nyams par 'gyuraro//sa dI ba'i gnod sbyin rnams kyi smra bar snang la
71b5('dul ba): spyod pa'i gnod sbyin rnams dang /rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /'thab bral ba rnams dang /'phrul doga' ba rnams dang /gzhan
71b6('dul ba): 'phrul dbang byed kyis thos nas/skad cig de dang thung cig de dang /yud tsam de dang /skad cig dang thang cig dang /yud tsam de la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du sgra grags par
71b7('dul ba): gyur te/tshangs ris pa'i lha rnams kyis sgra phyung zhing dbyangs rjesu bsgrags pa/grogs po dag bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang mi rnams kyi zhes bya ba nas/'di yul bA ra na sa
72a1('dul ba): drang srong smra bar dgas kyi nagasu bskor bas m+b+ha'i rlos dag ni mngon par 'jol bar 'gyur/lA ma yin gyi ris dag ni yong sgra nyams par 'gyur zhes
72a2('dul ba): bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhino//bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ba ranA s+ye drang srong smra ba ri dgus kyi nag su chos kyi la ra lo chos dang 'thun pa lan gsum gyi bar du bzlas te
72a3('dul ba): rnam pa bcu gnyis pa bskor te de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya'o//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong lnga po dag gi rgyud la
72a4('dul ba): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/de dag bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos por gyur pa de'i tshe/de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la shin tu mtshan nas smos pa dang /gdung
72a5('dul ba): nas smyos pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa zhes smos pa kun tu spyod nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khyed de bzhin gshegs pa la shin tu mtshan
72a6('dul ba): nas skyes pa dang /gdung nas smyos pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa zhes spros pa kun tu ma skyed cig/dge slong dag de ci'i phyir zhe nA/gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa la shin tu mtshan
72a7('dul ba): nas smos pa dang /gdung nas smos pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa zhes smos pa kun tu spyod pa de ni skyes bu gti mug de la yun ring por gnod pa dang /phan pa ma yin pa dang sdug
72b1('dul ba): /bsngal bar 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das kyis dgo sa pa/nyos dmigs gang chung zad byung ba ni/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa la mtshan nas smos pa dang /gdung nas
72b2('dul ba): smyos pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa zhes sgos pa kun tu spyod pa las gyur gyis/de'i phyir dge slong gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mtshan nas smos pa dang /gdung nas smos pa dang /
72b3('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa zhes smos pa kun tu spyad par mi bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/dge slong lnga po dag la dka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas ni dge slong gis de bzhin gi shegs
72b4('dul ba): zil myi chen nas smras pa dang /gdung nas smos pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa kun tu skyed par mi bya ste/kun tu spyod na 'gal tsha bas can du 'gyuraro//bcom ldan 'das kyis
72b5('dul ba): dge slong gis/de bzhin gshegs pa la mtshan nas smos pa dang /gdung nas smyos pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa zhes smos pa kun tu spyad par mi bya ste/kun tu spyod na 'gas
72b6('dul ba): tshabs can du 'gyur ro//zhes bka' stsal pa dang /dge slong gzhon nu dag dge slong rgyun pa rgan pa dge la ming nas spros pa dang /ngas nas spros pa dang /rgyu dong ldan pa
72b7('dul ba): zhes smos pa kun tu spyod nas/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong gzhon nus dge slong
73a1('dul ba): chos rgan pa lus ming nas smos pa dang /rus nas zlos pa kun tu spyad par mi bya'o//'on kyang tshe dang ldan pa zhes zad pa dang /btsun pa zhes byed pa
73a2('dul ba): gnyis kun tu spyad par bya'o//dge slong gzhon nus dge slong ches rgan pa la ming nas smras pa'am/rus+ya nas smos pa kun tu spyod na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro/
73a3('dul ba): gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//mnyan yod na dge slong 'brel thabs can dang /dge slong ma gsod mo ji lta ji ltar skye bo'i tshogs mang po mi dad par 'gyur ba
73a4('dul ba): de lta de ltar khyim dag tu rgyu bar byed ces bya ba rgyas par rnam par 'byed pa las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ku sha'i grong khyer na
73a5('dul ba): gyad kyi nye 'khor shing sa li zung gi tshal na bzhugaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi tshe de na/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/
73a6('dul ba): dge slong dag ngas 'dul ba rgyas par bstan+da na/mdor bsdus te yang ma bsten pas legs por nyon la yid la zung shig dang ba shad//dge slong da khyed kyis sngon smang
73a7('dul ba): pab yang med/bkag pa yang med pa gang yin pa de yang gal te mi rung ba ston cing rung ba dang /mi mthun na rung ba ma yin pa yin pa'i phyir spyad par mi bya'o//gel te
73b1('dul ba): rlung ba sbyin cing /mi rung ba dang mi nA thun na/rung ba yin pa'i phyir spyad par m+b+ha bya ste/'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o//sdom ni/spangs pa dag ni bgod pa dang //smyung ma rnams
73b2('dul ba): kyi skyabs dang ni//spyang tshogs dang ni gyo mo dang //sra brkyang gdong dang mang po'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mngon med zas
73b3('dul ba): sbyin gyi kun dga' rA bo na bzhugaso//dge slong zhig la chos gos kyi sbyang ba byung nas/des de rgan pa'i mtha' logasu 'dug ste/dge 'dun la spong so//dge skos kyis
73b4('dul ba): bsams pa/'di ni dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa grub pa yin te/spel nas bgo bar bya'o snyam nas/des de spel nas dge 'dun la brims pa dang /dge slong de phongs par gyur to//
73b5('dul ba): skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong dag spang ba dge
73b6('dul ba): 'dun la spangs pa las gyur gyis/de'i phyir dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyang bar mi bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag dge slong zhig
73b7('dul ba): gis spangs pa dge 'dun la spangs pa dang /de dge skos kyis spel te bgos kyis/de lta bas na dge slong gis spang ba dge 'dun la spang ngor mi bya'i/'on kyang gang zag la
74a1('dul ba): spang bar bya//gal te mi shes pa sa spangs nA yang dge 'dun gyis bsgo bar mi bya'o//dge slong gaus spyang ba dge 'dun la spyad Sh+Ta sam/dag
74a2('dul ba): 'dun gyis bgos na gnyi ga 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi spang ba dge 'dun la spang bar mi bya'o//'on kyang gang zag la spang bar
74a3('dul ba): bya'o zhes bka' stsal ba dang /dge slong gzhan zhig la chos gos kyi spang ba byung ste/des dge slong mi shes pa zhig la spang ba dang /des blangs nas cang mi zer
74a4('dul ba): bar 'dug/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ge slong gzhan gyi gya brda' sbed pa
74a5('dul ba): bya ste/gal te byin na legs/ji ste mi ster na/mthus phrogs la byin gyis brlabs par bya'o//rung bar bya ba'i phyir spang ba yin pas/spangs pa gtan bshu ri bar
74a6('dul ba): mi bya'i//'on kyang spangs pa slar sbyin par bya'o//gleng gzhi ni yangs pa cin nu'o//dbyar gyi dus su dge slong dag spong bu ma cu rings kyis zos te/de dag g.ya' ste
74a7('dul ba): son mos lus kun phrugs pa dang /bar bar du khrag gi thigs pa dang /thor bu dag byung ba snang ngo //de ltar lus mi sdug pa de dag bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams
74b1('dul ba): kyis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/'phags pa khyed ci zhig gis lus kyi gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur/de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa bskrad pa dang /de dag gis smras pa/
74b2('dul ba): 'phags pa khyed spyang skyabs mi 'chang dam/bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang na ji ltar bcad/'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang
74b3('dul ba): bar 'gyuraro//skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta bas na gnang gis dge slong gis sbrang skyabs
74b4('dul ba): bcang bar bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis sbrang skyabs bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/dge slong gis ci 'dra ba bcang ba ma shes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis
74b5('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ras srid du khru bzhi zheng du khru do pa de shing lo brgyangs la/steng nas dgab par bya zhing ras khru bcu gnyis pas ngos khor yug bskor bar bya'o//dge slong dag
74b6('dul ba): gis ras de ma lus par byas pa dang /gle nas sbrang bu mchu rings dag 'jug nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'i stsal pa/ras lhag ma dang bcas pa bcang par bya zhing depe glo nas
74b7('dul ba): bkri bar bya'o//dge slong dag gis sbrang skyabs byas nas/ras de phyogs gcig nas bte ge s+t+waM/'dzul ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sgo gdod par bya'o//
75a1('dul ba): //dge sbyong dag gis sgo thAd kar gtod pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/snol mar bya'o//cha nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bkang phyu
75a2('dul ba): /de nyid du bsil yahA gzhag par bya'o//'og nas sbrang mo mchu rings dag 'jug nus/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gnas mal gyis dgab par bya ning
75a3('dul ba): rnam pa gang dang gang gis sbrang ma mchu rings zla ba de thams cad rung bar bya'o//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis chu btsag par bya'o zhes bka'
75a4('dul ba): stsal pa dang dge slong dag lag ngas chu chags 'dzin pas de dag ngal bar gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shing la btags te btsag par bya'o//dge
75a5('dul ba): slong dag gis shing la btags te bcag na 'on kyang dal nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dbyu gu gsum btsang bar bya'o//dge slong dag gis dbyu gu gsum
75a6('dul ba): la btags na 'dug tu ma btub nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de dag phug la skad bu 'am gzer bus sbrel la chu tshags gdags par bya'o//dge slong
75a7('dul ba): dag gis chu tshags btags nas chu blugs pa dang /phyed sa la bo nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'i sprul pa/ci nas sa la mi 'bo bar dran pa nye bar bzhag ste blugs par
75b1('dul ba): 'o//dge slong dag gis dum bskangs rten mod parang zhag dbu de 'dus nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis pa/sprul pa/zhabs rten gzhug par bya'o//dge slong dag cig pas
75b2('dul ba): chu brang bar bdums pa dang /de chu tshugasum chags pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gcal
75b3('dul ba): gzhug par bya'o//dge slong dag gis ci zhig gzhug par ma shes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bye ma 'am ba lang gi lci ba'o//'on kyang ma chags nas/
75b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/tshags rten snod bcang bar bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis tshags rten snod bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /dge slong dag gis
75b5('dul ba): ji lta bu bcad pa mi shes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/tshags rten snod ni gnyis te zangs las byas pa dang sa lngas byas pa'o//dge slong dag gis chags
75b6('dul ba): rten snod lag pas bzung ba dang /de dag ngal nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/zangs las byas pa gang yin pa de ni phug la lcags thag 'jam pos dbyug gu
75b7('dul ba): gsum la gdags par bya'o//sa las byas pa gang yin pa de ni phug la za bus gdags par bya'o//chu tshogs gzhan dag chu ma phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
76a1('dul ba): stsal ba/de dag gi glor yang dang yang du brdab par bya'o//dge slong drag chu rtog pa na bum pa ma ga ba la brtags pas srog chags dag ma
76a2('dul ba): rtogs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bum pa legs par bkang la ji srid du chu mi g.yo ba de srid du bzhag par bya zhing /de nas brtag par bya'o//bum pa
76a3('dul ba): bkang ba dang steng du rdul zhugs pa/dge slong dag gis de ma bsal bas/srog cha gdag ma rtogs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rdul bsal nas
76a4('dul ba): brtag par bya'o//dge slong dag gis srog chags 'dzub mo'i rtse mos bsten pas de dge 'gul nas/mig gis ma sod pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
76a5('dul ba): pa/shing bu'i rtse mo 'am/rtswa'i rtse mo 'am phra mo gzhan gang yang rung bas bstan par bya'o//dge slong dag gis chu tshags nyid nas chu khron par pho ba dang /srog
76a6('dul ba): chags dag rngub bsnun pas gnod par gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sal tshigs bsrel bar bya'o//dge slong dag gis bkang ste bting na
76a7('dul ba): phyir gang bzhin du 'ong ba gang yin pa de lta bu bsrel nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bkang ste btang na phyir stong par 'ong ba ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba bsrel bar
76b1('dul ba): rgyu rgyu rgyun mnas gyus/maldan ga dadag gis rgyu gsusasu rgyags can na/sma na
76b2('dul ba): sbyong bar myong ba de lta btang bar bya'o//dge slong dag gis rgyu bonaste rgyu tshigs bshal bar mi byed 'gyu bar mi byed/'chir bar mi byed rnams par mi byed/ba byar mi spyod
76b3('dul ba): nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bko' sprul pa/chu tshags kyi chu phyo nas de ba shal bar bya/bkru b+hair byA/btsir bar bya bskum par b+he/bsgrub par bya'o//dge slong dag dag
76b4('dul ba): 'dun gyi chu yang chu tshigs kyis 'chag par byed pa dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun pal chos pas skye bar gyun nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal /gal te dge slong shi
76b5('dul ba): 'dun pal che bar gyur na/chu tshags mang po bcang ba 'am/yang na bum tshigs gce'u can bcing bar bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bum chags gce'u can gyis btsag
76b6('dul ba): bdu byong zhes bka stsal pa dang /dge slong dag gis bum chags kanin+da can ji lta bu mo shes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sa nyam zangs las bum pa'i
76b7('dul ba): dbyibs lta bu bya zhing de la pad+ma'i snying po lta bu'i bu ga dag gdod par bya'o//de dag bsdu ba'i phyir de dag gi steng du bu ga chen po gcig gdod do//de dag nyid bsdu ba'i phyir
77a1('dul ba): 'og tu gce'u gzhug par bya'o//de nas stong ras kyis g.yogs la chu btsog par bya zhing ras de yang bshal bar bya bkru bar bya bskam par bya'o///bam po nyi shu
77a2('dul ba): gnyis pa/dge slong dag gis shig dang /rtsa shig dang //srog chags gzhan dag g.yangs nas bor ba dang //de dag dran pa nyam shing gnod par gyur to//skabs
77a3('dul ba): de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/srog chags thams cad g.yangs nas dang bar mi bya'o//
77a4('dul ba): ngag gis gar bab bab du bor ba dang //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gar bab bar du dor bar mi bya'i/shig ni ras ma'i nang du gzhug par bya/de ma rnyed
77a5('dul ba): na ka ba'i ser ka 'am/rtsigs pa'i bu gar chug shig/rtsa shig ni ne'u gsing sngon po'i sa phyogs su bzhag par bya'o//de ma rnyed na bsil ba'i phyogs su'o//srog chags
77a6('dul ba): gzhan yang rang rang gi gnas su btang bar bya'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/btsun pa chab stan btsags pa
77a7('dul ba): ma brtags pa 'tshal du rung lags sam/nye bar 'khor mig gis ma rtags na mi rung ngo //btsun pa chab btsags pa brtags pa 'tshal du rung ngi tsaHlags sam/
77b1('dul ba): nye bar 'khor mig gis brtags pa'i phyir rung ngo //grong gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa'i dge 'dun gyis//sra brkyang gdong par
77b2('dul ba): bya'o//zhes bka' pA dang /ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis thos nas//des dge 'dun la sra brkyang phul lo//de bzhin du btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang /rgyal rigs
77b3('dul ba): dbyar tshul ma dang /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang drang srong byin dang /bsnying pa dag dang phye mkhan dag dang /gzhan mang po dag gis sra brkyang du la ba dang /dge slong
77b4('dul ba): dag gis sra brkyang gcig cig byin gyis brlabs nas/lhag ma dgazhan de dag nyid la slar bskur bar brtsam pa dang //de dag gis 'phags pa 'di dag ni bdag cag gis
77b5('dul ba): dge 'dun la phul ba lags pas/bdag cag slar ji ltar 'tshal/skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
77b6('dul ba): ba//de'i phyir gnang gis blang bar bya zhing /blangs nas kyang brtan pa gding ba'i dge slong mang po bsko bar bya'o//ji ltar snga bskos pa de las phyis gcig gding bar bya'o//
77b7('dul ba): lhag ma rnams ni bzhag par bya zhing /de ni dbyar gnas pas khas blangs pa'i dge 'dun gyi bsgo ba'i rnyed pa yin pas//dbyar gnas pas khas blangs pa'i dge 'dun tshogs
78a1('dul ba): pas ci dkar bum+b+hi bAr byaste/'di la 'gyod par mi b+h+yo//nAm ni/d+ya 'das pas sbyin med dang //gang gi sa smos pa sha~M ba dang //gdang /
78a2('dul ba): gtad pa shi ba dang //babs bya dang ni 'gyod pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshul mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga'
78a3('dul ba): ra ba ni bzhug so//mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig gnas pa des rigs me nyam pa las chung ma blangs te/de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed dga'
78a4('dul ba): dgur spyod par byed//dri rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las rim gyis bu gsum byung //de rnams kyis tho chungs gang yin pade
78a5('dul ba): legs phyir gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung //de dus gzhan zhig nu ljongs rgyu zhing song ngo //ljongs rgyu zhing song ba na de'i phu nad kyis thebs nas/de
78a6('dul ba): dang /snod du /ma dang /mai tog dang /'bras bu'i sbyin du nas kyis ris b+h+rUM m+bu kyang de'i na du de ni bang mi gyur te/gagi rgyu de mi shis thug pa'i tshurat+na
78a7('dul ba): byung ste/ring pa mi thogs par 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/des mngo' bo dang /gnyen dang /phu nu bo dang //khyim chos rnams bsdus nas bu de gaN+DI
78b1('dul ba): lasmras pa/bu nga'i khyim na chung zad rlom yod pA de thams cad khyer tAM shog shig/de dag gis kyang de'i tshig mnyan to/thams cad khyor to 'ongs pa dang /dros mdza' nga
78b2('dul ba): gnyen dang /phu nu drug dang /khyim chos kyi ma de la smras po/shes ldan+da dag gson cig/bdag gI bu gsum yod pa las/phu bo gnyis ni 'di dag yin tha chungs
78b3('dul ba): gang yin pa de ni dge sbyong shAkya'i bu'i nang du rab tu byung //de'i phyir bdag gi khyim na nor gang chung zad ci yod pa de thams cad de tsams mnyam par bags shig ces
78b4('dul ba): smras nas/bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad cing //mthon po'i mtha' ni rnyil lar 'gyur//'du ba'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste//gson po'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin//zhes bya
78b5('dul ba): bos dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur te/de khyogs gos sngon po dang /dmar po dang /ser po dang /dkar po dag gis brgyan te/dur khrod du khyer nas bsreg so//de'i
78b6('dul ba): sa de dag gis de'i bshid btang ba dang /mya ngan bsang ba byas te 'dug/de'i bu des bdag gi phyi de shi bo zhes thos nas/de 'di snyam du bdag song la ma yar mo de dang /phu
78b7('dul ba): de dag la chos bshad de mya ngan bsang bar bya'o snyam du bosams nas de ji srid 'dod par ldongs na 'dug nas lhung bzed dang chos gos khyer te/mnyan yod gang na ba dar
79a1('dul ba): rgyu zhing song nu//rim ste rgyu zhing sa shA la sa mnyan yod du phyin to//des chos gos dang lhung bzed rgyal byed kyi tshal du bzhag ste lam
79a2('dul ba): g+his dub pa ngal bso nas rang gi khyim du song ngo //nad mi rnams kyis de mthong nas duso//dub do thos nas khyim tshes rnams 'dus te la la ni skad phyung ste du ka la la ni
79a3('dul ba): mig mchi mas gang bar gyur to//de so so'i skye bo yin pas/skye bo'i tshogs chen po smre zhing 'dug pa thos nas/de yang mig mchi mas gang zhing 'dug pa dang /de la
79a4('dul ba): khyim chos kyi bud med gcig gis smras pa/bu mya nganA ma byed tsog/khyod kyi pha de bsod nams byas pas lha yul du song ngo //khyod la yang phras mdze' bo dang /gnyen
79a5('dul ba): dang /phu nu bo dang /khyim ches rnams bsdus te nor gyi su mau tshwa gucig kyang byin no//des bsamos pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis nga 'dus nas 'di la byin cig ces zer
79a6('dul ba): ba ni med pa yin zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni 'di lta bu yin snyam du rig nus nga de'i phyir mya ngan byed pa ni ma yin gyi/nga'i pha de dka' ba byed byed pas dbang
79a7('dul ba): med par mchi ma byung //bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang pha ma ni bu la dka' ba byed de/snyong pa dang /gso ba dang /skyed pa dang /'dzam bu gling sna tshogs ston pa yin te//
79b1('dul ba): thug pa gcig gos pa blangs shing /cog gas sa su thA s+yAt+ta/lo btu rkang bar 'gyur banargyas pa dang /sa chen po 'di la nar bu dang /mu tog dang /boT+Tam+b+ha dang /ma
79b2('dul ba): shel dang /byu ru dang /dngul dang /gser dang /rdo'i snying po dang /spug dang /pad+ma rA gA dang /gas su 'khyil ba de lta bu'i dbang phyug gi bdag por bzhag kyang 'di
79b3('dul ba): tsam gyis/bus pa dang mya la phan thogs pa dang /lan lon par mi 'gyur gyi/gang zhig gis phra ma de dag ma dad pa las dad pa phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par
79b4('dul ba): len tu 'jug/gzeng stod par byed/'dul bar byed/'jog par byed/rab tu 'jog par byed cing /tshul khrims 'chal pa/tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa
79b5('dul ba): 'jungs pa gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /shes rab 'chal pa shes rab phun sum tshogs pa yang dge bar len tu 'jug/gzing bstod par byed/'dul bar byed/
79b6('dul ba): 'jog par byed/rab tu 'jog par byed na de tsam gyi sa nA bus pa ma la phan btags pa dang len blan par 'gyu ro zhes gsung so//yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nga 'das
79b7('dul ba): nas de la byon cig ces zer ba ni smyon pa yang ma yino zhes bkago/bud med de cang mi zer bar 'dug/skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
80a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ngas ni khyim pa las dgongs te gsungs pa ma yin gyis/'on kyang rab tu byung ba las
80a2('dul ba): dgongs pa yin//khyim pa dag ni chags pa dang bcas bzhin du 'chi bar 'gyur la/rab tu byung ba ni ma yin//de lta bas na de'i phyir khyim pa 'di snyam du nga 'das
80a3('dul ba): nas 'di la sbyin snyam du sems pa ni byin pa yin gyi/rab tu byung ba ni ma yin pas blang bar bya zhing blangs nas kyang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin longs spyod du yongasu spyad
80a4('dul ba): par bya'o//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//dge slong zhig gis/dge slong zhig la chos gos dag bsngoso//des de dag bsngos nas dus las 'ongs pa dang /dge
80a5('dul ba): spyod de dag gis de khyer nas srog tu song ngo //de'i bar du dge slong des de'i gnas khang nas dri'i chos gis de dag blangs te rang gi gnas khang du bzhag/de nas dge
80a6('dul ba): slong de dag gis de'i rim gro byas nas gtsug lag khang du log pa dang /dge skos kyis de'i gnas gang du brtags na/ji tsam na lhung bzed dang /chos gos
80a7('dul ba): gsum dang /chu tshogs mthong nas/des rgan pa'i mthar khyer ba dang /de la dge slong de dag gis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa khyed kyi de'i chos gos gsum po
80b1('dul ba): 'di khyer te 'ongs sam/de la chos smos rung bar byas pa gzhan yang mung du yod na/der dog kyang khyed two shog shig/dus smras pa/de'i gnas khang na ni 'dor zad kyi gzhan/
80b2('dul ba): cung zad kyang mdo//dge slong dag gis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa de'i smres 'drin dge slong che ge mo zhes bya ba de la dris shig/des de la dris pa dang /smras pa/bdag
80b3('dul ba): gos khyer te/des bdag la bsngoso//skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag rung
80b4('dul ba): pabar bya ba'i phyir ngas bsngo bar gan ste/gang gis de dgra khyer ba de la 'di skad ces gyis shig/shrI ba'i yo byad kyi rnyed pa de dag dge 'dun la phul la/rang gi skul
80b5('dul ba): bas chog po gyis shig ces gyis shig/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod nu'o//dge slong gzhan zhig gis/dge slong zhig la tshe sa gos dag bsngos pa dang /gang la bsngos
80b6('dul ba): pa de dus lus 'das//dge slong rnams kyis dur khrod du khyer nus bsregs te slar 'ongs nus/de'i cho su gos de dag rgan bu'i mthar khyer ba dang /de la dge slong gis
80b7('dul ba): smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa 'di dge su'i yin/des smras pa/'di dag ni bdag gi lag mod kyi 'on kyang bdag gi de la bsngos//dge slong dag gis de ji ltar bsgrub pa mi shes
81a1('dul ba): nas/skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das lnga rgyas par gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/dge slong dag

81a3('dul ba): zhig la chos gos dag bsngos pa dang /gang la bsngos pa de babs nas/des bsams pa/bdag la dge slong des chos gos dag bsngos pas/bdag babs mod kyi
81a4('dul ba): 'on kyang de dag bdag dbang gis len du 'gro'o snyam nas/de dge slong de'i drung du song ste/des smras pa/'phags pa khyod kyis chos gos dag bdag la bsngos
81a5('dul ba): na de dag bdag la stsol cig/de dge slong dag la brjod pa dang /de dag gis ji ltar bsgrub pa mi shis nas/skyabs de dge slong drug gis bcom ldan 'das la
81a6('dul ba): rgyas par gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/nyes dmigs gang chung zad byung ba ni/dge slong gang kho na la yid brtan te/chos gos dgra
81a7('dul ba): btams pa de kho na'i mdun du sngo ba las gyur gyis/de'i phyir dge slong gis gsal yid brtan de chos gos dag btams pa de kho na'i mdun du//bsngo bar mi bya'o/
81b1('dul ba): snyam+b+ha du dpyongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong gis yid brtan zhing chos gro ga tums pa de nyid kyi mdun du chos gosla dasngo byar mi
81b2('dul ba): bya'i/de'i mngon sum du bsngo ba ma byas nA des na/nyes dmigs der mi 'gyuraro//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//dge slong gzhan zhig gis dge slong zhig le chos
81b3('dul ba): gos dag bsngos te/gang le bsngos pa'i de thab khyol can zhig ste/rtag tu dge slong dang lhan cig thab khrol byed pa las/de gzhan zhig dang thab mo byas nas 'gro bar
81b4('dul ba): chas pa dang /gang gis de la chos gos dag bsngos pa des mi btang bar brtsams te/tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gro shig ces des bzung ba dang /'dug tu ma gtub po//
81b5('dul ba): des yang dang yang du bzlog pa dang /de la dge slong zhig gis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa 'di ni thab khrol can zhig ste/rtag tu dge slong rnams la mi bde bar byed pa yin
81b6('dul ba): gyis thong shig/des smras pa/gzhan gyi phyir 'di mi gtong ba ma yin gyi/nga nyid kyi chos gopA dag 'di la bsngos pas 'di 'dzin to//skabs de dge slong dag
81b7('dul ba): gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gal te yid brtan pa'i dge slong rgya mtsho'i pha rol na 'dug pa zhig yin na de la
82a1('dul ba): yod la gan+na ta/bsngo ba byas nas bzung bar bya ste/'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis glal te yid brtun pa'i
82a2('dul ba): dge slong rgya mtsho'i bu rol na 'dug pa zhig yin na/de la yang chos gos dag bsngo bar bya'o zhes bka' stsol ba dang /dge slong gzhan zhig gis dge slong
82a3('dul ba): yul shin tu thAg ring po na 'dug pa zhig la/chos gos bsngos te/de dus las 'das por gyur pa dang /dge slong des dge slong de ji ltar dus las 'das par
82a4('dul ba): gyur pa ring shig lon nas thos pa dang /dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes//skyabs de dge slong dag la smras pa dang /dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol
82a5('dul ba): nonas/bcom ldan 'das kyisku bka' stsal pa/gang gi tshe thos pa de'i tshe gzhan la bsngo ba bya ste/'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o//sdom ni/mtsha bas kyi phyi rol 'dug
82a6('dul ba): pa yis//dad bye mi dbul sbyin+da mi bya//gcig la cig ni mi byA dang //gas sbyong dang ni degago dbye'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal bu rgya

82b1('dul ba): snosbyong dag gis bcoM ma ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'bras kyis pad+ma' stsal pa/mtshanas kyi rol na gnas pas dad pa dbul byar mi bya'o//bcom ldan 'das/
82b2('dul ba): kyis mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas pas dang pa dngul bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal phywa dang /dge slong ga zhan dag cig mtshams kyi phyi rol tu stong ngo //de dag ches pa

82b6('dul ba): dang po sbyin par byed do//dga' bos kyi nye dga' la/nyi dgas kyu dga' blo la/'dun pas ni 'cha ra ka laM/'char kas kyang 'dron pa la/'gro 'gyogs kyis ni nub sol

83a1('dul ba): gcig la cig dang pa sbyin byar mi byA ste/byin na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro/gleng gzhi ni mAnya nu yod na'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba
83a2('dul ba): byephyed byed cing gso sbyong gi tshe so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa thon cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /drug sde dag mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas shing gso sbyong la 'dun
83a3('dul ba): bo dang /yongasu dag pa 'bulo//skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mtshomus kyi
83a4('dul ba): rol na gnas pas gso sbyong la 'dun pa dang /yongasu dag pa dbul bar mi bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas pas gso sbyong la 'dun

83b5('dul ba): dag pa sbyin par mi bya'o//dge slong gis gcig la cig gso sbyong gi dad pa dang yongasu dag pa sbyin na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//gleng gzho ni mnyan yod na'o//bcom
83b6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis dbyer gnas par khas blangs pa'i dge slong gi gnas gsum po mthong ba dang /thos pa dang /dogs pas dgag dbye bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa/drug sde dag

84a1('dul ba): tshul shing dgra dang gang 'dod dang //na gcig khyim na gnas pa dang //dge tshul gsar bu mi 'dug pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
84a2('dul ba): mnyan yod na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso//mnyan yod na bram ze zhig 'dug pa de bya ba cung zad cig la phyir
84a3('dul ba): byung nas/rgyal byed kyi tshul du song ba dang /dre re shig 'di ni/dge slong du zhig gnas dri'o snyam pa'i 'dod pa skyes nas/des dge slong rnams la dris pa/'phags

84a5('dul ba): shes na khyed kyi dge slong dag mi shes pa lta de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang /bram ze de song //skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang //

84a7('dul ba): gcig ces bya ba la sogs pas bgrangs pa dang /phyis brjed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gcig ces bya ba la sogs pas bgrang bar mi bya'o//da
84b1('dul ba): klong dag gos sngar mos 'jugs byung 'brang na 'on kyang brjod nas/tsug ldan 'das kyim pa//'phrul pa/phor mos gzugs shing bgrang byar mi bya'o//bcom ldan 'das
84b2('dul ba): dge slong dag gcig ces bya ba la sogs pas bgrang bar mi bya/skyong mos gtsugs shing bzang bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /dge slong dag gis ji ltar bgreng ba
84b3('dul ba): ma shes//skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/tshul shing brim par bya zhing drims nas bgrang bar bya/
84b4('dul ba): bgrangs nas dpe 'dun la dge slong 'di snyed de zhes brjod par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul shing brim par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /dge slong dag gis nyi ma 'am/
84b5('dul ba): zla ba 'am/lo gang la brim pa mi shes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dbyar nye bar gtod pa'i tshe tshul shing brim par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
84b6('dul ba): gleng dag babrang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig gnas pa de dus dus su rgyal byed kyi tshul du nye bar 'ongs te/des de na dge slong bsam gtan
84b7('dul ba): dang /'don pa dang /yid la byed pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa mthong nas/de dag gis slong lam dang spyod pa dang sgrub pa des mngon par dad de/des bsams pa/re shig
85a1('dul ba): /'di na dge slong ji snyed cig yod pa dris lnga phyis spyan drangs te/bshos gso la snyam nus/des dge slong rnams la dris pa/'phags pa
85a2('dul ba): dge slong ji snyed cig bzhugs/dge slong dag gis smras pa/'di stod cig go/des rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te sod nas rang gi khyim du phyin te nang mi la smras pa/sdang
85a3('dul ba): kho bos sangs rgyas lnga sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol gyis khyed kyis dge slong 'di snyed cig gi bshos sbyor cig/de dag gis smras pa/rje'i
85a4('dul ba): sras legs te de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes de dag gis hwags dang bu ram dang /sha kha rA la sogs pa sta gon bya bar brtsam so//khyim dadag de yang mdza' bo da
85a5('dul ba): du dang pu nu rnams spyan nus/bshams zin pa'i dus de dag dang lhan cig rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste/rgan pa'i mtha' nas rkang pa la phyag byas nas dge gos pa
85a6('dul ba): smyos pa/'phags pa khyim bdag che ge mo zhig/snang sangs rgyas la sogs po dge slong gi dge 'dun sdom par gdugs tshod la spyan 'dren d+h+r-i zheso de skad gsungs
85a7('dul ba): shig/dge skos kyis smras pa dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis gnang nas de rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te song ngo //dge slong gzhon dge tsog kyang ljongs rgyu ba rgyu zhing
85b1('dul ba): mnyan yod du phyin to//de nas khyim bdag de de nyid kyi nub mo bza' ba dang /bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa sta gon byas nas/nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams/
85b2('dul ba): chur bzhag nis bcom ldan 'das la pho nya bas btsun pa gdugs tshod pa shams lags na/bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongasu gsol zhes gdugs
85b3('dul ba): tshod gdas par gsol to//dge slong rnams snga dro sham thabs bgos/lhung bzed dang chosnga gos thogs te khyim bdag de'i khyim du spong ngo //bcom ldan 'das ni gtsug
85b4('dul ba): lag khang na bzhugs shing gdugs tshad der drang so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu lngas gtsug log khang na bzhugs shing /gdugs tsho de 'dren te lnga
85b5('dul ba): gang zhe na/nang du yang dgra 'jog par bzhed pa yin/lha rnams lnga chos ston par bzhed pa yin/gnas mal la gziDa par bzhed pa yi mA nad pa la gzin par bzhed pa yin/nyan thos rnams
85b6('dul ba): 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa yin//don 'di la ni bcom ldan 'das nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed nas/gtsug lag
85b7('dul ba): khang na bzhugs shing /der gdugs tshod drang so//khyim bdag des dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi tshad bzhin stan bshams zan sta gon byas pa las ji tsam na dge slong rab tu
86a1('dul ba): mang bar mthong nas des smras pa/'phags pa bdag gis khyed kyis dge slong ji snyed yod pa stan pa de skad kyi dge slong gi gdan bshams/bshos/
86a2('dul ba): sta gon byas na dge slong mang du byon to//dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/khyim bdag dge slong glo bur pa dag lhags kyis rab tu dga' ba skyed cig/des smras pa/'phags
86a3('dul ba): pa skye ma khyed kyi dge slong gzhan dag kyang 'ong so zhes bgyis pa dang /bdag gis bshos kyang mang du sta gon bgyis/gdan yang mang du bshams pa zhig/dge slong
86a4('dul ba): dge spobs pa med nas cang mi smra bar 'dug/de na kha cig tha ma ma sbyangs tsam du gyur te de dag la dge slong rnams gshe bzhin du kham zin tsam za bar gyur to//skabs de
86a5('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge skos kyis dge slong glo bur pa 'di snyed cig lhagaso zhes dge
86a6('dul ba): slong glo bur pa rnams shes par byas nas khyim bdag la sbran par bya'o//dge slong gzhan dag cig zan gyi thad ka kho nar 'ongs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
86a7('dul ba): skyel pa/de dag kyang sbran par bya'o//dge slong gzhan dag cig sngar bos pa las gud du song nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/de dag kyang sbran par bya'o//
86b1('dul ba): gzhan yang ngas dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi dge slong gi kun tu spyad pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste dge 'dun gyi gan+d+ha brtan gyis dge slong gi dge 'dun blta bar bya zhing /gal te
86b2('dul ba): dge slong ni mang /zan ni nyung na/sbyin bdag la bzhin bzangs zan ni nyung /dge slong ni ming gis snyoms par rims shig ces brjod par bya'o//don te zan mi mang/
86b3('dul ba): dge slong ni nyung na des bzhin bzangaso zan ni mang gis ci 'byor pa bzhin rims shig ces brjod par bya'o//dge 'dun gyi gnas brtar gyi dge slong gis kun tu spyad pa'i
86b4('dul ba): chos ji ltar bcas pa rnams yang dag par blangs te mi 'jug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyu ro//gleng gozhi ni mnyan yod na'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka snga dro sham
86b5('dul ba): thabs lagos lhung bze dang chos gos thogs te/mnyan mod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhug so//mnyen yod du bsad snyoms la rgyas nas/btsun mo phreng ldan me ga la ba der
86b6('dul ba): song ste phyin nas/btsun mo phreng ldan ma la chos bstan par brtsam so//des de la chos ston pa na/ri dgas 'dzin kyi ma sa go dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi na ba'i sman khyer
86b7('dul ba): nas glu dang rol mo'i sgra dang /rgyal byed kyi tshal du chas pa btsun mo phreng ldan mas thos nas smras pa/'phags pa glu dang rol mo'i sgra breg pa'o ni suM'i lags/des smras
87a1('dul ba): pa/btsun ma ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga dge slong gi dge 'dun gyon pa'o sman ra nas 'dra s+thA/sgra rnga rna da tshadan/ngos smras pa/'phags pa
87a2('dul ba): gal te de lta na btsun mo phreng ldan gyis dge slong gi dge 'dun la na ba'i sman gyis blta bas so zhes bdag gi ming gis dge slong gi dge 'dun la brjod pa'i rigs so//des smras pa/
87a3('dul ba): btsun mo legs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gang zhig nad pa la rim 'gro byed pa de ni nga la rim 'gro byed pa yin no zhes gsungs pas/khyod kyi ming gis dge slong gi dge
87a4('dul ba): 'dun la bstabs par bya'o zhes smras nas/btsun mo phreng ldan ma la nad med par gyur cig ces byas te//stan la langs nas song ngo //de nas
87a5('dul ba): gtsug lag khang du song ste/rgan pa'i mthar 'dug nas smras pa/btsun mo phreng ldan mas dge slong gi dge 'dun la na ba'i sman gyis bstabs kyis/gang zhig
87a6('dul ba): sman gang 'dod pa de song la slongs shig/dge bskos kyis bsgo ba dang /dge slong rnams kyi smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa 'chas ka/bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i
87a7('dul ba): pho brang du 'gro ba la nyes dmigs bcu yod do zhes ma gsungs sam/de ji ltar bdag cag gis sman gyi phyir bslab pa nga las 'da' bar bya/de spongs pa med nas cang mi zer
87b1('dul ba): bar 'dun s+ho/da slong 'ga' yang skyong ldan ma la spyan ma spa nga/dzamam na tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang /tsun mthong ldan ma'i dir sa dwa da /sa s+thA sru ba/'dugs pa
87b2('dul ba): khyad kyis bdag gi ming gis dge slong gi dge 'dun la na ba'i sman gyis ma bstabs sam/btsun mo bstabs so//'phags pa gal te de lta na bdag gis 'di la ji ltar bsgrub pa
87b3('dul ba): 'byi//btsun mo tshong 'dus pa'i tshong pa'i log tu kar sha pa na ngag gtad na/dge slong gang zhig gang 'dod pa de/de la de dag slong grangs des smras pa/'phags
87b4('dul ba): pa legs te de ltar bgyi'o zhes des tshong 'dus pa'i tshong pa'i lag tu kar sha pa na dag gtad nas smras pa/'phags pa dag rgyal ba'i pho brang du mi 'ong gis dge slong gang zhig gang
87b5('dul ba): 'dod pa de la de byin cig/tshong pas rgyal po'i bkas kar sha pa na dag blangs te bzhag pa dang /dge slong rnams kyis lha mo phreng ldan mas spos 'tshong che ge mo zhig la
87b6('dul ba): kar sha pa na dag gtad de dge slong gang zhig gang 'dod pa de khyod kyis sbyin par bya'o zhes bsgo ba thos nas song la bslang ngo snyam mo//de nas dge slong kha cig ni song nas
87b7('dul ba): smras pa/bzhin bzangs kho bo cag la khur skam dang /khur ba dang /sha khu dag byos la byin cig/kha cig gis smras pa/kho bo cag la khur ba dang /sha skam byin
88a1('dul ba): cig/kha cig gis smras pa/kho bo cag la shrA khu khrol bu dang chog pa byin cig/de de dag gis gtsos pa dang smras pa/'phags pa bdag na
88a2('dul ba): khur mkhan yang ma lags/sha g.yos mkhyen yang ma lag pas/dbyig 'di snoms te bzhud la gang zhig gang gzhed pa des de bgyid du stsol cig/de dag gis/
88a3('dul ba): smras pa/bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyig mya gan //des smras pa/'phags pa bdag ni spos 'tshong ste/tshong 'dus kyis 'tsho ba lags na/de lta na
88a4('dul ba): bdag gis 'tshe ba 'chad par 'gyur//skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sbyin bdag la
88a5('dul ba): yid brtan te/kar sha pa na dge blangadra nas ci 'dod par yongasu spyad par bya ste/'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o//gleng gzhi ni menyan yod na'o//drug sde rnams khyim pa dag dang
88a6('dul ba): lhan cig stan gcig la 'dug pa/bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis mthong nas 'phya bar byed cing /'phags pa khyed rab tu byung ba tshangs par spyod pa yin
88a7('dul ba): ni/ji ltar 'dod pa'i longs spyod spyod pa 'di dag dang lhan cig stan gcig la 'dug ces byas pa dang /de dag cang mi zer bar 'dug pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams
88b1('dul ba): kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag bram ze dang /khyim bdag dad pa can dag 'phya ba ni theg tu bab bo//de lta bas na
88b2('dul ba): dge slong gis khyim bdag dang lhan cig stan gcig la 'dug par mi bya ste/'dug na 'gal chibs can du 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim pa dag dang lhan cig stan
88b3('dul ba): gcig la 'dug par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /dge tshul dag dang lhan cig stan gcig la 'dug po dge bsnyen dag gis mthong nas smras pa/'phags pa khyod ni
88b4('dul ba): bsnyen par rdzogs pa lags na/ji ltar dge tshul dag dang lhan cig stan gcig la bzhugs/de dag gis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di dag ni khyim pa ma yin te/'di dag
88b5('dul ba): dge slong yin na 'di la 'gal ba ci zhig yod/de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug pa'i skabs de/dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis
88b6('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang lhan cig stan gcig la 'dug par mi bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang lhan cig stan gcig la
88b7('dul ba): 'dug par mi bya'o zhes bka' sprul pa dang /dge slong rgan pargan pa dag/gsar bu gsar bu dag dang lhan cig stan gcig la 'dug pas gsar bu rnams/rgan pa
89a1('dul ba): rnams la ma gus par byeng ba'i skabs de/dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/nan
89a2('dul ba): pa dang /gsar bu lhan cig stan gcig la 'dug par mi bya'i/'on kyang byar nA lo gsum zhugs pa dang lhan cig 'dug par bya ste/lor ma lon pa dang /lo gsum
89a3('dul ba): lon pa yang lhan cig 'dug par bya zhing /lo gcig lon pa dang /lo bzhi lon pa dang /de bzhin du lo dgu lon pa dang /lo bcu gnyis lon pa'i bar yang
89a4('dul ba): lhan cig 'dug par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bar na lo gsum zhugs pa dang lhan cig 'dug par bya ste/lor mA lon papA dang lo gsum lon pa yang lhan cig

89a6('dul ba): bka' stsal te/bcom ldan 'das kyis bar na lo gsum zhugs pa dang lhan cig 'dug par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /dge slong dag khyim gyi nang du
89a7('dul ba): yang bar na lo gsum zhugs pa dang lhan cig 'dug par byed pas des stan dag ma 'byor nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyim gyi nang du
89b1('dul ba): na slob dpon dang mkhan po dag drang yang lhan cig 'dug par bya ste/'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o//sdom ni/dge tshul khye'u g.yogs mi sbyin dang /dge tshul kha dang mi bya dang
89b2('dul ba): mna' dang skugs gzugs mi bya dang //stag gi god ma mi bza' ba'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod no//rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi
89b3('dul ba): kun dga' re ba na bzhug so//bcom ldan 'das kyis chos nyan pa'i stan ba shams par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /dge tshul dag kyang khri'u g.yogs ma can la 'dug
89b4('dul ba): nas chos nyan par bye'o//de dag gnyid log nas de nyid du bshang gci shor te/khri'u g.yogs ma can dag ma rung bar gyur pa'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom
89b5('dul ba): ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge tshul la khri'u g.yogs ma can sbyin par mi bye'o/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul la khri'u
89b6('dul ba): g.yogs ma can sbyin par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i dge tshul skul byed ces bya ba de chos nyan du song ba dang /de la dge slong dag gis khro'u
89b7('dul ba): rkyang pa zhig byin pa dang /des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag ci'i phyir bdag la khri'u rkyang pa sbyin/de dag gis smras pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul rnams la
90a1('dul ba): m+b+hi'u g.yogs matsun bkag go/des smras pa/tshe dang ljon pa dag ci kho ba yang nyos dmigs de pyod dam/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis
90a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bkang sprul pa/dge tshul gang dag dran pa nye bar 'jog pa de dag la khri'u g.yogs ma can sbyin
90a3('dul ba): bar bya'i/gzhan dag la ni ma yi ni//glang gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//dge slong zhig la dge tshul zhig yod pa de la des nan thur byas pa dang /de rgyal byang
90a4('dul ba): kyi tshul gyi sgron du zhing 'dug/drug sde las gang yang rung ba zhig gi rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo mi stongs pa yin pas/tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' sgo na 'dug pa des de
90a5('dul ba): mthong nas des smras pa/dge tshul tse'i phyir du/des smras pa/btsun pa nye dga' bdag mkhan pos nan thur byas//bu tshur ngas khyod kyi lhung bzed dang /
90a6('dul ba): chos gos dang /drA ba dang /phor bu dang kau ska rags da/khyod gat+ta dang gang gis phongs pa de dang des mi phongs par bya'o zhes des de gnas khung du khrid do//
90a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis nan tur byas nas yal bar dor bar mi bya'i//na kyang slar dgug par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pas/dge slong des dge sbyong de le dge
90b1('dul ba): rluslong zlog mngags nas/dos do la smras pa dang /des smras pa/kho bo la mkhan pA ci dgos/hu dgas kho ba'i yo byad thams cad sbyar bas mi 'gra'o//dge slong 'phyo bar byed//
90b2('dul ba): gzhog phyis byed/smod par byed/bdag gis rab tu phyung ba nye dga' kha phyu zhes zer ba'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'dra la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan
90b3('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong gis gzhan gyi dge tshul kha drang bar mi bya ste/khwa 'dren na dbyen dang nye ba'i nyes pa sbom por 'gyuraro//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//
90b4('dul ba): drug sde rnams gad dang gang du dgos par mna' 'dor bar byed de/sangs rgyas la muna' 'dor/chos dang dge 'dun la mna' 'dor/slob dpon dang /mkhan po la
90b5('dul ba): mama' 'dor ba dang /bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis smras pa/slob dpon dag/bdag cag khyim pa lags kyang /ston pa la mna' 'dor bar mi bgyid na//
90b6('dul ba): khyed rab tu byung ba lagase na ji ltar ston pa la mna' 'dor/'di ni 'tshams pa me lags zhes byas pa dang /de dag cang mi zer bar 'dug pa'i skabs de/dge slong rnams
90b7('dul ba): kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag bris dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams 'phya ba ni thog tu bgo/rab tu byung
91a1('dul ba): ba ni bden pa'i bsam pa can yin te/de lta bas na dge slong gis mdza' 'dor bar mi bya'o//dge slong mna' 'dor na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur/
91a2('dul ba): gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//drug sde dag gang dang gang du dgos par lhung bzed dang /chos chos dang /dri ba dang /phur bu dang /ska rags dang /gzhan yang
91a3('dul ba): dge sbyong gi yo byad gang yang rung ba dge skugasu 'dzugs par byed pa/bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas 'phya bar byed cing /'phags pa khyed ci
91a4('dul ba): khyim po dgra bzhin du lhung bzed la sogs pa yo byad skugasu 'dzugs sam/de'i 'tsham pa ma yino//de dag gis smras pa/sgog skya zos sam/chang 'thungs
91a5('dul ba): sam/'di la mi 'tsham pa ci zhig yod/de dag cang mi zer bar 'dug pa'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan
91a6('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni thog tu bab po//de lta bas na dge slong gis skugs gzugs par mi bya ste/dge
91a7('dul ba): slong skugs 'dzugs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//drug sde rnga las kyi kun tu spyod pa ni/nang par sngar langs nas khang thog tu
91b1('dul ba): 'dzegs te phyogs bzhir lta zhing de dag gang na du ba 'thul po 'am/bya rgod lding ba snang ba der myur du gom pa bslang ste 'phro bar byed do//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na nye dga'
91b2('dul ba): nang par sngar khang thogs tu 'dzegs te blta bar brtsams na/des bya rgod lding ba mthong nas/do rengs pa rings par song ba dang /ji tsam na stag gis nags things po'i sa
91b3('dul ba): phyogs shig tu gong ma zhig sbas pa mthong nas de dga' ste/de khyer nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang /stag dri snom zhing phyi bzhin 'brangs nas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi
91b4('dul ba): sgo na sgra 'byin par byed do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa yin pas/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras pa
91b5('dul ba): sdug 'i ni ci ste skad 'byin/des gsol pa/btsun pa des gong ma sbas pa de/btsun pa nye dgas 'tshal te mchis pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
91b6('dul ba): kun dga' bo dge slong dag stag gi gong ma za 'am/btsun pa 'tshal lagaso//kun dga' bo ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge ni rigs dwags bzang po bzang po dag bsad nas/
91b7('dul ba): sha bzang po dag zos shing khrag bzang po dag 'thungs nas bor te 'gro'i/stag god ma sbed par byed pas/de lta bas na dge slong gis stag god ma bza' bar mi bya ste/zan
92a1('dul ba): 'phrul tshabs can du 'gyur ro//dge slong drug gzhan yang ngas dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi kun tu spyad pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/dge 'dun
92a2('dul ba): gyi gnas brtan gyi dge slong gri sha 'drim pa'i tshe 'di ci'i shA stag gi god ma ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o//ma dris par len na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro//sdom
92a3('dul ba): ni/tshul shing rnams ni brims pa na//spun gnyis dag ni gab pa dang /la ba bsgyur bar bya ba dang //de lta bu la sogs pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
92a4('dul ba): mnyan yod na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso//ri 'or zhig na gtsug lag khang zhig yod ji tsam dus gzhan zhig
92a5('dul ba): nu dga' bo dang nye dga' ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba las ri 'or de ro phyin to//de dag der phyin pa na/dge 'dun la yang rnyed pa zhig grub na de dag gnas ngan len kun tu
92a6('dul ba): spyod pa yin pas dge slong gang gis kyang ma bcar ba dang nye dga' bas dga' bo la smras pa/slob dpon lhung bzed nag po can 'di dag khengs pa nga rgyal can dag cig
92a7('dul ba): pos gtses tshur sbyor/gab ste bzhugs la 'di dag rnyed pa ji ltar bged pa gzig so//des smras pa/legs te de bzhin bya'o zhes de dag gab ste 'dug pa dang
92b1('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis rnyed pa de dgas//gang gi tshe rnyed pa de dgos zin pa de'i tshe de dag 'ongs nas smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa grub pa bgo'o//dge slong rnams
92b2('dul ba): kyis smras pa/khyed ga las du gzod 'dir 'angs kyi rnyed pa de 'drim pa'i cha ma yin/de dag gis smras pa/ci khyed bged rgyu zhig yin nam/bgos par mi chud kyi bgo nyes te/
92b3('dul ba): ci khyod kyis go bar byas nas bgos sam/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge 'dun la deng
92b4('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa 'drim na/dge slong grang yang gang du yang ma dgro shig ces go bar byas nas rnyed pa brim par bya'o//dge sbyong rnams kyis rnyed pa de slar bsdus//bsdus
92b5('dul ba): nas dge 'dun la dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa 'drim na/dge slong gang yang gang du yang mu 'gro zhig ces bsgo nas/de dag gis bgro bar brtsams pa dang /dga' bo dang nye dga'
92b6('dul ba): de bzhin du gab ste 'dug//bam po nyi shu rtsa gsum pa//gang gi tshe dge 'dun gyis rnyed pa de bgos zin pa de'i tshe/de dag yang 'ongs nas smras pa/tshwa dang
92b7('dul ba): ldan pa dag tshur rnyed pa de bgo'o//dge slong dag gis smras pa/khyed gang nas da gzod 'dir 'ongs kyi rnyed pa de dge 'dun la go bar byas nas/'drim pa'i tshe ni ma yin//
93a1('dul ba): de dag gis smras pa/gul te khyod kyis go bar byas kyang bgos par mi chud kyi bag+h+na&s twa/mkhyud kyis go bar byas nas gaN+DI brdungs sam/sbyangs//
93a2('dul ba): de dge sbyong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/go bar byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te/dge 'dun la rnyed pa de brim
93a3('dul ba): par bya'o//dge slong rnams kyis yang rnyed pa de slar bsduso//bsdus nas de bzhin du go bar byas te gaN+DI brdungs nas/bgo bar brtsams pa dang /de dag de kho na bzhin du
93a4('dul ba): gang ste 'dug/gang gi tshe rnyed pa de bgos zin pa de'i tshe yang 'ongs te/de kho na bzhin du smras pa dang /dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/dge 'dun la yang go ba
93a5('dul ba): byas/gaN+DI la'i brdungs nas khyed ga la da gzod 'dir 'ongs/de dag gis smras pa/khyed kyis go bar yang byas/gaN+DI de yang brdungs kyang cig khyed kyis tshul shing
93a6('dul ba): brims sam/bgos par mi chud kyis bgo nyeso zhes zer ba'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
93a7('dul ba): stsal pa/go bar byas te gaN+DI brdungs nas tshul shing brim par bya'o//dge slong rnams kyis yang rnyed pa de bsdu so//bsdus nas go bar byas/gits+tsha brdung tshul shing
93b1('dul ba): brims te/dgo bar brtsams pa dang /de dag de kho na bzhin du gab ste 'dug/gang gi tshe rnyed de bgos zin pa de'i tshe de dag 'ongs nas de kho na bzhin du smras pa dang /dge
93b2('dul ba): slong rnams kyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa khyed kyis dge 'dun de lta tsa 'dri 'am/dge 'dun la go bar byas/gaN+DI brdungs/tshul shing brims nas/khyed gi las nga gzong 'dir
93b3('dul ba): phyir/de dag gis smras pa/tshe dang ljon pa dag rnyed pa lta phar shog/gal te de lta na kho bo cag gis dge 'dun ji ltar co bris pa smros shig/gal te khyed kyis dge 'dun la go
93b4('dul ba): bar byas gaN+DI brdungs tshul shing brims na de ci khyed kyis kho bo cag gi bgo skal bstan tam/der zad rnyed pa med kyang bla 'gro'o zhes zer ba'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis
93b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge 'dun la gro bar byas gaN+DI brdungs/tshul shing brims nas gang zhig mi snang ba de'i
93b6('dul ba): bgo skal bstan nas bgo bar bya'o//bgos zin te 'ong ba gang yin pa de la ni rnyed pa sbyin par mi bya ste/gal te de ltar bgos na legs par bgos pa yin pas/'di la
93b7('dul ba): 'gyod par mi bya'o//dge slong gis ched du bsams te de ltar dge 'dun la co dri bar yang mi bya'o//dge slong ched du bsams te dge 'dun la co 'dri bar byed na 'gal tshabs
94a1('dul ba): rgyun du gyus+ho// ka ni mAn+dan yod nano//gdu nar+m+ma ma 'drug mgon myung bas rgyu u d+hUSh+Ta ts+tsha tun+d+has rlon na don srung byungan
94a2('dul ba): skye sbyin gyis rgyal byed kyi tshal tshan ci'i khrid par rnam po sna tshogs kyis byi nang baHsa t+tAri mo bris na ste/mchog tu phun sum tshogs par byu ba hU~M smr-i tAM/
94a3('dul ba): zlog chags brgya stod byug du ma rgyal byed kyi tshal blta ba'i phyir nye bar sed do//yang de'i tshe mnyan yod na bram ze zhig gnas pa de la rgyal po dang rnon po dang grong mi
94a4('dul ba): rnams blam tha 'di ma rdzas zhes mngon pa da de/des rgyal po po blang nas chen po la spros pa'i ltu zhig bye go//des de bgos rgyas hU~Ms byed kyi tshal du skad
94a5('dul ba): ltar song ba dang /de mthong ma thug kho nar dad pa chen po skyes nas/des la ba de phyogs bzhi'i dge sbyong gi dge 'dun la bu'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis chos
94a6('dul ba): mying ba rgya na/tha'i mi mar rgyu myong ba'i rgyakhyim du yid mi nyam par bzhi ni zhes pasos bus/dege slong rnams kyi mi'i rgya 'dzu tshol bur byas nis ma
94b1('dul ba): bgos so//bram ze des bsdams pa/la ba da chen po la 'os pa zhig pas/bdag gos 'phags pa rnams la/kar sha pa na dag dul la slar blang ngo snyam ste/de nang par

94b3('dul ba): 'bregs pa bdag gis khyed la la ba phul ba de khyed kyis cir bgyis//dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/bram ze chen po rje su yi rang bar gyis shig/kho bo cag gis mnyam par bgros/

94b5('dul ba): kor la klan to//gzhan zhig gis smras pa bdag gis lhung bzed byi bar bya'o//des smras pa/'phags pa la ba chen po la nges pa zhigan kye ma khyed kyis de kar sha pa na dag tu
94b6('dul ba): bsgyur la/kar sha pa nA dag bgo 'dod ces zer ba'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das rgyas bka' stsal bya/dge slong dag
94b7('dul ba): drim ze de zer ba bden te de lta bas na dge 'dun la gos kyi rnyed pa de lta bu grub pa gang yin pa de kar sha pa na dag tu bskyang la kar sha ba ni dag bgo bar bya'o//sdom ni/rung ba ma
95a1('dul ba): yan+d+ra lnga dag gi/l+h+wam ni dgag pa mdzad pa dang //dom lpags kyi ni lham drag dang /de yi steng gi rim pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan
95a2('dul ba): yod na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi 'tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso//drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/dga' bo nye dga' bo bdag cag gis mnyan
95a3('dul ba): yod du skye bo mang po thams cad la ma lus par bza' bo'i rin bslangs na/rgyal po'i glang po che 'dul ba de dag gis bdag cag la cung zad kyang ma byin gyis tshur shog
95a4('dul ba): 'dong cung zad cig bsla//de na kha cig gis smras pa/legs te de ste byo mod kyi 'on kyang thabs shig bsham par bya'o//ci zhig bya/seng ge'i lpags pa las
95a5('dul ba): lham byas pa de bgos te/rdzi kar 'dug nas glang po che rnams bskyog parau bya'o//gzhan dag gis smras pa/re shri gr-i de bzhin du bslangs la/gal te ma ster na
95a6('dul ba): phyis de ltar bya'o zhes do rnams nang par sngar langs te de dag drung du song nasgo smos pa/bzhin bzangs dag gtum po khyed kyis khro bo cag lA zas kyi rin mi
95a7('dul ba): sbyin na mo//de dag gis smras pa/'phags pa khyod la kho bo cag ci rog lus na/gang gi phyir kho bo cag gis zas kyi chen sbyin/drug sde rnams kyis mjal+ya to
95b1('dul ba): zhes byas nas song ngo //de dag gis sngar gros byas pa bzhin seng ge'i lpags pa las lham byas nas bgos te/de dag glang po che rnams rgyu ba'i rdzi kar dong ste 'dug pa dang /
95b2('dul ba): glang po che rnams kyis seng ge'i dri tshor te bred nas gcin rtug gtor te 'bros par brtsam so//glang po che 'dul ba rnams kyis lcags kyu dag gis zho sha yod med kyis bzung na
95b3('dul ba): ma thub pa dang /drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag ma gting shig ma gtang shig/de dag gis smras pa/'phags pa mi thub na ji ltar myi gtang /drug sde rnams
95b4('dul ba): kyis smras pa/kho bo cag gis glan nam/'phags pa de ltar gnang na sman che'o//tshe dang ldan pa dag gal te bza' ba'i rin ster bar dam 'cha' na gla no//'phags pa dbu'o///
95b5('dul ba): bden grang zhes byas nas de dag rdzi phyogs ma yin par dong ste 'dug pa dang /seng ge'i dri mnam pas glang po che rnams sdod do//glang po che 'dul ba rnams kyis smras pa/'phags
95b6('dul ba): pa ci khyed rig sngags mkhyen tam/bzhin bzangs kho bo cag rig sngags mi shes//'phags pa gal te de lta na khyed kyis ji ltar bzlog/de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa
95b7('dul ba): bsnyad pa dang /de dag gis smras pa/khyod kyis gnod pa 'di lta bu yang byas pa lta/gal te rgyal po'i glang po che dam pa yan lag mchog can 'di lta bu dag nags kyi nang du
96a1('dul ba): shor bar gyur na/khyed kyis rgyal po la rku byas par ma gyur tam+ba/de dag 'dzum dmyal nas cang mi zer bar 'dug pa'i skabs de/dge slong
96a2('dul ba): rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong dag sang+ge'i lpags pa'i lham gyon
96a3('dul ba): ba las gyur gyis/de'i phyir dge slong gis seng ge'i lpags pa'i lham bcang bar mi bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag
96a4('dul ba): de lta bas na dge slong gis seng ge'i lpags pa'i lham bcang bar mi bya ste/dge slong seng ge'i lpags pa'i lham 'chang na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro//bcom ldan

96a6('dul ba): pa'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das lnga gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta bas na sa na mo dang mche ba'i stobs
96a7('dul ba): can lnga po glang po cang shes dang /rta cang shes dang /sing ge dang /stag dang /gung gi lpags pa'i lham bcang bar mi bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis sen mo dang
96b1('dul ba): mche ba'i stobs can lnga'i lpags snyam bcung bar mo byA'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa senA mo dang mchi

96b3('dul ba): bcang bar mi bya ste/'chang na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//mnyan yod na dge slong zhig gzhang 'brum gyi nad kyis thebs pa de sman pa'i
96b4('dul ba): drung du song nas/bzhin bzangs bdag gzhang 'brum gyis thebs na sman ston cig/des smras pa/'phags pa dom lpags kyi lham mnobs shig dang /khyod ses par

98a6('dul ba): khab kyi grong khyer na/rgyal po pan chen po zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/chos kyi rgyal po rgyal srid 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang bde ba dang /lo legs pa/
98a7('dul ba): skye bo dang mi mang pos kong ba/'thab pa dang /rtsod po dang /'khrug pa dang /'khrag long rab tu zhi ba/chom kun dang /nad med pa/sa lu dang bu ram shing dang /
98b1('dul ba): mu he phun sum tshogs pa/chos dang 'thun pas byed du 'jug/mnyan yod na ni rgyal po tshangs byin ring du 'phur 'phags rgyal ni ni mu khyud mtha' yas/ko'u sham brin

98b3('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'dis dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na/gzigs pa lnga po rigs la gzigs pa dang /dus la gzigs pa dang /yul la
98b4('dul ba): gzigs pa dang /rus la gzigs pa dang /bud med la gzigs pa 'jig rten la gzigs te/'dod pa na spyod pa lha drug kyang lan gsum du sbyang ba mdzad nas glang po cher
98b5('dul ba): bstan pas yum gyi lhumasu zhug so//de'i tshe sa chen po g.yos par gyur/'jig rten 'di thams cad kyang snang ba rgya chen pos kyang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi kha
98b6('dul ba): dog gi mthu yang zil gyis mnan nas khyab par gyur te/'jig rten dang 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun gnub thibs po skrag tu gyur pa gang du nyi ma dang /zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul
98b7('dul ba): che ba/'di ltar mthu che ba 'di dag gi 'od kyis kyang snang bar ma nus pa/gang dag yin pa de dag kyang de'i tshe snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur te/der sems can gang dag
99a1('dul ba): smyos pa de dag rang gi lag nos bzung yang mi mthong ba de dag kyang 'ong dus sems can+da phon tshun mthong nas shes ldan dag sems can gzhan dag kyang //
99a2('dul ba): 'dir skyes pa lta/shes ldan dag sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes pa lta zhes bya bar shes//gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das bltam pa de'i tshe//
99a3('dul ba): rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bu yeng btsas te/rgyal po'i khab tu ni rgyal po pad+ma chen po'i bu btsaso//mnyan yod du ni tshangs byin gyi/'phags rgyal du ni mu khyud mtha' yas
99a4('dul ba): kyi/ko'u sham bir ni rgyal po dmag brgya po'i bu btsa so//byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa na/sa chen po 'di gas ro bzhun ma lta bur snang bar gyur pa dang /rgyal po
99a5('dul ba): so so nas bsams pa bdag gi bu'i mthu'o//bdag gi bu'i mthu'o snyam nas de dag so so nas ming 'dogs par byed de/rgyal po pad+ma chen pos smras pa/shes ldan dag
99a6('dul ba): nga'i bu btsas pa na nyi ma'i gzugs bzhin du 'jig rten snang bar byas pas/de'i phyir gzhon nu'i ming gzugs can snying po zhes 'drog so//rgyal po tshangs byin ring du 'phur
99a7('dul ba): gyis smras pa/nga'i bu bcas pa na ljongs rnams gsal zhing gsal ba lta bur snang bas de'i phyir gzhon nu'i mang bsal rgyal zhes bya bar gdag so//rgyal po mu
99b1('dul ba): khyud mtha' yas kyis smras pa/nga'i bu bcas pa na 'jig rten rab tu snang ba la kho nas snang bar byas pas de'i phyir gzhon nu'i ming rab snang zhes bya bar gdugaso//rgyal po dmag
99b2('dul ba): brgya pas smras pa/de'i bu bcas pa nA 'jig rten nyi ma shar ba bzhin du snang bar byas pas/de'i phyir gzhon nu'i ming shar bang bdag so//de'i tshe ri kI snyin don la drang
99b3('dul ba): srong mi dkar ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten 'di'i 'jig pa lnga mkhas pa/'chags pa la mkhas pa zhi gro gnas//de'i tsha bo na la da zhes bya ba zhig yod de de'i drung du yang dang yang
99b4('dul ba): du nye bar 'gro'o//de nye bar 'ongs pa de la rtag tu 'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i gtam byas te/de 'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i gtam thos nas skyo ste de'i thad du rab tu byungango //des
99b5('dul ba): dus gzhan zhig na drang srong mi dkar ba'i bug snang ba rgya chen pos khyab pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang tshigasu bcad de smras pa/nyi ma thams cad cig char du//'dir ni shar
99b6('dul ba): bar gyur tam ci//'di ltar ri dang phug bcas par//'od zer dag gis 'dar ba bzhin//yi dkar ba yis de smras pa//nyi mi'i 'od cha 'od 'di bsil//lus 'dir snang ba 'jug
99b7('dul ba): pas ni//'di ni nges par thub pa'i 'od//byang chub sems dpa' 'ad po che//gdon mi za bar lhums nas 'byung //'di ni byang chub sems dpa' de//'byung ba'i 'od ni
100a1('dul ba): dri med pa//'jig rten gsum po dag tu ni//gsor dang 'dra ba bkye ba yin//na la des smras pa/mkhan po gal te de lta na tshur spyon byang
100a2('dul ba): chub sems dpa' gzigs kyis bzhud//des smras pa/bu da lta byang chub sems dpa' lha dbang che bar grags pa/dbang che bar grugs pa rnams kyis bskor cing
100a3('dul ba): bzhugs te/de bdag gis blta bar bla ba ma yin gyis/gang gi tshe pho brang du gshegs nas mtshan btags te phyir byung ba de'i tshe bltar 'dong ngo //gang gi nyin par
100a4('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa de nyid kyi nyin mo 'dun pa la sogs pa rim gro pa lnga brgya dang /'dun ma la sogs po rim gro ma lnga brgya dang /glang po che mo lnga
100a5('dul ba): brgya dang /rta rgod ma lnga brgya yang bcas shing 'brangs/gter lnga brgyu yang kha bye ste snang //blon po rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang sbran pa/lha zhal rjes dges pa
100a6('dul ba): mdzad du gsol/gzhon nu bltam+ba pa na don 'di snyed grub ste/rim gro pa lnga brgya dang /rim gri mA lnga brgya yang btsos/glang po che mo lnga brgya dang /rta rgod ma lnga brgya
100a7('dul ba): yang bcas shing 'brangs/gter lnga brgya yang khaM bye ste bstan lagaso//rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas yid bde ba skyes te smras pa/shes ldan dag gzhon nu
100b1('dul ba): bcas pa na nga'i don thams cad dang las kyi mtha' thams cad grub pas/de'i phyir gzhon nu'i ming don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar gdagaso zhes de na byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan/
100b2('dul ba): 'di lta ste/don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba der btag so//byang chub sems dpa' rin po sna bzhi'i khyogs la bzhag s+ho/sems can stong phrag du mas bskor nas/lha
100b3('dul ba): dang mi'i bkur bsti chen pos ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer du zhug so//byang chub sems dpa' grong khyer du zhugs pa na/shAkya nga rgyal can mu tsor smra ba thugs thub can rnams
100b4('dul ba): thub pa bzhin du cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/shAkya nga rgyal tsan mu tsir smra ba thugs thub can 'di dag gzhon nu grong khyer du zhugs pa dang /
100b5('dul ba): thub pa bzhin du cang mi smra ba 'dug pa de'i phyir gzhon nu'i ming shAkya thub par gdagaso zhes de ni byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid pa 'di lta ste/shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba
100b6('dul ba): der btag so//shAkya rnams la gnod sbyin gzhug mar gnas pa shAkya spel pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/shAkya su'i bu 'am bu mo btsas kyang rung /de dang por gnod sbyin
100b7('dul ba): shAkya spel ba'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du khrod pas rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/shos ldan dag deng la gzhon nu gnod sbyin shAkya spel ba'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du
101a1('dul ba): chud shig/blon po rnams kyis de'i mdun du khrod pa dang /gnod sbyin shAkya spel bas byang chub sems dpa' thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo //mthong /
101a2('dul ba): nas kyang de brtad de rings par gomu bslang nas/byang chub sems dpa' bsu ste rkang pa la phyog byas pa dang /rgyal po zas gtsang gIs smras pa/shes ldan dag gnod sbyin
101a3('dul ba): shAkya spel ba yang /gzhon nu'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te de lta bas na 'di ni lha'i yang lha yin pas/de'i phyir gzhon nu'i ming lha'i yang lha zhes gdag so zhes don
101a4('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan gsum pa 'di lta ste/lha'i yang lha zhes bya bar btag so//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis byang chub sems dpa' bram ze rnams dang
101a5('dul ba): mtshan mkhan rnams dang /skar mkhan rnams la bstan nas/shes ldan dag gzhon nu ci/gang dag dang ldan na skyes bu chen po'i 'gro ba gnyi su 'gyur gyi/gzhan
101a6('dul ba): du ma yin te/gal te khyim pa khyim na gnas na 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal po chos dang 'thun pa rin po che sna bdun dang ldan
101a7('dul ba): par 'gyur zhing /de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta bu dag yin te 'di lta ste/'khor lo rin po che dang /glang po rin po che dang /rta rin po che dang /nor bu rin po che dang /
101b1('dul ba): btsun mo rin po che dang /khyim bdag rin po che dang /bdun pa blon po rin po che'o//gal te sgra dang kha spu brags nas gos ngur smrig dag bgos te/dad pas yang dag par khyim
101b2('dul ba): nas khyim med par rab tu byung na 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur/skyes bu
101b3('dul ba): chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan nAm/de dag gis smras pa/lha de lta lags te gzhon nu nI/gang dag drong ldan na skyes bu chen po'i 'gro ba gnyi su 'gyur
101b4('dul ba): gzhan du ma lags te zhes bya ba nus/'jig rten na sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ba skyes bu chen po mtshan su cu nyis dang ldan lagaso//nal des smras pa/ma khan pa
101b5('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' ser skya'i grong khyer du gshegs te/de'i mtshan yang btags logs kyis chur gshegs gzigasu bzhud//des smras pa/bu legs te de bzhin
101b6('dul ba): byos 'dong ngo zhes de gnyis rdzu 'phrul gyis rgyas pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i mthus de'i rdzu 'phrul nyams te rkang pa kho nas ser skya'i de zhi'i grong khyer du zhubus nas rgyum
101b7('dul ba): po zas gtsang gi pho brang ga la ba der song ste phyin na rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo na sdod do//de nas drang srong mi dkar bas mi zhig la smras pa/kye skyes bu khyod tshur shog song la rgyal po
102a1('dul ba): zas gtsang la drang srong mI dkar ba lha la blta bar 'dod de sgo na 'dug zhes sgron cig/des song nas rgyal po zas gtsang la lnga drang srong mi
102a2('dul ba): dkar ba lha la blta bar 'tshal te/tshab sgo ni mchi so zhes sbran pa dang /des smras pa/shes ldan dag drang srong mi dkar ba la suM 'gog/nang du shog shig/de nang
102a3('dul ba): du zhugs pa dang /rgyal po zas gtsang gis byon pa legaso zhes bya ba'i kun tu spyod pas kun tu spyad nas/rkang pa la mchod yon phul te seng ge'i khri la 'dug tu bcugo/
102a4('dul ba): de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/drang srong chen po ci go zhig gi slad du byon/des tshigasu bcad de smras pa/rgyal chen
