165a6('dul ba): pa/lha rgyal po gautum po rab snang na khyod kyi yun ring po nas gsod pa phyir rgol ba mi mdza' ba lags pas/gal te lha der bzhud de mdzel nu gnod pa bgyid
165a7('dul ba): pa'i gnas gang lags pa de mchi so//des smras pa/sbyor ba 'chang mi rnams kyi nang na mi gzu lums can dag yod mod kyi/'on kyang khyod 'dir 'dug shig nga ni
165b1('dul ba): 'gro'o//des smras pa gal te lha de ltar bzhed na/lha bag mi mnga' ba lags mod kyi/'on kyang bag mdzad pa'i rigaso//rgyal po shar pa'i bu yang shin tu bud med la brkam
165b2('dul ba): chags can zhig pas des de'i tshig khyad du bsad nas/'phags rgyal du song ba dang /skya bseng gi bu mo des de gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa mdzes pa mthong ngo //nges
165b3('dul ba): de mthong nas smras pa/rgyal rigs tshur spyon skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol ma dang dga' dgur spyad par bgyi'o//des smras pa/legs kyis mal gyis shig/des smras pa/
165b4('dul ba): khyod mal gyis shig/de gnyi ga yang dregs shong nga rgyal gyis khengs pas rgyal po shar pi'i bus kyang mal ma byas/skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol mas kyang ma byas par/de
165b5('dul ba): gnyis khyod ma la byos shig nga mi byedado zhes smra ba'i bar du nam nangs par gyur to/rgyal po'i pho brang du rnga brdungs po dang skya ba seng gi bu mo sgrol ma song ngo //rgyal po shar pa'i
165b6('dul ba): pus smras pa/sdod cig dga' dgur spyad par bya'o//skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol mas smras pa/ji ltar dga' dgur spyad ltos 'di skad du bud med zhig rnga brdungs te mi 'ongs pa
165b7('dul ba): de'i mgo bo drungs nas bcad sa la dor ro zhes khrim su bcas po gzhag la da gzad rnga de yang brdungs na ci bdag la mgo gnyis yod dam 'gro zhes de dag dgur ma spyad par rgyal po
166a1('dul ba): shar pa'i bu'i lag nas sor gdub rgyu phyung ste song //rgyal pos dris pa/sgrol ma khyod kyis dga' dgur spyad dam/des smras pa/lha dga'
166a2('dul ba): dgur ma spyad//ci'i phyir khyod kyis dga' dgur ma spyad/des ji ltar gyur pa brjod nas/sor gtub rgya bstan te 'dri ni bdag gis de'i sor gdub rgya 'tshal te mchis
166a3('dul ba): lags so//rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis de'i rgyu blugs nas gsos pa la smras pa/gsos pa rgyal po shar pa'i bu dmag mang po can 'dir 'ongs pa sus kyang ma
166a4('dul ba): tshor te/de yod nga'i btsun mo'i 'khor 'dod na khyod kyis ji ltar yalA bar dor/des smras pa/lha ma tshor bar dri 'drir mchis mod/ji ste da dung 'dir mchi na mi
166a5('dul ba): bzod par bgyi'o//de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snong gis yang de bzhin du dril bsgrags pa dang /rgyal po shar pa'i bu des de bzhin du thos nas/sbyor ba 'chang la
166a6('dul ba): smras pa/sbyor ba 'chung rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis yung de btsun mo'i 'khor ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du skyes bu longs spyod du gtingango zhes grug gis de'i phyir rgyal
166a7('dul ba): pagatum po rab snang gi btsun mo'i 'khor rnams dang lhan cig dga'a'i dgur spyad kyis tshur shog 'dong /sbyor ba 'chang gos smras pa/lha de'i tshe ni khyod mo tshor bar
166b1('dul ba): /bzhud pas/de'i slad du bde bar 'dir 'khor gyi/da ni rgyu lnga po gtum po rab snang sta gon du chas shing mchis pas ma gshegs na legasaso//des smras pa/sbyor ba 'chang mi
166b2('dul ba): rnams kyi nang na mi gzu lums can dag lta yod de/'gro'o zhes de song ba dang /sbyor ba 'tshang yang rgyal po'i bkres song ngo //rgyal po shar pa'i bu rim gyis 'phags rgyal
166b3('dul ba): du phyin te khyim gung du zhugs pa de gasngos pas lag na ral gyi thogs pa'i mi dag gis kun nas bskor nas de rnams la bsgo ba/shes ldan dag gal te bud med cig phyi
166b4('dul ba): rol tu byung na ni thongs shig/ji ste skyes pa zhig na ma btang zhig/sbyor ba 'chang gis tshor nas des bsams pa/bdag gis rgyal po mi bzad pa dog pa nyam nga bar
166b5('dul ba): gyur pa yal bar dor ba gang yin pa ni bdag gis cha ma yino snyam nas/des rgyal po da bud med phal pa'i cha lugs dang rgyun gyis brgyan te/de nas bum pa bkur
166b6('dul ba): nis/lcug mas bzhus te skyo zhing lha da dung tshems shing ma gsol na/khyed chu khyer te mi 'ong ngam zhes byas nas phyir phyung //rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis bu mo mngag
166b7('dul ba): gzhug mi yin no snyam nas yol bar btang ba dang /des bum pa rdzing bu'i 'gram du bor nas zlos te song ngo //goms pas khyim de bltas pa dang /re shig na bros
167a1('dul ba): na rgyu ga da gyu rgyu ma tha snang dus rna rdzums rgyun ba shA nga gang lags/
167a2('dul ba): rlu gis smrasmra ba/stu bA s+yai g-is sgras /khadag thom ldan po deng gros des bden zhi ba /bdag gis hU~M btung ba gang lags pa de ni dag gis rigs
167a3('dul ba): m+b+hisl-i/nga nga / nga ba dang 'bus par gas ma lan sa pa dang /
167a4('dul ba): basnro smrapa la sa nas sa s+ho/ hU~M rgyu TIg yang das ba nga ba gas /de b+h+ri
167a5('dul ba): khrid de yinas sbyin legs/ 'dus chud pas kyi ga rgyu de ni ma skyes pa dang na dwe ga napa de gzung ba'i bus po sems shing 'dun don shigan
167a6('dul ba): zhes pa y-i hrIg+h+nAN+Da ts+tsha brdzunag ma dung/ seMs sgyu 'di du hU~M la la 'i kha byeng nus sa ma zhes dris pa nga/
167a7('dul ba): rgyu sa sa na/sa rje myo byin padan cesas ni//sangs sa slong ba kyi
167b1('dul ba): /dUn du rdzu sa sa sgru ts+tsha ba nga/da chu//de yang byanas dang phyogs na rgyum sma sa gru m+bu myur rlu r+m+ma nan na lda pa ba sa su rmAm R+tha gang+gA rdzu//
167b2('dul ba): la shrI n+d+he sa smras pa /sa spyod pa ga ma la g+h+ri sa so
167b3('dul ba): skye 'ab s+ho// ts+tsha d+mo rgyu ma du drug hU~M/ m-i sa ts+tsha ba/rkyenas byung dge N+Di
167b4('dul ba): sbyi ma du shA b+hi myu la la la mi shis/ m+bu shA gling gi tshogs yan lag na ba d+hA du ni/da gyis
167b5('dul ba): ran d+he gtsug d+ha kun ni rlung babyung nas myur du 'dir khrid na shi ces byas pa dang /de dag gisuM myu lce rnam la kau
167b6('dul ba): ts+tsha shru hU~M sa seM 'ang / d+d+he smai/rdzu ng+ge/shA hU~M/
168a1('dul ba): yi no zhes ze ro//gzhan dag na ro 'di glang po che'i rgod ma yin gyi 'phags rgyal gyi rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam
168a2('dul ba): bu'i ri zhes bya ba bros pa de 'dir 'ongs pa yino zhes zer ro//de nas kha cig gis rgyal po shar pa'i gan du song nas/gcam bu gsol pa/lha 'phags rgyal
168a3('dul ba): na gnas pa'i rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam bu'i ri bros par gyur pa gang lags pa de ni lha'i bsod nams kyi mthus 'dir mchis te/srog
168a4('dul ba): chags brgya stong du ma ltar mchi so zhes byas pa dang /rgyal po shar pa'i bus thos nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/dga' ba'i rnga ni brdungs/dung zung kha
168a5('dul ba): bsdams pa ni bus nas/sbyor ba 'tshong la bsgo ba/song la dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon la grong khyer du yang dril sgrogs te/'di skad du grong khyer
168a6('dul ba): na gnas pa thams cad dang /yul sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams la rgyal po glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam bu'i ri 'dzin tu gshegs kyis mtshan cha
168a7('dul ba): rnam pa sna tshogs dang zhags pa thogs te sheg shig ces bsgo shig/sbyor ba 'chang gis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon te grong khyer du yang dril bsgrags
168b1('dul ba): nas 'di skad du shes ldan grong khyerar+ya na gnas pa rnams dang /pho brang 'khor na gnas pa rnams dang //yul sna tshogs nus 'ongs pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag nyon cig lhas
168b2('dul ba): nga glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam bu'i ri 'dzin du gshegs kyi khyed cig mtshon cha sna tshogs dang zhags pa dag thogs te sheg shig ces bka' stsal to zhes byaso//de nas
168b3('dul ba): rgyal po shar pa'i dpung gis tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang /mi'i mchog stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam bu'i ri 'dzin du 'ongs pa dang /
168b4('dul ba): 'khrul 'khor 'phul bya rnams kyis ji ltar glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam bu'i ri ltar bcos pa de 'bras par brtsom pa de ltar 'khrul 'khor de phul ba dang /blon po rnams
168b5('dul ba): kyis smras pa/lha khyod nyid glang po chu'i cho ga la mkhas pa lags pas/glang po che'i 'di 'brosu bgyid kyis khyod nyid kyis thabs mdzad du gsol/rgyal pos
168b6('dul ba): sbyor ba 'chang la bsgo ba/dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa khyed cig/nga nyid thabs kyis 'di'i drung du 'gro'o des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa bgyid nas//
168b7('dul ba): rgyal po bdag nyid pi bang snyan pa len cing nye bar 'gro bar brtsams po dang /'khrul 'khor 'phrul pa rnams kyis ji ltar 'khrul 'khor rgyal po shar pa'i bu'i drung du song
169a1('dul ba): nas 'dug pa d+mo ltar phul to mo lnga brgya po de dag 'khrul 'khor nus byung nas bzang //bzung nas 'khrul 'khor du bcug ste/'khrul
169a2('dul ba): 'khor de ji ltar rlung gi shugs ltar mgyogs par gyur pa de ltar du'o//rgyal po shar ba'i bu da//rgyal po shar ba'i bu khrid zhes blon po rnams kyus kun tu spyan
169a3('dul ba): ba dang /srob chags brgya stong du mA dang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi las bsnyag par brtsam so//gang gi tshe sa tshigs 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe sbyor ba 'chang gis
169a4('dul ba): smras pa/shes ldan dag rgyal po khrid zin te/thabs gzhan zhig bcas kyis slar log shig ces byas pa dang /de dag thams cad log go/rgyal po shar pa'i bu
169a5('dul ba): yang 'phags rgyal du khrid nas/gsos ngas rgyal po gtum po rab snang la phul te/lha rgyal po shar ba'i bu 'di lag so zhes byas pa dang /rgyal pos dgong ba'i dza ni brdungs
169a6('dul ba): dung zung kha bsdoms pa ni bus te/glong dang grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /srang na gnas pa'i srog chags rnying ni bdu ma tshogs pa dang /gsos pa la bsgo ba
169a7('dul ba): ngas rgyal po shar ba'i bu yongasu btang gis sod cig/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/lha rgyal po 'din glang po che'i cho ga la mkhas pa zhig ste/gal te 'di bkum na
169b1('dul ba): glang po che'i cho ga nub par 'gyur bas/de'i slad du re shig lhas 'di las glang po che'i cho ga bslab tu gsol/slad kyis ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin bgyi'o//rgyal pos
169b2('dul ba): skyes pa/gsos pa gal te de lta na khyod kyis 'di las glang po che'i cho ga slobs shig/ngas 'di las glang po che'i cho ga bslabs te/nga'i slob dpon du gyur na de ji ltar na de
169b3('dul ba): ji ltar slob dpon bsad par bya/gsos pas smras pa/lha bdag la yang nyes dmigs de nyid du 'gyur bas de ni cha ma lagaso//rgyal pos smras pa/gsos pa gal te
169b4('dul ba): lta na su zhig 'di la slob tu bcug la de las nges bslab par bya/gsos pas smras pa/lce khyod kyi sras mo nor lhas byin 'di la lo ma mchos pa/brtson 'grus
169b5('dul ba): dang ldan pa/mkhas pa grims pa lags pas 'di slob tu stsal te 'dis lha la bslab par bgyi'o//rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis nor lhas byin la smras pa/bu ma mi
169b6('dul ba): de mtshan ngan pa bcwo brgyad dang ldan na/'on kyang de glang po che'i cho ga la mkhas pa zhig pas khyod kyis de las bar du yol bas bcad glang po che'i cho ga slobs la phyis nga la
169b7('dul ba): slobs shig/khyod kyis mi de la blta bar yang mi bya ste/de mthong na bkra mi shis pas khyod kyis de mthong na khyod mchi'o zhes byas pa dang /des yol bre bcad de las
170a1('dul ba): glang po che'i cho ga bslab par brtsam so//sbyor ba 'chang gris bsams pa/gal te lha btsal te gson na ni de thar pa'i thabs shig bsam mo//
170a2('dul ba): 'on te shi ste dus las 'das na ni gzhan zhig rgyal por dbang bskur ro snyom nas/de'i sring mo gser phreng can zhes bya ba sgyu ba sham pa la sbyor ba 'chang ba bas kyang
170a3('dul ba): lculhag pa zhig yod pa de la des smras pa/sring mo 'phags rgyum du song la son nas rgyal po kun tu tshol te/gal te gson na de thar pa'i thobs shig bsam par bya'o//
170a4('dul ba): 'on te shi ste dus las 'das na gzhan zhig rgyal por dbyung bskuro zhes byas pa dang /des de la cang mi smra bas khas blangs te kun tu rgyu'i cha lugasu bsgyur nas 'phags
170a5('dul ba): rgyal du song ngo //de rgyal po'i sgor 'dug nas rgyal po'i mi dag la dris pa/shes ldan dag rgyal po shar pa'i bu cig gson num 'on te shi/rgyal po'i mi dag gis
170a6('dul ba): smyos pa/re shig rab tu byung ba khyod la dris/des khyod la gnod pa ci zhig byas/des smras pa/shes ldan dag des kho mo'i khyo dang bu ni 'tsho ba dang bral/bdug
170a7('dul ba): gi nor rdzas thams cad ni phrag so//de dag gis smras po/rab tu byung ba de ni dus las ma 'das te/de rgyal po'i sras mo nor lhas byin pa la glang po che'i cho ga slob bo//
170b1('dul ba): debazhin du des rgyal po'i sgo bzhir rgyal po'i mi dag la dris pa dang /de dag gos kyang de bzhin du lan btab bo//dI ga thabs de dang des nang du chud pa dang des rgyal po shwar
170b2('dul ba): pa'i du mthong nas/phyogs bzhir bltas te dal bus lha gson namA zhes smras pa dang /de yang brag che zhing yid mi dga' bzhin du phyogs bzhir+ya ba sa nas sring mo
170b3('dul ba): gson no zhes smraso//des de mngon sum du byas nas thabs gzhan zhig gis ni ltas byin pa mthong nas smras pa/bu mo khyod su lus glang po che'i cho ga slob des smras pa/
170b4('dul ba): bsgres mo mi mtshan ngan pa bco brgyud dang ldan pa zhig yod de/de la bar yol bas bcad nas slog/des smras pa/'di ni mi mtshan ngan pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa
170b5('dul ba): 'ga' yang ga la yod/gang zhig khyod slob pa de ni rgyal po shur pa'i bu yin te/gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa/blta na sdug pa/mtshan thams cad legs par rdzogs
170b6('dul ba): pa yin na/khyod la su zhig gis de skad du bslus/ji ste khyod yid mi ches nu yol ba phye lnga ltos shig ces byas pa dang /des de'i gzugs dang na tshod thos nas
170b7('dul ba): da de yol ba phye ba dang mthong ngo //mthong ma thag tu rlung gi stobs kyi shugs kyis bskyod pa bzhin du 'dod pas g.yengs nas smras pa/bgras mo khyod ji skad gsung ba
171a1('dul ba): gang lags pa de ni med na/'on kyang gsol ba zhig mchis te/bdag 'di dang lhan cig mjal bar khyod kyis spyod dram/des smras pa/bu mo
171a2('dul ba): bdag gis khyod kyi de kho na bzhin du bsgrub par bya ste/gar bskor kyang skyes bu 'di lta bu dang phrad pa yang dka' na/gang khyod du la 'di lta bu 'tshal bya lta smos
171a3('dul ba): kyang ci dgos/'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi////bam po nyi shu rtsa brgyad po//khyod kyis 'dod pa gnas bzang por skyes te/rgyal po rgyal rigs
171a4('dul ba): spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba dang phrad par bdag gis bya'o//des de rgyal po shar pa dang lhan cig phrad par byas te/nor lhas byin de dang lhan cig shin tu chags par gyur
171a5('dul ba): ba dang /gser phreng can gyis sbyor ba 'chung la lha ni gson te/rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi sras mo nor lhas byin la/glang po che'i cho ga slob po zhes spring ngo //nges
171a6('dul ba): kyang rgyan lnga mi mngon par byas nas bdag nyid gos hrul po bgos te ming dpyid ldan zhes bya bar btags nas/smyon pa'i cha lugs kyis 'phags rgyal du song ngo //de der
171a7('dul ba): lam po che dang srang dang bzhi mdo dang sum mdo dag tu rgyug mchong rgal zhing dpyid ldan dga' bo dpyid ldan dga' bo zhes skyon tshig kyang smra'o//gang dag gis 'di sbyor ba
171b1('dul ba): 'chang yino zhes dero shes pa de dag la ni nges rgyan byin pa dang /de dag gis de blangs nas cang mi zer byar 'gro'o//gang dag mi shes pa de dag ni 'di smyon pa zhig zhes yal bar
171b2('dul ba): gtong ste/de rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang khyim bzang po gang du zhugs pa der bza' ba dang /me tog dang /gos dag kyang rnyed cing /shar pa dang lhon cig gsang ste gros
171b3('dul ba): gcig go/ci tsam dus gzhan zhig na nor lhas byin gyis rgyal po shar ba'i bu la smras pa/lha gal te na bdag gi phas tshor du mchis tshur spyon 'bros so//des smras pa/
171b4('dul ba): lha mo gal te de lta na song la pha la 'di skad ces/yab bdag gi glang po che'i cho ga ne lo bas na/'on kyang la su bgyi ba ma mthong ste/de'i slad du lhas bdag la glang po che mo
171b5('dul ba): bzang ldan ci bder bgyid du stsol cig dang /de la 'tshal nas las ngag blta bar bgyi'o zhes gyis shig/de song nas rgyal po la de bzhin smras pa dang /rgyal po gtum
171b6('dul ba): porab steng gis kyang glang po che'i rdzi rnams la/shes ldan dag glang po che mo bzang ldan bu mo nor lhas byin la ci bder gyis lo/de la zhon nas las dag bltar chug shig ces
171b7('dul ba): bsgre'o//de dag gis de la glang po che mo bzang ldan ci bder byas pa dang /de rgyal po shar pa'i bu dang lhan cig de la non nas 'bros pa'i thabs sham par rtsom ste/res
172a1('dul ba): 'ga' ni snga dro song zhing nyi ma byed na'ong //res 'ga' ni nyi ma byed na song zhing phyi dro slar 'ong //res 'ga' ni phyi dro song nas dgongasu slar 'ong /
172a2('dul ba): res 'ga' ni dgongs song nas mtshan mo nam phyed na slar 'ong //res 'ga' ni 'jing lo slar 'ong /ras 'ga' ni snga tshigs la slar 'ong /res 'ga' ni nas chung na/res
172a3('dul ba): 'ga' ni skya rangs shar na slar 'ong //shar pos sbyor ba 'chang la 'bros pa'i thabs smras pa dang /des glang po che'i lci ba dag phyir dbyung bar brtsamaso//chub sgo ba dag
172a4('dul ba): gis smras pa/dpyid ldan 'di ci yin/des smras pa/shes ldan dgra rgyal po'i ba sho su byas te 'di dag der la tur 'gyur ro zhes byas pa dang /de dag gis bgad nas
172a5('dul ba): 'di ni smyon pa'o snyam nas cang mi smra bar 'dug/des kyang de dag khyar te ko'u sham bi'i lam gyi bar bar du shing gi yal ga la sbyangaso//yang glang po che'i gcin dag gis bum
172a6('dul ba): pa bkang ste bkur bar brtsams pa dang /sgo ba dag gis de bzhin du dris pa dang /des smras pa/shes ldan dge rgyal po bshosu byas te 'di ni der skyem su 'gyur ro zhes
172a7('dul ba): byas pa dang /de dag de bzhin du 'di ni smyon pa yino snyam nas bgad de 'khod//des kyang de khyer d+he ko'u sham bi'i lam gyi bar bar du shing gi yal ga la sbyang so//
172b1('dul ba): rgyal po shA p+tas sbyor ba dang gsar brod can gyis nyon ldan ma nog la/phyogs chen mo zhog tu thams cad 'dra bar bya nas drus patu nas/rgyal po shAd pa'i bu dang /
172b2('dul ba): nor lhas byin gyi natshan mo bzang ldan la zhon nas phyogs deng song ste/sbyor po 'chang dang gser phreng can yang de nyid la zhon te/de rnams phyi bang snyan pa len zhing dor be ni
172b3('dul ba): rgyal po shar pa'i bus pi bang snyan pa blangs pa dang /sbyor ba 'chang dgra' ba skyes te glu blangs pa/bzang ldan ma dang dbyangs snyan dang //nor lhas byin dang shar pa dang /
172b4('dul ba): gser phreng can dang dpyid ldan dang //'di dag don mthun 'dong ba yin//dus gang du de dag sgrar 'ong ba'i dus de yang myur du thal/dus tha ma gang yin pa de yang thal
172b5('dul ba): nas/rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis gsos pa la smras pa/gsos pa nor lhas byin dang thogs na 'di ci las gyur ces byas pa dang /gsos pas btsal bar
172b6('dul ba): rnams po las ma rnyed nas/des rgyal po la smras pa/rgyal po shar bu'i bus glang po che mo bzang ldan lA badz+wa la te nor ltos byin khrid nas bros lag so//rgyal pos
172b7('dul ba): sngams nas smras pa/gusos pa myur du song la/glang po che 'dam bu'i ri la zhe ni te shar pa dang nor gyis byin khrid do shog shig/de rings pa rings par glang po che 'dam
173a1('dul ba): bu'i ri la zhon nas bsnyag so//des bsnyags te slebs la thug nas sbyor ba 'chang gis glang po che'i lci ba'i thum po bshig pa dang /'dam bu'i
173a2('dul ba): ris de bsnam par brtsam so//ji srid snom pa de'i bar du glang po che mo bzang ldan gyis dpag tshad bcu 'daso//yang 'dam bu'i ris slebs la thug nas sbyor ba 'chang
173a3('dul ba): gis gcin gyi bum pa bcag pa dang /'dam bu'i ris de bsnam par brtsamaso//ji srid snom pa de'i bar du glang po che mo bzang ldan gyis dpag tshad gzhan bcu 'das te/
173a4('dul ba): gzhan gyi yul du phyin par gyur pa dang /gsos pas bsams pa/'di ni gzhan gyi yul yin pas/glang po che 'dam bu'i ri yang shor du 'ong gis ldog go snyam
173a5('dul ba): nas de re thag cha de slong log/rgyal po gtum po rab gis smras pa/gsos pa ci grag/des smras pa/lha ci zhig gda' dros lags mod ces byas pa dang /rgyal po
173a6('dul ba): lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khongasu chud cing 'dugo/rgyal po shar pa'i bu yang srog stor ba las slar rnyed de ko'u sham bir 'ongs nas/dge sbyong dang /
173a7('dul ba): bram ze dang /bkren pa dang /phongs pa dang /mdza' bo dang /phu nu dang /gnyen rnams la sbyin pa dag byin zhing dga' ston chen po byas nas nor lhas byin dang lhan
173b1('dul ba): tso bar byed dka' bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed//dus gzhan zhig na/rung bdangs kyi thog tu byung nas/nor lhas byin dang lhan cig tu bre mo gtam dag zor nang
173b2('dul ba): 'khod pa las smras pa/lho me khyod kyang ngad+mo de ltar sgyus phrogs pa yin no//des smras pa/sgra khyod kyang de bzhin du bdag gi phas thabs kyis bzung ste bzhag pa
173b3('dul ba): lags so//des smras pa/lho mo ji ste khyod kyi pa 'dir bkug ste tha ga pa'i las slob tu ma bcug na nga rgyal po shar pa'i bu ma yin du zad ces byas pa dang /de khros
173b4('dul ba): bzhin du cang mi smra bar 'dug/rgyal po shar pos sbyor ba 'chang la smras pa/nga'i mi dga' ba khyod kyis bsal bar nus ma/wA ci zhig bgyi/rgyal po gtum po
173b5('dul ba): rab snang mgul pa nas thogs te 'dir khug la/tha ga pa'i las slob tu chug shig/des smras pa/lha gang gi tshe khyod kyis nor lhas byin dang /glang po che mo bzang
173b6('dul ba): ldan phrogs pa'i tshe don gyi na khyod kyi mi dgyes pa bsal lags mod kyi/'on kyang gal te rngo thig kyang gdas bsams te bgyi'o zhes byas te des 'phags rgyal du 'gro
173b7('dul ba): ba'i zong dag lta gon byas nas/ded dpon spro ba bskyed/smad 'tshong ma gzugs dang na tshed dang ldan pa rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan po zhig kyang /ded dpon gyi chung mar
174a1('dul ba): b+h+yas nas/de rim gyisgra grong dang /gling khyer dang /sral 'khor dang /rgyal blo pho brang rnams chung ngus dag zhing 'phags rgyal du na
174a2('dul ba): to//rgyal po gtum po rab snang phyis nor mang po dang ldan pa'i dang dpon zhi ba 'di sngo zhes n+ne sa//dus thos nas kyang bdag nyid nir rjer song ste/des 'dren pa de dag
174a3('dul ba): la dris po/shes ldan dag ded dpon gyi khyim gang yin/de dag gis des dpon gyi khyim ni 'di yin zhes byas pa dang /rgyal po der song ste sgor 'dug nas/ded dpon
174a4('dul ba): gang ni 'dug ces dris pa dang /de rnams kyis smras pa/sbyor byung ste song ngo //des smos pa/'di na su 'jug/de rnams kyis smras pa/ded dpon gyis chung
174a5('dul ba): mchis so//des sgro gtan phye ste nang du zhugs pa dang /dzi tsam na ded dpon gyi chung ma gzugs dang na tshad bzang bas 'phags rgyal na gnas pa'i bud med thams cad
174a6('dul ba): zil gyis gnon pa zhig mthong ngo //des de mthong nus kyang rab tu chags par gyur te smras pa/bzang mo nga dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod na/ded dpon gyi sho gam
174a7('dul ba): btang ngo //des smras pa/gal te de lta na/mal 'dir 'dug shig ces byas pa dang /'dod chags kyis long bar gyur pas ni mi bye ba ci yang med pa'i phyir/de der
174b1('dul ba): 'dug pa dang /rgyalnga pr-I mau rnams kyis sgo bcad/khyogasu bcug nas mi bzhis bteg ste/glu ljon cing sgo cog nas 'phags rgyal du rab tu zhug so//de na kha cig ni
174b2('dul ba): thal mo dzob/kha~M cig ni 'di skad du glu len te/spyong mi dag gis zla bzlos//rnam thos bu ni grwanyer byas dang //sa gzhi nags bcas mkha' la 'phags//smad 'tshong
174b3('dul ba): mas ni rab snang khrid//ces byas pa dang /'phags rgyal na gnas pa rnams kyis bsams pa/ci'i phyir tshod pa 'di dag de skad ces zer snyam pa las/de rnam sgo bzhin du
174b4('dul ba): byung ste/skyugs bcang bros te skyong ngo //bsros pa yang phan tshun du rgyal po tshol shing de rim gyis ko'u sham byir song ngo //blon po dag gis rgyal po shar pa la smras
174b5('dul ba): bo/b+hu dgyes par mdzad du gsol/rgyal po gtum po rab snad ni 'dor khugs lag so zhes byas pa dang /rgyal po shar byas smras pa/shes ldan dag deng la de thogs te tha
174b6('dul ba): gA pa'i las slob tu chub shig/rgyal po rab snang 'dir 'ongs par nor lhas byin la su yang ma zer cig par khrimasu yang chos shig ces bsgo'o//ji tsam dus gzhan
174b7('dul ba): zhig na rgyal po shar bI bu nor lhas byin dang lhan cig tu khang bzangs kyi steng du byung ste 'dug pa na/rgyal po gdum po rab snang thags kyi grwa gang nas bya ba zhig phyir sgor byung ba
175a1('dul ba): dang /rgyal po shar bas de mthong nas/des nor g+has byin la smras pa/mi'o ni su yin khyod kyis shes sum/des kyang ring zhig tu brtags pa dang /
175a2('dul ba): rgyul po de spyi cer zhig yin pas ngo shes nas/de mchi mas brnangs bzhin du 'dug ste des bsams pa/rgyal po ngan pa 'dis nga'i pa 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs byas
175a3('dul ba): ma/ oM d+he rgyal po ngan ba 'di ma bsad na/nor lus byin ma yin du hU~M/ji myur bsad pa yang bdag nyid kyis ma tshur ba de ltar bskyed do sgyu mo//rgyal d+d+ha
175a4('dul ba): yang yid rno ba zhig pas de khros par shes nas/des sbyor ba 'chang la bsgo ba/sbyor ba 'chang dgra laM sha lon zin gyis song la/rgyal po gtum po rab snang khrol
175a5('dul ba): te khrus kyis zan byin la/bkur bsti chen pos 'phags rgyal du skyol cig ces bsgo ba dang /des kyang ji ltar bsgo ba bzhin du 'phags rgyal du bskyal to//nor
175a6('dul ba): lhas byin gyis bsams pa gral te bdag gis 'di nga nyid gsad pa'i thobs brtsams na/g.yon can 'dis 'phrogs par 'ongs pas/dus chung zad cig gi bar du brid do/
175a7('dul ba): snyam nas/des de la re shig chung zad cig bkad pa dang /dga' ba dang rtse ba dang dga' dgur spyad pa dag gis brid//de nas de gos dri ma can gyon to//khri'u dra ba
175b1('dul ba): can la nyul zhing 'dug pa dang /rgyal po shwar pA'i bus smras pa/lha mo 'di ci tha tshig/des smras pa/lU lha rnams 'khrugs lag so//des smras pa/lha mo mi bzlog
175b2('dul ba): gam ci/ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin gyis shig/des smras pa/lha gang bdag gis dam bcas pa de mi 'grub lags mod/rgyal pos smras pa/khyod kyi dam ci
175b3('dul ba): bcas/gang gis na khyod mi dga' bar gyur pa smros shig dang /thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byas/khyod mi dga' bar mi byed cig/des smras pa/gang gis tshe
175b4('dul ba): bdag gi phas lha bzung ste bzhag pa de'i tshe bdag gis lha la 'di skad du ji ste lha dang bdag lhan cig bde log su ko'u sham bir phyin nas/der lha dang bdag lhan cig
175b5('dul ba): nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du zas mi za zhing zhag bdun 'das nas lha me tog gi phreng bas rkang pa'i rtse mo nas spyi bo'i bar du dkris te/ra ba'i khar 'dug par bya'o//bdag
175b6('dul ba): ni dka' thub rdzogs nas bram ze stong zan byin la/mchod pa dang bkur bsti cher bya'o zhes dam bcas na/ngo lha btsun mo'i 'khor rgya che bar gyur pas/ci'i slad du 'di lta
175b7('dul ba): bu mdzad par 'gyur snyam du bdag de sems shing mchis te/mdor na 'gum logasu pas so//rgyal pos smras pa/lha mo khyod kyis lha la gsol ba btab pa yang //
176a1('dul ba): don gyis na nga'i ched kho na yin pas/longs shig dang tham+b+ha cad bsgrub par bya'o zhes byasmra pa dang /de langs te des khye gu gnyis shig ra dra /
176a2('dul ba): drung du gtags te bzhag na/de ji tsam mi tsam gyi sha za nus pa de tsam du sha gong nas grong du bskyed de byino//gang gi tshe khye gu de gnyis sha de tsam za nus pa de'i tshe rgyal
176a3('dul ba): po dang lhan cig nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du 'dug cing de ni mtshan mo za/rgyal po shar pa ni chung ma dro la tshogs pas nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du ma zos pas de lus skya bo
176a4('dul ba): bseng bseng por gyur cing /sha bri ngan pa dang /nyam chung ba dang rmya bar gyur to//zhag bdun lon pa dang /nor lhas byin gyis me tog phreng rgyud mkhan rnams la yang //
176a5('dul ba): rgyus bdag gis me tog dri zhim po dag brgyus la myur du khyer la shog shig ces bsgo'o//sbyor ba 'chang la yang dang du lha'i dka' thub rdzogs kyis/khyod kyis glong
176a6('dul ba): khyir mdzes par gyis la bram ze stong dang /rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang /gzhon nu dang /blon po dang /grong khyer gyi skye bo'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i zan sbyor cig
176a7('dul ba): ces bsgo'o//blon po gzhan dag ni mi tshor 'a phyo ba'i phyir gnas gzhan dang gzhan dag tu lasu bsko so//sbyor ba 'chang yang rgyal po la snying nyo zhing rje su chags pas/
176b1('dul ba): grong khyed de dang gsag ma dang b+h+yo mo na med par byas/tsan dang tshum ni chag chag btag bdug pa d+ma zhim po'i pog ra ni bzhag/rgyul mtshan dang ba dan ni bsgyung /mu tig/
176b2('dul ba): dang dar gyi rjen blo dang rdzu nI s+thA sa tog rnam pa sna tshogs ni nikra paste/lhu rnams kyis bskyed ma ma tshulu dga' ba'i tshal bzhin du dag dga' snar b+has+thA nas/ngas
176b3('dul ba): gnas rnam su rol mo'i skye ste tshogs ni bsgrubs/gar mkhan dang /snyun drags mkhan dang 'dzi chu na gyi bro mkhan rnams kyis ni br-i gar bya bar brtsam so//ca co chen po
176b4('dul ba): chenor lhas byin gyis rgyal po shar ba'i bur ba'i khar rkang pa'i rtse mo nas spyi bo'i bar du me d+hob+ha gis dkris nas bsku la//de nas ra ba'i kha nas phul nas snang ma thag tu gson
176b5('dul ba): bor khyi dag gis rus gong 'ba' zhing lus par byas te/bya rog dang /bya rgad dang /lnga dang mo ro la za bu'i srog chags gzhan dag kyang 'thab par gyur to//ko'u shAm po'i lhur
176b6('dul ba): 'i khA nas grong khyer mdzes pa lta ba las sbyang ste khye dgu gis zoso zhes ku co'i sgra cher gyur pa dang /de ni kha cog ni ngu/kha cig ni dga'/kha cig ni zlu mal par 'dug/kha cig
176b7('dul ba): ni 'phrog ram byed por gyur to// chen po d+ha ga lugs zin po dam 'i da'i thong dag ma mir thos dang/kha cig ni mnyad yong du song ngo //kha cig ni gnas gan//
177a1('dul ba): dang gzhan du song ngo //skabs drer sbyor ba 'chang dang blon po gzhan rnams dang /ko'u sham bI na gnas pa'i mi'i gtso bo dang /bram ze dang /khyim bdag
177a2('dul ba): rnams kyis ku co zhi bar byas te/de nas sbyor ba 'chang gis ji ltar rgyal po ra ba'i khur song //ji ltar rA ba'i drung na khyi 'dug par gyur ces kun tu brtag par brtsamaso//des
177a3('dul ba): de ltar brtag pa dang /nor lhas byin gyis ji ltar thabs kyis bsad po brtsad chode/de khros nas nor lhas byin rgya tshigs kyi khang par bcug skye bsreg so//dge slong dag the tsom
177a4('dul ba): skyes nas/the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa rgyal po shar pa'i bus las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin
177a5('dul ba): pos/khyi dag gis 'tshal te dus las 'das lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag rgyal po shar pa'i bu nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/rkyen yongasu
177a6('dul ba): bsgyur ba/'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/gdon mi za bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags te/dge slong drag rgyal po shar pa'i bus las byas shing bsogs pa
177a7('dul ba): dge gzhan sus so sor nyam su myong bar 'gyur/dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin por mi 'gyur/chu'i
177b1('dul ba): khams la ma yin/me'o khams la ma yin/rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi/'on kyang dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las byas pa drug ni zin pa'i phung po dang /khams dang skya
177b2('dul ba): mched dag kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/bskal pa burgya phrag rnamasu yang //lus rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te//tshogs shing dus la bab pa na//lus can
177b3('dul ba): rnams la 'bras bur sbyin//dge slong dge sngon byung ba ri 'or zhig ni/bram ze mdun na 'don cig 'du'o//sangs rgyas 'byung ba med pa na/ring sangs rgyas phongs pa dang /
177b4('dul ba): dman pa la thugs brtsibs pas mtha'i gnas mal dag la dga' ba/sbyin gnas gcig pur gyur pa dag 'jig rten du 'byung bas/rang sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu ba
177b5('dul ba): rgya zhing ri bor der phyin pa dang /phyogs shig tu nub mo gran so//de phyi dro nyon snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/lhung bzed thogs nas ri 'or gyi grong khyer der
177b6('dul ba): bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /mdun ni 'don de yang khyi khrid nas phyir byung ste/desA rang sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po nyes pa med cing gnod pa mi byed pa de la khyi spudo///
177b7('dul ba): dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/mdun ni 'don gang yin pa de ni rgyal po shor ba'i bu 'di yin te/'dis ni de'i tshe de'i dus na rang sangs rgyas nyes pa med cing gnod pa mi
178a1('dul ba): byed pa la khyi spyad pa gang yin pa de ri las kyi rnam par sbyin pas tshe rlabs lnga brgyur khyis zos nas dus lus 'das te da ltar gyi bAr du yang khyis zos te
178a2('dul ba): dus las 'das par gyur to//dge slong da'ad lta lha gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yid gcig tu gnag/gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi yang gcig tu dkar/
178a3('dul ba): 'dren ma rnams kyi yid 'dren ma skye/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa dang /'dren ma rnams spangs nas las gcig tu dkar ba dag khonas brtsal bar
178a4('dul ba): byAbya ste/dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
178a5('dul ba): yi rangs te mngon par bstod do//rgyal po shar pa'i bu dus lus 'dres nas/rgyal po gtum po rab snang mgun zla med par rgyal po byed par gyur to//de dus gzhan
178a6('dul ba): zhig na khang bzangs kyi steng du byung nas/blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor te/gtam bzang po ma yin pa dag zer zhing 'khod//shes ldan dge slong dang grong khyer dang /
178a7('dul ba): gnas gang na smad 'tshong ma bzang mo yod/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/lha rdo 'jog na smad 'tsheng ma bzang mo zhes bgyi ba gzugs dang na tshad dang ldan po/rgyu rtsal
178b1('dul ba): drug cu rtsa bzhi lnga mkhas pa zhig mchis te/de mthong ma thag tu chags par mi 'gyur ba'i mi gang lags pa de ni sa'i sbyong na 'ga' yang ma mchis//rgyal po gtum pa
178b2('dul ba): rab snang gis de'i gzugs dang na tshod dang ldan pa thos nas/thos ma thag tu chags par gyur te smras pa/gsos pA tsi byas kyang mi panA~M/de lta bu'i bud med la dga' dgur
178b3('dul ba): spyad dgos pas/rdo 'jog tu song ste/de dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyad par bya'o//des smras pa/lha rgyal po pad+ma'i snying po tsa ni yun ring po nas khyod kyi gshed mar gyur pa/phyir
178b4('dul ba): rgol bar gyur pa/mi 'dza' bar gyur pa lags la/de ni rtag tu rdo 'jog no mchis lags pas/ji ste rdo 'jog tu gshegs pa na gdon mi 'tshal bar des lha brlag
178b5('dul ba): par bgyid lagaso//des smras pa/mi rnams kyis nang na mi gzu lums can dgra lta yod mod kyi/'on kyang khyod ni 'di na 'dug shig dra ni 'gro'o//des smras pa/ji ste
178b6('dul ba): lha de lta bur dgyes na/lce nyid mkhyen mod kyi/'on kyang bag mdzad pa'i rigasaso//rgyal po rab snang bud med la brkam chags can yin pas//des de'i tshig ma mnyan
178b7('dul ba): nas/glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam bu'i ri la zhon tardo 'jog tu song //de rim gyis song na/gtun shing ri la phyin pa dang /des der glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam bu'i ri
179a1('dul ba): bzhag nas rdo 'jog tu song ngo //de nas mu tig gis dau shal sraT brgya stong ri ba mgul nas bkrol te/bzang mo gzugs kyis 'tsha
179a2('dul ba): gan du song nas/de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed//'phags rgyal na gnas pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag gang dag shes
179a3('dul ba): ldan dag rgyal po mi snang na/gar bzhud ces dpyod pa la zhugs pa dang /de na kha cig gis smras pa/de ci'i phal pa yin nam/des na mi mngon mngon par mi
179a4('dul ba): 'gyur du zad kyi/de gar yang ni ma bzhud//gzhan dag gis smras pa/de ni btsun mo'i 'khor rgya che ba yin pas/ci'i phyir phyi rol tu 'byung ste/btsun
179a5('dul ba): mo'i 'khor nyid na dga' ba dang /rtsed mo so sor nyamasu myong bar byed do//kha cig gis smras pa/'di la the tshom byar ci yod/tshur sheg gsos pa la
179a6('dul ba): 'drir 'dong //kha cig gis legs kyis de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas/de dag thams cad 'dus te/gsos pa'i drung du dong nas smras pa/gsos pa lha mi snang
179a7('dul ba): na gshed du ma bzhud grang /des smras pa/shes ldan dag ci rings mthong bar 'gyur ro//de dag gis smras pa/gsos pa ji srid cig na mthong bar 'gyur//
179b1('dul ba): smrasmras pa/bdun sna ldan nas//de dag smos nas smras pa/smrasas pa gang gi da ma smra ba lngas na gdon min b+hur khyod kyis skya bas nas pad+mag
179b2('dul ba): srid byed par 'dod do//de'i phyir re shig gal te zhag bdun na g+hi blta yod na/de lta na legs/ji ste med na ni nged kyis gzhan zhig rgyal por dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes
179b3('dul ba): bdang /de cang ma zer bar lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de/sems khongasu chud cing 'dug pa la bya lang skyong gi ma zhi bas thos nas/des de bos te sa pa/gsos pa
179b4('dul ba): khyod ci'i phyir lag pa 'gram pa la btang /sems khongs su chud cing 'dug/des smras pa/lha mo bram ze dog 'di skad ces mchi na/ji ltar sems khongasu chud cing ni mchis//
179b5('dul ba): ngos smras pa/gsos pa gal te lta na sdong la nas kyi chas mor dang sbrang rtsis bslus pa/gser snod kyi nang du blugs te/rta mang po lag pa brgyus pa gang yin pa de'i mdun
179b6('dul ba): du zhig la 'di skad ces gang zhig dang nyid rdo 'jog tu 'gro bar spro bye des nas kyi chas mar dang spyang rtsis bsgres pa 'di dag zo shig ces smos la/de ltar byas te
179b7('dul ba): bzang po gang gis zos pa deng la sbyin cig/gsos pas ji ltar ba sgo ba bzhin du byas na/'ga' yang za bar sprob medo//phyogs gzhan zhig na rta red rke ba~M lus rmya ba
180a1('dul ba): gyur pa/ngan ma zla ba dbugs rgod pa/rna ba chag pa zhig pa de'i drung du de song ste mdun du 'dug nas/gang zhig dang nyid rdo 'jog tu
180a2('dul ba): 'gro bar spro ba de/nas kyi chos mar sbrang rtsis bskus pa 'di dag zo shig ces smras pa dang /des de dag zaso//gsos pas song nas ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba la ji
180a3('dul ba): ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /des smras pa/gsos po song la ltos cig/gal te stong pa'i tshe mi sun byed na khyod kyis ma 'jigs par spungs skyed cig/sems
180a4('dul ba): stobs dang ldan pa la ni sus kyang mi rdzi'o//de song nas de bstod par brtsams pa dang /de stod pa'i'o tshe rab tu 'jigs pa chen po'i gzugs bdag nyid sprul nas/kA'e
180a5('dul ba): mi khyod kyis sngan chad 'di lta bu'i rta mthong ba 'ga' yod dam zhes smraso//de ral gri shubs nas phyung ste bsdigs nas/kwa'e'i rta'i srin po khyod kyis sngon chang rta zhon
180a6('dul ba): pasul yang lcags de lta bu mthong ba yod dam zhes smras pa dang /des smras pa/kye mI sngon ma mthong ngo //des kye d+h+rU'i srin po gal ter shog mi spyan ma byed nA de ltan
180a7('dul ba): legs/ji ste byed na mgo drungs nas bcad des la ngar bar bya'o//des smras pa/kye mi dzaM ste de lta na gal te bdag phyir 'dir khrad ma 'ong bar dam 'chi'an 'ogro'o//
180b1('dul ba): des smras pa/legs kyis de bzhin du byas 'dong zhes smras nas/des de la zhon te song nas rim gyis rdo 'jog tu phyin to//rgyal po rab snang gis mthong nas smras pa/gsos
180b2('dul ba): pa 'ongs sam/des smras pa/lha mchis//dgos pa ci zhig gi phyir zhes byas pa dang /des ji ltar gyur pa rnams brjod//rgyal pos smras pa/gsos pa re zhig zhag
180b3('dul ba): 'dun gyi bar du rtses l-i/zhag bdun 'das pa dang /dus shes par bya'o zhes byas nas zhag bdun gyi bar du gzugs kyis 'tsho ba bzang mo dang lhan cig dga' dgur
180b4('dul ba): spyad de zhag bdun 'das nas song ngo //gtun shing rir phyin nas bdag nyid kyis glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam bu'i ri bstad par brtsams pa dang /des bstad pa na skad
180b5('dul ba): phyung ba/de dang mi ring ba zhig na bram ze lngas mkhan long ba zhig gnas pa des thos nas/des smras pa/glang po che'i gtso ba 'di'i skad dang sbyar na/'di ni 'di nas
180b6('dul ba): dpag tshad brgyar song nas/lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po las chu 'thung bar 'gyuraro//de nas rgyal po rab snang dang gsos pa glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam bu'i ri la zhon
180b7('dul ba): te song ngo //ro shig cig na phyogs shig na rngo mkhan zhig 'dug pa de'i snod som btang ba dag cig 'dam bu'i ri'i rkang pas rdzis nas/rdza mkhan gyis mya ngan bya ba
181a1('dul ba): brtsams pa dang /gsos pas smras pa/gang dag sa su 'tsho ba de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyuraro//rgyal po rnams ni khwa bzhin khu 'phrig za ba yin pas/
181a2('dul ba): rgyal po rab snang gis bsams pa/gsos pa 'di bdag la zur za ste/ci bdag gcig pu sas 'tsho ba yin namo/mjal to snyam du bsams nas cang mi zer bar songango ///
181a3('dul ba): yong phyogs shig na mthing ril gyis lam kar tshang bcas pa de'i sgo nga dag 'dam bu'i ri'i rkang pas bcom nas/des kyang mya ngan bya bar brtsams pa dang /gsos pas
181a4('dul ba): smras pa/gang dag spyod yul ma yin par spyod pa de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyuraro//rgyal po rab snang de bzhin du rtog pa skyes nas bsams pa/yang 'di bdag la zur za ste/ci
181a5('dul ba): smad 'tshed ma bdag gi spyod yul ma yin nom/mjal to snyam du bsams nas cang mi zer bar songango //yang 'dam bu'i ri shing drung na mar song ba dang /shing de'i yal gal
181a6('dul ba): sbrul zhig gnas pa des brlabs nas/rgyal po rab snang bza' bar brtsam so//re shig na gsos pas mthong nas/des de ral gri shubs nas phyung ste dum bu dum bu
181a7('dul ba): gtubs nas sa la bor ba dang /g.yo zhing 'gul ba gsos pas bltas te smras pa/gang dag don du gnyer bar bya ba ma yin pa don du gnyer ba de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyuraro//
181b1('dul ba): rgyal po rab kyang de kho na bzhin du rtog pa skyes nus pasams pa/'di bdag la ldan gsum gyi bur du zur za ste/ci smad 'tshong ma bdag gis don du gnyer bar bya ba ma yin
181b2('dul ba): nanonam mjal to snyam du bsams nas cang mi zer bar song ngo //dus gzhan zhig ni 'dum bu'i ri bang theg ste song nas/rgyal pos de bzung ba dang /ma thub nas/gsos pas
181b3('dul ba): smras pa/lha bram ze ltas mkhan gyis 'di dpag tshad brgyar song nas/lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po las chu 'thung bar 'gyuraro zhes lung bstan gyis/de'i slad du myur du
181b4('dul ba): shing gi yal ge la 'jus te/glang po che thong shig ces byas pa dang /des myur ba myur bar shing gi yal ga la 'juso//gsos pas kyang shing gi yal gA la 'jus pa dang /
181b5('dul ba): 'dam bu'i ri 'das te song ngo //rgyal pos gsos pa la smras pa/gsos pa song la me tshor bar zhi ba la lha ni byon nas bskyed mos tshal na bzhugaso zhes gyis shig/de song
181b6('dul ba): nas de la brjod pa dang /de dga' ba skyes nas cang mi zer bar 'dug/rgyal pos kyang stor khung nas 'dzul bar brtsams pa las/re shig na bu mo gnyis shig bsang sar
181b7('dul ba): byung ba dang /de na cig gis smras pa/grogs mo lha 'ongaso zhes grago/cig shos kyis de stor khung nas 'dzu lo zhes smras pa dang /rgyal pos thos nas nges bsams pa/
182a1('dul ba): gsos pa la bdag gis khyod kyis mtshor bar zhi ba la skyes shig ces bskon/des khyim na 'dug pa ril la smra so snyam du bsnams te/de khros
182a2('dul ba): nas des sna smos pa la ji lta ji ltar gyur pa dran par byas nas glan ka btsal pa/gsos pa khyod ko dra la gnod pa byed par zhugs pa lta nga gicig buM sam+b+ha 'tshe ba yin nam/
182a3('dul ba): ci na gang gi phyir khyod nga la phyogs che ge mo zhig tu gang dag sas 'tsho ba de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes zur za/smad 'tshong ma nga'i spyod yul ma yin nam ci na/yang
182a4('dul ba): phyogs shig tu gang dag spyod yul ma yin par spyod pa de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyuraro zhes zur za/smad 'tshong ma ngas don du gnyer bar bya ba ma yin nam ci na yang phyogs/
182a5('dul ba): shig tu yang gang dgra don du gnyer bar bya ba ma yin pa don du gnyer ba de dag 'di ltar 'gyuraro zhes zur za/da gzod kyang nga bskyed mos tshal na 'dug pas/khyod
182a6('dul ba): song la ma tshor bar zhi bu la lha byon te bskyod mos tshal na bzhugaso zhes gyis shig ces bsgo bsgo na/khyod kyis khyim na 'dug pa rIl la smras pas/khyod ni nga la
182a7('dul ba): gnod pa byed par zhugaso//de dogs shing mi dga' nas/yid ches par bya ba'i phyir smras pa/lha sdig pas ni brlag ste/bdag gis lha la zur bgyis pa ma
182b1('dul ba): mchis sa///bdag gis lha la ji ltar zur bgyis/lha 'di skad du gnas cho ga mo zhag tu khyod kyi nga la gang dag sas 'tsho ba de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyuro zhes zur byas zhes
182b2('dul ba): gsang ba gang lags pa ni/phyogs der rdza mkhan gyi snod som gtang ba dag cig 'dam bu'i ro'i rkang pas brdzis nas/rtswa mkhan des mya ngan bgyi bar brtsams pa dang //bdag
182b3('dul ba): gis de las bsams nas 'di skad du/gang dag sasa'i tshe ba de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyu ro zhes bgyi ba byas so//phyogs che ge mo zhig tu khyod kyis nga la gang dag spyod yul ma yin/
182b4('dul ba): par spyod pa de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur zhes zur byas zhes gsung ba gang lags pa ni/phyogs der sog chags mthing ril gyi sgo nga dge 'bram bu'i ri'i rkang pas btsem nas de
182b5('dul ba): yang mya ngan byed par brtsams pa dang /bdag gis de las bsams nas 'di skad du/gang dag spyod yul ma yin par spyod pa de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes bgyis par byas so/
182b6('dul ba): phyogs che go mo zhig tu khyod kyis nga la/gang dag don du gnyer ba ma yin pa don du gnyer ba de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyuraro zhes zur byas zhes gsung ba gang lags pa ni/phyogs
182b7('dul ba): der shing gi yal ga la sbrul zhig gnas pa des brlangs nas lha bza' bar brtsams pa dang /bdag gi ral gri shungs na pi gyur ste/dum bu dum bur bcad nos des
183a1('dul ba): rgyanal sbyang ba dang /bdug gis de bus bsams nas 'di skad du/gang don dug+hA ny+tsir b+hu bru ba ma yin pa don d+hak+shany+dza byung dag no 'diltarar+ya 'byu
183a2('dul ba): nos bgyis par bas so//ngas khyod la mtshor bar ni bal lha bsgyud mos tshal ni bzhugs shes gyis shig ces byasar+b+ba/khyod kyis khyim na gnas pa rim
183a3('dul ba): smraso zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa de yang bdag gis mtshor ba kho nar zhi bar bgyis na/bdag ji ltar lha la gnod pa bgyid par zhug pa lags/rgyal pos
183a4('dul ba): smras pa/gsos pa khyod kyis rdul lan thams cad legs par glan na/da gzod de/gtor khung nas 'dzul ba na/nga bdag nyid kyis bud med gnyis shig
183a5('dul ba): las cig gis grogs mo lha ni byon to zhes gla go shes byas pa dang /cig shos na de myur khung nas 'dzu ba zhes zer ba thos nA/de sus byas zhig/lha de dag ni
183a6('dul ba): bla men ma lags na/'on kyang 'tshal mod/der yang bdog gis lha la gnod pa ma bgyis//rgyal pos smras pa/gsos pa khyod kyi ji skad smras pa de de ltar yin mo
183a7('dul ba): gyi/ngas khyod bgam par zad kyis mi dga' bar ma byed cig/'on kyang nga rngo 'jog tu song 'i tshe bram tsha gang dag gis gzhan zhig rgyal por dbang bskur bar brtsams pa
183b1('dul ba): de dag phyag gzhug pa'i dus 'du yin pas de rnams bsad par bya'o//des smras pa/bram ze rnamasA ri shrIg g+hanag gas la/lhun mon mdo rnams da nga bum par 'gyu/
183b2('dul ba): rgyal po basmras pa/gsos pa de rnams ji ltar bsadu par nus/bdag gis de rnams khams pa'i thabs shig 'gyi'o//gsom pa legs kyis de bzhin du gyis shig
183b3('dul ba): chos byas pa dang gsos pas mdun ni 'don gyi khye'u rig sngags zla ba mkhas pa zhig yang pA de'i drung du spong nas/bu 'phru man ma 'di dag skye ba med pa gsas par byed na/
183b4('dul ba): de dag bzung bar bya ba'i thabs de 'ga' yod dom/zhes skyes bu dang /des smras pa/yab ci bgyur mchis/bdag gis gzung bar byas so//bu leg so zhes byas pa
183b5('dul ba): dang /des myi'i log pa la ud bu la 'dra bar bsgyur nis mi'i lag tu basmAd nas smras pa/kye mi khyod so la sgyung d+ha b+hin nas 'duphrul su rini mis lto ba du ma sbyin
183b6('dul ba): ba/gang zhig mthong na dgo du pa de'i ming dris te gli gas bu la bris shig/des de thags te 'dug nas gang zhig rin gyi ma nye ba du la mi ster/gang zhig mthong na
183b7('dul ba): dgod pa de'i ming ni dris nas glegs bu la 'dre bar byed de/des de ltar 'phags rgyal gyi 'phra min me lnga ba rgya'i ming dris nas briso//de nas gsos pa la bstan nas/
184a1('dul ba): gsos pas kyang rgyal po la bstan pa dang /rgyal pos smras pa dang /gsos pa 'phra mon mang po 'di dag ts+tsha ltar khyu bdag/des smras/
184a2('dul ba): pa/lha de rnams ji ltar dgum pa'i thabs bdag 'tshal gyis/lho thugs khral skyang gsol/des smras pa/gsos pa legs te khyod nyid sheso//des 'phags
184a3('dul ba): rgyal gyi phyogs shig tu 'khor gyis khyams shig byas nas/des lha ni ma mo'i dam tshigo la 'jug gis/'phags rgya lda na srin mo ji snyed gnas pa thams cad 'khor
184a4('dul ba): gyi khyam su 'du bar gyis shig ces dril bsgrags po dang /de dag gis bsams pa/lha 'khor gyi khyams su ma mo'i dam tshig la 'jug pa der bdag cag la rdzas bzang
184a5('dul ba): po mang du ster gyis 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas/gang dag mi mngon par 'dug 'dug pa de dag kyang rnyed pa la chags pas bdag nyid nye bar bstan te/srin mo lnga brgya lhag
184a6('dul ba): tsam 'khor gyi khyam su lhags so//de nas mdun na 'don gyi bu des de dag thams cad rig sngags kyi zhags pas bcings pa dang /gsos pas kyang dri rnams khu ga rtag go//
184a7('dul ba): rgyal pos 'phags rgyal na gnas pa'i bram ze rnams bos nas/shes ldan dag bdag gi 'phra men ma 'di snyed cig bsad pas/bsod nams ma yin pa mang po bskyed
184b1('dul ba): kyis/khyed kyis bdag 'khor ba'i dgon pa de las dbyung ba'i phyir/nyin gcig bzhin 'khor gyi khyams su 'du zhing zan zo cig ces bsgo ba dang /de rnams kyis shis pa
184b2('dul ba): brjod pa byas nas khas blangaso//rgyal po rab snang gis bsgo ba la bsgo ba/kye skyes bu bram ze ji snyed cig 'khor gyi khyamasu zan zos nas 'gro ba de dag thams cad khyod
184b3('dul ba): kyis legs par grongs te nga la snyod cig/des smras pa/lha de ltar bgyi ste gsol bar 'tsha lo//rgyal pos blon po rnams la yang bsgo ba/shes ldan dag 'phags rgyal
184b4('dul ba): na gnas pa'i bram ze ji snyed cig 'khor gyi khyam su zan za ba thams cad la/kha zas bsod pa phal cher byin cig/bram ze rnams ni phal cher lto 'dun can yin pas//

184b6('dul ba): bgrangs nas lhag tshad med par bram ze brgyad khri byung ste/des rgyal po la lha lhag chad ma mchis byar bram ze brgyad khyi mchi so zhes gsol to//rgyal pos gang gis na 'di
184b7('dul ba): rnams dus gcig tu mgo bcad pa'i thabs de gang yin snyam du bsams nas/des zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/bram ze zan za ba re re'i rgyab tu gshed ma mi
185a1('dul ba): ral gri thogs par ro nog la/gang gi tshangs na 'on cig ces smras pa de'i tshe/thams cad kyis mgo tshod cig rgyal po gtum po
185a2('dul ba): rab snang gis de ltar byas pa dang /'phags rgyal na gnas pa'i bram ze rnams las 'tsho bdag gi zhags pas zin pa brgyad khri thum pa 'khor gyi khyam su 'dus
185a3('dul ba): pa de dag sbyor ba des tsog car mgo bcad do//des na 'phags rgyal na gnas pa'i bram ze brgyad khri rgyal po rab snang gi bsod do//des de dag bsang nas/nub mo
185a4('dul ba): mal chen por nyal ba na/rmi lam du sa bla'i sgra drug dang /bar snang gi sgra drug ni thos/rmi lam rnam pa bAN+yad ni mthong //sa bla'i sgra drug gang zhe na/'di lta ste/

185a6('dul ba): pa ni/lo ni stong phrag drug bcu dang //lo ni brgya phrag drugau tsu ru//sems can dmyal bar 'tshed rnams kyi//nam zhig mthar ni phyin par 'gyuraro//med ces bya ba las/
185a7('dul ba): tshig su bcad pa ni/mtha' meng mtha' lnga ga la yod//nga dang khyed cag gnyis kyis no//mtha' nyid dmigs par mi 'gyur ba//de lhor sdig pa'i las byaso//bdag
185b1('dul ba): ces bya ba las ched su bcad pa ni/bdag cad gis ni longs spyod dag/'thun dang mi mthun pas bsgrubs pa//gzhan dag bde bas dga' byed kyi//bdag cag sdug bsngal
185b2('dul ba): skal can 'gyur/ngan pa zhes bya ba las tshig su bcad pa ni/'di na bdag cag 'tsho ba ngan//bdag cagra gang bdeg dri ma btang //longs spyod dag ni yod pa'i tshe//bdag
185b3('dul ba): nyid la ni phan ma byas//sems shes bya ba las tshigasu bcad pa ni/sems kyi su ni bslus gyur cing //mi shes pas ni bdas gyur pa//sems can dmyal bar skyes
185b4('dul ba): rnams kyi//gnya' ni su zhig byed par 'gyur//'di rnams shes bya ba las tshigasu bcad pa ni/bdag cag 'di rnams bde 'gro ru//song ste dge ba maung byas nas//de
185b5('dul ba): nas bsod nams byas gyur cing //shis pa byas rnams mtho ris 'dong //bar snang gi sgra drug gang zhe na/'di lta ste/thams cad/su gang /da ni/de rnams/'di dgra
185b6('dul ba): ces bya ba ste/'di dag ni tshigasu bcad pa drug yi ge dang po yino//de la thams cad ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/thams cad gsog tu phyung zin te//'di la snying
185b7('dul ba): po tsa mo zhig lus//rgyal po srin de snying po la//dga' ba med pas re ba bor//su zhes bya ba la tshigs su bcad pa ni//su zhig gnyen len tshul ngan po'i//
186a1('dul ba): mig ya cig kyang 'jor byed pa//des ni bdag gis bu tsha dang //bdag kyang sdug bsngal las thar byas//gang zhes bya ba las tshigasu bcad pa ni/rdzing 'di
186a2('dul ba): nya dang ru sbal ni//mang po dag gis gang ba las//de ni sprul pas 'tsho mod kyi//bdag gis gnas ni mi 'dor ro//da ni zhes bya ba las tshigasuM bcad pa ni/gang zhig ri bo gtum
186a3('dul ba): ldan la//bdug la rkang pas nom byed pa'i//long ba nyon mongs de dag ni//da ni mgon yang med par gyur//de rnams shes bya ba las tshigasu bcad pa ni/de rnams mtsho ni bzang po
186a4('dul ba): las//chu ni bsol zhing zhim pa dag/bde blag nyid du rnyed par 'gyur//bdag kyang de ltar der dga'o//'di dag ces bya ba las tshigasu bcad pa ni/'di dag khrus byas zos nas ni//
186a5('dul ba): phyogs dang phyogasu 'gro bar byed//bdag ni sti yis bzung gyur pa//sngon go sdig pa ci zhig byas//rmi lam brgyad ces bya ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/tsan dan dkar pos lus
186a6('dul ba): byugs pa dang /tsan dan dmar pos gtor ba dang /glung la me 'bar ba dang /mtshan khung gnyis nas sbrul gnyis 'phyang ba dang /rkang pa gnyis la nya khar pa gnyis ldag pa dang /
186a7('dul ba): ngang pa gnyis na mkha' la 'phur ba dang /ri nag po zhig mdun na tshur 'ong ba dang /chu skyar dag mgo la rtug pas 'thor ba mthong ngo //de gnyid sad nas 'jigs par gyur//
186b1('dul ba): bkra tsha bar gyur cing spu zing zhes byed nas gzhi 'di las bdag rgyul srid las nyams pa 'am/srog gis byar chad du mi 'gyur grang snyam//des rmi lam de dag bram ze rmi lam gyi dbyung
186b2('dul ba): shes pa gang dag yin pa de dag bos te bsnyad pa dang /de dge gros bsams pa/lhas rmi lam de dag bzang po zhig mthong mod kyi/'on kyang bsngags par ni mi bya ste/gal te bsngags
186b3('dul ba): na 'di ji lta bu ngan par gyur nas/bram ze lhag ma gang dag yin pa de dag kyang ma lus par byed par 'ong ngo snyam du rig nas gros byas te smras pa/lha rmi lam ni mi bzung ba dag cig
186b4('dul ba): go/des smras pa/shes ldan dag gang gis 'bras bu cir 'gyur/de dag gis smras pa/gzhi de las lha rgyal srid las nyams pa 'am/srog gi bar chad du 'gyuraro//rgyal pos
186b5('dul ba): smras bya/shes ldan dag gleng gis na nga rgyal srid las kyang nyams par mi 'gyur zhing /sgrog gi bar tshad du yang mi 'gyur ba'i thabs de lta 'ga' yod dmo/de dag gis smras pa/

186b7('dul ba): shes ldan dag ci bya smos shog/de dag gis spros pa/lha bskyed mos tshal du rdzing bu bskor stsal te/bgos nas rdo thal gyis nyug tu stsol cig/de nas der yan lag gi mcho
187a1('dul ba): lnga po gsos pa dang /mdun na 'don dang /ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba dang skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol ma dang /gzhon nu ba long skyong rnams bsad de bcug la/de rnams
187a2('dul ba): kyi khrag gis khrus mdzad de/rdzing bu nas byung lnga pus mo gnyis sa lo btsugs nas/bramo ze rnams kyi rkang pa la lces bsngags na/de lta na khyod rgyal srid las kyang nyams

187a4('dul ba): skyong gi ma zhi ba dang /rgya gseng gri bu mo sgrol ma dang /gzhon nu ba lang skyong rnams bsang+ga na pa/bdag rgyal po byas te yang ci rung snyam du bsams nas/bram ze rnams la

187b1('dul ba): bu chen po la zhus shig/des sbas pa/tsA ba legs so logs/khyo kyis dus su 'phags pa ka t+yA bu chen po la gtad pas 'gro'o zhes tshe dang ldan pa kA t+ya'i bu gal ba de na/
187b2('dul ba): de der song ste song nas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+ya'i bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dub nas rgyal po gtum pa rab snang gis
187b3('dul ba): cha dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po la 'di skad ces smraso//slob dpon ka t+ya'i bu chen po 'di ni bdag mtshan mo mal chen po zhig na nyal zhing mchis pa'i tshe/rmi lam du sa bri'i sgra drug

187b6('dul ba): cen dmyal bar 'tshed rnams kyi//nam zhig mthar ni phyin par 'gyur//med ces bya ba las tshig su bcad pa ni/mtha' med mtha' lha ga la yod//nga dang khyed cig nyis kyis

188a5('dul ba): drug gang zhe na/'di lta ste/thams cad/su gang /da ni/de rnams/'di dag ces bya ba ste/'di dag ni tshigasu bcad pa drug gi yi ge dang po lag so//de la thams cad ces
188a6('dul ba): bya ba las tsha gsu bcad pa ni/thams cad gsog tu phyung zin te//de la snying po tsam zhig lus//rgyal po srin de snying po la//dga' ba med pas re ba bor//su zhes bya ba

188b1('dul ba): zhes bya ba las tshogasu bcad pa nI/rdzing 'di nya dang ru sbal ni//mang po dag gis gang ba las//da ni sbal bas 'tsho mod kyi//bdag gis gnas ni mi 'dor ro//da ni zhes bya ba

188b5('dul ba): rmi lam brgyad ces bya ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/tsin dan dkar pos lus byugs pa dang /tsan dan dmar pos gtor ba dang /glad la me 'bar ba dang /mchan khung gnyis nas
188b6('dul ba): sbrul gnyis 'phyang ba dang /rkang pa gnyis laM nya khang pa gnyis ldag pa dang /ngang pa gnyis na mkha' la 'phur ba dang /ri nag po zhig mdun na tshur lhur ba dang /chu skyur
188b7('dul ba): dog mgo la rtugs pas 'thor ba mthong ste/gnyid sad nas 'jigs par 'gyur/bag tsha bar gyur cing /spu zing zhes bgyid nas/gzhi 'di las bdag rgyal srid las
189a1('dul ba): ma prASh+Tam/srog gi bung chad du mi 'gyur grang sgyum bskyed do//'a dgas byAka r+dz+dza thu nan pa lta bdag na'adurnam ga 'a bu dan
189a2('dul ba): rgyal srid la sA nyams pa'am/srog gi bar med du mi 'gyur legs gyung /tshe dang ldan pa/d+hA'i bu chen posna smras pa/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis sgo de dag dang /rmi lam de dag
189a3('dul ba): gzhan 'ga' zhig la bskrad dam/des smras pa/'phags pa bsnyad do//su zhig le/bram ze rnams la'o//de dag gis khyod la ji skad du lung bstan/des ji ltar gyu
189a4('dul ba): par bsnyad pa dang /des smras pa/rgyal po chen po de dag ni rtag tu 'dod pa la longs spyad pa dang /lha'i 'jig rten mngon par 'dod pa yin te/dngag ci shes/khyod kyi
189a5('dul ba): sgra bzang po dag cig kyang b+h+yos/rmi lom bzang po dag cig kyang mthing gis/khyod ma 'jigs shig dang /gzhi de lasna khyod rgyal sring nyams par yang mi 'gyur/srog go ba
189a6('dul ba): du yang mi 'gyur//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rgyal po chen po khyod kyi rmi lam na/sad+d+hi'i sgra drug zos pa gang yin pa de gang gi ltas yi nI zhe na/khyod kyi mdun rol gyi rgyal po drug
189a7('dul ba): tsog gis chos dang chos mo yin pas rgyal srid byed du 'jug pas lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skyes so//dul ba phrin tshigs kyi gan/
189b1('dul ba): bam pa nyi shu rtsa dgu pa//de na gcig gis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyis ston nas tshigasu bcud pa/lo ni stong phrag drug cu dang //lo ni brgya phyag drug cu ru//sems na ni//
189b2('dul ba): dmyal ba de'i tshed rnams kyis//nam zhig mthar ni phyin par 'gyur//zhes bye ba smras sgo//gnyis pas tshigasu bcad pa/mtha' med mtha' lta gA la yod// dang khyed cag nyid
189b3('dul ba): gyis ni//mtha' nyid dmigs par mi 'gyur ba//de ltar sdig po'i las byaso so /zhe sa bya ba smo so//gsum pamyi tshig su brjod pa//dug cazhi gis ni longs spyod dag/'thun dang
189b4('dul ba): mi mthun pas bsgrubs pa//gzhan dag bde bas dga' byed kyi//bdag tsog sdug bsngal skal can gyur//tsam b+hi b+da smras//bzhi te ma cheg su bcad pa/'di na bdag caga'i
189b5('dul ba): zhes//bdag cag grang bdog de ma btang //longs spyod dag ni yod pa'i tshe//bdag nyid la ni pan ma byas//zhes bya ba smras so//lnga pas tshig su bcad pa/sems kyis
189b6('dul ba): lus ni bslus gyur cing //mi shes pas ni bdas gyur pa//sems can dmyal bar skyes rnams kyi//gnya ni su zhig byed par 'gyur zhes bya ba smras so//drug pas tshig su
189b7('dul ba): bcad pa/bdag cag 'di rnams bde 'gro ru//song ste dge ba mang byas nas//de nas bsod nams byas gyur cig shis pa byas rnams mtho ris 'dod //zhes bya ba smras te/
190a1('dul ba): de dag ni de'i ltas yin no//rgyal po chen po khyod skyes par sna las sgra dag thos pa gang yin pa de gang gi sa yin zhes/khyod kyi khyim gyi gdung
190a2('dul ba): ma de la srin bu zhig gnas pa des/de'i snying po ma yin pa thams cud zos nas/snying po nyi tshe lus pa dang /de de ltar mngon par mi dga' nas tshogasu bcud pa/khrims
190a3('dul ba): cad gsog tu phyung zin te//'di la snying po tsam zhig lus//rgyal po skyid de snying po la//dga' ba med pas ri ba bor//zhes bya ba smra so//na mkha'i sgra dang ba ni de yin te/
190a4('dul ba): de bas na khyod kyis phyung la gdung gzhan zhig chug shig/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang khyod kyi rta rdzi gnyen len zhes bya ba des byi rog mo'i sgo nga byung zhing byung ba rnams bcom pa
190a5('dul ba): dang /de bu dang bral bas yid ma bde ba skye ste/snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing dal bus tshig su bcad pa/su zhig gnyen lon tshul dran po'i//mig ya cig kyang 'jor byed pa//
190a6('dul ba): des ni bdag gi bu tshwa dang //bdag kyang sdug bsngal las thar byas//zhes bya ba smras te/na mkha'i sgra gnyis pa ni de yin gyis/khyod kyis de 'jom su ma gzhug shig
190a7('dul ba): gzhan yang khyod kyi khyim na rtse ba'i rdzing bu bya rog gis btung slobs tsam du chus kha da can du gang ba nya dang ru sbal dang /sbal pa mang po gnas pa de na/chu skyer gcig
190b1('dul ba): cig nya dag za zhing 'dug pa las/de de skams te chu med par gyur pa dang /chu sbyar des de lta bu de mthong nas/mi dga' ste tshigasu btsud pa/rting 'dri nya dang ru sbru la ni//mang po dag gis/
190b2('dul ba): gang ba las/da ni sprul pas 'tshe mod kyi//bdag gis gnas ni mi 'dor ro//zhes bya ba smras te/na mkha'i sgra gsum pa ni de yin gyis khyod kyis de chus khrod shig/gzhan yang
190b3('dul ba): khyod kyi yul na ri bo gtum ldan zhes bya ba de la/glang po che dang /glang po che mo dmus long zhig gnas te/de gnyis la bu gcig cig yod pa de/de dag gi rim gro byed do//de de gnyis
190b4('dul ba): kyi zas kyi phyir spong ba dang /glang po che mo zhig dang lhan cig 'dus par gyur pa las/de khyod kyis thabs kyis grongs te khrid de 'ongs nas btags te bzhag pa dang /de ma dang po'i
190b5('dul ba): rje su mya ngan byed cing rtswa yang mi za/chu yang ma'i thung bar de dag rje su dran zhing mi dga' bar gyur nas tshig su bcad pa/gang zhig ri bo gtum ldan la//bdag la rkang pas nom byed
190b6('dul ba): bI'o//long ba nyon mongs pa de dag ni//da ni mgron yang med par gyur//ces bya ba smras te/na mkha'i sgra bzhi pa ni de yin gyis/pha ma'i grogs byed pa shi na mi rung bas khyod
190b7('dul ba): kyis de thong shig/gzhan yang khyod kyi khyim na ri dgas shig bzung ste 'dug pa de khyu dang phral bas dgon pa'i ri dgas rnams dran nas tshigasu bcad pa/de rnams mchi
191a1('dul ba): /ni bzang po las//chu ni gasngal zhing zhim pa dag/bde thag nyid du skyed par 'gyur//bdag kyang da ltar deng dga'o//zhes bya ba smras te/bud snang gi sgra lnga pa
191a2('dul ba): pa ni de yin gyis de thong shig/gzhan yang khyod kyi khyim na dad pa dag cig bzung ste 'dug pa de dag gis dang pa gnam la 'phur ba dag mthong nas mi dka' ste tshig su bca
191a3('dul ba): pa/'di dag khrus byas zas nas ni//phyogs dang phyogasu 'gro bar byed//bdag ni sI yis bzung gyur pa//sngon go sdig pa ci zhig byas//zhes bya ba smras te/na mkha'i sgra
191a4('dul ba): drug pa ni de yin pas de dag kyang khyod kyis btang bar bya ste/de ni de dag gi ltas yin no//rgyal po chen po khyod kyi rmi lam brgyad mthong ba gang yin pa de ci'i snga ltas yin zhe na/ri shig
191a5('dul ba): tsin+dan dkar pos lus byugs par mthong ba gang yin pa ni khyod la lus 'phags kyi rgyal pos gos bai'u ras yug po che zhig skyes su bskur ba lam du zhugs shing dug ste/
191a6('dul ba): de zhig bdun nu byin par 'gyur bas/khyod kyi rmi lam dang pa ni de'i snga ltas yi no//khyod kyi lum+b+ha la tsan+dan dmar pos gtor bar mthong brag yin pa ni/khyod la sa 'dzin gyi rgyu
191a7('dul ba): bos la po rin po che zhig skyes su bskur ba lam du zhugs shing 'dug ste/de yang zhag bdun na phyin par 'gyur bas/rma lam gnyis pa ni de'i snga ltas yin//khyod kyis klad pa la
191b1('dul ba): myo 'byung ba mthong ba gang yin pa na//d+yod l+yA s+yAl+yA yA ba ni rgyal pos gsar phreng bya zhog skyes su bsgyur ba lam du zhugs shing 'dug s+ho/du yang zhag bdun na sbyin par 'gyur bas/
191b2('dul ba): rmi lam gsum pa ni de'i sde ltas yin no//khyod kyi mtshan bung gnyis nas sbrul gnyis 'phyong ba mthong ba gang yin pa ni/khyod la rgyu'i rgyal pos ral gi zung cig+sa skyes su bskur
191b3('dul ba): lam du zhugs shing 'dug ste/de yang zhag bdun na phyin par 'gyur bas/khyod kyi rmi lamo bzhi gan da'i snga ltas yin//khyod kyi rkang po gnyis la lnga khar ba gnyis ldag pa mthong
191b4('dul ba): bya gang yin pa ni/khyod la song ga la'i rgyal pos nor bu'i lha ma zung cig skyes su bskur ba lamAM du zhugs shing 'dug ste/de yang zhag bdun na phyin par 'gyur bas/khyod kyi
191b5('dul ba): rmi lam lnga pA ni da'i snga ltas yin no//khyod kyis dang po gnyis na mkha' la 'phur ba mthong ba gang yin pa ni/khyod la bag la'i rgyal pos rtaganyis shig skyes su bskur ba la
191b6('dul ba): du zhugs shing 'dug ste/de yang zhog bdun na phyin par 'gyur bas/khyod kyi rmi lam drug pa ni de'i snga ltas yin no//khyod kyis ri nag pa zhig mdun nas chur 'ongs pa mthong ba
191b7('dul ba): gang yin pa de ni khyod la ka ling ka'i rgyal pos glang po che'i btso bo zhig skyes su bskur ba lam du zhugs shing 'dug ste/de yang zhag bdun na phyin par 'gyur bas/khyod kyi
192a1('dul ba): /rmi lam bdun pa ni de'i snga ltas yin no//khyod kyis chu sgyur dag mgo la drug pas 'thor ba gang yin pa de ni khyod dang ba lang skyong gi ma zhi shes par 'gyur//
192a2('dul ba): khyod kyis bram ze rnams la yang ngan sems bskyed par mi bya'o//de skad ces smras pa dang /rgyal po rab snang srog stor ba las phyir rnyed pa bzhin du dga' ba dang /mgu ba dang /rab tu dag
192a3('dul ba): ba dang /rangs pa dang /bde ba dang /yid bde ba skyes nas/tshe dong ldan pa kau t+ya'i bu chen po sa bshad pa la rjesu yi rang nas/rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/stan las langs te song ngo //de
192a4('dul ba): rarlung gi khyim du song nas/tshe dang ljon pa ka t+ya'i bu chen pos ji skad smras pa de thams cad bskyebs te/gdung ma yang gzhan zhig bcug/rta rje gnyen len yan de ltar byed du ma cug
192a5('dul ba): rdzing bu yang chus bkang /glang po che dang ri dgas dang ngang pa rnams kyang btang ngo //zhag bdun na de'i skyes ji skad bstan pa thams cad kyang phye nas/de nor snyed pas bde ba skyes nas//
192a6('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po la je sems mngon par dad par gyur te bsams pa/bdag gi khyim na dpal dang dbang thang phun sum tshogs pa gang cung zad yod pa de thams cad
192a7('dul ba): ni 'phags pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po la brten nas yino//de'i ci'i phyir ri shig gos be'u ras yug po che 'di bskur la phyis rgyal srid bstabs par bya'o snyam du rig nas mi zhig
192b1('dul ba): la smras pA/kye skyes bu khyod chur gos be'u ras yug po che 'dri khyer la 'phags pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po la phul cig ces byas pa dang /des gos be'u ras yug po che de khyer nas 'phags
192b2('dul ba): pa ki t+ya'i bu chen po lo byin no//de nas ba lang skyong gi mA zhi ma dang /skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol ma dang /gzhon nu ba lang skyong dang /gsos pa dang /mdun na 'dan la smras po/shes ldan
192b3('dul ba): dag nga la yul sna tshogs la dbang ba'i rgyal po rnams kyis/skyes 'di dag bskur gyis khyed gang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin khyer cig/de nas ba lang skyong gi ma zhi bas ni gser gyi 'phreng
192b4('dul ba): ba khyer/skya ba seng gi bu mo sgrol mas ni la ba rin po che/gzhon nu ba lang skyong gis ni rta gnyis/gsas pas ni ral gri zung shig/mdun na 'don gyis ni nor bu'i lham zung cig
192b5('dul ba): khyer te glang po che'i gtso bo lus pa de rgyal pos khyer ro//de nas rgyal po rab snang yan log gi mchog lnga la rin po che dag gis bgo bsha' byas/tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA'i bu chen
192b6('dul ba): pau gA la ba der song ste phyin nas//tshe dang ldan pa kA t+ya'i bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/rgyal po rab snang
192b7('dul ba): gis tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po la 'di skad ces smraso//'phags pa sman 'dogs shIng bces spros mdzad pa logs te/de'i slad du bdag 'phags pa lo rgyal srid stong
193a1('dul ba): na/thugs brtse ba nye bar gzung ste rgyal srid bzhi su gsol/tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen pos smras pa/rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis
193a2('dul ba): dge slong la rgyal srid byed pa bkag go//rgyal pos smras pa/'phags pa gal te de lta na 'dod pa thams cad stobs na/'dod pa thams cad yongasu spyad du gsol/des smras pa/
193a3('dul ba): rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi bdog pa thams cad kyang bkago/rgyal pos smras pa/'phags pa gal te de lta na longs spyod dang /longs spyod kyi mchog rnams stobs
193a4('dul ba): no yongasu spyad du gsol/des smras pa/rgyal po chen po re shig bcom ldan 'das la zhus te bya'o//rgyal pos smras pa/'phags pa de ltar mdzad cig/de'i tshe na bcom
193a5('dul ba): ldan 'das ni mnyan yod na rgyal po rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso//skangs de lta bu la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la
193a6('dul ba): mi mkhyen pa 'am/mi gzigs pa 'am/mi rig pa 'am/rnam par mi rog pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/dge slong ka t+ya'i bu chen po
193a7('dul ba): longs spyod dang longs spyod kyi mchog rnams don tu gnyer ba ma yin mod kyi/'on kyang kyi bo phyi ma rnams la phan gdags so snyam du dgongs nas 'jig rten pa'i thugs
193b1('dul ba): bskyod pa mdzad do//chos nyid kyis gang go tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i rgyags bskyed pa de'i tshe srog chags grog sbur rnams kyis kyang bcom
193b2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes so//gang gi tshe 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe ni/nyon thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan
193b3('dul ba): 'das kyis thugs sems kyis mi shes na/byol song gi skye gnasu song ba rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/don 'di la ni bcom ldan 'das dang /tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i
193b4('dul ba): bu chen po'i thugs dang semasu 'phrod pa'i 'jig rten pa'i thu gos bskyed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das dang /tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen pos lha'i mig dang lha'i rna ba mngon par
193b5('dul ba): bsgrubs nas/phan tshun blta ba dang nyan par yang zhugs//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa dge slong gi
193b6('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi ched du longs spyod dang longs spyod kyi mchog dag blang du rung lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ka t+yA'i bu chen po skye bo phyi ma rnams la snying brtse ba'i
193b7('dul ba): phyir dang /sbyin pa po rnams kyi longs spyod 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir rung ste/de lta bas na dge 'dun la longs spyod dang longs spyod kyi mchog rnams gnang gi gang zag la ni ma
194a1('dul ba): no//de la longs spyod ni 'di dag yin te/grong dang zhing rnams so//longs spyod kyi mchog ni ba lung dang /ma hA dang /ra dang lug rnams so//de nas
194a2('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA'i bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das la zhus nas/rgyal po rab snang la 'di skad ces smras so//rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phyi ma rnams
194a3('dul ba): la snying brtse ba'i phyir dang /sbyin bdag rnams kyi longs spyod 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir dge 'dun la longs spyod dang longs spyod kyi mchog rnams gnang ngo //de nas rgyal
194a4('dul ba): pa rab snang gis tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po las brten nas yo byad phun sum tshogs pa'i gtsug lag khang byed du btsug ste/phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun
194a5('dul ba): la phul nas/longs spyod dang /longs spyod kyis mchog rnams kyang phul lo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag pa'i
194a6('dul ba): dge bsnyen nga'i nyan thos dge 'dun la thog mor 'dod pa thams cad stobs pa rnams kyi nang na mchog ni 'di lta ste/'phags rgyal gyi rgyal po rab snang 'di yin no//dge
194a7('dul ba): slong dag nga'i dge bsnyen nga'i nyan thos dge 'dun la thog mar ba shos 'bul ba rnams kyi nang na mchog ni 'di lta ste/rgyal po'i khod kyi rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs
194b1('dul ba): can stong pa 'di yin no//dge slong dag nga'i dge bsnyen du'i nyan thos dge 'dun la thog myur gnas mal 'bul ba rnams kyi nang na mchog ni 'di lta ste/mnyan yod kyi khyim bdag mgon
194b2('dul ba): med zas sbyin 'di yin no//dge slong dag dra'i dge bsnyen nga'i nyan thos dge 'dun la thog mar gtsug lag khang byed pa rnams kyi nang na mchog ni 'di lta ste/yul bA ra na se'i khyim
194b3('dul ba): bdag bzang ldan 'di yin no//bar sdom ni/'dod pa kun gyis rab snang ste//dge 'dun bshos kyis bzo sbyongs yin//gnas mal mgon med zas sbyin te//gtsug lagau khang
194b4('dul ba): ni bzang ldan no//rgyal po rab snang btsun mo'i 'khor du ris kyis zan za ste/nyi ma TI gr-i ni ba lang skyong gi mo zhi ba'i drung du/gcig ni sgyu gseng gi su mo sgrol ma'i drung du'o//de'i
194b5('dul ba): dus gzhan zhig na dgongs pa pi lang skyong gi ma zhi ba'i thad du zan za ba na/rgyal po de zhol dga' bos ba lang skyong gi zho'i phor pa thogs te de zan za ba'i mdun na 'dug/ji tsam na
194b6('dul ba): phyogs der skya bseng ge bu mo sgrol mo song ste/des la ba rin po che bgos pa dang /des glog byung ba lta bur rgyal po de ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba dang bcas te snang bar byaso//zhi
194b7('dul ba): nges snang po de mthong nas ya mtshan skyes te smras pa/lha 'di ci lags glog cig blo bur du byung ngam/'ga' zhig giso zhugs mar 'tshal/des smras pa/zhi ba 'di ni
195a1('dul ba): rgyun/b+h+yo nag 'ad dus na/sa sa slong su yin no// sgru bsod ma skye spyan rtogs nas song / ma ng+gA pa chogag slo bsku 'don dang
195a2('dul ba): 'od yin no//khyed kyis lci ba rin po ched lta bu btang ste/gluser gyi phreng ba rmongs pa ni khyod na no//rdo bdag gi khyim nu gser gyi phreng ba med dam/nyis na rigs na
195a3('dul ba): ba las skyes pa de tho gi'o//des smras pa/b+hU de la de lta bu'i shes rab ga la mAN+Di so// don ma 'tshul bar khyod nyid kyis la ba rin po che long shig ces bstan te/

195a6('dul ba): po sam/bdag kyi da d+hAs rgyu lug pas//sa dag bsu //ji srid srog dang ma sbrel zla bung du pa de bsna m+b+ham+b+ha nis/des gsos pa la bsgo pa gsas
195a7('dul ba): pangs pa lang skyong gi mo zhi ba yongasu btang gis sod cig/gsas pas bsams pa/de 'di la shin tu bas na 'di khro ba'i phrin nas bkris pas 'di sa
195b1('dul ba): bar zad pas/'phral la bsad par mo byul kun+da nas bkris pa dang bral la bsams bla shes par bya ste/bsad kyis ro shrIg gnas dben pa zhig tu bzhag nom snyam du rag
195b2('dul ba): nus smras pa/lce de ltar 'tshal te/dgum+b+ha mo zhes byas nas/des de gnas dben pa zhig tu bzhag/rgyal po kun nas dkris pa dang bral nas smras pa/glasas pa ba lang skyed
195b3('dul ba): ge ma zhi ba ga re/des smras pa/lha khyod kyis/ngas po lang skyong gi ma zhi ba yongasu btang gis sod cig ces bka' stsal pas/bdag gis de lha'i bka' bzhin du bkum lpags//
195b4('dul ba): des smras pa/gsos pa legs so//da ni da dang skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol ma dang /gzhon nu ba lang skyong dang /mdun na 'don kyang sod la/khyod nyid cod pan chings te rgyal srid byed
195b5('dul ba): la rog go//ngas ko de la de la ma gus pa byas pas/dus do nan tur byas la phyis dga' bar bya'o snyam du bsams bsams na/khyod kyis mod kho na la bsad pa lta zhig/des smras
195b6('dul ba): pa/lha 'di na skyes bu mkhas pa kha cig smras pa'i don dpes kyang kun 'tshol bar 'gyur bas/re shig dpe gsan du gsol/bsdus pa'i sdom ni/khro bo dang ni sgren mo dang /
195b7('dul ba): rnyed par dka' dong bsru ba dang //mi ngoms pa dang gnyis gtogs par//bskum pa'i sdom du yang dag bsdus//sngam ni/khra bo spre'u dang 'jig rten na//long pa dag ste tha
196a1('dul ba): ma yin//rgyal po chen po ston 'byung ba ri'i phyogs mi 'du ba dang /'jigs pa ma mchis pa/shing sna tshogs kyi tshal gyis brgyun bu/seng ge dang /
196a2('dul ba): stag dang /dred dang /byi la dang /ri dregs dang /phag rgod rgyu ba/bya'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis bsten pa/gcig cig tu srog tshogs thi bas shing chen po zhog gi khAr tshad bcas
196a3('dul ba): te/des de 'bras bu smin pa rnams kyis bkang nas chung ma li smras pa/bzang mo khyod kyis 'bras bu 'di dag bza' bar mi bya ste/da lta ni gang yang rung bas bdag nyid 'tsho bar
196a4('dul ba): bya'o//namA rlung dang yul ngan byung ba de'i tshe 'di dag bza' bar bya'o//des smras pa/legs te de bzhin bya'o//ji tsam na rlung dang nyi mas phog pas 'bras bu rnams skams te/
196a5('dul ba): tshing de 'gribs par gyur pa dang /thi bas smras pa/bzang mo ngos khyod la khyod kyi 'bras bu 'di dag bza' bar mi bya ste/rlung ngam yul ngan byung ba'i tshe bza' bar bya'o zhes ma bkag
196a6('dul ba): grAm/'o na ci'i phyir khyod kyis zos/des smras pa/bdag gos mi zes so//des smras pa/ngas tshangs 'di bkag ste bzhag na/gal te khyod kyis ma thos na/'o na tshangs 'di ci'i
196a7('dul ba): phyir 'gribs par gyur/des smras pa/tshang 'di ci'i phyir 'gribs ma shes/bdag gis ni 'di las 'bras bu gcig kyang ma zos so//khyod kyis zos so//ngas ma zos so
196b1('dul ba): gos de gnyis lan dang yang lan 'das pan 'thab mo b+hU s+t+wa~M/dus tho ba maud ma nus bsngon nas/srog dang bral tad do na 'thun nang zhing 'a / /ga na dus ma yin pa nga//
196b2('dul ba): rgyad chen pa byab pa dang /yang chang de len bzhin du 'bras bu dag gisug nas des byis pas/'di'i bu dag gos snang gang ba ltas so//des 'di dag ma zis sa snyam nas/
196b3('dul ba): des dri la bzod pa gsol par brtsams pa/wa m+bi stug pa mengs shig/'di dge khyod kyis ma zas te/bdag gi chung 'di dag gis nyes pa cig pa du bar mdzod cig ces byas pa da /
196b4('dul ba): lhas tshigasu bcad de smras pa/nags tshul rgyu ba'i tho bi ni//mda' ma khra bo mig dmar ba//rang gi sdug ma bsad nas ni//blong na ci zhig mya ngan byed//ji ltar thi ba bang tshol spyong pa yis/
196b5('dul ba): 'di na sdug pa nyes med bsad nas ni//blo rmongs mya ngan byed cing bzang mo zhes//des la bzhams te nyas gcig bzod gsol pa//de bzhin rgyal po gzu lums spyod pa yi ste//zhi/
196b6('dul ba): bla yid dang 'thad pa 'ding bsad nas//ma rmongs mya ngan byed cing bzang mo zhes/des ma zhams te nyes cig bzod pa gsol//zhes bgyi ba lags te/lha khyod kyis gsungs pa'i
196b7('dul ba): ni bdag dpe de dang 'dra ba snyam bgyid do//lha gzhon yang khyim bdag cig dbyed 'das pa dang /ston gyi dus su sran ma'i khur 'tshal nas zhing thog tu chos so//des sran ma
197a1('dul ba): khur de shing drung zhig du bzhag nas/pha zad du bshang bya'i sar mchis pa dang /ji tsam na spre'u zhig shing de las babs nas/sran ma lngas sbyar gang blangs
197a2('dul ba): te/yang shing de la 'dzeg so//de 'dzegs pa na sran ma 'brum bu cig shor te sa la lhung nas/des sran ma spar gang po de bor te/sran ma 'brum bu gcig po de btsal bar
197a3('dul ba): brtsams pa na/khyim bdag des de la bong ba cig bsnun te/de dus las 'das pa dang /lhas tshig su bcad de smras pa/sran ma spur gang bor rwa nas su//gang zhig 'brum bu
197a4('dul ba): cig tshol ba//shin tu tshogs mang ldan pa yi//spre'u 'di kye mir mi 'dzangs//shes bgyi ba lags te/ltos gsungs pa'i don gang zhig bA lang skyong gi ma bkum nas/
197a5('dul ba): yang bzod pa gsol par bzhed pa na/bdag dpe de dang 'dra ba snyam bgyid do//rgyal pos smras pa/gsos pa khyod kyis tshig gcig kho na'i kha lo ba lang skyong go ma
197a6('dul ba): zhi ba bsad do//des smras pa/lha ston pa gang zag zla med pa/gcig pu tshig ni gcig gsung ste//gsung ba de ni nges lags pas//'di la bdag blo 'gyur ma mchis//
197a7('dul ba): zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/rgyal pos smras pa/gsos pa khyod kyis gang gi phyir pha lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas da long bar byas so//des smras pa/lha
197b1('dul ba): lha dang myor bcas 'jig rten 'dir//long bo gnyis ni nges grub pa//rang bzhin gyis ni dmus long dang //gang yang chos la mi gnas pa'o//'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu//gzhan
197b2('dul ba): yang long ba gnyis lags te//gang la sdig lta de yod dang //gang zhig khrims la mI brtan pa'o//zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/sdom ni/sgren mo cir yang mi rung dang //
197b3('dul ba): ma spyad gtun dang lan cig dang //nad dang bag tsha brnyas pa dang //de bzhin du ni bags bgyis so//byis pa dang ni bshos dag dang //skyes bu tha shal nyid dang ni//shing rta yi ni 'khor
197b4('dul ba): lo dang //g+ha yo rtogs par ni yongasu rdzogs//rgyal pos smras pa/gsos pa gang gis phyir/khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas nga sgren mor byas so//des smras pa/

197b6('dul ba): mo'o//gal te mang po bcu yod kyang //khyo med bud med sgren ma'o//zhes bgyi ba lagaso//rgyal po sna smras pa/gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba
197b7('dul ba): bsad pas de cir yang mi rung bar byas//des smras pa/lha 'jig rten na cir kyang mi rung ba gsum mchis par khyod kyis ma gsan tam/des smras pa/gsos pa gsum
198a1('dul ba): snang yin//r+N+Na b+h+r-i thalA kar byung thul dang //spyan myo thun med pa dang //bud mod gang shog snyom sun 'byon//'od gsum tsor yang mo rung brgA
198a2('dul ba): rgyal pos smras pa/gsos pa ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba longs ma spyad par khyod kyis bsad do//des smras pa/!/stsol ba byed po'i gos dang //bku bad pa byed pa'i

198a5('dul ba): pa/gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas/khyod ni gtun gyis brdeg pa'i rgyu'o//des smras pa/lha/shing mkhan rtsang rtsing 'jog pa dang //bza'

198b4('dul ba): ba bsad pas/khyod ni rang gis nad blangs so//des smras pa/lha/sngar ma sna tshegs go gyon dang //rtsa 'jing chung ngu nor mang dang //rgad po chung ma gzhon len pa//de dgago rang gis nad

198b6('dul ba): lha/dka' thub can ni blun mthong dang //dpa' bo rma mtshan med pa dang //bu mo chen mo mthong nas ni//snying lo bag tshe skye bar 'gyur//zhes bya ba khyod kyis ma gsan te ma/
198b7('dul ba): rgyal pos smras pa/gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi babs krud sa so//des smras pa/lha/tso le tse la smras pa dang //gnyis pa gos ngan gyon pa dang //
199a1('dul ba): bkru zhing za ba gang yin pa//de gsum brnyas par bya ba yin//zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma klas na tam/rgyal pos smras pa/gsos pa gang gi phyar khyod
199a2('dul ba): kyis ba lang skyong gre ma zhi ba bskrad pa ste/ngas khyod dag zhig dgas kyis spel to//des smras pa/lha/nya ni bags kyis bza' bar bya//ri bo la ni bags kyis 'dzag
