199a7('dul ba): par byed/tso so bgyi ba khyod kyis mi gsan tam/rgyal pos smras pa/gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma ni babasod pas/khyod ni skyes bu za sha

199b3('dul ba): lha/ri mo mkhan ni tshen gtong mi shes dang //'khrul 'khor mkhan ni 'khar ka mi shes dang //gyad kyi bu ni dor thabs mi shes pa/bsad bya gsad par rtag tu bzlog pa med//ces
199b4('dul ba): bgyi ba lhas ma gsan tam/rgyal pos smras pa/gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas/khyod ni g.yon can yin no//des smras pa/lha/bud med

199b6('dul ba): dang gzhan dang gcig/bsags dang de bzhin mi mthun dang //brdung dang med pa nyid dang ni//mi 'tshams pa dang don med do//gsos pa khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma rnyed dka' ba
199b7('dul ba): bsad do//des smras pa/lha ri bong rwa can rnyed par dka'//ru sbal sru can rnyed par dka'//smad 'tshong gcig pu 'dug pa dang //gza bo drang por smra rnyed dka'o//zhes bgyi de khyod kyis
200a1('dul ba): mA gsan tam+b+ha/rgyal pos smras pa/glu sos pa khyod kyis gzhan gyi ched du ba lang skyong gi mU zhi ba bsnyad do//des smras pa/lha/gtams pa len dang
200a2('dul ba): gnya'o dang //g.yon can gyi ni che bzhi dang //smyan byed blo zhan bzhi po dang /gzhan gyi don du ma rung 'gyur//zhes bgyi ba khyod kyi ma gsan tam/rgyal pos smras pa/gsos

200b1('dul ba): mon d+ha/ma mthun//nas ba da kyis ma gsan d+ham+b+ha/rgyal pos smras pa/gsoso pa gang gi sbyor khyod kyis pa ltang sbyang ba mgo ba bas pas khyod na 'jung rgyu'o//dus smras ga/

201a5('dul ba): lha/g.yul ngor dpa' bo blta bya ste//mi bzang dug la gsang sngags blta//bza' btung tshe no nye du blta//don rtogs bya la mkhas pa blto//zhes bgyi bau khyod kyis ma gsen

201b1('dul ba): gsan tag/rgyal pos smras pa/gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis pa lang stong gi mA zhi ba bas dngas/khyod ni bskrad pad byA byA yin no//des smras pa/wAn+ta mo mkhas shing rta btsog pa dang //

201b6('dul ba): baM gang gi phyir khyod kyis pa lang skyong gi ma zhi ba sad pas khyod ni gting bar bya ba yin//des smras pa/lha/rigs kyi phyir ni gcig gtang ste//grong gi phyir ni rigs gtong/

202a1('dul ba): /'chad du ma btu'o//des smras pa/rtswa myed gzhan gyi bud med dang /lcag mo gcig gis chu 'thung dang //gzhan gyis chang blud gang yin pa//de dag sred pa
202a2('dul ba): chad pa med//ces bgyi ba khyod kyis mi gsan tam/rgyal pos smras pa/gsos pa khyod kyis ma bsams pa kho nar ba lang skyong go ma bsad do//des smras pa/lha/rgyal la

202b4('dul ba): byis pa sbrul dang sprul pa dang //gang gi ma ni g.yem pa dang //mi gang mdzo'i ni mi rtag dang //lhan cig rtse bar mi bya'o//zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gson tam/rgyal pos smras pa/
202b5('dul ba): gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas/khyod kyis nor 'phrog pa byaso//des smras po/lha/rol mo mkhan dang dmag mi dang //sman pa chom rku ni brtson
202b6('dul ba): NI ste//de dag nya ma thag gyur pa la'ang //nor ni 'phrog par byed pa yin//zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/rgyal pos smras pa/gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang
202b7('dul ba): skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni smra bar bya ba ma yino//des smras pa/lha/ha cang phyug dang ha cang dbul//dam dang ha cang mtho gang dang //ha cang ring dang ho cang nye//da drug bla
203a1('dul ba): par bya ba min//zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/rgyal pos smras pa/gasngos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gri ma zhi ba bas pas/khyod ni
203a2('dul ba): sems rab tu sdang ba yin no//des smras pa/lha/sbyin pa mi snang mi mthun byed pa dang //'thun par mi byed nyes spyod sgrogs pa dang //sbyin pa byin nas rim gyis ldog byed pa//
203a3('dul ba): de dag rab tu snang ba'i rtags yin//zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/rgyal pos smras pa/gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas
203a4('dul ba): mgon med par gyur to//des smras pa/lha/gnas brtan rgyal po rgad po dang //tshul me da dka' blo mi bde dang //bla ma la ni gnod byed gang //de drug mgo na med par bshad///
203a5('dul ba): ces bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/rgyal pos smras pa/gsos pa khyod kyis gang gi phyir ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas/khyod dang lhan cig pa shes par bya ba
203a6('dul ba): ma yin no//des smras pa/lha/bzhad rgod mkhyen dang gar mkhan dang //pho nya skud mtshong tshong dad can//ma ning de bzhin ga zhung ngan pa//de dag dang ni bshes mi bya//
203a7('dul ba): zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/rgyal pos smras pa/gsos pa gang gis phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bas smra pas/khyod ni yi brtan par bya ba ma
203b1('dul ba): yin no//des smras pa/lha/sgo tsam nub pa'i chu dang rta dang ni//glang po che drang spre'u dang sbrul nag dang //sgyu 'grong ba dang gdong gnyer gang ba dang //kha spu nyung la yid ni brtan myi bya//
203b2('dul ba): zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/sdom ni/gnyid med 'dod pa ma yin dang //kun nas mnar sems dngos po dang //de bzhin snying rje khwa dang ni//zlo ga thabs tha me stobs
203b3('dul ba): yin no//rgyal pos smras pa/gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas nga gnyid med do//des smras pa/lha/g.ye ma dang skems nad can dang ni//
203b4('dul ba): cham pas thebs dang sdug bsngal dang //don sems khros dang brtson po dang //'jigs pa de ni rnam kun tu//gnyid mi 'ong ste 'jig rten na//brgyad ni rang bzhin sdug bsngal
203b5('dul ba): lo//zhes bgyi ba khyod kyisnga ma ge san tam/rgyal pos smras pa/gsas pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas 'dod pa ma yin no//des smras pa/
203b6('dul ba): lha/'dod pa ma yin pa'i dngos po brgyad ces bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/gsos pa brgyad gang yon/nA dang rga dang 'chi ba dang //sdug bral mi sdug phrad pa dang //ser
203b7('dul ba): ba thog dang mi rtag nyid//brgyad ni 'jig rten 'dod min rab//rgyal pos smras pa/gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyi smra ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas/nga khyod la kun nas
204a1('dul ba): myanar sems skyes so//des smras pa/lha/kun nas mnar sems dgu 'dul ba zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/gses pA dgu gang yin//
204a2('dul ba): lha 'di ni bdag la gnod par 'dod pa/phan pa mi yin par 'dod pa/bde ba ma yin par 'dod pa/reg pa ma yin por 'dod pa/grub pa dang bde ba ma yin par 'dod pa ste/
204a3('dul ba): 'dis bdag la gnod pa byas so byed do byed par 'gyuraro snyam mo//yang de 'di snyam du sems te/gzhan las bdag gi 'di ltar gyur na mi rung bas/bdag gi 'di kho na
204a4('dul ba): ltar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'di 'grub par ga la 'gyur snyam nas/de de la kun nas mnar sems skyes pa sel bar byed do//'di gang zhig bdag la gnod par
204a5('dul ba): 'dod pa//phan pa ma yin par 'dod pa/bde ba ma yin par 'dod pa/reg pa ma yin par 'dod pa/grub pa dang bde ba ma yin par 'dod pa/de la gnod par 'dod pa/
204a6('dul ba): phan pa ma yin par 'dod pa/bde ba ma yin par 'dod pa/reg pa ma yin par 'dod pa/grub pa dang bde ba ma yin par 'dod pa ste/'dis de la gnod par byas so//
204a7('dul ba): byed do byed par 'gyur snyamo//yang de 'di snyam du sems te/gzhan las bdag gi 'di ltar gyur na mi rung bas/bdag gis 'di kho na ltar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'di
204b1('dul ba): 'grub par ga la 'gyur snyam nas/de de la kun+da nas mnar sems skyes pa sel bar byed do//'di ni gang sgrog da dag la gnod par 'dod pa/phan pa ma yin par 'dod pa/ba
204b2('dul ba): ba ma yin par 'dod pa/reg pa ma yin par 'dod pa/grub pa dang bde ba ma yin par 'dod pa/de la don du 'dod pa/phan par 'dod pa/bde bar 'dod pa/
204b3('dul ba): reg par 'dod pa/grub pa dang bde bar 'dod pa ste 'dis de la phan par byas so byed do byed par 'gyuraro snyamo//yang de 'di snyam du sems te/gzhan las bdag
204b4('dul ba): gi 'di ltar gyur na mi rung byas bdag gis 'di kho na ltar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'di grub bor ga la 'gyur snyam nas/de de la kun nas mnar sems skyes pa sel bar byeda'o//
204b5('dul ba): rgyal pos smras pa/gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong go ma zhi ba byasad pas khyod ni snying rje med pa yino//des smras pa/lha/khyod kyis snying rje med pa bcu po
204b6('dul ba): shan pa dang /bye gag 'tshong ba dang /phag 'tshor ba dang /nya pa dang /ri dwags kyi rngon pa dang /bya ba dang /bong bu rgyas 'chor ba dang /chom rkun pa dang /gshed ma pa dang /ba lang
204b7('dul ba): gsod pa lags par ma gsan tam/rgyal pos smras pa/gsos pa gang gi phyir khyed kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsod pas khwa lta bu yi no//des smras pa/lha//yan
205a1('dul ba): lag su dang ldan nA khA lta bu lag so zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gson tam/gsos pa bcu gang yin/lha gtsor ba dang /mu tsor smras pa dang /drub
205a2('dul ba): tshod byed pa dang /'khu ba dang /byas pa mi ga za ba dang /snying rje med pa dang /ma byin par len pa dang /sogs pa dang /dgang dka' ba dang /'chal pa lags//rgya la pos
205a3('dul ba): smras pa/gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba ldang skyong gi me zhi ba bsad pas khyekhyod ni zlog thabs can yino//des smras pa/lha/zlog thabs can bcu zhes bgyi bo khyod kyis
205a4('dul ba): mi gsan tam/gsos pa bcu gang yin/lha/nyi me zlog thabs can dang /zla bzlog thabs can dang /me zlog thabs can dang /chu zlog thabs can dang /gzhon nu ma zlog
205a5('dul ba): thabs can dang /bud med zlog thabs can dang /bram ze zlog thabs can dang /gcer bu bzlog thabs can dang /dge slong zlog thabs can dang /slad sa zlog tha sa ts+tshin
205a6('dul ba): lcag so//de la nyi ma zlog thabs can nI/nyi ma ni dgun ljo nas mchin dri bar yang mi 'gyur la//spos ka theg ring po nas mchin 'on kyang dro bar 'gyur te/'di ni nyi ma
205a7('dul ba): klog thabs can zhes pa gyi'o//zla ba zlog thabs can gong zhe na/zla ba ni gang gi tshe shas chung ba de'i tshe skye bo thams cad kyis phyag bya bar 'gyur la/gangagi tshe rnam pa
205b1('dul ba): thams cad so su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i cho su yang phyag mi 'tshal te/'di ni zla ba zlog thabrus can zhes bgyi'o//mi zlog thabs can gang zho na/mo ni chog pa me nyid du su
205b2('dul ba): ste/'di ni me zlog thabs can zhes bgyi'o//chu zlog thobs can gang zhe na/chu ni dgun rdzing na bsil na 'on kyang btung du mi rung gi/khron pa na dron 'on kyang btung du rung la/so gror treng
205b3('dul ba): na dro na 'on kyang btung du ru la/khron pa na bsil ni 'on kyang btud du mi rung ste/'di ni chu zlog thabs can zhes bgyi'o//gzhon nu ma zlog thabs can gang zhe na/gzhon nu ma ni
205b4('dul ba): gang gi tshe ma phyin pa de'i tshe gyos po'i khyim la dga' la gang gi tshe gyos pa'i khyim du khyer bA de'i tshe khyim la khong du yang dga' la ngu bar byed de/'di ni gzhon nu ma zlog thebs rten
205b5('dul ba): zhes bgyi'o//bud med zlog thabs can gang zhe na/bud med ni gang gi tshe gzhon zhing blta na yid du 'ong ba de'i tshe lus bgab ste 'gro la/gong gi tshe rgas shing yid du mi 'ong ba de'i
205b6('dul ba): tshe phye nas 'phro ste 'di ni bud med zlog thabs can zhes bgyi'o//bram ze zlog thabs can gang zhe na/bram ze ni gang gi tshe byis pa ste 'dod pa'i 'dod chags ma skyes pa
205b7('dul ba): de'i tshe tshangs par spyad pa stod la/gang gi tshe dang la bab ste 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyes pa de'i tshe 'dod pa dge sten par byed de/'di ni bram ze zlog thabs can zhes bgyi'o//
206a1('dul ba): gats+tsher bu pa zlog thabs can gang zhe na/gcer bu pa ni gang gi tshe khyim na 'dug pa de'i tshe gos bgosra sh+tsi dug la/gang gi tshe spyod yul du 'gro ba de'i tshe na/
206a2('dul ba): gcer bur 'gro ste/'di ni gcer bu bzlog thabs can zhes bgyi'i/dge slong zlo gau thabs can grang zhe na/dge slong ni gang gi tshe gzhon nu lang tse lo bab cing /zos pa dang /
206a3('dul ba): 'thungs pa dang /'chos pa dang /myangs pa rnams 'ju bar nus pa de'i tshad dge mi snyed la/gang gi tshe rgas te zos pa dang /'thungs pa dang /'chos pa dang /myangs pa rnams
206a4('dul ba): 'ju bar mi nus pa de'i tshe de dag rnyed de 'di ni dge slong zlog thabs can zhes bya'o//slad sa zlog thabs can gang zhe na/slad sa ni gang gi tshe gsher ba de'i tshe chu'i steng na 'phyo
206a5('dul ba): gang gi tshe skabs pa de'i tshe 'bying ste/'di skad sa zlog thabs can zhes bgyi'o////bam po sum cu pa//rgyal pos smras pa/gsos pa de thams cad go sde
206a6('dul ba): mcho go/'di dris drang por smros shig/khyod kyi stobs gang gis pa lang skyong gri ma zhi ba bsad/des smras pa/lha bdag la gang gis na ba lar skyong gi ma zhi ba khums pa'i
206a7('dul ba): stobs ga la mchis/lha 'on kyang 'phags pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po 'di gong gi nyan thos lags pa de ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
206b1('dul ba): sangs rgyas rig pa dang wang su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i khwa lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa lags te de bzhin
206b2('dul ba): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes thigs pa mi mnga' ba'i stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba de la/gang dgra dang ldan na/de khyu mchog gi gnas
206b3('dul ba): rlabs po che zhal gyis 'che zhing tshangs pa'i 'khor lo skor bar mdzad/'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgronapar mdzad pa stobs bcu minga'o//bcu gang legs she na lha
206b4('dul ba): ni gnas la yang gnasu/gnas ma yin pa la yang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//lha 'di ni de'i stobs dang po lags te stobs de dang ldan pas
206b5('dul ba): de khyu mchog gi gnas rlabs po che zhal gyis 'che zhing tshangs pa'i 'khor lo skor bar mdzad/'khor gyi nang du seng ga'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs par mdzad do//lha gzhan yang des sems
206b6('dul ba): can rnams kyi las dang /chos yang drag par blangs pa 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba rnams la gnas dang gzhi dang rgyu dang /rnam par smin pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin dus
206b7('dul ba): tumakhyen to//des sems can rnams kyi las dang chos yang dag par blangs pa/'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba rnams gnas dang gzhi dang rgyu dang /rnam par smin par
207a1('dul ba): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pa glang lags pa 'di ni lha de'i stobs gnyis pa lags te/stobs de dang ldan pas de khyu mchog go gnas rlabs po che zhal/
207a2('dul ba): gyi 'che zhing tshangs pa'i 'khor lo skor bar mdzad/'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs par mdzad do//lha gzhan yang des bsam gtan dang /rnam
207a3('dul ba): par thar pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba rnam par gzhag pa dang /rnam par dag pa yang dag pa ji lta
207a4('dul ba): ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//des bsam gtan dang /rnam par thar pa dang /ting 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba dang
207a5('dul ba): rnam par dag pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa gang lags pa 'di ni/lha de'i stobs gsum pa legs te/stobs de dang ldan pas de khyu mchog gi gnas
207a6('dul ba): rlabs po che zhal gyis 'che zhing tshangs pa'i 'khor lo skor bar mdzad/'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs par mdzad do//lha gzhan yang des sems can
207a7('dul ba): gzhan rnams dang /gang zag gzhan rnams kyi dbang po mchog dang /mchog ma yin pa nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//des sems can gzhan rnams dang /
207b1('dul ba): gang zag gzhan rnams kyi dbang po'i mchog dang mchog ma yin pa nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa gang lags pa 'di ni de'i stobs bzhi pa lags te/stobs de dang
207b2('dul ba): ldan pas de khyu mchog gi gnas brlabs po che zhal gyis 'tshe zhing /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo skor bar mdzod/'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs par mdzad do//
207b3('dul ba): lha gzhan yang des sems can gzhan rnams dang /gang zag gzhan rnams kyi mos pa sna tshogs nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//des sems can gzhan rnams
207b4('dul ba): dang /gang zag gzhan rnams kyi mos pa sna tshogs nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa gang legs pa 'di ni lha de'i stobs lnga po lags te/stobs de dang ldan pas
207b5('dul ba): de khyu mchog gi gnas rlabs po che zhal gyis 'tshe zhing tshangs pa'i 'khor lo skor bar mdzad/'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs par mdzad//lha gzhan yang
207b6('dul ba): des 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs pa dang /khams du ma pa'o zhes bgyi ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//des 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs pa dang /khams
207b7('dul ba): dum pa'o zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa gang lags pa 'di ni/lha de'i stobs drug pa lags te/stobs de dang ldan pas de khyu mchog gi gnas
208a1('dul ba): rlabs po chu zhal gyis 'che zhing rdungs pa'i 'khor lo skor bar mdzod/'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs par mdzad do//lha gzhan yang des kun
208a2('dul ba): tu 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//des kun tu 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa gang lags pa 'di ni lha de'i stobs bdun pa
208a3('dul ba): lags te/stobs de dang ldan pas de khyu mchog gi gnas rlabs po tsho zhal gyis 'che zhing /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo skor bar mdzad/'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par
208a4('dul ba): sgrogs par mdzad do//lha gzhan yang des sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjesu dgongs te/'di lta ste/tshe gcig kyang dgongs//tshe gnyis dang /gsum dang /bzhi dang /lnga dang /
208a5('dul ba): drug dang /bdun dang /brgyad dang /dgu dang /bcu dang /nyi shu dang /sum cu dang /bzhi bcu dang /lnga bcu dang /tshe brgya dang /tshe stong dang /tshe brgya stong dang /tshe brgya phrag du ma dang /
208a6('dul ba): che brgya stong phrag du ma dang /'jig pa'i bskal pa dang /'chags pa'i skal pa dang /'jig pa dang /'chags pa'i bskal pa dang /'jog pa'i bskal po du ma dang /'chags
208a7('dul ba): pa'i bskal pa du ma dang /'jig pa dang /'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma yang rje su dgongs te/gang du bdag gi ming ni 'di zhes bya/rigs ni 'di lta bu/rus ni 'di lta bu//
208b1('dul ba): gzas na 'dri lta bu zazla/byung ba dang /sdug brtul na di lta bu zhog tu mAm+b+hats+tsho rdzun 'donam thub/yan no 'ad srod ga glanas/ mtha' 'ad b+h+yo/yon par 'gyur ba na/
208b2('dul ba): sems can ni de dag byung ngo //bdag 'di nas shi 'phos nas ni cho ga mo zhig tu skyes so//de nas kyang sha 'phos nas ni 'drir skyes so zhes sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma
208b3('dul ba): rnam pa dang bcas/yul phyogs dang bcas par rje su dgongs so//des mngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rje su dgongs te/'di lta ste/tshe gcig kyang dgangs pa nas/'dir
208b4('dul ba): skyes zhes bya ba'i bar sngon gyi gaunas rnam pa du ma rnam pa dang bcas/yul phyogs dang bcas par rje suM dgengs pa gang lags pa 'di ni/lha de'i stobs brgyad pa lags
208b5('dul ba): to/stobs dang ldan pase de khyu mchog gi gnas rlabs po che zhal gyis 'chi zhing tshangs pa'i 'khor la skor bar mdzad/'khor gyi nang du sang+ge'i sgra yang dag por sgrogs par
208b6('dul ba): mdzad//lha gzhan yang des lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi'i las dbang bas/sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang /skye ba dang /kha dog bzang po dang //kha dog ngan pa dang /dman
208b7('dul ba): pa dang /gya nom pa rnams kyang gzigs la/sems can las ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar 'gro ba/'di 'gro dang don 'gror 'gro ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te/
209a1('dul ba): sems can 'di dgu ni lus kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa/drug dang yod kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa/log
209a2('dul ba): par lta ba can yin te/log par lta bya'i las dang /chos yang drag par blangs pa'i phyir/rgyu de dang rkyen des lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can
209a3('dul ba): dmyal ba dag gi rlung du skye bar 'gyur//sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ngag dang yid kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/'phags pa
209a4('dul ba): rnams la skur ba mi 'debs pa/yang dag pa'i lta ba can te/yang dag pa'i lta ba'i las dang /chos yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus/rgyu dang rkyen des lus zhig nas
209a5('dul ba): bde 'gro mtho ris su lha dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur zhes bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//des lha'i spyan zhes bya ba nas bde 'gro mtho ris su lta
209a6('dul ba): dag gi n+yA du skye b.ra'i'agyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin//'di ni lha de'i stobs dgu pa legs te/stobs de dang ldan pas/de khyu mchog gi gnas rlabs pa
209a7('dul ba): che zhal gyis 'cha zhing /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo skor bar mdzad/'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs par mdzad do//lha gzhan yang de zag pa rnams
209b1('dul ba): zad pa'i phyir mthong ba'i chos kha na la zag pa med pa'i sems rnam par grol ba dang /shes rab rnam par grol ba dang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas nas rdzogs par
209b2('dul ba): byas te/bdag gi zag pa zad do//tshangs par spyod pa bsten to//bya ba byas so//'di las sresrid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes gsung so//de zag pa rnams zad pa'i phyir mthong
209b3('dul ba): bo'i chos kho na la zag pa med pa'i sems rnam par grol ba dang /shes rab rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba nas/'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhi no///
209b4('dul ba): lha 'di ni de'i stobs bcu pa lags te/stobs de dang ldan pas de khyu mchog gi gnas rlabs po che zhal gyis 'che zhing /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo skor bar mdzad/'khor gyi nang
209b5('dul ba): du seng ge sgra yang dag par sgrogs par mdzad do//de skad ces smras pa dang /rgyal po rab snang spobs pa med nas cang mi zer bar 'dug/gsos pas bsams pa/lha ni
209b6('dul ba): spongs pa med de cang mi zer bar 'dug na/'di dang ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba ji srid tho ba tsam snyam nas/des de ngom zum gnag bzhin khrid nas/rgyal po'i rkang pa gnyis la
209b7('dul ba): phyag 'tshal nas/rgyal po la bzod par gsol bar zhugs pa/lha/mi yi dbang pos 'dir rtag chos kyi tshul//bgrod cing rjesu bgrod pa yang dag gzigs//bzod pa rgyal po
210a1('dul ba): rnams kyi chos gcalta//ba yang skyong gi ma yi nongs bzod mdzod//'jig rten lta bya logs gsungs rin po che//ji ste gzigs par ma gyur gsan
210a2('dul ba): ma gyur//khyod kyi glang po che yang gdul bar bad lags no//cung zad nongs bgyid bud med smos kyi'i chel//khyod lus mi 'phye gzugs dang yon tan ldan//sngon dang phyis
210a3('dul ba): kyang de bzhin btsun mo lags/rje slad kho nas lhan cig ba lang ma'i//thams cad bzod pa mdzod ces de skad mchi'o//rgyal pos kyang gsos pa la tshigasu bcad de slar
210a4('dul ba): smras pa/rab smras legs par smre 'di khyod kyis ni//nga la snying nye bskyed de smras pa yin//de ltas khyod la kan n+ya ku ba dza byin//nga yis zhi ba la yang snying nas bzod//gsos
210a5('dul ba): pa'i lan rdzogs s+ho////sdom ni/drag shul can gyi gser snod dang //'od bzangs ma dang dgon pa pa//'tsho byed dang ni 'bras spyan dang //'khor ni mang po
210a6('dul ba): sun byed pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pan+d+han+da gyi sgye'u d+hIng 'gram na/khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzangs ni bzhugaso//de'i tshe bram ze dang khyim bdag
210a7('dul ba): mang po dpongs na 'dus shing 'khod pa dge bar skabs kyi gtam 'di lta bu dge gleng ste/shes ldan dge sbyong go'u ta ma dang /de'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'dod chen che ba'o//
210b1('dul ba): mu stebs can dag ni dri lta ma yin no zhes zer ro//de'i tshe khyim bdag drug shul can 'khor de nyid du 'dus nas 'dug par gyur to//de nas khyim bdag drag shul can gyis/yangs pa
210b2('dul ba): can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag mang po rnams la 'di skad ces smras so//shes ldan dag re shig sdod cig dang /ngas bcom ldan 'das 'dod chen che 'am 'dod chen chung ba dang de'i
210b3('dul ba): nyan thos 'dod chen che 'am/'dod chen chung ba dgra khyod kyi mngon sum du bya'o zhes byas nas/des gser dang /dngul dang /bai DUr+ya dang /shel gyi snod dag bsdogs nas/sangs
210b4('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba dar song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang /yang dag par mgu ba'i gtam/rnam pa sna tshogra
210b5('dul ba): byas nas phyogs gcig tu gdugo//phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag drag shul can la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/
210b6('dul ba): yang dag par len du 'jug par mdzad/yang dag par gzeng bstod par mdzad/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do//rnam grangs du mar chos dang 'thun pa'i gtam gyis
210b7('dul ba): yang dag par bstan/yang dag par len tu bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so//de nas khyim
211a1('dul ba): 'drug drug shUl can stan las la s+yA/b+hags drug pa gcig tu gzung nas/bco ldan 'das gal bu dang logs tham ma spyod pa rgyun su
211a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ce sa/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thab ste gcig tu bdag gi snum par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gan zhes gsos
211a3('dul ba): dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag drug shul can la cung mi gsung pos gnang ngo //de nas khyim bdag dreg shUl byin gyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnas
211a4('dul ba): par rig nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bskyed cing rje su yi rang nas ston las lhungs te song ngo //des mu stegs can rnams la yang shes ldan
211a5('dul ba): dag sang bdag gi khyim du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gdug sna tshod la spyad drangs kyis/da kyang de nyid du dz+nyAn lA shog shin
211a6('dul ba): mgron du ngos so//yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la yang /shes ldan dag bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
211a7('dul ba): pa dang /mu stegs can rnams sang bdag gi khyim du gdugs chod la spyan drangs kyis khyed kyang de'i tshe grags byed du shog shig ces bsgo'o//de nas khyim bdag drag shul
211b1('dul ba): can gyis/de nyid kyi mtshan mo gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba sta glon byas nas/nang par sngar langs te gdan bA shams chur dag bzhag ste/bcom ldan 'das la
211b2('dul ba): spyan 'dren gyis gdugs tshod gsol ba/gdugs tshod sbyar lags te/de de'i dus la byab na bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i dus la bzla par dgongasu gsol zhes gdugs chod
211b3('dul ba): 'das par gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/sham thabs dang chos gos bsnabs/lhung bzed bsnam te/khyim bdag drag shul can gyis bka sa

212b7('dul ba): brtsams pa dang /sgra mthon pa dang sgra mang po gtan nas/la li na re khyim bdag bdag la ni gser los byas pa byin cig ces zer la/la la ni rig snga dang dngul las byas pa byin cig ces
213a1('dul ba): da/do ltar dro dag/ts+tsha 'don pa de'i tshe 'thab mo byung nas/phan tshun du khwa chung dang /thal lcag dang /dbyug pa dang /lcug dbyug dang /rdog pas rdeg pad+ma /

213a3('dul ba): brtsams pa dang /sgobs bzung bar brtsam so//de rnams kyis smras pa/kye nang rje khyim bdag gis nged la byin na ci'i phyir bzung /des smras pa/khyim bdag gis khyed zin gyi phyir byin

213a6('dul ba): can nyes par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba can 'di dag ni de lta ma yin//de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pi la mngon par ma dad pa mang po ni mngon par

213b7('dul ba): la sogs pa'i snod du za bar gnang gis 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yad na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
214a1('dul ba): dga' ba na bzhugs//mnyan yod na khyim bdag phyug pa nor mang ba/longs spyod che ba/yongasu bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan

214a3('dul ba): par byed do//de dang rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod pa byed pa las/dus gzhan zhig na chung ma de la sems can zhugs par gyur to//gang gis nyin mo de sems
214a4('dul ba): can zhugs par gyur pa de nyid kyi nyin mo nos mdangs bzangs par gyur to//de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas/bu mo gzugs bzang ba/mdzes pa/blta na sdug pa/yan
214a5('dul ba): lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsaso//de btsas po'i tshe de'i khyim nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du snang bar gyur nas mnyan yod kun du khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gi bu
214a6('dul ba): mo gzugs bzang ga mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig bcis te/dro bcas pa de'i tshe de'i khyimo nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du snang bar gyur
214a7('dul ba): tozhes sgra dgrags pa dang /srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po ngo mtshar du gyur nas/khyim bdag de'i khyim du 'dus so//re shig nA bram ze ltas mkhan zhig yul gzhan nas
214b1('dul ba): ngas pa de yang ngo mtshar gyi phyir de nyid du 'dus te/des de la phan tshun du bltas nas/skye bo'i tshogs la smras pa/shes ldan dag khyed kyis bu mo 'di mthong ngam/de dag gis smras pa

214b4('dul ba): ldog pa/yan lag dang nying log thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas te/de bcas pa de'i tshe de'i khyim de nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du snang bar gyur to//de la mtshan mkhan gyis bu mo

215a1('dul ba): 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /nu zh-i ldud pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /dri ma phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /rtse nA grogs kyi ma mra gnyis la gtad do//da ma mo brgyad kyi/

215a3('dul ba): par gyur to//de dag gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe/gzugs dang lang che mdzes pa dang /g.yer ba dang /sgyu rtsal gyi yon tan gyi khyad par dang ldan pas/rigs che

215a5('dul ba): gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba'i drang srong dag kyang sems 'phrog par byeng na/thog ma med pa'i dus nas nyon mongs pa kun tu spyod pa bsags pa/rigs dang /gzugs dang /
215a6('dul ba): lang tsho dang /dbang phyug gi drags pas rgyags pa'i mi rnams lha mos kyang ci dgos/khyim bdag de yang nang mi'i skye bI'i 'khor dang bcas te/da srung ba lhur lan cing gnyid

215b1('dul ba): gnas pa'i rgyal po dang /blon pa'i bu dang /mdun na 'don gyi bu la sogs pas bslang bar brtsams kyang /bu mo 'dra bzang ma skyes bu lnga brgya dang lhan tsog dga' mgur spyod par na chen
215b2('dul ba): mkhan gyis lung bstan pas na/'jig rten gyis dpya su dogs pa'i phyir sus kyang ma blangaso//de yang de'i khyim gyi skar khung dro ba can dang /skar khung dang /stegs bu dang /khang thog tu

215b4('dul ba): 'ga' yang len du ma btub bo//de nas khyim bdag de de su yang ma 'dod pas yid mi bde ba skyes te/bya ba thams cad kyi blo gtad nas/de sbyin pa'i thabs sems pas/lus skye bo bseng

215b7('dul ba): las byas la/des kyang dpya bar 'gyur ba'i las byas pas/de'i ming chung ma bsod pa chung me gsod pa zhes bya bar chagaso//des gzhan du blangs pa dang /de dag gis smras pa/dad kyis

216a2('dul ba): dang /chung ma med kyang bla zhes chung ma 'dod pa'i re thag bcad nas/dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /spyod pa pa dang /kun tu rgyu rnams dang lhan cig bsten par brtsam so//de'i pha sangs rgyas pa'i
216a3('dul ba): dge bsnyen zhig pas des bsams pa/bdag gi pha sangs rgyas pa'i dge bsnyen yin no/bdog la dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /spyod pa pa dang /kun tu rgyu ba rnams kyis ci zhig bya/bac+doMs
216a4('dul ba): kyi nyan thos rnams la bsnyen bkur bya zhing /de dag la bya ba byas nas de nyid du rab tu 'byung snyam nas/de yang dang yang du rgyal byed kyi tshul du 'gro bar gyur to//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na

216a7('dul ba): bar gyur to//de dag gis kyang tshe thung bar 'gyur ba'i las byas/kho bos kyang dpya bar 'gyur ba'i las byas pas kho bo'i ming chung ma gsod pa chung ma gsod pa zhes bya ba chags
216b1('dul ba): nas bdag yi rgyad do//dge slong dag la nges par bsnyen bkur bya ba ni bdag gis pha'i lugs yin te/'di mi byA na gzhan su lo bsnyon bkur bya/des smras pa/grogs po de yang bden nu
216b2('dul ba): 'on kyang gdon mi za ba bu bskyed dgos te/gzhan du na rabs chad par 'gyur na ci ste gzhan gyi bu mo slong bar mi byed/des smras pa/grogs po ci phan gang la bsangs pa dri nged kyi bu mo
216b3('dul ba): ci ste bsad ces ze'o//des smos pa/grogs po gal te de ltan yugs mo dag blangs na ci nyes/des smras pa/grogaso pa bdag gis blangs na de dag kyang nga'i lus ci'i phyir yongasu

216b6('dul ba): shig dang /de'i pha yang skyo zhing 'dug pas ster bar 'gyur ro//de khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ste/des smras pa/bde legasu gyur cig/bde leg su gyur cig/khyim bdag des smras pa/ci
216b7('dul ba): zhig 'dod/'od bzangs ma'o//sbyin no//des de dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos bag mar blangs te/lde mig dang /lde mig kyog po dag byin nas/khyim gyi bdag maur bcug te smras pa/bzang
217a1('dul ba): /mo kho bo cug gi rigs kyi lugs kyis ni/smyon pa sangs rgyus dang /dge slong dag sbyin gnas yin pas khyod kyis kyang de dag la bya ba byos shig/des smras pa/

217a4('dul ba): khyim bdag de yang ri 'o ro zhig tu don zhig yod nas/des bzang mo kho bo ni ri 'or che ge mo zhig tu don cig yod de/bdag der 'gros khyod kyis yon gnas dag de bzhin du bshos

217b1('dul ba): med do snyamA nas/bud med kyi g.yo dang /bud med kyi sgyu dang /bud med kyi tshul 'chos pa glang dag yin pa de dag dge slong rnams la ston pad+ma rlom pa dang /dge slong dag gis cig la
217b2('dul ba): cig nyes dmigs byung na 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bya zhes babros pa dang /de na kha cig gis smras pa/'di la bsgrub tu ci yod/sang nas mi 'ong du zad mod/gzhan dag gis smras pa/
217b3('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa bdag cag ni bsod snyoms pa yin pas sang nas bsod snyoms la 'dod du zad mod/gzhan dag gis kyi legs kyis de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras nas/de dag phyi de
217b4('dul ba): nyin nas bsod snyoms la zhug so//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag de slar 'ongs nas 'od bzangs ma la dris pa/'od bzangs ma yon gnas dge bshis gsol tam/des
217b5('dul ba): smras pa/nyin cig byon nas de phan chad ye ma byon to//des bsams pa nges par 'dis de dag gi mdun du bud med kyi g.yo dag bstan te/bkur sti ma byas pas 'joms nas de
217b6('dul ba): dag ma 'ongs so snyam ste/de de dag gi drung du song nas yang skyon drangs pa dang /de dag gis smras pa/khyim bdag bdag cag ni bsod snyoms pa yin pas bsod snyoms la rgyu'o//des
217b7('dul ba): smras pa/'phags pa bdag gis 'tshal gyis gshegs dang /de lta bu'i nyes dmigs mi mchi'o//de dag gis khas blangs pa dang /de dag rkang pa la phyag 'tshol nas song ngo //
218a1('dul ba): dge slong dag phyi de nyin de'i khyim du 'ongs pa dang /khyim bdag des 'od bzangs ma khyim du bcug nas phyi bsgo bcad de bzhag nas/de nas de dag la rang gi lag
218a2('dul ba): dAr te/'drim par brtsams pa na/'od bzangs mo khyim gyi nang du 'dug bzhin du dge slong zan za ba de dgro la rnam par rtog pa skyes par gyur te/'phags pa che ge mo zhig
218a3('dul ba): gi rkang pa ni 'di 'di/byin pa ni 'di 'dra/baR+Sha ni 'di 'dra/rked pa dang /rtsib logs dang /rgyab dang /k+to dang /bzhin dang /so dang /mchu dang /sku dang /mig dang /'phral ba dang /
218a4('dul ba): mgo ni 'di 'dra'o zhes de de ltar rnam par rtog pa na/sa bcu pa'i 'dod chags kyi mi byung bar gyur pa rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gi shugs bod ba des sbyar bas/rdul de nyid du
218a5('dul ba): 'chi ba'i dus byaso//dge slong dge zan zos te yon bshad pa byas dong ba dang /khyim bdag des sgo phye nas smras pa/'od bzongs ma tshur shog zan za zhos byas na/de dus las
218a6('dul ba): 'das pas su zhig lan 'debs/des nang du zhugs na/ci tsam na sa la 'gyel ba mthong ngo //des bsams pa gdon ma zos par 'di gnyid kyis log gis bslang nas snyam/des
218a7('dul ba): de la sprul bar rtsams pa dang /re shig na dus las 'das par mtha nas/dongo bcum gnag cing sla bab nas/nang gi mi dag la smras pa/shes ldan dge 'dag
218b1('dul ba): ltar byung ngan pa/chung ma rin po che 'di lta bu dang bral bar gyur gyis/mdza' grogs dang /phu nu dang /gnyen dag la/'od bzangs ma dus las 'das zhes sgron cig ces byas pa dang /de
218b2('dul ba): drag gis ku tse btinA ti/kha cig ni sa la 'gyel nus ngu zhing 'dug/kha cig ni khyim bdag ngu ba'i log pa dang rkang pa nas 'dzin par byed/mdza' shes dang /phu nu dong /gnyen kha
218b3('dul ba): cig ni drad mo'i sgra 'byin par byed do//khyim bdug der dgi skye bo dang /ga shes kyi 'khor rgyu che ba zhig pas//de rnams ji srid 'du ba de'i bar du nyi ma nub nas/de dag gis gos sngon
218b4('dul ba): dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dag gis khyogasau brgyan te/bkur sti chen pos de dur khrod du khyer//re shig cig na mi rgod lnga brgyu tsam zhig ri 'or zhig tu song nas/

218b6('dul ba): 'dra bzangs ma skyel bar dur khrod du song ba rnams mi rgod de dag gis tshul ma yin par gnod pa byas na mi rung gi sbran to snyam nas de ma phyogs par song ste/skye bo'i tshogs chen
218b7('dul ba): po de la shes ldan dag mi rgod lnga brgya tsam ha cang mi ring ba zhig na 'dug gis sbron cig ces sbran pa dang /de dag gri kyang sang rim gro bya'o zhes srungs ma bzhog ste 'ad bzangs
219a1('dul ba): mdzum+b+ha spyan sna tshogs kyis klubs padang / dang nga b+hU dang /gos dang/phyim dang /gduk+ShAm+b+ha dang /sgyu mtshan dang /bdun du mas par
219a2('dul ba): byas te phyung nas bsnyal bar bzhon du bor te 'phros bslang nas grong khyer du zhug so//ji tsam na mi rgod de dag phyogs der phyin pa dang /srungs ma rnams kyang brosu so//mi rgad
219a3('dul ba): rnams kyis rab tu brgyan pa de mthong nas/mchog tu ngo mtshar skyeso//de nas 'od bzangs ma'i gos rnams bshus nas bltas pa dang /de dag gis de'i gzugs gzhon la

219a6('dul ba): kun tu sma glag so//dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas the tsom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa btsun pa khyim bdag gi mchis brong 'od bzangs
219a7('dul ba): mas las ci zhig bgyis na/las de'i rnam por smin pas 'od dang ldan par gyur cing /btsas ma thag tu khyim thams cad 'od kyis srung bar bgyis pa dang /gul nas kyang
219b1('dul ba): mi rgad lnga brgyas kar shu pa na lnga brgya stsal nas dga' dgur spyad lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khyim bdag gi chung ma 'od bzangs ma nyid kyis las/

219b3('dul ba): gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur/dge slong dag las byas shing bsagras pa rnams ni phyi'i sa'i khrims la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams la ma yin/me'i khams

219b7('dul ba): skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/bA re ne se'i grong khyer na/nye bar rten cing drang srong spro bar
220a1('dul ba): /dgas kyi nags na bzhug so//de'i tshe de'i dus na/bA ra na so'i grong khyer na rgyal po kri kau zhes bya ba rgyal srid byeng du 'jug s+ho//rgyal srid 'byor pa dang /

220a3('dul ba): dang ba lang dang /ma he phun sum tshogs pa/chos kyis rgyal pos chos bzhin byed du 'jug/ji tsam na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa

220a7('dul ba): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten la dad pa skyes nas srog shing la me long btags pa gang yin pa'i tshong dpon gyi bu mo de ni khyim bdag gi chung

220b2('dul ba): pase 'od dang ldan bzhin du skye la/skyes ma thag tu yang khyim thams cad de 'od kyis snang bar gyur pa yin//gang yang shi nas skyes bu lnga brgyas kar sha pa nA lnga brgya byin nas/

220b6('dul ba): mo zhes bya ba/gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa/blta na sdug pa skyes pa'i yid du 'ong gi snron rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi zhang pos yongasu spyad pa zhig 'dug//re zhig

221b1('dul ba): cig dga' dgur spyad par gyur na/bdag gi gnas skabs ci 'dra bar 'gyur/khyod kyis sngon bdag yongasu bzung bas de'i slad du khyod kyis bdag de dag las yongasu bskyab pa'i rigaso zhes smos shig/

222a1('dul ba): gnas 'di lta bu la byA ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag gzugs kyis 'chi ba la tha na shin yang /R+Sha sha pa nu lnga brgya byin nas dga' dgur spyod par/

223a1('dul ba): glan pa'i dus ni 'di yin no snyam nus des blangs te/rgyal po gzugs can snying po steng na khang bzangs kyi steng na grwa nyid kyis ldog pa'i steng du boro//

224b1('dul ba): 'ongs nas/dge slong rnams la 'phags pa bdag nad 'di lta bu dang 'di lta bus thibs na/bdag gis g.yar zas nI ji lta bu zhig 'tshal bar bgyi/sman ni dzi lta bu ni bla dadu/

224b7('dul ba): kyang mnyan yod du 'ong so//bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /ko se la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /btsun mo phreng ldan
225a1('dul ba): nga /sa sa byung tshus ma dang /byam nga rmang shA rnye ba dang /nga gas 'don bloms pa du/na smra

225a4('dul ba): dga' ba de dag gang gi tshe sems 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas bkris par gyur pa Sh+Ti tshe/bud med gang dag rgyu rol du don gnyi du seng ba khye cha lugasu bdag

225a6('dul ba): gli dang smras mi sdug par skyes/kha T+wA~M gra ni nag la mog dem d+hA/ cig ni mgo che ngas chung ni mig sa /kha cig ni skye ljang khrug//da
225a7('dul ba): de dag gis mthong ba dang spongs nas/khyim gyi bar dang /tshang tshang gi phyogs dag tu bor ba dang /de dag mi ma yin pa'i mdangs kyis thos par byed//khe cig nim
225b1('dul ba): gzugs su mi gsal bar skyes zhing /gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe 'gyur ba ston par byed//de dag kyang mas lam po che'i khar bor ba dang /de yang mi ma yin pa'i madrangs
225b2('dul ba): kyis gso bar byed//dug sngo rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni de dag ji snyed rab tu 'byin/bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa de dag dang ji srid du gnas ngan len kun tu spyod par mi
225b3('dul ba): shes pa de srid du lhan cig ginaso//gang gi tshe yongs su shes pa de'i tshe rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong dag dang lhan cig tu gnas te/gzhan du ni ston pa'i bkas
225b4('dul ba): dus gsum du blta ru 'gro'o//re shig na tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' lnga gro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/mnyan yod bsod snyos lo zhugs//de bsod snyos la rgyu na
225b5('dul ba): dran sgra ljang khu tsan zhig mthong nas des bsams pa/'di ni lhung bzed nag po can dag gis phrogs par mi 'gyur bas/gal te rab tu byung na 'di rab tu dbyung ngo snyams tu
225b6('dul ba): bsems nas de'i drung du song ste dris pa/bzhin bzungs khyod su ri/des smras pa/'phags pa bdag la su yeng ga las mchis/bdag mgon med pa zhig lagaso//
225b7('dul ba): des smras pa/bzhi ni bzangs gal te/de lta na ci'i phyir rab tu ma 'byung /des smras pa/'phags pa skra ljang khu can bdag su zhig rab tu 'byin//bzhin bzangs bac+doMs
226a1('dul ba): de/kyi bstan pa ni snying rjes rab tu phye ba yin pas/gal te sus kyang rab tu mu phyung na/tshur shog ngas rab tu dbyung gis 'dod zhes byas pa dang /de/
226a2('dul ba): yid bde ba skyes te rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas des de rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas//de nas nyin zhag mi mang ba zhig tu kun tu spyad par bya ba'i chos rnams bslabs
226a3('dul ba): te bsgo ba/bzhin bzangs ri dgas kyis ri dgras mi sos kyis/mnyan yod rang gi spyod yul yangs pa yang yin la pha'i yul yang yin pas/slongs mo la rgyu bas
226a4('dul ba): 'tsho bar gyis shig/de mi dga' nas phyi de nyin sta gro shams thabs bgos/chaso gos dang lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs//re shig
226a5('dul ba): ni bud med cig bsod snyoms khyer te phyir byung la/des de mthong ba dang drang brdungs nas smras pa/'phags pa khyod skra ljang khu can+da ni sus rab tu phyung na des smras pa/
226a6('dul ba): sring mo mkhan po nye dgas snying rjes bdag rab tu byung //des smras pa/gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa de ma yin pa gzhan su zhig/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa
226a7('dul ba): kun nas mdzes pa sun par byed ces byas pa dang /gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du 'phya ste/mdod pa kha zer ba rnams srang dang /bzhi mdo dang /sum mdo dag tu dge/
226b1('dul ba): sbyong shAkya'i bu pa rnams kyi dge slong gi tshul ni tshi go/tshangs pa'i tshul yang tshig ste/dra ni skra ljang khu can dag kyang rab tu 'byin to zhes mi snyan pa smra ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams
226b2('dul ba): kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/nyes dmigs geng cung zad byung ba ni/dge slong rnams de lta bu dag kyang rab tu 'byin pa las
226b3('dul ba): gyur gyis/de'i phyir dge slong gis de lta bu dgra rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o snyam du mkhyen nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dge bram ze dag khyi mo bdag rnam
226b4('dul ba): 'phya ba ni thog tu bab po//de lte bas na dge slong gis 'khor sun par byed pa'i 'khor nye bar bzhag par mi bya'o//dge slong gis sun par byed pa'i 'khor nye bar bzhag na
226b5('dul ba): 'gal che bas can du 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gos 'khor sun par byed pa'i 'khor nye bar gzhag par mi bya'o zhes bka' sprul pa dang /dge slong rnams
226b6('dul ba): kyis 'khor gyis 'khor sun par byed pa ji lta bu ma shes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bko' stsal pa/dge slong dag 'khor gyis 'khor sun par byed pa ni rgyu gnyis kyis
226b7('dul ba): gang dag gis she na/rigs dang mtshan mas so//de la rigs kyis ni rigs gang yang rung bas te/ma rabs dman pa phongs pa/kos thag pa/bkrin pa/bza' ba dang /
227a1('dul ba): btung ba chen po mi bdog pa/de lta bu'i ri dgas las so sor skyes par gyur pa de dag dge slong rnams rab tu 'byin par byed na/de lta bu'i ni rigs kyis yin///
227a2('dul ba): mtshan mas ji lta bu zhe na/skra ser dang ni skra ljang khu//de bzhin du ni skra dmor ba dang //mi rnams sgra ni dkar ba dang //glang chen sku dang skra med pa//de lta bu yi min/
227a3('dul ba): dag ni//drang srong chen pos spangs pa yin//'ber 'bum mgo dang glang po che//mag spyang dang ni mgo le ba dang //bong bu phag ga~M mgo dang ni//mi gang mA ga ni
227a4('dul ba): gnyis yod pa//de lta bu yi mi dag ni//drang srong chen pos spangs pa yin//glang po'i rna dang rta rna dang //ba lang rna dang spre'u rna dang //bong bu phag gi rna ba dang //
227a5('dul ba): rna gaTIg dang ni rna med pa//de lta bu yi mri dgra ni//drang srong chen posra spangasra pa yin//mig dmar ha cang mig che dang //mi ga chu mig ha cang ser//shel mig
227a6('dul ba): dang ni mig 'bur dang //mig gcig dang ni mig med dang //dri lta bu yi mi dgu ni//drang srong chen pos spangs pa yin//glang pos sna dang rta sna dang //ba lang dang ni
227a7('dul ba): spre'u sna dang //bong bu phag gi sna dag dang //sna sbubs gcig dang sna med pa//de lta bu yi'i mi dag ni//drang srong chen pos spangs pa yin//rta dang glang chen
227b1('dul ba): kos sgo dang //byA lang spre'u yi kos sgo dang //bong bu phagA gI kaus sgra dang //ko smai gcig pa dang kos med pa//de lta bu yI'i mI dag ni//drang srong chen pos spangs pa yin//
227b2('dul ba): glang chen po dang sod /ba lang spre'u so dang ni//bong bu phag gi so dag dang //so gcig pa dang so med pa//de lta bu yi'i mi dag ni//drang srong chen pos spangs pa yin//
227b3('dul ba): mjing bu thung dang ske rings dang //phrag mig dang ni sgur po dang //mtshan rdum dang rlig drug dang //rlig gcig dang ni rlig med dang //de lta bu yi'i mi dag ni//drang srong chen
227b4('dul ba): pos sbyangs pa yin//ha cang ring dang ha cang thung //skem dang ngal skyen he cang tsho//she mdog kha dog bzhi pa dang //gyol po grub po so sto ba//de lta bu yi'i mi dag ni//
227b5('dul ba): drang srong chen pos spangs pa yin//lag rdum dang ni rkang rdum dang //lag sor rdum po 'jas pa dang //mchu med lus ni ri mo can//ha cang rgan dang ha cang gzhon//de
227b6('dul ba): lte bu yi'i mi dag ni//drang srong chen pos spangs pa yin//theng po smad 'tshal zha ru ba dang //sor rdum rgur po mi'u thung dang //lba ba can dang lkugs pa dang //'on pa rten 'phye
227b7('dul ba): rkang bam pa//de lta bu yi'i mi dag ni//drang srong chen pos spangs pa yin//mdze can 'bras can phol mig can//gta' gam shu ba g.yan pa dang //nad ni gzhan can tha~Md
228a1('dul ba): rgyung //drang skyong rgyun pos smrangs pa yin// med la ma da dUr gyis dubya//s+yA zamasmug ga/gam dang //de dag dang gnan/
228a2('dul ba): yan lag nyams//de kun 'gror kun 'byon pa yin//mdzes pa rab tu dbyung ba dang /yongs su dag pa bsnyen rdzogs pa//rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rab mkhyen te//bden pa'i
228a3('dul ba): mtshan gyis bka' stsal to//nye dgas sgra ljang khu can de'i sgra dag kyang gar mkhan gyi lag tu btsongs pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
228a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta bas na dge slong gis sgra btso ngas par mi bya'o//byed na nyes pa sbom por 'gyuraro//sdom la bran can dang ni skyong ba dang /
228a5('dul ba): gleng gzhi dang ni zhu ba dang //cho 'phrul cha dang snyun ldan dang //dmigs kun dang ni srin bu ri//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
228a6('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ri ba na bzhugs so//tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyi dge tshul gnyis po byan can dang skyong ba ste/de dag pan tshun gta mu 'dus pa/
228a7('dul ba): phengs par smra ba/spros 'drin 'grogs bshes yin no//de gnyis las gcig gis khyad bsnyen por rdzozhus shig dang /nges mkhan po dang khyod kyi rim gro bya'o zhes
228b1('dul ba): smras pa dang /gcig shos kyis de kho na btsun du smras te//dro dag phan tshun spangs byed pas gnyi ga yang bsnyen par ma rdzogs par gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor bcom ldan
228b2('dul ba): 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogs gcig du 'dug nas/tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis bcom ldan
228b3('dul ba): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa mkhan po gcig dang /slob dpon gcig dang /gsol ba'i lngas gcig gnyis gnyen par rdzogs su rung lags sam/nye bar
228b4('dul ba): 'khor rung //de gnyis gang rgan lags/gang yang ma yin//btsun pa mkhan po gcig dang /slob dpon gcig dang /gsol ba'i las gcig gis gsum bsnyen par rdzogs
228b5('dul ba): rdat+pa lags sam/nye bar 'khor rung //de dag las gang rgan pa lags/gang yang ma yin//btsun pa mkhan po gcig dang /slob dpon gcig dang /gsol ba'i las gcig
228b6('dul ba): gis bzhi bsnyen par rdzogs su rung lags sam/nye bar 'khor mi rung //de ci'i phyir zhe na/nye bar 'khor tshogs kyis tshogs kyi las dag mi bya bas/dge 'dun gyis dag
228b7('dul ba): 'dun bsnyen par rdzogs par 'gal te/dge 'dun gyis dge 'dun bsnyen par rdzogs par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro//de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis de
229a1('dul ba): de gnyis gsol pa'i las gcig gis bsnyen par rdzogs par byas pa dang /de gnyis gdul phyag bya ba dang /las su dz+r-IM wAr bsko bar bya ba dang /
229a2('dul ba): rnyed pa ji ltar blang ba mi shas+t+ra pA'i skabs de/tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dI ga nyi
229a3('dul ba): kyis gcig la cig phyag ni mi bya'o//rnyed pa ni gang ster 'ongs pas blang bar bya'o//phyis 'ongs pa de ni sngar la su bsko zhing rnyed pa phyis sbyin par bya'o//gling gzhi na
229a4('dul ba): mnyan yod na'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/btsun pa me 'ongs de'i dus na dge slong dran pa nyams ga/da ni bzhin pa dag
229a5('dul ba): 'byung ste de dag gis gnas dang /grong dang /grong rdal gang dang gang du mdo sde gang bshad pa dang /bslab pa'i gzhi gang bcas pa ma 'chal bar gyur ni/de dag gis rdzi
229a6('dul ba): ltar bsgrub par bgyi/gzhan yang mdo sde dang /'dul ba dang /chos mngon pa bskyed par 'gyur na/de dag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/gzhan yang rgyal po dang /khyim
229a7('dul ba): bdag dang /dge bsnyen rnams kyi sngon gyi bka' mchid dag la gnas dang /rgyal po dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /khyim bdag dang /dge bsnyen rnams
229b1('dul ba): kyis ming bskyed par 'gyur na de dag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nye bar 'khor gang gis gnas la sogs pa'i ming brjed par gyur pa
229b2('dul ba): de dag gis grong khyer chen po drug las gang rung po 'am/yang na de bzhin gshegs pa gang du lan mang du bzhugs pa brjod par bya'o//ji ste rgyal po'i ming brjed nA ni gas
229b3('dul ba): rgyalo//khyim bdag gi ming ni mgon med zas sbyin no//dge bsnyen ma ni ri dgas sgra'i ma sa gA'o//sngon gyis gtam gyi gnas ni bA ra na se'o//rgyal po ni tshangs sbyin//khyim bad
229b4('dul ba): ni khyim bdag sdums byed//dge bsnyen ma ni khyim bdag gso sbyong skyes kyi chung ma brjed par bya'o//mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang chos mngon pa rnams brjed par 'gyur na/glags bu
229b5('dul ba): l-i bris nas bcang bar bya ste 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba'i khab 'ad ma'i che la bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugaso//sangs rgyas bac+doMs
229b6('dul ba): rgyal po dang /blon po dang /bram ze dang /khyim bdag dang /grong mi dang /ljongs kyi mi dang /phyug po dang /tshong dpon dang /dad dpon rnams kyis rim gror byas/bla mar byes/
229b7('dul ba): phu dud du byas/mchod pa byas pas/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos yis dang /bsod snyoms dang /gzims cha dang /snyun gsos kyi rkyen sman dang /yo byad rnams kyang
230a1('dul ba): brnyas//mu stegs rnams ni rgyal po dang /blon po dang /bram ze dang /khyim bdag dang /grong mi dang /ljongs kyi mi dang /phyug po dang /tshong dpon dang /
230a2('dul ba): ded dben rnams kyis rim gror ma byas bla mar ma byas/phu dud du ma byas/mchod pa ma byas pas/tshes gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /mal bstan dang /nad kyi gsos
230a3('dul ba): kyi rkyen sman dang /yo byas rnams kyang ma rnyed par gyur to//de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du bdag gis yun ring mo nas dge sbyong go'u ta ma la rnam par tho tsam pa glags
230a4('dul ba): ma rnyed kyis/ma lo dag gis mu stegs can rnams la tho btsam mo snyamo//de'i tshe rdzogs byed la sogs pa ston pa drug pa thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin par thams
230a5('dul ba): cad mkhyen par nga rgyal byed pa rnams rgyal po'i khab rten cing 'khod//de nas bdud sdig can gyis bdag nyid rdzogs byed kyi cha byad du mngon par sprul nas/kun tu rgyu
230a6('dul ba): gnag ltos kyi bu ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /kun tu rgyu gnas ltas kyi bu'i mdun du 'bar ba dang /snang ba dang /char 'bab pa dang /glog 'gyu ba'i cho 'phrul dag
230a7('dul ba): bstan pa dang /kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bus smras pa/rdzogs byed khyod kyis 'di lta bu'i yon tan gyi tshigs rnams thob pa ma/tho bo//de bzhin du smra 'dod kyi bu ma'i
230b1('dul ba): bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang /mi 'pham sgra'i la ba can dang /ka t+yA'i bu nog can dang /gnyen gyi bu gAcer bu'i mdun du 'byar ba dang /snang ba dang /char 'bab pa dang /glog
230b2('dul ba): 'gyu ba'i cho 'phrul rnams bstan pa dang /des kyang smras pa/rdzogs byed khyad kyis 'di lta bu'i yon tan gyi cho rnaMs thob bam/thob po//de bzhin du bdag nyid kun tu rgyu gnag
230b3('dul ba): lhas kyi bu'i cha byed du mngon par sprul nas/thams cad kyi drung du song nas 'di lta bu'i yon tan gyi tshogs rnams khyod kyis thob par/thob po zhes bya ba'i bar snga mo bzhi no//
230b4('dul ba): de bzhin du bdog nyid mi 'pham sgo'i la ba can du mngon par sprul nas/thams cad kyi drung du song nas 'di lta bu'i ston gyi tshogs rnams khyod kyis thob bam/thob po zhes bya
230b5('dul ba): ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no//de bzhin du bdag nyid sgra 'dod kyi bu yang dag rgyal ba can gyi tshe byad du mngon par sprul nas/thams cad kyi drung du song nas zhes bya ba'i bar snga mo
230b6('dul ba): bzhin no//de bzhin du bdag nyid ka t+ya'i phu nog can gyi cha byad du mngon par sprul nas/thams cad kyi drung du song nas zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhi no//de bzhin du bdag nyid gcer
230b7('dul ba): dra ba gnyen gyi bu'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas/tham cad kyi drung du song nas zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin te/de rnams so so nas bsams pa/bdag gci ga bu ma gtog
231a1('dul ba): //pa 'di dag thams cad niHbu chub/rdzu 'phrul che'o snyamo//de nas dus gzhan zhig na rdzogs byed la sogs pa ston pa drug po rnams rtog khang
231a2('dul ba): du 'dus shing 'khod pa nu/bar skabs kyi gtam 'di lta bu dge gling ste/shes ldan dag sngon ni bdag cag rgyal po dang /blon po dang /bram ze dang /khyim bdag dang /
231a3('dul ba): grong mi dang /ljongs kyi mi dang /phyug po dang /tshong dpon dang /ded dpon rnams kyis bkur bstir byas/ri mor byas/mchod pa byas pas/chos gos dang /bsod snyom
231a4('dul ba): dadeng /mal stan dang /na ba'i rkyen sman dang na yo byad rnams kyang rnyed par gyur to//da ni bdag cag la bkur bstir mau byed/ri myor mi byed/bla mar mi byed/mchod par mi
231a5('dul ba): byed ces bya ba nis/chos gos dang /bsod snyoms dong /mal bstan dang /na ba'i bsos rkyen sman dang /yo byad rnams mi rnyed do zhes bya ba'i bar snga mo bzhin no//shes
231a6('dul ba): ldan ngag dge sbyong go'u ta ma de ni bkur sti byas/ri mo byas shes bya ba nas/dge sbyong go'u ta mas ni chos gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /mal stan dang /nad gsos kyi
231a7('dul ba): rkyen sman dang /yo byad rnams kyang rnyed zhes bya ba'i bar sdo ma bzhin no//shes ldan dag de lta bas na/bdag cag gis dge sbyong gau ta ma'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi
231b1('dul ba): cho 'phrul la dgugs par bya zhing gal te/dge sbyong go'u ta mas mI'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gcig bstan na//bdag cag gis gnyis/dge sbyong go'u ta mas gnyis
231b2('dul ba): na bdag gis bzhi/dge sbyong go'u ta mas bzhin bdag cag gis brgyad/dge sbyong gau ta mas brgyad ni bdag gis bcu drug/dge sbyong go'u ta mas bcu drug na bdag gis/
231b3('dul ba): sum cu rtsa gnyis te/dge sbyong gor+ya ta mas mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul ji snyed bstan pa las bdag cag gis mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi chos 'phrul nyis 'gyur sum
231b4('dul ba): 'gyur du bstan par bya'o//de nas rdzogs byed la sogs pa ston pa drug po rnams rgyal po gzugs can snying po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/rgyal po gzugs can snying po
231b5('dul ba): la/rgyal ba dang /tshe spel ba byas nas 'di skad ces smraso//lha bdug cag ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ye shes can du smra ba lags/dge sbyong gau'u ta ma yang bdag nyid rdzu
231b6('dul ba): 'phrul dang ldan pa/ye shes can du smra ba lags par sems na/de'i slad du shes dang ldan par smra ba dang ye shes dang ldan par smra ba lhan cig tu mI'i chos bla mi'i
231b7('dul ba): rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul bstan par stsal ba'i rigs//gal te dge sbyong go'u te mas mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gcig bstan na bdag cag gis gnyis shes
232a1('dul ba): bya ba nas/bdag cag gis mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul nyis 'gyur sum 'gyur tu bstan par bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhi no//dge snang
232a2('dul ba): gau ta ma yang shul gyi phyed du dgug du gsol/bdag cag kyang shul gyi phyed du mchi'o//de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos rdzogs
232a3('dul ba): byed la sogs pa ston po drug po rnams la 'di skad ces smraso//kye ro dang 'dri ba khyed kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das mi'i chos bla mo'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la dgug gi
232a4('dul ba): rgyal pos de skad ces smras pa dang /de dag dong //ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ma ga d+hi'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste/bcom ldan
232a5('dul ba): ldan 'das la blta ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba dang /de dag de'i lam khar song nas/rgyal po la rgyal ba dang /tshe sgril
232a6('dul ba): be byas nas 'di skad ces smraso//lha bdog cag ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa ye shes can du smra ba lags zhes bya ba nas/mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul nyis
232a7('dul ba): gyur sum gyur tu bstan par bgyis na/dge sbyong go'u ta ma shul gyi phyed dag du dgug par gsol/bdag cag kyang shul gyi phyed du mchi'o zhes bya ba'i bar
232b1('dul ba): snga ma bzhi no//rgyal pos smras pa/kyo 'di'i tshe ni dor zad/gal to khyed don 'di lan gsum gyi bar du zor na khyod spyug s+yA to btA zhes des de dag thag bcug pa/slar so
232b2('dul ba): rang gi gnasu phyin pa dang /yang blod pa shes ldan dag ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po ni dge sbyong gr-i ta ma'i phyogs byed pas/mnyan yod na ki sA la
232b3('dul ba): rgyal po gsal rgyal gzu bo lta bu zhes yod ces grag gis/gang gi tshe dge sbyong go'u ta ma mnyan yod du 'ongs po 'dri tshe//bdag cag gis dge sbyong go'u ta ma mi'i chos
232b4('dul ba): bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la dgug par bya'o//ci tsam du gzhan zhig na ba com ldan 'das rgyal po'i khebs tu ji srid dgyes kyi bar du bzhugs nas mnyan yod gang
232b5('dul ba): na bar ldengs rgyu zhing gshog so//rim gyis ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las mnyan yid du byon nas/mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
232b6('dul ba): gyi kun draga' ri ba na bzhugaso//de nas rdzogs byed la sogs pa ston pa drug po rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes shing mnyan yod du dongo //de nas rim gyis mnyan
232b7('dul ba): yod du phyin pa dang /de dag lam gyis dub pa ngo la bso nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la rgyal
233a1('dul ba): ba dang cha spel ba byas nas smras pa/lha bdag rtag ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/yas can du smra ba lags/dge sbyong gau ta ma yang bdag nyid
233a2('dul ba): 'phrul dang ldan pa ye shes can du smra ba~M lags par sems na/de'i sma du yi shrIs can du skye ba dang /ye shes can du smra bi lhan cig mu'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul rgyu
233a3('dul ba): 'phrul ston du stsal pa'i rigs//gal te dge sbyong go'u ta mas mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gcig bstan ni bdag cag gis gnyis/dge sbyong go'u tu
233a4('dul ba): mus gnyis na bdag cag gi sra bzhi/dge sbyong go& ta mas bzhi na/bdag cag+na gau sa brgyad/dge sbyong gro'u ta mas brgyad na bdag cag gis bcu drug/dge sbyong
233a5('dul ba): gau ta mas bcu drug na bdag gis sum cu rtsa gnyis te/dge sbyong glo'u ta mes mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ji snyed bstan pa las/bdag cag gros nyes gyur/
233a6('dul ba): sum gyur tu mi chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan par bgyis/dge sbyong go'u ta ma shul gyi phyed du dgug tu gsol/bdag cag kyang shul gyi phye du mi che'o//
233a7('dul ba): ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis smras pa/shes ldan dag gal te de lta na bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus te byas/re shig sdod cig/de rnams kyis//
233b1('dul ba): rmus pa/lha legs kyis de ltar mdza du gsol/sdod//de nas yul kau sal+li rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
233b2('dul ba): mgo bos 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das la ko sa le'i rgyal po gsapa rgyal gyis 'di skyed ces gsol to//btsun pa mu
233b3('dul ba): ste can de rnams bcom ldan 'das mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la spyan 'dren ni/de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyis cho 'phrul bstan du
233b4('dul ba): gsol/mu stegs can rnams thag stsal tu gsam/lha dang mi rnams dga' bar mgyir gsol/skyes bu drim pa rnams glo ba rangs par 'gyor gle sol/de skad ces gsol
233b5('dul ba): pa dngabacom ldan 'das kyis ko sro la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rgyal po chen po nga ni nyan thos rnams la 'di skad du dge slong dag khyad
233b6('dul ba): tshur/bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing 'ongs pa rnams la mI'i chos bla ma'i ya rA phul gyi cho 'phrul ston cig ces chos ston par mi byed kyi/'on kyang nga ni nyan thos rnams lo
233b7('dul ba): 'di skad du dge slong dag dge ba ni ma spyoms shig/sdig pa ni shogs te gnas shig ces chos ston to//ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis lan gnyis lan gsum
234a1('dul ba): kyi bar du bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa mu stegs can de rnams bcom ldan 'das mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul gyi spyan//
234a2('dul ba): 'dren na/de'i sgra du bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'drul bstan du gsol/mu stegs can rnams thag stsal tu gsol lha dang mi rnams dang
234a3('dul ba): brla bgyir gsol/skye bo dam pa rnams glo ba rangs par bgyir gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du
234a4('dul ba): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rgyal po chen po nga ni nyan thos rnams la 'di skad du dge slong dag khyed tshur/bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing 'ongs pa rnams la/
234a5('dul ba): mI'i'o chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ston cig ces chos ston par mi byed kyi/'on kyang nga ni nyan thos rnams la 'di skad du dge slong dag dge ba ni mi spyoms
234a6('dul ba): shig/sdig da ni shogs shig ginos shig ces chos ston to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis nges par mdzad pa ni lnga yin te/lha gang zhe na//
234a7('dul ba): snga phyi med pa'i semra can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par mdzad pa dang /nyan thos dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa/rgyal tsha
234b1('dul ba): tu dbang bkur bas dbang bkur bar mdzad pa dang /yab dang yum bden pa la 'god par mdzad pa dang /mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa mdzad pa dang /sangs rgyas kyis gdul bar
234b2('dul ba): bya ba thams cad 'dul ba'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis cho 'phrul chen po gdu bstan ces dgongs na mnyan yod du yin par gzigs so//yang
234b3('dul ba): skye bo'i tshogs chen pos dus ji tsam na khong du chud par 'gyur zhes dgongs na/zhag bdun lon nas 'gyur bar mkhyen nas/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces bka'
234b4('dul ba): stsol to//rgyal po chen po song la de bzhin byas ci rigs par sgrubs shig ces bgyis shig/bcom ldan 'das dus ji tsam na/rgyal po chen po zhag bdun na'o//de nas ko sa la'i
234b5('dul ba): rgyal po gsol rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ste/mu stegs can rnams la smras pa/kye bcom ldan 'dra
234b6('dul ba): ni zhag bdun na rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po ston par mdzad kyis/khyed cag gis bya zhing bshams dogs pa ci yod pa de gyis shig/mu stegs can rnams kyis bgros pa shes/
234b7('dul ba): ldan dag yang na ni dge sbyong gau ta mi 'bros par 'gyur ro//yang na ni grogs tshol bar 'gyur na de la ji ltar bsgrub/de dag 'di skad ces kyi dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni gdon mi za bar
235a1('dul ba): tshol bar 'gyur bas ji ste de ltar gyur na/bdag cag gis kyang grogs btsal//de'i tshe ko sha'i grong khyer na kun tu rgyu shin tu bzangs po zhes bya ba rgyus
235a2('dul ba): pa 'khogs pa/gtugs pa/ku sha'i grong khyer gyi gyad rnams kyis dgra bcom par bkur zhing /rim gro byas/bkur sti byas/bla mar byas/mchod par byas pa zhig 'dugo//de rnam
235a3('dul ba): kyi gros bcag nas de'i drung du song ste smras pa/shin tu bzang po khyod dang bdag cag tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin te/bdag cag gis dge sbyong go'u ta mA me'i chos
235a4('dul ba): bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul la bos kyis brags gyis shig/des smras pa/kye khyod kyis dge sbyong go'u ta mA mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la bos pa ni ma legs pa zhig byas//
235a5('dul ba): de ci'i phyir zhe na de ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin//ji ltar shos/'thad pa la so//'di la gtan tshigs ci yod/shes ldan dag gang gi tshe/dge sbyong gau ta mi 'jig
235a6('dul ba): rten du ma byung ba de'i tshe/kho bo dral gyis 'bab pa zhes bya ba'i mtsho 'gram na/nyin mo gnas shing kho bo'i bsod snyoms blang nas/mtsho chen po mo dros par song ste/
235a7('dul ba): za'o//de ni kho bo phyogs gcig na 'dug pa la ma dos po na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis chu bcus shing sbyin par byed//gang gi tshe dge sbyong gau ta ma 'jig rten tu byu
235b1('dul ba): ba de'i tshe/de'i nyan thos kyi mchog shA ri'i bu zhes bya ba de'i dge sbyong skul byed ces bya ba des/phyag dar khrid pa khyer nus mtsho chen po ma dros par 'ongs pa dang /ma dros pa
235b2('dul ba): na gnas pa'i lha de rnams de'i phyag dar khrod pa de dag bkrus nas 'bul b.ro byed la/bkrus pa'i'o chu des kyang bdog nyid kyi mgo bor 'debs par byed//de lta bas na bdag cag
235b3('dul ba): gang gi yang slob dben dang yang mi mnyam pa de khyad kyis mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la bos pa ni ma legs pa byas//de rnams phan tshun du kyai 'di yang de'i phyogs
235b4('dul ba): shig yin pas/bdag cag gzhan tshol du dong zhes smras nas/de rnams kyis de la g.yo'i kun tu spyod pas/bkur sti bya ba ltar byas te dong nas/saM phyogs dben pa gzhan
235b5('dul ba): zhig tu 'dus nas bgros pa/kye bdag cag gis grogs gzhan ji ltar btsal bar bya smros shig/de las kha cig gis smras pa/grong khyer bskyed mos tshal gyi nags shes
235b6('dul ba): bya ba na/lnga mngon par shes pa che ge mo zhig gnas pas de'i gan du dong dang /des bdag gi grogs byed par 'gyu ro/kha cig gis \u0f88\u0f90k+Sha pa/des mi nus kyi 'on kyang dka'
235b7('dul ba): thub kyi nags tshal che ge mo zhes bya ba na/dka' thub can lnga mngon par shes pa che ge mo zhes bya ba gnas pa de'i drung du dong na de dag gis grogs byed par 'gyu ro//de'i tshe
236a1('dul ba): gangs ri'i sul shing sna tshogs kyi nags tshal gyis brgyan pa/chu mig dang /me tog dang /'bras bu dang /rtsa baphun sum tshogs pa 'bab chu dang chu
236a2('dul ba): 'us mdzes par byas pa na/drang srong lnga brgya cim zhig gnas te phal cher mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'o//de'i nang nas drang srong mngon par shes pa lha dang ldan pa gcig
236a3('dul ba): grong khyer gyi nye 'khor du 'ongs nas/de ban tshun 'phyan pa las/de rnams kyi drung du 'ongs pa dang /de rnams kyis de la byon pa leg so zhes bya ba kun tu skyed nas khyod gang na
236a4('dul ba): 'dir 'ongs shes dris pa dang /des ji ltar gyur pa rnams brjod//de rnams yid bde ba skyes nas de dag gi drung du song //de nas phan tshun yang dag par dga' bar byas nas
236a5('dul ba): lam gyis dub pa ngal bso ste/kye khyed dang bdag cag tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin to//bdag cag gis dge sbyong go'u ta ma mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul
236a6('dul ba): la bos na/khyod kyis kyang grogs gyis shig/de dag gis smras pa/kye legs te de bzhin du bya na 'on kyang ded la mtshan ma ston cig/de rnams yod bde ba smras
236a7('dul ba): nas/de dag lo gus par smra bas mgu bar byas te dang //re shig na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi mas dbyen gyi nu bu gzhon nu nag gu zhes bya ba de dri dang me tog gi
236b1('dul ba): phreng byas brgyan+da nas/rgyal po'i pho brang gi drung na mar song ba las/de'i btsun mo zhig khang bzangs kyi thog nas mye tog gi phreng ba bor ba dang /de'i lus la phog pa gzhan zhig gis
236b2('dul ba): mthong //'jig rten ni mdza' ba dang /mi mdza' ba dang /tha mal pa yin pas des kyang blon po la byas so//blon pos kyang rgyal po la lha rgyal bu gzhon nu nag gu ni lha'i btsun
236b3('dul ba): mo dang 'khri'o zhes gsol to//rgyal po rnams ni ma brtags par byed pa yin pas/de blon po rnams la shes ldan dag ngas rgyal bu gzho nu nag gu yongs su btang gis//
236b4('dul ba): deng la rkang lag med par gyis shig ces bsgo ba dang /de dag gis ji srang du khrid nas rkang lag med par byas te bzhag nas/de gnyen mgu mchims gang ba rnams dang /skye
236b5('dul ba): bo'i tshogs gzhan dag kyang yongs su bskor cing 'dug/ji tsam na mu stegs can rnams kyang phyogs der 'ongs pa dang /de dag la de'i gnyen rnams kyis 'phags pa
236b6('dul ba): rgyal bu gzhon nu nag gu'i yan lag dang nying lag ngag ji ltar snga ma kho bzhin du 'gyur ba'i bden pa'i tshig mdza du gsol zhes smras pa dang /de dag spobs pa med nas/cad
236b7('dul ba): mi zer bar langs te/ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bsod snyoms la rgyu ba las phyogs der phyin pa dang /de dag gis de la smras pa/'phags pa rgyal bu gzhon
237a1('dul ba): nu nag gu yan lag dang nying lag dag ji ltar snga ma lo bzhin du 'gyur bar bden pa'i tshig mdza du gsol/des smras pa/shes ldan dag bcom ldan
237a2('dul ba): 'das la zhus te 'ongs zhes byas pa dang /de dag 'di ni sos zin to zhes dbugs phyin par gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bor nges pa rings par mnyan yod du
237a3('dul ba): song ste/bsod snyoms bzhag nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/skabs de bcom ldan 'das la rgya cher gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
237a4('dul ba): kun dga' bo song waM rgyal bu gzhonu nag gu'i gnyen gyis yan log dang nying lag dag gnas ji lta ba bzhin du 'jog tu chug la/bden pa'i tshig 'di ltar gyis shig/bden/
237a5('dul ba): pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis sems can rkang pa med pa dang /rkang gnyis dang /rkang bzhi dang /rkang mangs dang /gzugs can dang /gzugs med pa dang /'du shes
237a6('dul ba): yod pa dang /'du shes med pa dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min gang su yang rung ba de dag gi nang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
237a7('dul ba): pa'i sangs rgyas mchog tu gsungs pa dang /'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos gang ci yang rung ba de dag gi nang na/'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos mchog tu
237b1('dul ba): gsungs pa dang /'dus pa 'am/mang po 'am/tshogs pa 'am/'khor gang su yang rung ba de dag gis rlung na/de bzhin ga shugs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mchog tu gsungadra//
237b2('dul ba): pa dang /tshul khrims dang /brtul zhugs dang /dka' thub dang /tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag gi nang na/'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims
237b3('dul ba): mchog tu gsungs pa'i bden pa dang /bden pa'i tshig 'dis rgyal bu bzhon nag gru'i yan lag dang /nyid lag sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur cig ces byos shig dang /snga mkho
237b4('dul ba): bzhin du 'gyur ro//tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/de'i gnyen rnams kyis yan lag dang /nying lag gnas
237b5('dul ba): ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag nas/'di ltar bden pa'i chog bya bar brtsams te/bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gis sems can rkang pa med pa dang //zhes bya ba nas gang du yang ru
237b6('dul ba): bde dag gi nad na/'phags pa dges pa'i tshul khrims mchog tu gsungs pa'i bden pa dang /bden pa'i tshig des de'i yan lag snga ma kho bzhin du gyur cig ces
237b7('dul ba): bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du byas pa dang /bden pa'i tshig gis de'i yan lag dang nying lag ji ltar snga ma bzhin du gnas par gyur nas/skye bo'i tshogs kyis ngo mtshar
239a1('dul ba): du gyur pa'i mig phye ste/a la la 'phags pa kun dga' bos mu stegs can rnams pham par byas so zhes smra bo ches gtan to//de nas tshe dang
239a2('dul ba): ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal bu gzhon nu nag gu khrid nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyo
239a3('dul ba): gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces//btsun pa rgyal bu gzhonu nag gu de ni 'di lag so zhe
239a4('dul ba): gsol pa dang /de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu nag gus bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug/bcom ldan 'das kyis
239a5('dul ba): de'i bsams pa dang /bgo la nyal dang /khams dang /rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/de dge 'tshams pa'i chos ston pa mdzad//rgyal bu gzhon nag gus de thos
239a6('dul ba): ma thag tu bden pa mngon par rtogs te/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byas shing rdzu 'phrul yang thob par gyur to//ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal gyis/'phags
239a7('dul ba): pa kun dga' bos bden pa'i tshig ji lta ba bzhin du byas pas/rgyal bu gzhonu nag gu'i yan lag dang nying lag snga ma kho bzhin du gyur to zhes thoso//thos nas kyang
239b1('dul ba): rgyal bu gzhon nu nag gu glang nA bA der song ste phyin nas/rgyul bu gzho nu nAg gul 'di skad ces smraso//gzhon nu tshur shog khyim du 'dong /des smras pa/lU bdag ni bac+doMs
239b2('dul ba): la bsnyen bkur 'tshal zhing 'di nyid du mchiso//legs kyis de bzhin du gyis shig ces des kun dga' ra ba'i nang der 'changabaso byas//de de na 'dug pa na de'i yan lag dang
239b3('dul ba): nying lag dum bu slar 'byor pas/de'i ming dum bu'i kun dga' ra ba/dum bu'i kun dga' ra ba zhes bya bar chagaso//de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das
239b4('dul ba): glang na ba der song ste byin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug//phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/kro sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal
239b5('dul ba): gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/bdag gis mnyan yod nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshul ji srid pa de'i bar du
239b6('dul ba): 'phrul chen po bstan pa'i 'dun khang bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po legs kyis gyis shig/der glodon mi za bar skye bo'i tshogs
239b7('dul ba): chen po 'du bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal pa dang /ko sa li'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mnyan yod dang /rgyal byed kyi tshal ji srid pa de'i bar du sa gzhi yongasu sbyangs/tshe
240a1('dul ba): /'phrul chen po la stan pa'i 'dun khang ga sham swA to/'dun khrang gos brgya stong ribs g.yogs pa/tsan dan gyi chag chag btab b+ha/dri zhim
240a2('dul ba): byudug pa'i snod bzhugs po/ba den dang rmyil mtshan sbring ba/dar gyi rgyun 'byung gi tshogs sbyongs pa/mye tog sil ma sna tshogs bkram pa/lha rnams kyi dga' tshal
240a3('dul ba): gyi bskyed mas tshil bzhin du nyams dga' bar byas nas/der bcom ldan 'das kyis phyir rdo rje dang /bai r+m+ma dang /mArgad dang /byu ru dang /nor bu dang /mu tig+na dang /
240a4('dul ba): an daM skyil dang /mthon klo chen po dang /pad+mA rA gasdu brgyan cing spras pa'i gser gyi seng ge'i khri yang ba sham so//mu stegs can gyi dge bsnyen rnams kyis
240a5('dul ba): rang gi 'byur pa dang 'thun pa'i gos kyis g.yogs pa'i 'dzin khang drug kyang byas/stan drug kyang bshams nas/de dag tu myi stegs can rnams rang gi 'khor gyis
240a6('dul ba): bskor nas sbyar 'ongs te/'dug nas rgyal po la lha bdag cag ni mchis logs na/dge sbyong go'u tam+b+ha dgug tu gsol zhes pa nya btang //rgyal pos thos nas
240a7('dul ba): kyang btsun mo dang /gzhonu dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang bcas te cho 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang du song nas/des bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod
240b1('dul ba): tshur shog/bcom ldan 'das gang na bzhugs pa der song la byin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyags 'tshal te/bdag gis mchis nas/gnod pa chung ngam//
240b2('dul ba): nyam nga ba yang ngam/bskyod pa nyung ngam/'tsho 'am/stobs dang /bde ba la reg par granas sam/kha na ma tho bo mi mnga' 'am zhes/snyun gsol la 'di skad ces/btsun /
240b3('dul ba): ba mu stegs can de rnamos tshogs shing mchis lags na/bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes kyang gsel cig/lha de ltar 'tshal lo zhe
240b4('dul ba): bram ze'i khye'u bla ma kaM sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi ltar mnyan nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig phan
240b5('dul ba): tshun yang dag par dga' ba dang /yang dag par mgu bar gyur pa'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bram ze'i
240b6('dul ba): khye'u bla mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//kye go'u ta ma kaMs la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal go'u ta ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/gnod pa chung ngamA/
240b7('dul ba): nyam nga ba nyung ngame/bskyod pa yang ngam/'tsho 'am/stobs dang /bde ba la reg par gnas sam/kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' 'am zhes snyun gsol zhing mchis
241a1('dul ba): /shes gsol bya dang /blan nA k+Sha sa la'i rgyal po gsam rgyal dang khyad bye brnya na drug/ka sa la'o rgyalta po gsul rgyal na mchis nAs
241a2('dul ba): go'u ta ma mu stegs can rnams cho 'phrul chun po'i 'dun khrong du lhags nas/'dus shing mchis na/bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i dus la bab par dgongs su
241a3('dul ba): gsol zhes mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bla ma song shig/nga 'ang zhes bka' stsal pa dang /bram ze'i khye'u bla ma songango //bcom ldan 'das kyis ji
241a4('dul ba): ltar ngang pa'i mdab ma brkyang ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs nus/na mkha'i dkyil du 'phags te/srog chags brgya stong du ma ngo mtshar gyis mig phye nas
241a5('dul ba): A la la zhes ca co dang /gzha'i s+thi ba ton twe/lce bzhin du na mkha' las cho 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang du gshogaso//ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal
241a6('dul ba): gyis 'byor pa de dag mthong nas/ye mtshan gyis yid dad par gyur te/mu skyegs tsan+da rnams lnga 'di skad ces smraso//kye bcom ldan 'das kyis me'i chos
241a7('dul ba): bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrulabastan zin te/da ni khyod kyi ris la bab kyis khyod kyis ston cig/de rnams kyis smras pa/lha ge zhes shig skye bo'i tshogs
241b1('dul ba): chen po 'dir 'dus lags na/cho 'phrul chen po 'di ci dge sbyong gau& ta ma'i lags sam/'on to bdag cag gi lags sam/gang gi lags sus 'tshal/de nas de'i mod la
241b2('dul ba): dum bu'i kun dga'i re ba pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis ri spos kyi ngad ldang los shing a mra yal ga dang lo mo dang /mdab ma dkar po du mas klubs pa bya'i tshogs du ma skad 'byin pa blangs na/
241b3('dul ba): cho 'phrul chen po 'dun khyung gi byung phyogasu bzhag pa dang /de yang rgyal pos/mthong nas yid bde ba skyes te/lan gnyis kyi bar du mu stegs can rnams lnga 'di skad ces smraso//
241b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis mI tshe bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan zin te/da ni khyad kyi res la bab kyi khyod kyis skyon cig/de dag gis smras pa/lha bdag gis khyod la sngar ma
241b5('dul ba): gsol te ma/lha skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dir 'dus lags na/cho 'phrul chen po 'di ci dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i lags sam/'on te bdag cag gi lags sam/su'i lags
241b6('dul ba): sus 'tshal/de nas de'i mod la khyim bdag ngan logs sbyin gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i dpag bsam gyi shing blangs nas/cho 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang
241b7('dul ba): gi lho phyogs kyi ngasu bzhag pa dang /de yang ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mthong nas/yang shin tu dka' ba dang mgu ba skyes nas/lan gsum gyi bar du mu stegs
242a1('dul ba): can rnams la 'di skad ces smras//kye bcom ldan 'das kyis mI'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan zin to/da ni khyod kyi res la bab kyis ston cig/de
242a2('dul ba): dgra gis smras pa/bdag cag gis gsol mod kyi/'on kyang ldan gsum gyi bar du gsol bar bgyi ste/lha skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dir 'dus lags na/cho 'phrul chen po
242a3('dul ba): 'di ci dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i lags sam/'on te bdag cag gi lags sam/su'i lags sus 'tshol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul chen po lta bar spro ba'i srog
242a4('dul ba): chags brgya stong du ma yang 'dus lha brgya stong du ma yang na mkha'i dkyil du 'dus par gyur pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu zhabs bkrus te/
242a5('dul ba): gtsug lag khang du gshegs nas/gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te/me'i khams la snyoms par zhugaso//de nas sgo 'phar gyi gsengs nas 'od zer byung bas tsha
