242a6('dul ba): 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang thams cad bsreg par brtsams pa dang /mu stogs can rnams kyis smras pa/lha de ni dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i cho 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang tshig
242a7('dul ba): cing mchis na/gal te dge sbyong go'u ta mas rngo thog na 'dir mchis la/zhi bar bgyid grang zhes byas pa dang /rgyal po cang mi zer bar sems khongasu chud cing 'dug/de
242b1('dul ba): bzhin du btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang /rgyal rigs dbyar tshul mA dang /phywa mkhan drang srong byin dang /rnyi pa dang /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang /ri dgas sgyu'i mas ga da /
242b2('dul ba): gzhan yang dad pa can meng po dang /bar mar gnos pa kha cig kyang cing mi zer bar 'dug/mu stegs can rnams dang /de'i slob ma rnams ni rab tu dga' bar gyur to//de na
242b3('dul ba): me des cho 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang gi dri ma thams cad bsregs nas/rang nyid zhi bar gyur te/'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang lce rnams kyi lha'i mthus
242b4('dul ba): cho 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang dri ma med cing gsal la mdzes par gyur cing 'dug//de nas yang rgyal po srog shor ba las rnyed pa lta bur dga' ba dang /yid bde ba skyes nas mu/
242b5('dul ba): stegs can rnams la 'di skad ces smraso//kye bcom ldan 'das kyi mi'i'o tshes bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul bstan zin te/da ni khyed res la bab kyis khyed kyis skyon cig ces byos pa dang //
242b6('dul ba): de dag spobs pa med pas cang mi zer bar 'dug go//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon par 'du bya ba dang bcas zhabs g.yas pa dri gcong khang ki nad du bstun po dang /su rnam
242b7('dul ba): ba drug tu g.yos par gyur nas/sa chen po 'di g.yos/kun tu g.yos/kun tu rab tu g.yoso//'gul kun tu 'gul/kun tu rab tu 'gul bar gyur te/sha ri phyogs mtho na ma
243a1('dul ba): gyo dmal nub phyogs mthon shar phyogs dma'/byung phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dmal/dbus mtho na mtha' dma'//mtha'
243a2('dul ba): mtho na dbus dma' bar gyur to//sa g.yos pa des gang ro'i khrod kyi kun dga' rA ba na gnas pa'i drang srong rnams lo bskul bas/de dag phan tshun du shes ldan dag
243a3('dul ba): bdag cag la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de dag gis mtshan ma dge bstan gyis 'dod zhes smras nas de dag dong ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams 'dul ba
243a4('dul ba): la gzigs te/nyi ma stong pas lhag po'i 'od/gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od zer dag bgye bas/de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas drang srong de rnams kyi bar
243a5('dul ba): thag ji srid pa de/gsor zhun ma lta bur snang bar gyur to//drang srong de rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyi ma dang po shar ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar mdzes pa gas
243a6('dul ba): mchog sbyangs pa'i dum bu'i tshogs spung+ga lta bu me tog ku man de ka dang /mya ngan 'tshang gi phung po lta bu'i medangs can/gsung dbyangs sprin chu dang bcas pa dang /rgya mtsho
243a7('dul ba): dang /khyu mchog dang rnga sgra lta bur zab cing bstan la rnam par gsal ba/mnyan na bde zhing snyan pa/'phral ba'i phyogs 'o ma'i rgya mtsho dbu pa dang /mu tig gi do shal dang /
243b1('dul ba): pad+ma'i rtswa lcag dang /ngang ba dang /me tog kun da dang /shel spungs pa lta bur dkar ba'i mdzod spus rnam par brgyan pa/yon tan rmad du byung ba bsams kyis mi khyab pa/grangs
243b2('dul ba): med pa'i tshogs kyi gnas srid pa'i dga' ba dang /bde ba dang /bkur sti la mngon par dga' ba'i chags pa'i dri ma'i 'dam gyi skyon dang bral ba/dus dpag tu med pa nas tshogs
243b3('dul ba): bsags pa'i yis bla na med pa phul du phyin pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i grags pa can/lha'i dbang po'i cod pan rin po che'i myu gus zhabs gnyis la gtugs pa/lha dang /
243b4('dul ba): lha ma yin dang /mi dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /rig sngags 'chang dang /drang srong mchod 'os rnams kyis rjed pa/mdor na sku skyes bu chen pol+la//
243b5('dul ba): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan po/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par smras pa/'od 'dom gang bas brgyan pa/'od nyi ma stong pas lhag pa/rin po
243b6('dul ba): ri 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong //ji ltar sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba bsogs pa'i rgyu can gyis dang po sangs rgyas mthong ba ltar/lo bcu gnyis su zhi gnas kyi sems
243b7('dul ba): goms pa'am/bu med pas bu rnyed pa 'am/bkren pas gter mthong ba 'am/rgyal po mngon par 'dod pa dang po rgyal por dbang bskur ba ni de lta ma yin pas drang srong de rnaM
244a1('dul ba): kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo blos phyag 'tshal nas/phyogs gcig tu 'dra ba/bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsams pa dang /bgral/
244a2('dul ba): nyal dang khams dang /rang bzhin mkhyen nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad pa dang /de rnams kyis de dris nas 'jig
244a3('dul ba): tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas//de rnams bden pa mthong nas stan las
244a4('dul ba): langs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag cag legs par
244a5('dul ba): gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos po thob na/bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi sngun sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod
244a6('dul ba): par 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad/gdams ngag phog pa dang /de rnams kyis 'bade brtsal bsgrims pas/
244a7('dul ba): 'khor ba'i 'khor lo g.yo ba dang /mi g.yo ba ma lnga pa 'di nyid rig nas/'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad 'jig pa dang /ltung ba dang /'gyes pa dang /'joms
244b1('dul ba): pa'i chos can du rtogs te/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/drugra bcom pa khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/
244b2('dul ba): sems bod pa dang gser du mnyam pa/na mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dre ba/can dan dang ste 'ur me tshungs pa/rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/mngoni par
244b3('dul ba): shes pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/srid pa dang rnyed pa la chags pa dang /bsnyen bkur la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/dbang po dang nye dbang du bcas pa'i lha rnams
244b4('dul ba): kyis mchod pa dang /rjed par bya ba dang /gus par smra bar bya bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dgra bcom pa lnga brgya dang thabs gcig zla ba kham pa lta bur
244b5('dul ba): bskor nas/cho 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang ga la pi dang gshegs te byon nas/'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la seng ge'i khri la bezhug so//dra nas dge bsnyen ma rdzu 'phrul
244b6('dul ba): len gyi ma bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo brosuM phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//ba tsa
244b7('dul ba): ldan 'das thugs khrel chung ngur mdzadadu gsol/bdag gis mu stegs can rnams dang lhan cig me'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cha 'phrul bstan par bgyi zhing /mu stegs can
245a1('dul ba): /rnams thug sprul bar bgyi/lha dang mi rnams dga' bar dgyi/skye bo dam pa rnams glo ba rnyings par bgyi lcags//bac+doM ma ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa
245a2('dul ba): pa/rdzu 'phrul len gyi mi khyod sems khral chung ngur gyis shig/khyod kyis mu stegs can rnams dang lhan cig mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan cing mu ste smai
245a3('dul ba): can rnams thag gzhug pa dang /lha dang mi rnams dga' bar bya ba dang /skye bo dam pa rnams snying rangs par bya bar nus mod kyi/'on kyang 'di rnams khyod mi'i chos
245a4('dul ba): bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul la mi 'bod kyi/'di rnams nga mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lo 'byod pas/nga nyid kyis 'di dag la mi'i chos bla ma'i
245a5('dul ba): rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bston par bya'o//gal te khyod kyis 'di rnams dang lhan cig mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan nas/mu stegs can rnams dge sbyong
245a6('dul ba): go'u ta ma la mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul med kyi/'on kyang 'di'i nyan thos ma rdzu 'phrul lon gyi ma/'di ltar rdzu 'phrul tshe zhing 'di ltar mthu che bzhig
245a7('dul ba): dang lhan cig mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ston to//zhes smra bar 'gyur bas/khyod rang gi stan ji lta ba laM 'dug shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /de
245b1('dul ba): rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug ste/khyim bdag dran legs sbyin dang /dge tshul sbrul byud dang /dge tshul ma brjod med dang /dge slong ma ud pa la'i mdog dang /gzhan yang
245b2('dul ba): 'phrul dang ldan pa phal mo che dag kyang de dag 'dra'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa me'u dgal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
245b3('dul ba): la mgo bos phyeg 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das thugs khrel chung ngur mdzad du gsol//bdag gis mu ste can rnams dang
245b4('dul ba): lhan cig mo'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan par bgyi zhing /mu stegs can rnams thag stsal bar bgyi/lha dang mI rnams dga' bar bgyi/skye bo dam pa rnams
245b5('dul ba): glo ba rangs par bgyi lag so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/me'u dgal gyi bu khyod sems khral chung ngur gyis shig/khyod kyis mu stegs can rnams dang lhan
245b6('dul ba): cig mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan cing /mu stegs can rnams thug gzhug pa dang /lha dang mi rnams dga' bar bya ba dang /skye bo dam pa rnams snying pa
245b7('dul ba): par bya ba nus med kyi/'on kyang 'di rnams khyod mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la mi 'bod kyi/nga 'di rnams kyis mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la
246a1('dul ba): bos pas/nga nyid kyis 'di dag la mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyis cho 'phrul bstan par bya'o//gul te khyod kyis mu stegs can rnams dang
246a2('dul ba): lhan cig mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan na/mu stegs can rnams ni dge sbyong giru ta mau la ni mi'i chos bla mo'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul med kyi/'on kyang 'didi
246a3('dul ba): nyan thos dge slong mo'u dgal gyi bu 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/'di ltar mthu che ba zhig nged dang lhan cig mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ston to zhes bya bar 'gyur/
246a4('dul ba): bas/khyod rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug ces bka' stsal pa dang /de yang rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po
246a5('dul ba): gsal rgyal la bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa la mu stegs can rnams dang lhan cig mi'i chos bla me'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan par gsol
246a6('dul ba): pa 'debs pa su yin//de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal stan las langs te/blo gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logasu
246a7('dul ba): thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mu stegs can rnams dang lhan cig mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul/
246b1('dul ba): kyigyicho 'phrul bstan cing /mu stegs can rnams thag stsal pa dang /lha dang mi rnams dga' bar dkyi ba dang /skye bo dam pa rnams glo ba rangs par bgyi bar gsol ba grang ba
246b2('dul ba): lpags te/de na dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas/lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu la/yun ring po'i don dang /phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur lagaso zhes gsol pa dang /bcos
246b3('dul ba): kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la cang mi gsung bas gnod //de nas ko saM la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsungs pas gnang bar rig nas//
246b4('dul ba): rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na nyid kyi gdan las mi snang bar gyur nas/shar phyogs kyi steng gi na mkha'
246b5('dul ba): la mngon par 'phags te/spyod lam bzhi po 'di lta ste/gshegs pa dang /'greng ba dang /bzhugs pa dang /gzims pa mdzad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting 'dzin la
246b6('dul ba): snyoms par zhug so//me'i khoms la snyoms par zhugs te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs pa'i sku las 'od zer sna tshogs 'di lta
246b7('dul ba): ste/sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dang /btsod ka dang /shel gyi kha dog lta bu dag 'thon to//zung gi cho 'phrul sku'i smad nas ni me 'bar/sku'i stod nas ni
247a1('dul ba): chu grang mo'i rgyun 'babs pa dang /sku'i snod nas ni me 'gyur/sgyu'i skad nas ni chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bab pa dag kyang snun par mdzad//shar phyog su
247a2('dul ba): ji lta bar lho dang /nub dang /byang phyogs su yang de dang 'dra ste/phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas/rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad
247a3('dul ba): pa btang ste/seng ge'i khri la bzhugaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs
247a4('dul ba): pa'i rdzu 'phrul 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mongs pa yino//rgal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa la mu stegs can rnams dang /skye bo'i
247a5('dul ba): tshogs kyi mdun du bla na med pa'i cho 'phrul chen po bstan par gsol ba 'debs pa su yin//de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal stan las 'das te/blo
247a6('dul ba): gos phrag pa cig tu gzer nas/bcom ldan 'das gaM la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun
247a7('dul ba): ba bcom ldan 'das kyis mu stegs can rnams dang /skye bo'i tshogs kyi mdun du bla no med pa'i cho 'phrul chen po bstan cing mu stegs can rnams thag stsal pa/
247b1('dul ba): dang /lha dang mi rnams dga' bar mdzad pa dang /skye bo dam pa rnams glo ba rangs par mdzod par bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa bdag lpags te/nga ni dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas/lha
247b2('dul ba): dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu la yun rings po'i don dang /phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur lags zhes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsol rgyal la cang
247b3('dul ba): mi gsung bar gnang //de nas kaM sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug/
247b4('dul ba): bam po so gnyis pa/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag 'khor lo dang /bkra shis dang /g.yung drung can dra bas 'brel pa/bsod nams brgya phrag du ma las 'khrungs pa/'jig
247b5('dul ba): pa rnams dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas sa la reg par mdzad/kye ma klu rnams kyis pad+ma shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam/mdab ma stongs dang ldan pa/thams cad gser khros byas pa/
247b6('dul ba): rin po che'i chu ba dang /rdo rje'i ze ba can khyer te 'ongs kyang bla na snyam du 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe
247b7('dul ba): 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe/srog chags grog spur rnams kyis kyang /bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes par 'gyur la/gang gi tshe 'jig rten las
248a1('dul ba): 'dus pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe ni/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang /bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes par mi 'gyur
248a2('dul ba): na/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba klu rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/bcom ldan 'das kyis ci'i phyir sa la reg par mjed snyam na/cho 'phrul chen po ston par mthong nas
248a3('dul ba): de dag gis pad+ma shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam mdab ma stong dang ldan pa/thams cad gser las byas pa/rin po che'i chu ba dang /rdo rje'i ze ba can khyer te/sa brtol nas byung ba dang /
248a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das pad+ma de'i snying po la bzhugaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis g.yas g.yos su pad+ma de 'dra ba gzhan rab tu mang po dag byung bar gyur te/de dag re re la yang
248a5('dul ba): sprul pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs par gyur to//de dag gi g.yas g.yos su yang pad+ma de 'dra ba gzhan dag byung bar gyur cing /de dag la gzhan/de dag la yang gzha
248a6('dul ba): te de bzhin du 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du sangs rgyas phal po che sprul to//de na sangs rgyas kha cig ni 'brur/kha cig ni gsal bar mdzad/kha cig ni char 'bebs/kha cig
248a7('dul ba): ni glog 'byin//ba cig ni kun shes pa lung ston/kha cig ni zhu ba zhu/kha cig ni lan 'debs/kha cig ni 'chag pa mdzad/kha cig ni gzhes/kha cig ni bzhengs//
248b1('dul ba): zhog nI bzhugs//ga ni gzims te/dzA ltar byis pa zhon nurnams rgyas kyang sgrings pa mau p+ta sangs rgyas kyi sgra mthong ba de myur yang byon gyis panabs// 'phrul de mtsha
248b2('dul ba): nas/ko sa la'i rgyal phyogs pa rgyal btsun mo'i 'khor dang /gzhanu dang /blon po dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang bcas pa dang //yul sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa'i srog chags 'bum phrag
248b3('dul ba): du ma dang /na mkha'i dkyil na lha 'bum phrag du ma bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe 'phrul chen po la mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing rgyun mi 'chad pa phyag 'tshalo//nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha
248b4('dul ba): rnams kyang rnga dag rdung //gnas gnas na yang rnga bo che rnams ni rdung //dung ske le ma ni 'brung rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs ni 'byin cing /la la ni glu len/la la ni gar byed//
248b5('dul ba): byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags rnams kyang yid bde ba skyes nas/rang gi rigs dang 'dra ba'i sgra snyid rnam pa sna tshogs sgrogs pa 'di lta ste/rta rnams ni 'char
248b6('dul ba): glang po che rnams ni ngur/rnga mo rnams ni 'khang /ba lang rnams ni 'bod/rma bya rnams ni 'gyur te/lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'gro ba dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba skyes nas
248b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya bar spro bar gyur to//den lha rnams kyis lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu da dang /pad+ma dkar po dang /man da ra ba rnams gtor to//
249a1('dul ba): wAT+Thi a gaR+Shan+d+he phyi ma dang /rgyu smos kyi bye ma dang /tsan dan r+m+ma byom dang /l+yA rdzas kyi gos drug kyang gtor te/mi dang mi ma yin pa'i b+hangag tu
249a2('dul ba): de bzhino//de lta bu'i dga' ston chen po byung ba na/gdul ba'i skye ba'o rtogs par mdzad pa'i phyirabacom ldan 'das nyid kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bkra' stsal to//
249a3('dul ba): brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya//sangs rgyas bstan la 'bod par bya//'dam bu khyim la glang chen bzhin//'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya//gang zhig tshe 'dul 'di
249a4('dul ba): la ni//bag dang ldan par spyod byed pa//skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas//sdug bsngal gyi ni mthar byed 'gyur//lhag ma sprul pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang //cig char
249a5('dul ba): du tshigs su bcad pa 'di dog bka' stsal to//ji srid nyi ma ma shar ba//de srid srin bu me khyar gsal//mkha' la nyi ma shar ba na//mog mog por 'gyur gsal mi
249a6('dul ba): 'gyur//ji srid de bzhin gshegs ma byung //rtog ge can rnams sngon gsal te//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten snang //rtog ge mi gsal de slob min//de nas bcoM
249a7('dul ba): kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag cho 'phrul chen po mi snang bar 'gyur gyis mtshan ma zung shig/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs ma thag tu
249b1('dul ba): modado la mi snang bar gyur to//da mi snang bar gyur pa dang /ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mu stegs can rnams la 'di skad ces smraso//kyai bcom ldan 'das kyis ma'i chos bla ma'i
249b2('dul ba): rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul bstan zin te/da ni khyed kyi res la bab pas khyed kyis ston cig/de nas 'od srung rdzogs byed cing mi smra bar kun tu rgyu gnag lces kyi bul glu drug byas/dang
249b3('dul ba): kyang sgra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can la'o//des kyang mi 'pham skra'i la ba can la'o//des kyang ka t+ye'i bu rnyog can la'o//des kyang gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu la'o//des kyang
249b4('dul ba): 'od srung rdzogs byed la byas na/'ga' yang smra bA ni byed//de dag la len gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du rgyal pos de skad ces smras na/de bzhin du gcig la gcig gru phug
249b5('dul ba): byed cing /cang mi zer bar gyur pa yul yul por 'gyur/zhum zhum por gyur nas/mgo smad cing spobs pa med de sems khongs su chud cing 'dug/de nas gnod sbyin
249b6('dul ba): lag na rdo rje 'di snyam du//skyes bu blun po 'di rnams yun ring po nas bcom ldan 'das la tho 'tshams pas/de'i phyir gang gis na 'di rnams kun tu 'bres par 'gyur ba'i
249b7('dul ba): thabs shig bya'o snyam nas/des gang gis na cho 'phrul gyi 'dun khang de de rnams kyi mig lam du yang mi 'bab pa de lta bu'i rlung dmar dang char drag bting ba dang /don kha cig
250a1('dul ba): ni byed na sA ra'i gsab tu zhugs/khaT+wA~M ga ni rtswa chang tshong du/kha cig ni nags thibs par/kha cig ni 'dun khang du//kha T+wA~Mg nI lha khang du zhugaso//n+das/
250a2('dul ba): ni nyid kyi cho 'phrul chen+de po'i 'dun khyang na bzhugs te/tshigs su bcad pa dag bka' stsal pa/'jigs pas skrag pa'i mi rnams ni//phal cher ri dang nags tshul dang /
250a3('dul ba): kun dga' ra ba ljon shIng dang //mchod rten rnams la skyabasu 'gro//skyabs de gtso bo ma yin zhing //skyabs de mchog gyur ma yin te//skyabs de dag la bsten nas ni//sdug
250a4('dul ba): bsngal kun las rab mi thar//gang zhig gang tshe sangs rgyas dang //chos dang dge 'dun skyabs song zhing //'phags pa yi ni bden pa bzhi//sdug bsngal bsdug bsngal kun
250a5('dul ba): 'byung dang //sdug bsngal yang dag 'das pa dang //mya ngan 'das pa bder 'gro ba'i//'phrogs lam yan lag brgyad pa dag/shes rab kyis ni blta byed ni//skyabs dri
250a6('dul ba): dag ni gtso yin zhing //skyabs de dag ni mchog yon te//skyabs de dag la brten nas ni//sdug bsngal kun las rab tu thar//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor
250a7('dul ba): bsam pa dang /bag la nyal dang /khams dang /rang bzhin thug su chud nas/de la brten te gang thos na sems can brgya phrag mang pos khyad par chen po thob par la
250b1('dul ba): pad+ma d+hU bu'i chos bskrun pag/khyu zlog gis ni rgyun tu zhugs da'i 'bras bu myangon sum du byas//kha cig gos ni sman d+h+r-ig phyir 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu//kha cig gis ni b+hu ma
250b2('dul ba): b+hU'i 'bram bu//cig gis ni nyon mongs pa thams ci blangs te/dag ba com pa nyid mngon sum du byaso//kha cug gis n-i nyan rdzos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyod//cig gis/
250b3('dul ba): ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu/kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed de/'khor de pal cher songs rgyas la gzhol ba dang /chosal
250b4('dul ba): 'drang ba dang /dge 'dun la bab par bkod//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de dag la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par len du badrug yad dag pang
250b5('dul ba): gzeng ba skyed/yang dge bur dga' bang mdzad de/gdan las be zhungs nus gshegs//de nas 'od srung rdzogs byed la slob ma rnams kyis dris pa/mkhyen pa de kho na nyid
250b6('dul ba): lta bu lags pa gsungs shig/des slob ma de dag kha cig la ni bu 'di lta ste/'jig rten rtag pa 'di ni dri khon nyid yin zhes smis/gzhan dag la ni mi rtig/gzhan dag
250b7('dul ba): oM ni rtag kyang rtag/mi rtag kyang mi rtago//gzhan dag la ni rtag pa yang ma yin/mi rtag pa yang ma yin//gzhan dag la ni mthar yod do//mtha' medo//ma
251a1('dul ba): /kyang yod/mtha' med kyang med//mtha' yod pa yang ma yin/mtha' med pa yang ma yino//sgrog de lus yin+do//srog kyang gzhan lA lus kyang gzhan/
251a2('dul ba): yin//de bzhin song ba shi phan chad yod//mdo//yod kyang yod la med kyang medo//de bzhin song ba shi phan chad yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin pa 'di ni
251a3('dul ba): bden gyi/gzhan ni rmongs pa yino zhes rnam pa gzhan dang /gzhan gyis bslu so//de yang ngo tsha nas mgo smadade/mya ngan gyi mes gdungs pas chu bsil ba 'dod pa'i phyir
251a4('dul ba): rdzing du song ba dang /de nas lam gyi nang du ma ning zhig gis nas/des tshigs su bcade skyes pa/thug re ru mithu chag pa lta bu yi//mdangs med khyod cig gla las rings
251a5('dul ba): par 'ongs//shAkya'i chos ni rnam par ma shes pas//bong bu bzhin du 'dzem pa med par 'phyan//des kyang tshig su bcad smras pa/nga yi mdun no 'dug 'di 'chi bdag dri/
251a6('dul ba): bdag gis lus la stobs dang brtson pa med//dngos po thams cad bde dang sdug bsngal ston//thar zin da ni bde ba byed du 'gro/gnye zer rab tu che bar byed rnams kyis//lus
251a7('dul ba): dang sems kun gdungs shing ngal gyur gyis//mi srun thong la rdzing rab bsil ba de//ge la yod pa bdag la myur du smos//des tshigasu bcad de smras pa/pho ngan sdig can
251b1('dul ba): skyes mchog ma yin pa//mtsho'u ltar pad+ma dad pa dang ldan zhing //gangs kyi chu ltar chu yongs gtsang ba yi//rdzing bu shin tu bzangs po ma mthong ngam/des yang tshigasu bcad de smras pa//
251b2('dul ba): khyod kyang pho min mi yi chung ma'ang min//de brda phrad kyis zur la lam phye dang //rdzing bu chu bzang chu bsil gang bar ni//gdung ba gsal bar bya phyir bdag 'gro'o//de lam de nas//
251b3('dul ba): bzur pa dang /rdzogs byed kyang rdzing drung du song ste/mgul du bum pa bye mas gang ba btags nas/der nub ste de nyid du dus las 'daso//de nas de'i slob ma rnams kyis gcig
251b4('dul ba): la cig dris pa/mkhan po khyod sus mthong /de rnams kyis smras pa/myi mthong //khyod la mkhan pos lung bstan pa su yod/de na kha cig gis smras pa/shes ldan dag nged la
251b5('dul ba): ni mkhan pos 'jig rten rtag po 'di ni bden gyi/gzhan ni rmongs pa yin zhes lung bstan to//kha cig gis smras pa/nged la ni mi rtag go zhes bstan to//gzhan dag gis smras
251b6('dul ba): pa/nged la ni rtag kyang rtag/mi rtag kyang mi rtag//rtag pa yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yino//mtha' med//mtha' yod//mtha' yod kyang yod//
251b7('dul ba): mtha' med kyang mdo//mtha' yod pa yang ma yin/mtha' med pa yang ma yino//de bzhin song ba shi phan chad yodado//medado//yod kyang yod la med kyang medado//de bzhi
252a1('dul ba): song ba shi phan chad yod pa ma yin/med pa yang ma yin pa 'di ni bden gyi/gzhan gyi rmongs pa yin zhe'o//de rnams kyis smras pa/shes
252a2('dul ba): ldan drag 'di lta ste sna tshog su bta Da pas bdag cag thams cad mi mthun par gyur gyis/ma la bdag cag gis mkhan po kun tu btsal la/de kho ni nyid ji lta bu yin
252a3('dul ba): bya 'di 'dri'o//zhes de rnams dong ba dang /de rnams kyis lam gyis dbus su bu mo zhig mthong nas de rnams kyis de la tshigs su bcad pas dris pa chos kyis gos ni
252a4('dul ba): gyon pa po//dka' thub na la ze gang za ba//rdzogs byed 'di nas snong gyur nas/bzang mo khyod kyi ma mthong ngam/des kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ngan song sems
252a5('dul ba): can dmyal ba pa//lag pa brkyang nas 'gro nga yi//rdzogs byed de ni chus g.yengs nas//rkang lag skya bor gyur cing 'dug/de rnams kyis kyang tshigasu bcad pas
252a6('dul ba): smras pa/chos kyi gros ni gyon pa po//chos spyod thub pa de la ni//khyod kyis smras te legs min gyis/bzang mo de skad ma zer cing /des kyang tshigs su bcad de
252a7('dul ba): smras pa/po mtshan gyi ni rtags skyes pas//blo ldan des su 'jig rten no//rtag tu 'jig rten gyis mthong bar//gcer bu grong du rgyu bar byed//pho mtshan bdun nas spyad/
252b1('dul ba): byed pa//gang gis chos ni 'di 'dra ba//de ni rgyal po rnam thos bus//ma da' ni ste'u khas bcad 'dod//ces byas pa dang /de dag cad mi zer bar dong nas/de dag rdzing bur phyin
252b2('dul ba): po dang /re shig na rdzogs byed bum pa bye mas bgrang ba mgul du btags nas/dus las 'das pa mthong nas/de rnams las gang dag bslab pa 'dod pa de rnams kyis/shes
252b3('dul ba): ldan dag 'di ni bden gyi/gzhan ni rmongs pa yin no zhes smras nas/de dag kyang bum pa bye mas bkang ba mgul du btags nas/de nyid du dus la ma 'driso//lhag ma
252b4('dul ba): rnams ni slar logs nas mtha' 'khob du dong nas 'dug/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/thogs pa med pa'i stobs kyi 'khor
252b5('dul ba): lo sgyur bas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba de'i tshe/mu stegs can thams cad kyis/mi'i
252b6('dul ba): chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la spyan drangs po las mu stegs can thams cad thag stsol/pham par mdzad/rgyub kyis phyogs par mdzad/spobs pa med par
252b7('dul ba): mdzad/de nas mtha' 'kho kyi ljongs rnams su rten par gyur to//de na dge slong rnams rje tshom skyes nas/btsun po bcom ldan 'das kyis/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
253a1('dul ba): /pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyus nas mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la spyan drangs pa las/mu stsogs can thams
253a2('dul ba): cad thag stsal/pham par mdzad/rgyab kyis phyogs par mdzad/spobs pa med par mdzad pa la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag da ltar
253a3('dul ba): nga 'dod chags dang bral/zhe sdang dang bral/gauti mug dang bral/skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal
253a4('dul ba): dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa las yongs su grol te/thams cad mkhyen pa/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang /shes pa dang shes bya thams cad la dbang
253a5('dul ba): thob pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub nas/mu stegs cano thams cad thag
253a6('dul ba): bcug/pham par byas/rgyab kyis phyogs par byas/spobs pa med par byas pa 'di la ngo mtshar ci che/'das pa'i dus na nga 'dod chags dang bcas/zhe sdang dang bcas
253a7('dul ba): gti mug dang bcas/skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug
253b1('dul ba): las yongs su ma grol ba nA yang /ston pa drug po 'khor dang bcas pa 'di dag thams cad thag bcug/pham par byas/rgyab kyis phyogs par byas/spobs pa med par byas/
253b2('dul ba): tshar bcad de mtha' 'khob kyi ljongs rnams su rten du bcug pa de bshad kyis legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig/dge slong dog sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na lus 'phags zhes bya
253b3('dul ba): ba'i ljongs na/rgyal po bskyed pa zhes bya ba rgyal srid 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa zhes bya ba nas byed du 'dzud zhes bya ba rgyas paro//de nas rgyal po bskyed pas btsun mo gzugs bzang ba/mdzes pa/lhan
253b4('dul ba): sdug pa zhig blangs nas/dod dang lhan cig rtso bar byed//dga' bar byed//dga' dgur spyod//de nas btsun mo de la sems can zhugs par gyur nas/rim gyis zla ba dgu lon pa dang /khye'u gzugs bza
253b5('dul ba): gang lta nA sdug pa/mdzes pa zhig bco so//gzhonu de bcas pa na lus 'phags kyi ljongs rnams la legs pa dang /bza' ba dang /btung ba mod par gyur cing /lhas kyang char dus bzhin du phab/dus dang /
253b6('dul ba): 'thun pa'i rlung yang ldang ste/des na rtag tu bza' ba dang /btung ba mod par gyur to//de nas gzho nu'i bcos ston rgya cher byas nas/gzho nu'i ming cir gdags shes rgyal po sems pa na/gang gi phyir
253b7('dul ba): gzhonu 'di btsas pa ni/yul du bza' ba dang /btung ba mod par gyur pa de'i phyir/gzho nu'i ming bza' btung zhes btags nas/de nas gzhon bza' btung ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad do//gang gi
254a1('dul ba): tshod chen por byung ba dar rgyu yi ge sbyib du bcug pa dang /ring por ma phyogs par mthar phyin par gyur //rigs rgyu dpa' gnas la yang ring po ma thogs pa
254a2('dul ba): bar gyur to zhes gong ma bzhin du rgyus par brjod par bye'o//gzhon nu de yad dpa' ba tsho mtsham med pa/gdu ma rim par gyur to//de nas btsun mo bus bsnyems nAs rgyal yab
254a3('dul ba): bka' bzhin mi nyan cing /ba TI gi bas byed par gyur to//rgyu des rgyal po yang mi dga' bsku gdungs pa dang /de mi dga' bablon po rnams kyis shes nas smras pa/lha ci'i sladu mi dgas
254a4('dul ba): par gyur/rgyal pos smras pa/nga'i btsunA mo zlas bsnyems nas da ni nga'i bka' shin tu mi nyan cing bzlog thabs byed/rgyu des na de mi dga' bar gyur to//de nas blon po rnams kyis
254a5('dul ba): smras pa/lho gal te 'di bka' bzhin mi bgyid na/dri gzhan zhig blang bar bgyi ste/de nu 'di yang dbang du 'gyur la//lha yang gzhan dang lhan cig dgyes pa ltar 'gyuraro//rgyal
254a6('dul ba): pos smras pa/ga nas blang bar bya/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/nyi 'og gi rgyal po 'di'i de nas byung bar bgyi'o//rgyal pos smras pa/de dang nga mi mthun pa yin no/ji ltar de nas
254a7('dul ba): rlon pas smras gnyi 'og gi rgyal po 'di ni chung bas/gnyen du bgyis na bshes par 'gyur lagi mgyis thams cad du thugs khrel bar chung bar bzhugs shig dang /'di bdag cig gi
254b1('dul ba): sgrub par bgyi'o//de nas blon po rnams nyi 'og/glo rgyal po de'i thad du sod nas/dang dog gis dri shin tu rangs par byas pa dang /des smras grangs dam zhig btsas nas bu mo sbyin te/grul tu/
254b2('dul ba): de'i tshe'o zhig yod la/de rgyal tshab kyi thabs sbyin no//de lta na ngas sbyin par bya'o//de rnams kyis smras pa/de bzhin du bgyi'o//rgyal pos smras pa/re shig sngar rgyal po dal gyi sa la/
254b3('dul ba): de gal te dam bcas pa de bzhin du btub na//de'i 'og tu sbyin par bya'o//de nas blon po rnams kyis de la phyag 'chil te smras pa/lha rgyul chab tu stsal bar blon po rnams kyis dang
254b4('dul ba): bsam na/ci nas lha'i dpon po zhig mchis na/de rgyal tshob tu stsal bar ye bgyi'o//de nas thob ste dpalA gyi 'byor po chen pos bag mor blangs nas/de dang rgyal po skyed pa lhan cig
254b5('dul ba): rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed//de nas btsun mo de g.yor bag che ba zhig pas/ji ltar rgyal po dam pa de ltar gnyis par byas pa dang /rgyal pos smras pa/
254b6('dul ba): khyod la dam pa ci zhig sbyin/des thal mo sbyar nas smras pa/gal te bdag la lhas skabs phye na/bdag gi bro btsas pa gang legs pa de rgyal chab tu stsal bar gsol de'i tshig
254b7('dul ba): thos ma thag tu rgyal ba mtshan gyis gnad tu bsnun pa bzhin du ting zhes byed nas bsams pa/bdag gis 'di la dam pa sbyin par skabs phye baM dang /'dis kyang de lta du
255a1('dul ba): /dam pa bslangs la/bdag gi bu bza' btung 'di yang dpa' zhing brtson pa//gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa/rigs dang 'thun par skyes pa'i bu gcig
255a2('dul ba): pa yin na/ji ltar na 'di btang ste/gzhan la rgyal thabs sbyin par bya ste/da 'di la ji ltar bya zhes the tshom skyes nas/sems pa la zhugs pa dang /raM shig na/blon pa
255a3('dul ba): rnams kyis rgyal po yid mi bde bar rig nas/lha ci dgongaso shes dris pa dang /rgyal pos de rnams la rang bzhin smras te/ngas btsun mo la dam pa sbyin pa'i skabs phye ba dang /
255a4('dul ba): des kyang bu zhig mchis gyur na/rgyal chub tu stsal par gsol zhes gsol ba btab nas/de'i phyir nga sems khongs su chud par gyur to//de nas blon po rnams kyis smras
255a5('dul ba): pa/lha 'dir yang ma byas te/nyi 'og gi rgyal po gang las bdag cag gis 'di bslangs pa de las kyang dam pa 'di lta bu bcas pas stsal mod kyi/lha 'on kyang mchis par
255a6('dul ba): 'gyur ram/ma mchis par 'gyur ram/khye'u 'am bu mor 'gyur ba da dung sus 'tshal/re shig de la mchog stsol cig/de nas rgyal pos kyang de bzhin du bya'o zhes
255a7('dul ba): bsgo'o//de nas dus gzhan zhig na/btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/zla ba dgu tshang ba nA/gzhonu gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa/blta na sdug po zhig
255b1('dul ba): btsos te/de'i bcas ston rgya cher byas nas//gzhon nu 'di'i maud cir bdags shes mir 'dogs par byed//de nas rgyal po bskyes pas bsams pa/gang gi phyir 'di ma
255b2('dul ba): btsas pa nyid nas/rgyal srid mngon par 'dod cing mngon par 'ga' bas na/de'i phyir gzhonu 'di'i ming rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba zhes bya bar//
255b3('dul ba): gdag so//de ma ma brgyad po rnams la btad nas/de dag gis kyang dril ba dang /phyi ba dang /bkru ba dang /'o ma dang /sbrang rtsi dang /mer dkar rnams kyis bskyed nas/
255b4('dul ba): grang gi tshe chen por gyur kyang rgyal tshab tu mnga' ma bskur//de nas de'i ma mes nyi 'og gi rgyal pos/lus 'phags kyi rgyal po skyes pa la pho nya btAng ste/ji ltar bdag
255b5('dul ba): gi tsha bo rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba/rgyal tshab tu me bcug na bdag dpung gi tshogs yon lag bzhi pa gro bskon te/khyod kyi gan du 'ongo zhes spring pa dang /dus pho nya'i tshig
255b6('dul ba): thos nas/'jigs skrag nas/yid mi bde zhing 'dug/nga nas blon po rnams kyis rgyal po skyes pa skrag cing mi dga' bar rig nas smras pa/ci'i slad du/'di ltar mi dgyes
255b7('dul ba): par mdzad/skyes pas smras pa/nyi 'og gi rgyal po des tshe ba'i phyir pho nya btang nas/pha nya de 'di skad ces ci ste nga'i chu bo rgyal tshab tu mi gzhug na/nga 'ongs te khyod rgyal po la
256a1('dul ba): phyung la/nga'i tsha bo gzhug zhes zer//de nas blon po rnams kyis smras pa/lha rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba/rgyal chab thabs sprul la/gzhan/
256a2('dul ba): bza' btud 'di dgum par bgyi'o//de nas rgyal po skyed pas blon po rnams la smras pa/chos dang mi ldan pa'i tshig de lta bu ma smras shing /'di ltar 'di na bu pa gsod pa thos
256a3('dul ba): kyis/pha bu gsod pa ni ma yin pas nga ni de ltar gtan mi byed//de dag gis smras pa/ji ste mi dgum na yang yan lag ma mchis par bgyi'o//de nas rgyal po bskyed
256a4('dul ba): pas/blon po rnams la smras pa/gal te yan lag med par byas na bsad pa kho nar zad mod/de nas blon po rnams kyi rgyal po bskyed pa'i tshig zos nas/rgyal po la
256a5('dul ba): smras pa/lha 'di la gzhan ci bgyir mchis//bskrad par bgyi'o//rgyal pos smras pa/nyes pa med pa ji ltar bskrad par bya/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ci'i sla du 'ang
256a6('dul ba): mi sngo ba ring po mi thogs par gzhon la nongs par 'byung bar rngo thog gis/re shig r+yal srid la mngon par dga' ba thangs stsol cig/de nas ni rgyal po bza' btud rang
256a7('dul ba): nyid kyis 'tshal bar 'gyuraro//de nas rgyal po bskyod pas dbang thang gi nyi ma shis pa lan+d+ha bak+ko shis dang /byis par brjod pa byas nas/rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rgyal tshab
256b1('dul ba): kyi thabs byin no//de thabs byin par gzhonu bza' btung gis thos nas/bsams pa/lhas ni bdag spangs par gyur gyis nga bdag 'dir 'dug kyang ci zhig rung ste/bdag gsad par 'ong
256b2('dul ba): snyam nas/de'i ma'i thad du song ste/mi bde ba'i lo rgyus bshad nas/smras pa/bdag rgyal po lnga len gyi yul du mchis mkhyen par mdzod cig/de nas de yang sdug
256b3('dul ba): bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ni myos/bu dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang ni ldan/bu'i mgrol nas ni mkhyud de/snying rje rje skad smre sngags gton te smras pa/du gul ras kyi
256b4('dul ba): gding pas mdzes byas pa'i//mol stan che la 'os par bder nyel ba//bu cig dra ni sa steng thang bu la//gos kyi phyogs gcig gting nas ji ltar nyal//mal du bde bar
256b5('dul ba): nyal nas rol mo dang //glu sgra sna tshogs dag gis sad byed pa//grang dang tsha ba'i chu yis phog gyur na//mdangaso can lus ni ji ltar nags na dga'//sngon chad rgyal pos
256b6('dul ba): gnang ba'i bza' btung dang ///sbyin dang gzhan dang theg mchog la spyod pa//byug pa rgyan drang gis kyis phongs bzhin du//su yi dbang gis sdug bsngal gyur par 'bya
256b7('dul ba): 'jig rten dang phrad skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyis//thal mo rab sbyar rnga sgra glu dbyangs dag/yid dang rna bar 'ongs pa rnams kyis legs mchod pa//skom pas mngon
257a1('dul ba): pUr gdungs bzhin gang du 'khyams//gzhon nu sa smras pa/gtan du bde b+hU yang+tha ni su zhig yod//gtan du sdug bsngal ba yang su zhig yang/
257a2('dul ba): mi dadra ba thob pa yang su zhig yong //thob par mi 'gyur ba yang su zhig yod//'gyur ba'i dpung gis mi rnams bde sdug ste//rgyu skyer 'khor lo mkha' le 'khor
257a3('dul ba): ba bzhin/bde bas dga' mig sdug pas mi dga' med//mi dbang rigs rjes 'gro ba'i rtags yin no//des ma li de lta bu rnam pa ma ba khyod du rgyud par byas ste/mu
257a4('dul ba): lnga len gang na pa drer song //de dUr grong dang /nye bar phyin nas//lus ngal ba dang /lus bkres pas shing gi grib ma zhig la nyal zhing 'dug//ji tsam zhigan rgyal po'i bye ba
257a5('dul ba): cung zad cig gi phyir/lnga len gyi bkrabs pa dag cig phyogs der 'ongs pa dang /bza'i btung grib ma de li nyal zhing 'dug pa mthong nas smras pa/'di lta bu gzugs
257a6('dul ba): bzang ba/bAltan stug pa/mkhrang be/sra ba/legs par 'grel pa/ro stod che ba/dpung pa ring ba'i skyes bu 'di su zhig ces/de dag gi de bslangs nas/khyod
257a7('dul ba): zhig su'i bu yin zhes dris pa dang /des smras pa/bdag ni lus 'phags kyi rgyal po bskyed pa'i bu bza' btung zhes bya ba yin no//dgos pa ci zhig gi phyir 'ongs//des
257b1('dul ba): de rnams la ji ltar gyur pa smraso//des nas bkrabs pa de dag gris rgyalnga po'i bu de skyes su khyer nas/lnga len+da gyi rgyal po'i gan du song ste/bza' btung de la phul nas lha 'di rgyal
257b2('dul ba): pa bskyed pa'i mu bzo' btung zhes bgyi ba lags te/phas 'di lta bu zhig gi slad du bskrad nas/'dir phyin po lagaso//de nas bza' btung gis kyang lU len gyi rgyal po lo theng/
257b3('dul ba): rgyas par bsnyadado//yang smras pa/mi yi bdag po bskyed pa ni//dbang po 'dra ba'i sras 'di ste//gzugs ldan yon tan phun tshogs pa//rgyal sed nyams nas 'dir mchi/
257b4('dul ba): do nas lnga len+da gyi rgyal pos mgul nas ma byud/dga' ba' gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs smras nas/dga' ba khang du chud par byas ste/de la bu mo dang yul dag kyang byino//de yang
257b5('dul ba): de dag lhan cig rtso bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/re shig na skye dgu'i bdag mo de sems can dang ldan par gyur te/zla ba dgu tshang pa
257b6('dul ba): dang khye'u gzugs bzang ba/blta na sdug pa/mdzes pa/thong ga sang ge ltar 'dug pa/dpung pa ring ba/ro stod seng ge 'dri ba zhig bcas nas/de'i bcas
257b7('dul ba): ston rgya cher byas nas//gzhon nu'i ming cir gdags snyam pa las/bdag gi ming bza' btung yin pas/'di ni bza' btung mang po'o//de nas gzhon bza' btung mang po///
258a1('dul ba): ma ma brgyad po la btad pa dang /de dag gis bskul ba dang /phyi ba dang /bkru ba dang /'o ma dang /sbrang rtsi dang /mar dkar rnams kyis bskyed nas/
258a2('dul ba): gang gis tshe chen por gyur pa der tshe/khye'u yi ge slob pa'i grwar yi ge slob tu bta //de'i pha bza' btung nI nad kyis btab nas/des sman pa dang /nad g.yog rnams kyi/
258a3('dul ba): kyang glaso bar ma nus nas dus las 'daso//de dus las 'das pa dang /rgyal po'i bu mo shin tu mya ngan gyis thebs nas tshe nges btab ste/smre sngags 'don to//de nas lnga
258a4('dul ba): len gyi rgyal pos bsams pa/bud med thams cad kyis bsams pa ni/phal cher skyes pa 'dod pa yin pas/de cig la sbyin snyam nas des de dang gzhon nu bza'
258a5('dul ba): btung mang po dang bcas par mdun na 'don la byino//de nas mdun na 'don de de dang lhan cig dga' ba rgya chen po nyams su myong por byed//re shig na mdun na 'di na de'i
258a6('dul ba): khyim drung na/bya ga gcig gi skad 'byin pa phyogaso de na bram ze ltas mkhan zhig 'gro bas thos nas/des mi gang gis dor sha zos pa de rgyal por 'gyur zhes smras pa dang /
258a7('dul ba): tshog de mdun no 'don gyis thos nas/des bram ze de la dris te//de nas mdun na 'a don gyis bya gag bzung nas bsad de/chung ma la smras pa/bya gag 'di 'phral du chos
258b1('dul ba): shig dang /nga rgyal po lnga pho brang nas slar 'ong ngo zhes byas nas de rgyal blo'i pho brang du song ngo //ji tsam na khyo bza' btung mang po grwa nus bkres te/khyim du 'ongs nam yang mi snod/de nas
258b2('dul ba): des bdag cag gi ci dag bcos/ci zhig bza' snyam nas/re shig na ma ni mo snang gi bltas na rje'u zhog gi rlung na byA ga ga cig mgo skyon du myong zhing 'dug pa mthong //de nas
258b3('dul ba): des kyang rdzi'u yi nang du 'dug bzhin du mgo bcad de zos//ji tsam na ma 'ongs nas/de la mgo sus zlos shas dris pa dang /dris bdag gis 'tshal ho zhes byas pa dang /de nas
258b4('dul ba): khye'u zan byin te grang bting //mdun na 'don kyang 'ongs nas/bza' zhes byas pa dang /bya brag gri mgrin pa mi snang nas/'di'i mgrin pa ga re/chung mas smos pa/khye'us
258b5('dul ba): 'tshal to zhes byas pa dang /de nas byA gag gi lhag ma zos nas/bsams pa/ci re shrig bye gag ril gyis zos pas/rgyal por 'gyur ram/'on te yan lhag mtshang
258b6('dul ba): ba zos pas kyang 'gyur snyam du the tshom skyes nas/the tsom bcung ba'i phyir/thabs gzhan zhig gis bram ze ltas mkhan de nyid bos te/kye bram ze chen po khyod kyis
258b7('dul ba): sngar gang gis bya gag zos pa de rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ci yan lag ma tshang ba zos pa der 'gyur ram/'on te ril gyis zos pas 'gyur/des smras po/yan lag ma
259a1('dul ba): chung yang gang gis da nanas pa rtul por 'gyur//yang na gang gisu de'i mag zos pa de bsadad+ma de de'i mgo zos nu de nyid rgyal por 'gyur//de nas mdun na 'dun
259a2('dul ba): gyis blo skyes pa gzhon 'dri bsod nas 'dra'i mgo bza' ni/mas shes par ma byas nas ni bsad pa'am bza' bar mi nus byas/re shig btubs bamA mi btu ba 'di nyid kyi ma'i
259a3('dul ba): nyam drod blong ngo snyam nas/des snyam pa'i tshig rnam pa du mas bshams te/bzong mo ci khyod rgyal po byas na legs sam/'on te bus rgyal po byas na legs shas smras pa dang /des
259a4('dul ba): zung dang stsol dag las legs par brtags te bsams pa/gal te bus rtul po byas na logs shes smras na/'di bdag las kyang par 'gyur bas/ci nas kyang de dang
259a5('dul ba): 'thun par sla'o snyam nas/des khyos rgyal po byas na leg so shes smras//bud mod de yong mkhas shing mdzangs la/spyod pa can zhig pas/des bsams nA/bya gag gi mgo'i
259a6('dul ba): phyi du'i chung nas/bdag gi bru bsad par chad par 'phrigs te/da ni dus lnga bab kyi ci nas kyang bu bsrung ba bya'o snyam nas/de bu la gsang ste bu khyod kyis bye gag gi mgo
259a7('dul ba): zos pa ni legs pa zhig byas kyis yul 'di nas myur du sing shig/song nas mes po rgyal po byed pa de nas/spyod kyi rang gi skye bo'i tshogs yod pa der bde ba
259b1('dul ba): 'dug shig/de skad smras pa dang /de bros nas lus 'phags su song //de nga lnga zhing bkres skom pas lus bzir te gnas kyi/nye bar 'khor gyi skyed mos tshal gyi shing zhig gi drung du gos shig
259b2('dul ba): gting nas nyal zhing 'dug/de'i tshe rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba nad kyis thebs nas/sman pa dang /smyan dang /nAd g.yog rnams kyis gso bar ma nus nas/ngo shi ste rgyal
259b3('dul ba): po rabs chad//'di ni rgyal po'i chos nyid de/ji srid du gzhan rgyal por dbang ma bskur ba de srid du rgyal po'i ri ma 'byin to//ci tsam na blon po rnams dang /rgyal po'i mi gzhan dang /bram ze
259b4('dul ba): dang ltas mkhan rnams gal te bsod nams kyi dbang tshwar grags pa'i sems can 'ga' zhig rnyed na/de rgyal srid la gzhag go zhes phan tshun tshol zhing song ste/de rnams kyis btsal
259b5('dul ba): ba las/grong khyer gyi phyi rol shing drung zhig na khye'u gzhin nu gzugs bzang ba/blta na sdug pa/mdzes pa/thong kha seng ge 'dra ba nyi ma yol yang shing gi grib ma shar phyogs su mi
259b6('dul ba): 'khor ba ji dA'i lus mi gtong ba zhig 'dug pa mthong ngo //de nas blon po drug pa de rnams kyis de mthong nas ngo mtshar du 'gyur te smras pa/bdag cag gis bsod nams kyi dbang rtse
259b7('dul ba): bar brags pa'i sems can 'di las gzhan bsod nams kyi stongs dang ldan pa mthong ngo //yang 'di ni gzugs bzang ba/blta na sdug pa//mdzes pa/mtshan dang ldan pa zhig
260a1('dul ba): /pas/'di ni rgyal skyid la bzhag par 'o so zhes gcig tu nges par byas nas/bu longs longs zhes bslang //de yang langs te dris pa/da bslangs ta
260a2('dul ba): bya/de dag gis smras pa/rgyal por grazhug/des smras pa/rgyal po nyal ba de ltar bslang ngam/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/'o na ji ltar bslang /gzho nus smras pa//
260a3('dul ba): glu dang sil snyan dang /rol mo'i sgra mi dreg pas bslang mod/de rnams kyis dri thos pa dang /'di snyam du 'di ni rigs dma' ba las byung ba ma yin gyi/'di nges par
260a4('dul ba): rigs mthon po las skyes pa yin snyam nas/de dag gis nges pa/khyod su zhig/su'i bu yin/de nas khye'u gzho nu des kyang seng ge bzhin du bsgyings nas rang gi rigs
260a5('dul ba): smras pa/lus 'phags kyi rgyal po bskyed pa zhes bya ba de'i bu ni bza' btung //bza' btung de'i bu ni bza' btung mang po zhes bya ste nga yin//de nas blon po drag po rnams
260a6('dul ba): 'dzum phyung nas bdag cag gis ni bdag cag nyid kyi gzhon rnyed do zhes smraso//de nas gnas de nyid nas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos yongasu bskor cing /glu dang /sil snyan dang /
260a7('dul ba): rol mo'i sgra shis par brjod pa la sogs pas mdun du drangs te/grong khyer du bcug nas rgyal por dbang bskuro//gang gi phyir 'dis rgyal po'i brgyud chad pa bsams
260b1('dul ba): pade'i phyir/ming bskyed pa kho nar btags nas/de'i ming bza' btud mang po zhes bya ba gang yin pa de med par gyur to//de nas de rgyal srid byed du bcug pa na/byis pa'o snyam nA//
260b2('dul ba): blon po rnams kyis de khyad du bsad de/de la dbang cung zad kyang medado//de nas dus gzhan zhig na/rgyal po bza' btung mang po yul bltar song ste/des grong dang /grong khyer dang //
260b3('dul ba): tshong dus rnams bltas nas grong dang gong khyer dang /ri 'or pa 'ad rnam su'i yin zhes dris pa dang /de dag gis blon po drug kho na'i lag so zhes smras pa dang /de cag pus bsan
260b4('dul ba): pa grong dang grong khyer dang /ri 'or pa'i de su'i yin zhes de skad du gang dang gang la dris pa de dag thams cad de skad zer bas bdag lha zhig bza' ba dang /mgo ba tsam la dbang
260b5('dul ba): phyag byed kyi/gzhan ci la yang mA yino snyam du rang gis rig nas/de sems khongs kyi rgya mtshor chud nas 'di ji ltar bya zhes sam so//de de ltar sems pa na lha zhig gis rgyal
260b6('dul ba): po mi dga' bar ma byed cig/'di ltar khyod nyid kyis yul na ri bor gang po'i mtshan zhes bya ba de ni/sna la gtogs pa zhes bya ba de la/bu sman chen po zhes bya ba zhig
260b7('dul ba): yod par gyur gyis/de khyod kyi blon por chug shig dang /des yul bdag gir byas nas/khyod la 'bul bas khyod la phan po dang /bde ba dang /'dod pa dang ldan par 'gyur
261a1('dul ba): sa bsko/de nas bza' brjod mang pos mi dag mya dgus ste/ra ba gang po'i mtshan de na sna la gtogs pa gang po zhes bya ba de tshal te/gal ta rnyed dang /
261a2('dul ba): de'i chung ma la bu yod dam/med rtogs shig ces bsgo'o//de dag song ste mthong nas dris na/des bdag gi chung ma la bu yod do zhes smras pa dang /de dag slar 'ongs nas
261a3('dul ba): rgyal po la gsol pa/rgyal po sna la gtogs pa de mchis te/de'i mchis blang yang sbrum lagaso//de nas rgyal pos yi ge sbreng ste/gang po bkug nas bshes pa'i
261a4('dul ba): tshig gis/de la ri 'or de byin nis 'dis rang gi bu mo'i lto na 'dug pa de deng phyin chad yongasu skyongs la/ci nas kyang de yan lag gang yang nyams par mi 'gyur ba da ltar
261a5('dul ba): gyis shig ces bsgo'o//de nas de zla ba dgu tshang ba dang /khye'u gzugs bzang ba/mdzes po blta na sdug pa zhig btsas nas/ci 'byor pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas
261a6('dul ba): te/khye'u 'di'i ming ci gdags shes byas na/de'i mas smos pa/bdag 'di ltar yun ring su nad bu can du gyur te/sman pa dang /sman dang /nad g.yog rnams kyis
261a7('dul ba): nad zhi bar bya ma nus pa las/gang gi tshe khye'u 'di ltor zhugs pa de nyid nas nad shi bar gyur pas/des ni 'di'i ming sman chen bir gdags/smras pa/sman rnams
261b1('dul ba): kun gyi nang na ni//bdagra gi bu ni sman chen po//'di ni sman pas lhag pa'i sman//de ltas 'di'i ming sman yino//de nas sman chen po phye'i phrag pa la zhon te/khrus bya ba'i phyir
261b2('dul ba): srad gi dbus nas rdzing bur khyer te song ba las/ri shig na sa'i steng na nya'i dum bu zhig 'dug pa mthong nas/des de lnga rin po che yin mnyam nas/de'i rkang pa'i mtho ngos
261b3('dul ba): se steng nas blang bar brtsams pa dang /ji tsam na sman chen pos smra ba/pha cig gang po rin chen lhung snyam ste//las btang mig mi 'dzums par nya du ma la//rtog cing de nas rin
261b4('dul ba): chen yin par sems//pha cig glang po rtogs shig rin chen me ni//nya du ma dmar po rkang gis 'dril bar zad//rnam thos bu de bag meng spyod ma yin//de nas de rdzing du song nas
261b5('dul ba): gang pos sman chen po dang /gos rdzing 'bram du gzhag ste/khrus bya ba'i phyir chur zhugs pa na/pad+ma'i steng na chu skyar zhig 'dug pa dang /des chu skyar de bzung snyam nas de
261b6('dul ba): de'i drung du sdong ba dang /de yang de nas 'phur to//de nas sman chen pos smras pa/pad+ma'i steng nas chu skyer 'phur//chu skyur 'phur bas pad+ma lhags//pad+ma'i steng nas chu skyar mo//
261b7('dul ba): 'phur ba re shig pha cig gzigs//de nas yang dus phyi zhig na/des sman chen po phrag pa la khyer nas chu bo gang gar khrus byed du song ste/des de dang gos chu 'grom du/
262a1('dul ba): /gzhag nas chur zhugs te/khrus byed pa ni/khar gzhong zhig chu bos khyer ba de'i steng na rang mo zhig 'dug pa mthong //de mthong nas sman chen pos smras pa/
262a2('dul ba): chu bo gang gas khar gzhong khyer//khar gzhong de steng dang mo 'dug/khar gzhong dang mau lhan cig tu//gang gas khyer po pha cig gzigs//ji tsam du dus gzhan zhig na
262a3('dul ba): yang khrus byed cing /sman chen po chu 'gram du gzhag pa dang /re shig na chu bo gang ga'i rgyun phyogasu bum pa zhig khyer ba de'i steng na/chu sreg zhig 'dug pa de'i mthong nas/
262a4('dul ba): sman chen pos pha la smras pa/chu bo gang gas bum pa khyer//de yi steng na chu sreg 'dug/ro shig pha cig bum pa ni//chu sreg gar go bcas te gzigs//ji tsam du dus
262a5('dul ba): gzhan zhig na yang khrus byed par 'dod nas/chu bo gang gar srong ste/des sman chen po chu 'gram du bzhag nas/der khrus byed pa la zhugs po dang /re shig na chu bo gang
262a6('dul ba): ga'i rgyun phyogasu lug thug cig khyer ba de'i steng na byA dkar zhig 'dug pa mthong ngo //de nas dri sman chen pos mthong nas smras pa/chu bo gang gas lug thug khyer//de bzhin
262a7('dul ba): de steng bya dkar 'dug/lug thug bya dkar lhan cig tu//gang gas khyer ba yab cig gzigs//de nas sman chen po de na byis pa rnams dang lhan cig rtsi ba las re
262b1('dul ba): shig na/byis pa de dag 'dus nas/da rgyal por bcug/des kyang kha cig blon por bcug nas/de de dag dang lhan cig rtse zhing 'dug/ji tsam nu dram zo rgan po zhig chung ma ka To nu dar
262b2('dul ba): bab pa zhig dang /khyo ba shug lhan cig tu lam du zhugs nas yul gzhan du 'gro ba las/re shig na bram ze bshang gci'i sar song //de nas g.yon can pho zhig gos 'phrig/
262b3('dul ba): nas/bud med de'i drung du song ste smras po/bzang mo khyod kyi pha de gar song /bud med kyis smras pa/gang zhig de nas g.yon can gyis smras pa/des mes po yin pa lta
262b4('dul ba): zhig/smras pa/'di ci zer ba zhig/de nus g.yon can gyis smras pa/de khyod kyi mes po yin pa lta zhig/bud med kyis smras pa/nga'i pha yang ma yin/mes po yang ma yin//
262b5('dul ba): yang mes kyang ma yin gyi/de ni nga'i khyo yin//de nas g.yon can gyis cung zad cig bag de smras pa/blun mo khyod grogs mo 'am//ngo tsha shes pa gzhan gyi drung du 'di lta bu
262b6('dul ba): nga'i khyo yino zhes smra ba ngo mi tsha 'am/sa skal ldan 'di'i steng na skyes bu lha'i gzugs 'dra bas rab tu gang po khyod kyis ma mthong ngam/'di lta bu gzugs mdzes pa chud/
262b7('dul ba): zos//ngas khyod kyi khyo byas tshur bdag cag dang lhan cig 'dong /gal te khyod kyi phyir bram ze rgan po dang /do 'thab mo zung ba dang /der yang khyod kyis skye bo'i tshogs
263a1('dul ba): chen po la nga'i khyo 'di yin+do zhes nga khyo yin par phyi shig ces byas pa dang /de dang g.yon can 'grogs te song //bram ze yang bshung gci dang bkru bshal//
263a2('dul ba): byas nas langs pa dang /des de ma mthong //re shig na sgang bu mthon po zhig gi steng du 'dzegs nas bltas na/skyes pa gzhan zhig dang 'grogs te song ba mthong nas/
263a3('dul ba): bram ze des brgyugs te lag pA yA cig gis bzung //g.yon can gyis kyang lag pA ya cig nas bzung ba dang /de nas bram zes smras pa/nga'i chung ma ci'i phyir dbrog/
263a4('dul ba): gige yon can gyis smras pa/'di nga'i chung ma yin na/kye ma khyod re 'o rgyal/bram zes kyang nga'i yin zhes smras nas/de gnyis lom 'thab mo byung ste/phar drangs tshur
263a5('dul ba): drangs pa dang /g.yon can de dar la bab pas stobs che nas/bram ze las drangs te phrogaso//de nas bram ze bcom pas 'brog der bram zer ma byas kyis ra mda' log
263a6('dul ba): ces byaso//de'i tshe sman chen pos byis pa rnams dang lhan cig dgon pa ni rtse zhing 'dug pa las/bram zer ma byaso zhes bya ba de yang byis pa drag gis tho so//de nas
263a7('dul ba): byis po de dag gis de la smras pa/kye sman chen po khyod cig na re nga rgyal po'o zhe na/bram ze pha bi bram zer ma byaso zhes 'bod na/de ci'i phyir 'jigs pa las
263b1('dul ba): mi bskyab de nas des byis pa rnams la song ste khrid la shog ces bkye ba dang /byis pa de dag gis de kun khrid de 'ongaso//'di ci zhig ces dris pa dang /bram zes smras pa/bdag
263b2('dul ba): grogaso ma mchis shing nyams chung ba'i chung ma g.yon can stobs po che 'dis phrogaso//g.yon can gyis smras pa/'di brdzun mchi ste/'di ni bdag gi chung ma lagaso//bud med des/

263b4('dul ba): da gzod bud med 'di dang 'grogs te gang nas 'ongs/g.yon can gyis smras pa/gyos po'i khyim nas mchiso//der ci dag zos sam 'thungs/des smras pa/sha dang snum khur
263b5('dul ba): dang /beng tang dang /chad dge 'tshal to//sman chen pos smras pa/gal te de lta na skyugs shig/bden nam brdzun blta'o zhes smras pa dang /des 'dzub mo khar bcug ste skyugs
263b6('dul ba): bA na kha zas de lta bu cang ma byung ngo //'dul ba 'phran tshegs kyi gzhi////bam po so gsum pa//bram ze de la gang nas 'ongs zhes dris pa/bram ze des gyes po'i
263b7('dul ba): khyim nas mchis zhes smras//der ci zos der dar ba dang zan dang la phug dang nas kyi khur ba rnams zoso zhes smra so//des skyugs shig bsgo ba dang /des spyugs pa dang /
264a1('dul ba): ci zos ci 'thungs pa mngon du byung ngo //de ltar gyur nas sman chen pos skyes pa g.yon can 'dis ni gzhan ma bslus te/bram ze'i chung ma phrogs snyam
264a2('dul ba): bsams nas/g.yon can de dbyug pa dang //bu tshur gyis brdegs nas/mi nub pa'i dang brkos te mgrin pa man chad sa dong du bcug nas/rma byi'i khris pas dpral par
264a3('dul ba): bris te gang su yang rung bud med la 'di bzhin du rkun/sman chen pos 'di lta bu'i chad pas bcad do//gang gis bud med brkus pa bzhin du/rgyas par byis pa rku ba
264a4('dul ba): blaglang chub dang lnga bcu ba dang skud pa rku ba la sogs pa 'di lta bu lnga brgya bzung nas/dbyug pa dang /khu tshur gyis brdegs te/mgrin pa man chad sa dod du bcug nas/dpral

264a6('dul ba): sha mngon du zos par rgyal pos mthong nas 'di snyam du blo skyes//sman chen po de da wAr ni 'dra bar 'dug pa ltud mo lta'o snyam nas/blon po rnams la nga ni rI dgas
264a7('dul ba): shor du 'gro'o zhes byas la/ri brags kyi grong rdal du blto'o snyam nas/ri dgas shir du 'gro ba ltar byas te/'khor mang po 'dus pa dang /ri brags kyi grong
264b1('dul ba): log su chas pa dang /g.yon can lnga brgya sa'i dong du bcug pas rgyal po de mthong nas/mang po kun gyis rgyal po zhes bo so//rgyal pos sgra de thos nas/mi mi snang nas kun tu bltas
264b2('dul ba): kyang /dar skad kyi sgra grags nas/de la g.yon can gcig giso mthong nas rgyal po la bzlas te/rgyal pos bltas pa dang /bral ba la rma bya'i 'khris pas bris pa klags
264b3('dul ba): ba na/gang bud med rku ba dang /byis pa rku ba dang /glang rku ba dang /la ba rku ba la sogs pa rnams/sman chen pos 'di lta bu'i chad pas bcad zhes briso//sman chen po la sogs
264b4('dul ba): pa byis pa de rnams rgyal po mthong nas/kun tu broso//de nas rgyal po des de'i las byas pa mthong nas/sems dga' mgu ste/byis pa yin mod kyi 'di lta bu'i byed pa

264b6('dul ba): dang /gdugs dang /bya ngan dang /rgyal mtshan la sogs pas bsu ba dang /rgyal pos kyang ma 'jigs shig ces byas nas/glang po la khyod kyi bu blta yos khrid de shog ces

265a5('dul ba): dpon gang pos de thos nas/rab tu sems shing mi dga' sngangs skrag ste/bdag 'di tsam du skyes nas ma mthong ma thos pa'i klan ka zhig bdag la tshe lo//zhes smras te/
265a6('dul ba): shin tu mi dga' ba dang /gang po la sman chen pos phra ni nyes te mi dga' zhes smras pa dang /phas bu bdag gis tshe rabs kyang ma zlos ma mthong ba rgyal pos phab na/
265a7('dul ba): ci'i thabs zhig gis chad pas gcod par byed dam mi sheso zhes smras pa dang /de nas sman chen pos smras pa/mi de bdag dang sprod cig dang /rgyal po bskyed pa la lan
265b1('dul ba): bdag gis spring ngo zhes pa dang /phas pho nya dang spyad pa dang /sman chen pos pho nya la bdag gis gsol ba 'di rgyal po la ma brjed par gyis shing //bdag cag yul 'khor ba blo
265b2('dul ba): rtsid la mi mkhas shing blun pas ma 'tshal te/rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/bkal bar 'tshal na/lhas dpo khru gang ba cig bkalA te bdag la bkur te/dpe de la bltas la/

265b4('dul ba): pos smras pa/'di skad gang po zer ma bu n+de zhes slar dris na/pho nyas/lha sman chen po gzhon 'di skad mchi'o zhes smras pa dang /de nas rgyal po ngo mtshar skyes te/byasams
265b5('dul ba): pa 'di ni lhas bstan pa yang dag pa ste/'dis ni bdag gis rgyal srid rgyas par byed par mngon//de nas yang dus phyi zhig na/rgyal pos sman chen po la bag mo par 'dod na//

265b7('dul ba): yin/daphyi rol kyang ma yin/mes kyang ma yin/mi med pa yang ma yin par chos la lam du byor te mi 'ang /lam ma yin par yang khyer te mi 'ong /nyi mas kyang ma phog/

266a2('dul ba): cig ces spring pa dang /rgyal po'i bka' khyer nas/pho nya des rim gyis grong dang /grong khyer dang /grang rdal lha'i zhing rim gyi ri brags kyi grong khyer ga la bi der song ste/

266b1('dul ba): sul te/rdo thugs ste sgra zlum khar banas nas/myos kyang ma yin/mo me pas kyang ma yin par chos shog pa ni/de'i dusu ni me stong nas no nyams ldaca so//lam du
266b2('dul ba): yin lam me yin par yang ma yin par khyer te sheg shig pa ni skyes bu la bsgo ba/rkang pa ya cig lam du song la/rkang pa ya cig lam ma yin par song cig/nyi ma la yang
266b3('dul ba): ma yin/grib ma la yang khyer te me 'ong shog pa ni/mi dri la bsgo ba/dbyug pa'i rtse mo la rdze'u mchis pa'i gos srab mos g.yogs te song shig/gzhon pas kyang ma

266b5('dul ba): med kyis kyang ma yin par khyer te shog shig pa ni/ma ning la bkur ba'o//rgyal po bskyed pa'i drung du de khyer de 'ongs na/rgyal po bskyod pas mi de la dris po/des rgyal po la zhib
266b6('dul ba): tu smras pa dang /rgyal pos thos nas dga' ste/ci gang pos bsgo ste bkur ram/'on te sman chen pos bsgo zhes dris pa dang /pho nyas sman chen pos sku ro zhes smras//

267a1('dul ba): ste/'dri ltar bskyed mos tshal ldumA ra dang /bza' shing dang /rdzing bur ldan pa skur cig ces sbring pa dang /dri nas pho nya de puN+Da kar+b+ha'i grong rdal du phyin

267b1('dul ba): skur byar gastso/ngas kyi bskyed mos tshul de ji ltar mchis pa la bltas te brlabs nas/de'i rjes bzhin du btang bar 'tshal zhes spring pa dang /de nas po nyi do slar btang ste rgyal po la/

269a3('dul ba): denas rgyal pos bgad de ci glang po'i yid brtan pa/phe zer ram/'oni te sman chen po 'am/su zhes dris pa dang /nyas lha sman chen po lagaso zhes smraso//rgyal po dang /

270a1('dul ba): bsgrubs na 'di'i thabs ni mi snang zhes smras te/de yang rmug nas de'i thabs sems pa las/des pha la khyod kyis don de bsgrub par nus na/thabs cig

270a3('dul ba): de nas gang pos smras pa/ci nas bdag gi 'tsho ba dang bral bar mi gyur ba de ltar gyis shig/de nas sman chen pos pha'i mgo bo skra khrem gnyer bdun du bregs te/li kri
