403b6('dul ba): de la rtse dga' yongasu spyad pas chung ma sems can dang ljon par 'gyur te/ne mau gyi tshe sems can dang ldan par gyur pa de'i nyin mo nyid du ri las khrung khrung gi skad phyung //
403b7('dul ba): de zla ba dgu 'das pa dang /khye'u zhig btsas te/gzugs legs shing bsta na sdug pa bzang ba zhig ste/btsas ma thag tu yang ri las khrung khrung gi skad phyung //de bdag
404a1('dul ba): gis rigs dang 'thun pa'i rgyud ga nig pa thams cad kyis bcas pa'i baHsa snron nAr byas te/ming 'dogs pa la zhug so//khye'u 'di'i med
404a2('dul ba): cing bdags shes bgros na/gnyan bshes dag gis 'di mAngal du zhugs pa na yang ri las khrung khrung gi skrod phyung bcas pa na yang khyung khrung gi skang phyung la pha yang
404a3('dul ba): sa ta zhes 'byung ste/de bste nA khye'u 'di'i ming yang sa te ka rir gdag so zhes smras nas/de'i rmongs kai r-i ri btag so//khye'u sa taM kA ri dwa gsos po snyed du cher
404a4('dul ba): gyur pa dang /ji tsam dus phyi zhig na gau nad sbyin+da sa ta chung ma dang brdzus par 'das nas/sa ta ki ri khyim gyi bdag por gyur pa dang /gnod sbyin gyi bu mo dge'i byed mas
404a5('dul ba): pata k+ki ri la ming po rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag gi bu btsas shing bcas pa dag phrogs te/phrogs nas zla bar 'dod do zhes smras pa dang /des smras
404a6('dul ba): pa/srin mo yu bu cag gi phas yul mnyam dgi'i rgyal po mkhas pa can gzugs can snying po dang /btsun ma dang /gzhon nu dang /blon po dang /grong dang /gling
404a7('dul ba): khyer ba dang /yul mi rnams la rtag tu srung ba dang /skyong ba dang /skyongs par byed do zhes thos nas/yu bu cag gis rab tu bsrung bar bya bar rigs te/'di ni yu
404b1('dul ba): bu cag gi spyod yul yin gyis 'di la gzhan dag cig gis kyang byed na de la yu bu cag gis dgag pa'i rigs na ci'i phyir khyod kyis de bzhin byas mi rigs par khyod kyi sems
404b2('dul ba): skyed pa de slar zlog cig ces bsgo'o//de log pa'i smon lam gyi bag tshogs kyis bsgo bas bcos su ma btub ste/yang swo ta ki ri la ming po rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo
404b3('dul ba): mang po ngag gis bum tsas shing btsas pa dag phrogs shing phrogs nas bza' bar 'tshalo zhes smras pa dang /sa ta ki ris de'i dus kyis brten pa las na bco su mi btub
404b4('dul ba): par shes te/'di phyi phyir zhing rtag tu dgag mi nus kyi 'di phas kyang sngar byin te/bgra mar btang ngo snyam bsams nas/des gnod sbyin pany+tsa la bu mo dga' byed ma ni na
404b5('dul ba): chung ngu gyur kyis tshur gshegs la bag ma long shog ces yi ge spring pa dang /gnod sbyin pany+tsa la des gnod sbyin gzhon nu ma dga' byed ma dpal chen po dad sbyar te/bag
404b6('dul ba): mar blangs nas yul ga d+ha rar khrid do//gnod sbyin gzhon nu pAny+tsi ka de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongasu spyod//mo nam mdze' zhing spob pa dang /dga' zhing yido bde ba ma
404b7('dul ba): por gyur pa de'i tshe rmos jo bo rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i spyi ba mang po dag gi bu btsas shing btsas pa dag phrogs shing phrogs te/bza' bar 'tshalo zhes smras pa dang /
405a1('dul ba): des smras pa/bzang mo de ni khyod kyi gnyen gyi gnas yin te/der gzhan dgacig rgyal ka byed na yang ji bdag cag gis dgag pa'i rigs na khyod kyis
405a2('dul ba): ci'i phyir de lta khyod kyis mi rigs pa sems bskyed pa slar zlog shig ces bsgon de sngon gyis log pa'i smon lam gyi bag chags bsgos pas sdod cig ces smos te/
405a3('dul ba): cang mi zer bar 'dug go/de gnod sbyin gzhon nu pAny+tsi kA dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyad pas bu pho zhig btsas te/de'i btsas ston chen po rgya cher byas te//
405a4('dul ba): rigs dang 'thun pa'i ming btagaso//de bzhin lan gnyis lan gsum nas/bu lnga brgya' bor du bcas te de dag thams cad kyi tha chungs kyi ming dga' byed du btag+sa/
405a5('dul ba): so//de nam bu las mthu rnyed par gyur pa na/de na pAny+tsi kas bzlog kyang ma bzlog nas do ni dga' bar gyur te/mi smra bar 'dug/de nas gnod sbyin mo dgo' byeng mi
405a6('dul ba): gar dga' bar rang nyam du 'gro zhing rgyu ba dang /gnas par gyur to//des rgyal po'i khab na skye bo mang po dag gi bu btsas shing bcas pa dag phrogs shing phrogs
405a7('dul ba): nas bza' bar brtsasas pa dang /rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag gis rgyal po sems can snying pa la lha bdag cag gi bu btsas shing btsas pa
405b1('dul ba): dag cig gis phrogs na su zhig bdag cag la gnod pa bgyid pa rma ba'i rig so zhes gsol pa dang /rgyal po gnas thams cad la dbang ba rnams la kye rgyal po'i khab na gnas
405b2('dul ba): li'i skye bo mang po dag gi bu btsas shing btsas pa dag sus phrogs pa smros shig ces bsgo na/de dag gis nan tan du bag yod par rmed pa la zhugs pa dang /ji tsam na
405b3('dul ba): yang de dag gis yang 'phrogs par gyur pa nas gnod pa cher gyur te/su gang gi bud med sems can dang ldan par gyur pa des yul gzhan du phyung ste/bzhag pa dang /
405b4('dul ba): blon pa dag gis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la lha gnod pa cher gyur te/su gang gang gi bud med dag sems can dang ldan par gyur na/des yul gzhan du phyung ste/
405b5('dul ba): bzhag zhes gsol pa dang /rgyal pos bltas mkhan bkug ste/smras na de dag gis lha gnod sbyin khros kyis/gnod sbyin gyi gnas su gtor ma stsal nas/mi tshong
405b6('dul ba): pa dang /bkur bsti mdzod cig ces gsol to//rgyal pos blon po rnams la/kye song lnga rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du dril bsgrags par byos shig/rgyal po'i
405b7('dul ba): khab na skye bo mang po thams cad dang /yul so so ni gnas pa thams cad kyis gnod sbyin gyi gan su gtor ma byin lo mchod pa dang /bkur bsti byos shig ces
406a1('dul ba): bsgo ba dang /de dag gis de bzhin du dril bsgrags te/kye rgyal po'i khab dang grong khyer dang yul so so nas lhags pa'i skye bo nyon cig/lhas
406a2('dul ba): 'di skad bka' stsal te/bdag gi yul dang grong khyer dang yul so so nas lhags pa'i skye bo mang po gnas pa rnams kyis/gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad du/
406a3('dul ba): gtor ma byin la mchod pa dang /bkur bsti byas shig ces bsgo ba dang /rgyal po'i khob na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag gis grong khyer de dag rdo ba dang gyo mo dang
406a4('dul ba): sa rdo dag phyags te tsan+dan gyi chus chag chag btob nas/dri zhim po'i pog por dag so sor sbyangs/rgyal mtshan dang /lha'i 'phan bsgreng /dar gyi lnga ldi mang
406a5('dul ba): pos ni sbyangs te/me tog smra tshogs kyis gtor nas/lha rnams kyi bskyed mos tshal dga' ldan bzhin du mdzes par byas so//de nas gnod sbyin gyi gnas
406a6('dul ba): thams cad du gtor ma byin zhing mchod pa dang /bkur bista byas te/'on kyang dga' byed ma zhi ba bar ma gyur to//de nas rgyal lo'i khab na gnas pa'i lha dag gri
406a7('dul ba): rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag/kye khyed la gnod sbyin dga' byed mas khyad kyi bu rnams phrogs kyis khyed thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du
406b1('dul ba): dod pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis de 'dul bar mdzad do zhes bstan to//de dag gis kye 'di ni dga' byed ma ma yin gyis de ni 'phrog ma ste/des bdag cag gi bu bcas
406b2('dul ba): shIng bcas pa rnams phrog so zhes smras pa dang /de'i ming dga' byed ma zhes bya ba mdogs te/gnod sbyin 'phog mar ming du gyur to//de nas rgyal po'i khab na gnas
406b3('dul ba): pa'i skye bo mang po dag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs yo mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das gnad sbyin
406b4('dul ba): mo 'phyogs ma 'di rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo meng po la yun ring po na se ma 'khon pa dang ni 'khon/dgror ma gyur pa dang ni dgrar gyur/skad mi ring po
406b5('dul ba): la ni snying ring bar gyur/des bu btsas pa rnams ni phrogs na/bcom ldan 'das thugs rje can thugs rtse ba'i phyir gnod sbyin ma 'phrog ma 'dul bar ci gnang zhe
406b6('dul ba): gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bzhin/rgyal po'i khabe na gnas pa'i skye ba mang po la gan //de nas rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i sgyu blo mang ba
406b7('dul ba): dag gis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsungs pa bzhin gnang bar shes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das kyi drung na
407a1('dul ba): song ngo //de nas snga dro bcom ldan 'das kyis sham thabs dang chos gos ban pas lhung bzed bsnams nas/rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms kyi
407a2('dul ba): phyir gshegaso//rgyal po'i khab na bsod soms las slar bskor nas/zas kyi bya ba byas te/bsod snyoms phyis len pa spangs te gshegs nas gnod sbyin ma
407a3('dul ba): 'phrog ma'i gnas gang na ba der gshegs so//de'i tshe na gnod sbyin ma 'phrog masau bu dga' byed khyim du bzhag ste/spyod yul du song pa dang /bcom ldan 'das
407a4('dul ba): kyis de lhung bzed kyis bkab ste bzhag nas/ji ltar bu phu dag gis de mi mthong nga//des de dag thams cad mthong ba ro la'agyur pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs so//
407a5('dul ba): de ma thag tu gnod sbyin mo 'phrog ma spyod yul nas 'ongs pa dang /bu dga' byed mi snad nas/de bsngangs te phan tshun khyim kho ra khor yug tu bltas na 'on kyang
407a6('dul ba): mi snang nas/bu thams cad la bu drog bu dga' byed mi snang na ga re/de dag gis mi bdag cag gis kyang ma mtho ngo zhes smras pa dang /des br-ing bsrung nas
407a7('dul ba): mdog nyams shing mi dga' ste/mig mchis gong 'gros myur bar brgyugs te/rgyal po'i khab gyi grong dang /tshod 'dus dang srad dang lam gyi bzhi mdo dang //
407b1('dul ba): lam gyi sum mdo dang /kun dga' ra ba dang /bskyed mos tshal dang /mtsho dang /lteng kwa dang /rdzing dang /lha khang dang /mdun khang dang /gzhan yang khyim bdog pa'o
407b2('dul ba): gnas dag tu btsal na 'on kyang ma rnyed do//des bla gos med pas myos nas ngu zhing sme ba kyi hud bu kyi hud pha kyi hud dga' byed ces yang dang yang sgra 'byin cing /grong dang
407b3('dul ba): grong khyer dang grong mdab dang /pho brang dang pho brang 'khor rnam su bltas te 'on kyang ma rnyed do//de nas shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por song ngo //lho phyogs dang /nub
407b4('dul ba): phyogs dang /byang phyogs kyi rgya mtshor song ngo //shar phyogs dang /lho phyogs dang /nub phyogs dang /byang phyogs de dag na yang mi srung //de nas skrag cing sgren
407b5('dul ba): yir gyur gros kyang 'khyer yang 'tshong mar lhung sa la 'gro'o//bus mr-is 'gro/tsog pur 'dug pa de'i lta bu'i thabs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi ri nag po bdun rgal/gsar
407b6('dul ba): lta bu'i ri bdun dang gad kyi ri dang /ma dros pa'i mtsho chen po dang /ri dri rgyas dag tu yang btsal te/de nas de skad cher ngu zhing shar phyogs kyi lus 'phags gling dang
407b7('dul ba): nub phyogs kyi ban glang spyod dang /byang gi sgra mi sman rnams kun pa tsal yang ma rnyed do//de napa yang song dang /thib nag po dang /'dus gtub dang /'o dod 'bad pa dang
408a1('dul ba): 'a dad char 'bod pa dang /bsreg pa dang /rab tu sreg pa dang /mnar med pa dang /chu bur dang /shin tu chu bur dang /a ha ha zhes zer
408a2('dul ba): pa dang /ha hA pa dang /hu hu ba dang /ung ba la lta bu dang /pad+ma chen po lta bu la sogs pa dang /sems can dmyal ba dag tu btsal na yang ma rnyed do//de nu
408a3('dul ba): ri rab kyi bang rim dang por 'dzegs nas/gnyis pa dang /gsum par 'dzegs/grwa don sbyin gyi bdag po ngal bso po la ma dris par sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i
408a4('dul ba): gan su btsal te/bskyed mos tshul shing rta sna tshogs zhes bya ba dang /rtsub por 'gyur ba dang /'dras pa dang /dga' ba zhes bya ba'i bskyed mos tshel bu
408a5('dul ba): yang btsal te/pa rI yo tra go bin d+ha ri'i drung du yang song ngo //de nas lha'i 'dun sar+g+haMs bzangs zhes bya ba grong khyer bzang po'i nang du zhugs te/de nas brgya
408a6('dul ba): byin lha'i dbang po'i khang pa rnam par rgyal du 'gro bar btsams pa dang /der gnod sbyin lagla na rdo rje la sogs pa gnod sbyin du ma dang /lho stong gis gzungs
408a7('dul ba): pa dang /de myur du mgyogs par grong khyer bzangs po'i nang nas byung ste/phyogs gzhan zhig tu ring zhig tu gnas nas mdor na yi chad par 'gyur te/gnod
408b1('dul ba): skyon rnams kyi bdag po rdul bas pa'i drung du sod nas/dz+r-IM lob la bdag gi lus pa byas nas/kye hud bu kyi ts+tshad /kyai ts+tshang dga' byed ces skye zhes pa//sngo nga
408b2('dul ba): na b+h+yo pa m+b+ha phrogs mi dga' na/bu skyid nA sbrul du gsopa zhes smra sde pa dang /gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po chen po ngal byas pas skyes pa/tshi zhes mya ni thong mchim
408b3('dul ba): phyis shig khyod kyis gan su nyin par gnas shI su 'ongs soms shig ces smras pa dang /des smras pa/skye dpon dge slong go'u ta ma lagaso//des de ste de
408b4('dul ba): bzhin song la/bcom ldan 'das la skyabasu song shig dang /khyod la dga' byid de bcom ldan 'das kyis ston to zhes smras pa dang /de srog sbyar ba lngas
408b5('dul ba): slar skyed pa bzhin du rings shing myur du rang gi gnas su song pa dang /gnod sbyin mo 'phrog mas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
408b6('dul ba): sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan dpe byang bzang pos su smras/nyi zer stong las 'das pa'i 'od 'dab gang gis rgyun pa rin po che'i ri 'gro ba bzhir kha ra khor
408b7('dul ba): yug nas bzang ba mthong ma thag tu dga' ba skyes//bu dnga'abyed rnyed do snyam nas bcom ldan 'das gdan po der song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das/
409a1('dul ba): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/gnod sbyin ma 'phrog mas/bcom ldan 'das la
409a2('dul ba): 'di skad ces gsol to//kye 'go'u ta ma khyod kyis bdag gi bu dga' byed bstan du gsol/bdag gi bu dge' byed ma mthong nas/ring zhig lon no zhes skyes pa dang /
409a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin mo 'phrog ma la 'phrog ma khyad la buM myang zhe na/ji snyed yod smras pa dang /des smras pa/bcom ldan 'das bu lnga brgya mchis so//
409a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phyog mau de ste/khyod kyi bu lnga brgya las cig cog med pa lta ci nyes shes rmas pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag gi dge'i byed ma mthong na/
409a5('dul ba): khrag dron mo skyugs te gdon mi za bar dus bgyidado zhes gsol pa dang /'phrog ma khyod kyi bu lnga brgya las cig ma mthong ni yang 'di 'dra bar sdug bsngal na gang la
409a6('dul ba): bu gcig pu yod pa yang khyod kyis bsad de zas na/de'i sdug bsngal ci 'dra bar gyur/des bcom ldan 'das de bas sdug bsngal ba rab tu che'o zhes gsol
409a7('dul ba): pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/phrog mo khyod bu dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal 'di 'dra bar shes bzhin du gzhan gyi bu ci'i phyir zla/nges rdo rtse
409b1('dul ba): ldan 'das bdag gis ji ltar bgyi ba'i bka' stsol cig ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshur sho ka nga la skabasu song ste/bslab pa'i gzhi zung la rgyal po'i khab na
409b2('dul ba): gnas pa'i skye bo mang po'i mi 'jigs pa byin cig dang gal te 'di nyid na 'dug bzhin du dga' byed mthong bar gden mi za ba zhes bko' stsal pa dang /des btsun pa 'di ltar deng phran chad
409b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la skyab su mchi ba dang /bslab pa'i gzhi bzung ste/rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po la yang mi 'jigs pa stsal to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i
409b4('dul ba): bu dga' byed bstan nas/des kyang bcom ldan 'das la skyabasu spong nas/bslab pa'i gzhi bzung ste/rgyal po'i khyab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po la mi 'jig pa byin no//
409b5('dul ba): nam gyi tshe 'phrog ma bcom ldan 'das la skyabasu song /bslab pa'i gzhi gzungs nas rgyal po'i khab ni gnas pa'i skye bre mang po rnams la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa de'i
409b6('dul ba): tshe/dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/the tsam thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la btsun pa gnod sbyin 'phrog mas las ci bkyis/los gang
409b7('dul ba): rnam par smin pas na/mdangos 'phrog ma'i gnod sbyin mor skyes la 'di las bu lnga brgya bcas zhes zhus pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
410a1('dul ba): gyur //'jug sa su las byas shing sa smras pa ni gzhan gyis myong ba myi 'gyur//dge sbyi rnams smai skyes shing byas/sa pa b+h+ya /rdzu sa khams la
410a2('dul ba): rnam pa snye /la khamamalam yin/ rnams lam seMn+ta/rlung gi khams la ma yin /rten po phyung ba dang //rnams dang skye sa 'di la
410a3('dul ba): bi dang /mi dge pa'i las smras pa rnam par smin to//las rnams ste ba mI g+hA sh+ya//bkal pa dag ni ban+d+ha ni kyang+tha//dus dang 'phred nas thob pa ni/
410a4('dul ba): rnams la 'bras bu smod//dge slong dgi sbyin 'das phyi'i dusan byung ba ni rgyu pa'i khaba'i di nyid ni gang lhor gzhan zhig/dri ba le ba zhig gnas pa des/
410a5('dul ba): dang mnyam pa las chung mo zhig blangs te/des de dang ldan cig tu rtse dag sangs spyad du//de la mi dge ng+gA yongs spyad pas/dus phyi zhig na chung ma sems can
410a6('dul ba): de gyu /ngas rgyas sa 'byeng na ngas su rgyas 'jug /byams shing ngaman pa'i thugs kyil gnas pa'i mi thang rgyab
410b1('dul ba): rtun pa'i oMn+d+ra gnas gcig pa'o//ji tsam nu rang sangs rgyas gzhan zhig yul rgyu zhing rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs te/de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab tu tho khye du du
410b2('dul ba): bar gyur te//der spun zan pa lnga brgya tsam zhig gtsang zhing bskyod pa'i bza' ba dang /bca' ba ra te/gos sna tshogs kyis klubs me tog tu
410b3('dul ba): dri zhim pos brgyan ti/glur byed glu len/rdo rje zhing bskyed mos tshul gyi sar dod pa'i bar du ba lang rdzi mo zhig dar ba bum pa gang thogs te/lam de na mdu song pa
410b4('dul ba): dang /spun zan pa de dag gis de ma thong nas/grog so mo nur shog/glu blang ngo zhes smras pa dang /des kyang de dag gar ji ltar byeng ba de lta de ltar byas pas//de'i mngal
410b5('dul ba): zhig par gyur te/de khrus nus rlung sangs rgyas la am+b+ha'i 'bra ste bu sbyin pa lnga brgya phul nas smon lam btab pa/dge ba'i rtsu bo 'ongs pa dag gang dang gang du skyes pa dang
410b6('dul ba): mngangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin mo zhig tu skyes la rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams kyi bu dang bu mo dag gis phrogs te/za bar gyur cig/bdag la bu lnga brgya btsas byar gyur cig
410b7('dul ba): ces smras so//dge slong dag de'i tshe ba ling rje'i chung mar gyur pa ni da ltar 'phrog ma 'ad moni te/smon lam btab pa'i dbang gis 'di lta bur skyes pa yin no//
411a1('dul ba): 'dul ba phra ma'i dngos po//bam po zhe gnyis pa//gleng gzhi ni gnyen du yod pa na ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma dgon pa la gnas
411a2('dul ba): par mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /de dag tshongs 'dus dang /srang dang lam gyi sum mdo drug tu bsam gtan la zhugs pa dang /de yang nyes pa'i dmig su gyur te//
411a3('dul ba): de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bas na/dge slong ma dag dbyar mo khang du gnas par bya'o//zhes
411a4('dul ba): bka' sbal pa dang /dad pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la dbyar mo khang gnod zhes thos nas/de dag gis grong
411a5('dul ba): khyer gyi pha rol tu dge slong ma'i dbyar mo khang brtsigs pa dang /dge slong me dgu la de bzhin du mi rgod dang /nal gyi bu dang /su'i bu gtol med pa dag glags lha
411a6('dul ba): bor gyur na sra/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gris bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bas na dge slong ma'i dbyar mo khang
411a7('dul ba): grong khyer gyi phyi rol tu ma rtsig par grong khyer gyi nang du brtsig par bya'o zhes bka' ba spel to//gleng ge zha ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/dge slong ma sbom dga' mo
411b1('dul ba): dbyar mo khang gi sgon 'dug ste/bram ze dang khrim bdag la 'phyas pa dang /de dag 'phya zhing smon dran du zer te/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol na/
411b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/gang nyes pa'i dmig su gyur pa ni/dge slong ma dbyar mo khang gi sgo na 'dug pa'i phyir te/de lta bas na dge slong ma dbyar mo khang gi skyon 'dug
411b3('dul ba): par mi bya bar dgongs nas//dge slong rnams bka' stsal pa//dge slong rnams bram ze dang khyim bdag dag 'phya ba ni gnas yin te/de lta ngas na dge slong ma dbyar mo khang gi sgo
411b4('dul ba): na 'dug par mi bya'o//dge slong mas dbyar mo khang gi sgo na 'dug na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyuraro//gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma dbyar mo
411b5('dul ba): khang gi sgo na 'dug par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /sbom dga' mo skar khung du 'dug ste/bram ze dang khyim bdag la 'phya ba dang /de dag kyang dor 'phya bas snga ma bzhin te/dge
411b6('dul ba): slong mas skar khrung du 'dug par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/dge slong ma skar khung du 'dug na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyuraro//sdom ni s+yA kik+Shau ni gnang ba dang /skyes pa
411b7('dul ba): 'khru bar khrus mi bya//srang dag tu ni mi 'gro ste//de dge bsnyen par des rdzogs//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na 'dze ti'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi
412a1('dul ba): kun dga' raban bzhugs teng slong ma k+Shi byung ba 'dun rgyas gos lnga gyun to//las kun byed pa dang /de dag nyon mangs par gyur te//dmyur gyur pa/
412a2('dul ba): zothos nas dge sbyong ma dag gis dge slong la smras pa dang /dge slong ba dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bas na dge slong ma sung
412a3('dul ba): kAk+Shi gnang gi gyen te/dbyar mo khang gi las kun byos shig ces bka' stsal to//bram ze dang khyim bdag dag dbyar na khang du 'ongs na/yang de dag de bzhin du sad ka
412a4('dul ba): ljon pas las byed de/de dag chags par gyur nas/gzhan dang dag ni 'phya'o//dwa ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis thos te/bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das
412a5('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag bram ze dang /khyim bdag 'phya ba ni gnas smin te/de lte bas na dge slong ma bram ze dang /khyim bdag gi mdun na sang ka TI gyon te
412a6('dul ba): las mu byed cig/dge slong mas bram ze dang khyim bdag gi mdun du sang ka kI gyon pas las byed na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur//'di ltar nam bram ze dang /khyim
412a7('dul ba): bdag gi mdud du las byed pa de'i tshe/sa ko kIs dpung pa gami gas la sang gage gyon te/oMs kun byos shig/gleng gzhini gnyen du yod pa na ste/sdom dga'am
412b1('dul ba): skyes pa 'khru ba'i sar nges khrus byas pa dang /khye'u dang gzhonu dag gis de mthong nas cig la cig gtam du ze ba ni/kye ltos shig dge sbyong ma mgo byi mo de'i lus ni nags kyi
412b2('dul ba): mau he bzhi no//de ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag gis dge slong lA smras pa dang /dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
412b3('dul ba): gang su zhig dge slong ma skyes pa 'khru ba'i sar 'khru na nyes pa'i dmigs yin te/de lta bus na dge slong mas skyes pa 'khru ba'i sar khrus mi bye bar dgongs nas/
412b4('dul ba): dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/dge slong rnams bram ze dang khyim bdag 'phya ba ni gnas yin te/de lta bas na dge slong mas skyes pa 'khru ba'i gnasu ma 'khru shig/
412b5('dul ba): dge slong mas skyes pa 'khru ba'i sar 'khru na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur//gleng gzhi ni gnyen du yod pa na ste/dge slong ma sbom dga' mo laM gyi bzhi mngon 'dug nas/
412b6('dul ba): bram ze dang khyi mo bdag rnams la 'phyas pa dang /de dag gis kyang dge sbyong mgo reg mo lam gyi bzhi mdor 'dug ste/yu bu cag la 'phya yis ltos shig ces
412b7('dul ba): 'phya'o//ngo ltar gyur pa dge slong ma ngag gis thos nas dge slong dag la smras pa dang /dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das
413a1('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag bram ze dang khyim bdag dag ni 'phya ba ni gnas yin te/de lta bas na dge slong mas srang du ma 'a shig/
413a2('dul ba): 'gro na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur//gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/tshe dang ldan+do pa u pa li sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhugs pa/btsun pa bcom
413a3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis ni go'u ta ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo bla ma'i chos khas blangs pas rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong mu'i dngos por 'gyu ro zhes gsung pa na/
413a4('dul ba): ci btsun pa dge slong ma lnga brgya de dag gis kyang bla mi'i chos khas blangs pas rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong ma'i dngos por 'gyur lags sami/
413a5('dul ba): u pa li dge slong ma lnga brgya de dag kyang bla ma'i chos khas blangs pas rab tu byung zhi nga bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong mi'i dngos por 'gyuraro//sngam ni/ji ltar mtshan
413a6('dul ba): gnyis pa dang yang //de bzhin gle yang 'dams gyur pa//rtag tu khrag rab 'jig pa dang //tha ma yi ni khrag med pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod
413a7('dul ba): pa na 'dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/mnyan du yod pa na dge slong ma gzhan zhig gis mtshon gnyis pa zhig rab tu phyung ba
413b1('dul ba): dang /des dge slong ma dag la mtshan ma bstan nas/dge slong ma dag gis de la phu nu mo khyod ji lta bu zhes dris pa dang /des smras pa/che zhes mtshan gnyis ma'o//de ltar gyur//
413b2('dul ba): pa dge slong ma dag gis dge slong la smras pa dang /dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag mtshan gnyis
413b3('dul ba): ma ni ma ni de yin gyis dge slong khyed kyi mtshan gnyis pa de skrod cig/dge slong mtshan gnyis pa ni chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu skye ba'i chos can du yi 'gyur//de lta bas na gang
413b4('dul ba): su zhig rab tu 'byung bar 'dod de/de 'ongs na de la de dag gis khyod mtshan gnyis pa ma yin nam zhes dris shig/ma dris par rab tu phyung na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyuraro//
413b5('dul ba): gleng bzhi ni gnyan du yod pa na ste/gnyen du yod pa na dge slong mo gzhan zhig gis gle 'dams pa zhig rab tu phyung nas de chab khung ser song ste/gcis pa dang /de yang
413b6('dul ba): gshang gci gnyis ka byung ste/de slar phyung ba dang /dge slong ma gzhan zhig der zhugs pa dang /chab khung sa ga shang bas ma rung bar gyur pa des mthong nas/des nu
413b7('dul ba): mo chab khung sa 'di gshang pas ma rung par sus byas shes dris pa dang /des tshe zhes bdag gis bag ma mchis pas ma rung bar gyis so zhes smras pa dang /des
414a1('dul ba): tsu mo khyod kyis bag med pa ci zhig byas shes dris pa dang /des smras pa/che zha bdag ni glo 'dams ma ste/gtso bar bsam pa dang /de na bshad//
414a2('dul ba): pa yang byung na/bdag gis ji ltar bgyi/de ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag gis dge slong la/dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi

414a4('dul ba): su zhig rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa de'i drung du 'ongs na des glo 'dams ma ma yin nu ma zhes dris shig/ma dris par rob tu phyung na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro//
414a5('dul ba): gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/mnyan du yod pa na dge slong ma gzhan zhig gis rtag tu khrag 'dzag pa zhig rab tu phyung ste/de'i smad g.yogs kyi gnas su khrag
414a6('dul ba): gis ma rub par gyur te/sbrang bu dag gis gang bar mthong ba dang /de la dge slong ma gzhan zhig gis bu mo khyod khrag rtag tu 'dzags gam zhes dris pa dang //
414a7('dul ba): des smras pa/phu nu mo ji ltar bya/bdag ni rtag tu khrag 'dzag pa'o//de ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag gis dge slong la smras pa dang /dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das
414b1('dul ba): lal gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag rtag tu khrag 'jog pa ni ma ning yin te/dge slong khyed kyis skad cig/chos kyi 'dul ba la
414b2('dul ba): 'di rtag tu khrag 'dzag pa la rab tu skye ba'i chos can du mi 'gyur ro//de bas na gang su zhig rab tu 'byung bar 'dod de drung du 'ongs na/des khyod rtag tu khrag 'dzag
414b3('dul ba): pa ma yin nam zhes dris shig/ma dros par rab tu byung na 'das pa bcas par 'gyur ro//gleng bzhi ni mnyan du yod pa ni ste/mnyan du yod pa na dge slong ma gzhan
414b4('dul ba): zhig gis khrag med pa zhig rab tu byung bas/'dod tshogs dang bral ba ma yin pas na/dge slong ma dag ni dus dus su khrag 'dzag pa dang /des de mthong nas 'phyas pa
414b5('dul ba): phu nu mo dag khyed cag log par rtogs pa la rtog gam/ci'i phyir khyed cag khrag 'dzag nu mo ci zhig 'phyar yod/bud med ni chos nyid kyis 'di bzhin na khyod ci mi 'dzag
414b6('dul ba): gam/de bdag ni khrag med na bdag la 'khrag 'dzag tu ci zhig yod ces smras so//de ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag gis dge slong la smras nas/dge slong dag gis/
414b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khrag med pa ni ma ning yin te/khyod kyis skrod cig/dge slong dag khrag med pa la
415a1('dul ba): chos kyi 'dul ba lnga rab tu skye ba'i chos can du mi 'gyur ro//de lta bas na gang su zhig rab tu 'byung bar 'dod de drung du 'ongs na des khyang khrag
415a2('dul ba): med pa ma yin nam dris shig/ma dris nA 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro//sdo ma ni/mtshan ma tsam dang sme khag kyi/srang bus de la bcing bar bya/thu mi bya dang dge
415a3('dul ba): slong chags/dge slong mas kyang bshags mi bya/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na 'dze ta'i tshil mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
415a4('dul ba): ti/mnyam du yon pa ni dge slong ma gzhan zhig gis mtshan ma tsam yod pa zhig rab tu phyung ste/de chub kung sar zhugs nas/ring zhig lon te glar byung ba dang /de la dge
415a5('dul ba): slong ma dag gis nu mo ring zhig thogs te byung na ci byed/des phu nu mo bdag ni mtshan me tsam mchis legs te/mo mtshan tshang ba ma lags na ji ltar bgyi//zhes smras
415a6('dul ba): so//des nu mo khyod mtshan ma tsam pa zhig ma yin namo zhes dris pa dang /des phu nu mo bdag ni mtshan ma tsam mo//de ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag gis dge slong dag
415a7('dul ba): smras te/dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag mtshan ma tsam ma ning yin te/khyod kyis skrod cig
415b1('dul ba): dge slong dag chos kyi 'dul ba 'di la mtshan ma tsam la rab tu skye ba'i chos can du mi 'gyur ro//de lta bas na gang su zhig rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa de de'i drung du 'ongs na de
415b2('dul ba): dag la khyod mtshan ma tsam yod pa ma yin nam zhes dris shig/ma dris par rab tu byung na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro//gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa ni ste/'dod chags///

415b4('dul ba): gyur te/sbrang bu rag gis gang ba dang mi mdzes te/dge slong mas bkrus nas/bcos kyang slar de 'dra bar gyur te/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag la smras nas/dge slong drag gis
415b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta bas na dge slong dag dge slong mas skye khab chongs shig/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
415b6('dul ba): slong mas smre khab chongs shig ces gsungs pa dang /dge slong ma dag sme khab 'chang bar gyur nas/de nas dus phyi zhig na/sbom dga' mo bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /srung
415b7('dul ba): du sme khab lhung nas/srang na khye'u dang /bu modag cig rtse ba dag gis mthong ste/de dag gis 'phags ma 'di ci zhig lhung zhes dris pa dang /de skad smras nas khros te bu zan mo'i bu mo dang /
416a1('dul ba): durgo ma'i rlung du de ma rnaMs shig dang /de dag snro to zhes smras so//de lta gyu ba dge slong ma dag gis mas to//dge slong dag la smras pa dang /
416a2('dul ba): dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'i stsal pa/de lte bas na dge slong dag de lta bya kho nar mo mtshan gyis sme khab bcang

416a4('dul ba): srung chen po snga dro sham thabs dang /chos gos bgos lhung bzed thogs te/mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang /de sbom dga' mos mthong nas myur
416a5('dul ba): zhing rings par de'i drung du song ste/glen pa rab tu glen pa zhes smras nas/mchil mas btab pa dang /des smras pa/sring mo khyod kyis ni nyes par med kyi/tshe dang ldan pa kun
416a6('dul ba): dga' pos/gal te nyes pa sbom po spyod pa'i bud med rnams legs par bshad pa'i chos kyi 'dul ba la rab tu phyung ste/bsten par rdzogs nas dge slong me'i dngos
416a7('dul ba): por gnang bas lan no//de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis thos te/bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag sbom dga' mo ni dge sbyong
416b1('dul ba): ma yin/dge slong ma ma yin te/slad 'tshong ma yang ji ltar sgrom dga' mas byas pa bzhin dge slong la mu byed//de lbu bsen dge slong mas dge slong la b+hu zhes bya bar ma byed cig cos bka' stsal te//dge slong mas dan//
416b2('dul ba): slong la thu zhes byas na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyuraro//gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/de'i tshe na dge slong gzhan zhig la nyes pa byung ste/des dge slong ma zhig mthong nas/'phags ma chung zhig 'dug ces smras pa
416b3('dul ba): des 'phags pa ci 'tshal nges 'phags ma bdag la nyes pa zhig byung ste/'chag so zhes smraso//de 'dug nas des de'i mdun du 'dug sgra smras na/dgongs shig 'phags ma bdag ming 'di shes bya ba'i dge slong 'di lta bu/
416b4('dul ba): di'adra ba'i rnas pa zhig byung ste/bdag gis 'phags ma'i mdun du mtho lo 'chag so/mi 'cha'o//mthol zhing bshags pas bde bar 'gyur gyi mi mthol ma bshags na ni mi 'gyur ro//mos 'phags
416b5('dul ba): pa ci/'di 'dra ba'i nyes pa yang khyod la byung ngam/de ni ma legs pa byas so zhes smras pa dang /dge slong de skyengs par gyur te/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
416b6('dul ba): gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta bas na dge slong gis dge slong ma'i mdun du nyes pa bshags par mi bya ste/yongs su dag pa lta ba 'thun pa'i
416b7('dul ba): dge slong gi mdun du bshegs par bgyi'o//dge slong dag gis dge slong ma'i mdun du nyes pa bshags na 'das pa dang bcas par
417a1('dul ba): 'gyur ro//gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/de'i dus na dge slong ma gzhan zhig la nyes pa byung nas/des dge slong zhig mthong ste/des sti sbyang du/
417a2('dul ba): bya ba dang bcas ste/rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas/'phags pa thugs rjes dgongs te/cung zhig bzhugs shig ces smras pa dang /des 'phags ma ci dgos shes dris ni//
417a3('dul ba): nges 'phags pa bdag la nyes po zhig byung ste/de 'phags pa'i spyan sngararu bshags so zhes smras pa dang /de 'dug gi des kyang des rkang pa la phyag byas te/mdun du 'dug
417a4('dul ba): nas thal mo sbyar te/'phags pa dgongs shig bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba'i dge slong ma la 'di lta bu 'di 'dra ba'i nyes pa zhig byung ste/de bdag gis 'phags pa'i spyan
417a5('dul ba): sngar nyes pa byung ba gshegs so//mthol lo//mi 'chab bo//mthol zhing bshags na bde bar 'gyur ro//ma bshags ma 'thol na ni ma yin no//des 'di lta bu gzugs
417a6('dul ba): kyi nyes pa byung ba ni 'phags ma ma legs pa byas so zhes smras pa dang /dge slong ma de skyengs par gyur to//de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis thos nas/bcom ldan 'das
417a7('dul ba): la gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta bas na dge slong dag dge slong mos dge slong pha'i mdun du nyes pa mthol bar mi bya ste/dge slong ma
417b1('dul ba): yongs su dag pa lta ba 'thun pa'i mdun du nyes pa mthos par bya'o//dge slong mas dge slong gi mdun du nyes pa mthol na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro//sdom ni
417b2('dul ba): dge slong phas ni las brjod cig/dge slong mas ni brtag par bya'o//khri dang khri'u yang sbyin par bya//g.yogs pa dag la mi gzhag go//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
417b3('dul ba): mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyis kun dga' ra ba na bzhugasaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong pha'i las kyang so so dge slong ma'i yang so/
417b4('dul ba): spyi'i las ni ma gtogs so zhes gsungs pa dang /dge slong ma dag dge slong pha'i mdun du las byas pa dang 'jigs par gyur te/las byed par ma skyob so//de ltar
417b5('dul ba): gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag gis las byos shig/dge slong mas ni brtag/
417b6('dul ba): par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bas na/dge slong dag dge slong gis ni las byos shig/dge slong mas ni brtag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /dge slong ma dag
417b7('dul ba): gis ji ltar brtag pa mi shes te/de dag gis de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag la smras nas/dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das
418a1('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong ma dag gis ngag yod par yid la bya ste/'di ni gsol pa'o//'di ni las dang po'o//'di ni gnyis pa'i///
418a2('dul ba): 'di ni gsum pa'o zhes shes par bya'o//gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos nyan pa bsgrags par byos shig zhes gsungs pa dang //
418a3('dul ba): dge sbyong dag gis snyan ma bting nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan thing shog ces bka' stsal to//de nas dus phyi zhig na chos bshad pa bsgrags par gyur pa na//
418a4('dul ba): dge slong ma dag 'ongs nas g.yogs pa'i khri'u la 'dug ste/chos nyan par btsams pa dang /der dge slong ma gzhan zhig gis dran pa nye bar ma gzhag ste/
418a5('dul ba): khrags zags nas g.yogs pa'i khri'u ma rung bar gyur te//de nas chos bsgrags zin pa dang /dge bsgos kyis stan bsdu bar brtsams nas/ji tsam na
418a6('dul ba): gAyogs pa'i khri'u ma rung bar gyur te/sbrang bus gang pa mthong nas/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das
418a7('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas na//dge slong ma dag chos nyan pa'i phyir 'ongs pa la g.yogs pa'i khri'u mi sbyin no//des kyang khri'u g.yogs pa la
418b1('dul ba): 'dug pud mi bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma chos nyan du 'ongasu pa la khri'u g.yogs pa ma sbyin cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /dge slong dag gis chos
418b2('dul ba): nyan pa'i phyir lhogs pa rnams la khri'u ma g.yogs pa byin pa dang /ji tsam na skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo chos nyan pa'i phyir 'ongs pa dang /de la yang khri'u
418b3('dul ba): ma g.yogs pa zhig byin pa dang /des 'phags pa bdag sngon khyim na gnas pa de yang khri'u ma glu yogs pa la cung zad kyang mchis so zhes smras pa dang /dge slong
418b4('dul ba): ngadag gis smras pa/'go'u ta ma bcom ldan 'das kyis ma garlung ste/dge slong ma chos nyan pa'i phyir lhags pa la khri'u g.yogs pa ma sbyin cig ces bka'
418b5('dul ba): sprul to//des 'phags pa dge slong ma gang dag dran pa nye bar mi 'jog pa de bzhin du bdag kyang nyes pa'i dmigs ci bgyid dam zhes smras pa dang /de ltar gyur pa
418b6('dul ba): ngadage slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag de lta bas na gnang ba ni/dran pa nye bar 'jog pa'i dge slong ma de dag chos nyan pa'i
418b7('dul ba): phyir 'ongs na de dag la khri'u g.yogs pa sbyin par byos shig/'di la the tsom ma byad cig ces bka' stsal to//sdom ni/chang 'tshong ma dang smad 'tshang ma//bran mo dang yang rag
419a1('dul ba): m-i byA//gnod pa'i gos dang brad mi rdung //dge slong dag gi nang du gzha/sbyang+yas rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na mdzo tA dzam+b+ha
419a2('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bu nu bzhugs te/de nas dge slong ma sbom dga' mo s+t+wa sto g+ho'i dus nu/sha me thabs dang chos gos bgos/lhung bzed thog
419a3('dul ba): te mnyan du yod par bskyed snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so//de bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/khyim ma mo zhig mthong ste/bgo ba bzang zhing smad g.yogs dang /rgyan
419a4('dul ba): bzang po zhig ste des de mthong nas nu mo sa khyod kyi gos dang /rgyan dag ga las rnyed ces dris pa dang /des 'phags mi bdag ni chang 'tsheng pa ste/de las 'di dag thams
419a5('dul ba): cad rnyed do zhes smos pa dang /sbom dga' mos thabs 'di ni lagro pa zhig ste/de ltar 'grub bam mi 'grub pa lta'i snyam bsam nas/nges de la dmigs shing dran bzhin
419a6('dul ba): du song nas/ji tsam na mthong ba gnas gzhan zhig na bud med cig gos dri ma can gyon la zas med cing da ring la gom pa del kyis 'gro ba zhig mthong nas/bu mo
419a7('dul ba): khyod su'i yin zhes dris pa dang /des smras pa su'i yang ma yin te/gang bdag la bza' ba dang /bgo ba ster ba de'i las bdag gis bgyi'o//des bu mo nga ste de bzhin na chad
419b1('dul ba): 'tshong pa ci'i phyir mi spyod ces smras pa dang /des 'phags ma ni 'di bzhin nyid chang 'tshong pa spyad du rung ngam/der thob mar nor mang du dgos so//zong yod kyang snod dang
419b2('dul ba): chang 'thung ba dag bde bar 'dug pa'i khang pa rgya chen po rnams kyang med do zhes smras pa dang /sbom dga' mos bum de ste bdag gis de dag thams cad sbyar la khyod kyi bza'

419b7('dul ba): skyes bu dag la 'di ni sbom dga' mo'i chang 'tshang ma zhig dbyar mo khong dang nye ba na/chang zhig 'dug gis chang ma de yang khrid cig ma smras pa dang /de dag gis de bzung ste khrid do//

420a2('dul ba): song nas/bu zan mo'i bu dag bdag gi bu mo 'di gar bkri zhes smos so//de dag gis ci 'phags mA chang 'chad nga maM/mI mdza' pa rnams kyi gnyul bar rtog

420b1('dul ba): slong ma sbom dga' mo snga ng+ge'i dus na sham thabs dang /chos gos byugs lhung bzed thogs te mnyan du yod par bsad snyoms la zhugs so//de bsad snyoms la zhugs pa'i/
420b2('dul ba): tshe/smad 'tshong ma cig gis/sham thabs rab du bzang ba zhig gyon//rgyan rab tu bzang bas brgyan po zhig mthong nas/des mthong ba dang phu nu mo 'di lta bu gas dang /rgyun ga/

426b3('dul ba): the tsom du ma byed cig/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa 'dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//mnyan du yod pa'i phyogs gcig
426b4('dul ba): na khyim bdag byin pa zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa de rab tu phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che bya/yang so shing rgya che ba ni ngal bso po'i nor dang 'dra ba dal bso bo'i nor la sngo ba

426b7('dul ba): mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/de dang lhan cig rtse dga' yongs su spyod do//de dag cig la cig phyug pas mgran te/cig na re khyod pas ni longs spyod kyi rgyu bdag gi khyad
427a1('dul ba): zhugs so//cig na re khyod pas longs spyod kyi rgyu ba gi khyud zhug so//zhes smra'o//de gnyis phran tshun mdza' bar gyur te/cig gis kyang dus dus su
427a2('dul ba): skyes skur/cig gis kyang de bzhin slar bskur nas/de gnyi sa pa ni tshun mdze'i bar gyur te/ci nas dus phyi zhig na mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dgra

427a5('dul ba): phyi nas bu dang tsha bo dang yang tsha dang sum tsha dag gi byar du yang mdza' ba'i rgyun mi bcad par bya na/de la thabs ji lta bu zhig dris pa dang /ri dwags skyes smras pa/grogs
427a6('dul ba): po legs ste/bdag kyang de lta bur sems na chur shog/ma btsas par gnyen sngar byas te/do ste bdag la bu pho zhig skyes na/khyod la bu mo zhig byung na/khyod kyis

427b1('dul ba): bur bya'o zhes smras so//de dag cig la cig ma bcas par gnyen byas te dong ngo //de nas dus zhig na khyim bdag byin pa'i chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur te/zla ba brgyad/
427b2('dul ba): dam dgu 'dus pa dang /bu mo zhig btsas te/dbyibs legs shong bawA na sdug pa bzang mo yun log dang nyid leg tu ldan pa zhig ste/de rtag tu ngu'o//de nas khyim bdo/

427b7('dul ba): yang des shing nges pa'i yo byad kyi khyad par gyis myur du skyed pa ni rdzing na gnas pa'i 'dams las skyes pa bzhin no//de nas khyim bdag ri dwags sgra zhes bya bas khyim
428a1('dul ba): /bdag byin pa'i bu mo bcas par deklo pa dang /des grogs po'i bu mo bcas na/de la gos dang rgyun rnams bdag gis bskuraro snyam bsam/

428a3('dul ba): rab tu dga' ste mdza' bo'i bu mo'i gos dang rgyan dang bskur ba 'di yin gyis blang ba'i rigs so zhes spring pa dang /des de blangs nas/slar lan spring pa/
428a4('dul ba): mdza' bo de ltar byas pa legs kyis gnyen yang byas khyod la bu pho zhig byung na de la sbyin no//khyim bdag ri dgas sgras de'i lan thos pa dang /de bu 'dod par

429a1('dul ba): dbus sgra'i bu sa ga la khyod ston gtad zan te/rgyud kyang yin te/ngas nau ga nAng du mi rung ngo zhes zer nas mA gnang ngo //khyim drer

429a7('dul ba): pas kun tu sbyor ba 'phel bar 'gyur ba gsem pas yang dag par mthong nas/des 'dod pa la rten par mi rigs so//'dod pa la brten na cung zad kyang mi rigs

429b7('dul ba): mthong na mkhas pas bdag nyid rab tu 'byung ba la dad par bya ba'i rigs so//bla na med pa rnal 'byor bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa rjes su thob pa ma grub kyang bdag lhar skye

430a5('dul ba): gcig tu 'dub nas/dge slong ma ud pa la'i kha dog mas/bcom ldan 'das la btsun pa khyim bdag byin pa zhes bya ba'i bu mo chos sbyin me zhes bgyi ba

430b1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan+da pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo sod la dge slong ma dag lha 'di skad ces smros shig/khyim bdag byin pa'i bu mo
430b2('dul ba): chos sbyin ma zhes bya ba'i khyim de nyid du/ud pa la'i khe dog ma phrin par gtang gis skyabasu 'gro ba gsum dang /bslab pa'i gzhi lho byin la gnas pa de nyid du
430b3('dul ba): rab tu 'byung bar ngos gnang ngo //btsun pa de ltar bgyi zhes gsol nas/de nas tshe dang ldan po kun dga' bos/bcom ldan 'das la mnyan te/dge slong ma rnams la
430b4('dul ba): bsgo'o//dge slong ma'i dge 'dun mas dge slong ma ud pa la'i kha dog ma la bsgo ste/phrin par btang ngo //de der song nes bu mo bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gnang bar

431a3('dul ba): dga' ba song ste/dge slong ma drug la 'di skad du bsgo shig/chos sbyin ma gnas de nyid du u pA lo'i kha dog ma phrin parare thod la/lo gnyis su chos drug dang

432a1('dul ba): ces yi ge spring ngo //de nas khyim bdag ri dwags smras kyang mdza' bo dang /phu nu dang /gnyen rnams la da bzhin du yi ge spring ngo //khyim
432a2('dul ba): bdag de gnyis kyi skye bo dang /'khor dag rgya che ste/gnas nas mdza' bo dang /phu nu dang gnyen rnams lhags pas mnyan du yod pa'i nang thams cad gad do//

432b1('dul ba): du yod pa'i bskyed mos tshal dang nye ba'i tshol dro'i 'khor du bcas pa thams cad byi dor byas/rdo dang gyo mo dang /bo ba dag kyang phyogasnga nas med par byaso//tsan+dan

432b4('dul ba): bo dag la kye dus ma yin par dus ston 'di ci zhig yin zhes smras pa dang /de dog gis khyod kyis sngon legs pa'i tsho gros rnam par byasagos pa de'i mthus ni dus la ma bob

432b6('dul ba): rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas/yab bdag 'dod pa 'tshal ba ni ma lags na/rgyal po'i kun dga' ra ba zhes bgyi ba dge slong ma'i dbyar mo khang du mchir ci ga nang zhes
432b7('dul ba): smras pa dang /des smras pa/bu mo khyod ma skyes par khyim bdag ri dwags sgra'i bu sa ga la byin pas/da ni nga la dbang med do//khyod kyi khyim thab de yin te/de lta bur ni

433a2('dul ba): mang po dag gis shes nu ngas khyod la ji ltar gnang bar bya//ci bdag mdza' bo dang /phu nu dang /gnyen rnams brtson rar bcug ste 'chi bar 'dod dam/khyod ni sang
433a3('dul ba): bag mar 'gro ba ltar gyis shig/mdza' bo dang bdag gi mi dang /gnyen dang //skye ba meng po dag kyang 'dir 'dus na/de//dam zer cig/khyed rab tu gzhon pas
433a4('dul ba): ma rdzogs pa yin te/tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa mthong shing ces bsgo ba dang /de brtson pas lam yid la byed pa sgom pa pa zhugs na/'dod tshogs dang bral bar bya
433a5('dul ba): ba'i thabs ma rnyed do//de'i bar du yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mi mkhyen pa 'am/mi gzigs pa 'am/mi rig pa 'am/rnam par mi rig pa cung zad med
433a6('dul ba): de/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs rgya chen po can 'jig rten la phan 'dogs par zhugs pa srung ba gcig pu dpa' ba gcig pu gnyis su med pa gnyisu
433a7('dul ba): ma yin par gsungs pa/zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis gnas pa/'dul ba'i dngos po gsum ya mkhas pa/chu bo bzhi las rgal pa/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
433b1('dul ba): zhabs kyi mthil la rab tu rtag par gnas pa/mi 'jigs pa bzhis bsnyengs pa med pa yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/skye ba lnga las yang dag par 'das
433b2('dul ba): pa/yan lag drug dang ldan pa/pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/spyod pa drug la rtag tu spyod pa/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis brgyan
433b3('dul ba): pa/ya ma yan lag brgyad pa 'chad pa/dgu mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug po lA me khas pa/stobs bcu'o stobs dang ldan pa/phyogs bcur snyan pa rgyas por//
433b4('dul ba): grags pa/brgya phrag bcu las dbang sgyur ba/khyad zhugs pa/mtshan lan gsum nyin lan gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs
433b5('dul ba): nas/ye shes kyi mthong ba la 'jug ste/gang 'gri ba/gang 'phel/gang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur//gang dag par 'gyur//gang gnod par 'gyur/gang dga' ba dang //
433b6('dul ba): dog pa dang /gnod par 'gyur/gang ngan song la gzhol/gang ngan song la 'bab/gang ngan song la rab tu babya/gang ngan song las byung ste/mtho rIs dang thar pa la rab tu
433b7('dul ba): gzhag par bya/dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya/gang bskyed pa rnams yongs su smin par bya/gang yongasu smin pa rnams na grol bar
434a1('dul ba): bya'o snyam du gzigaso//yang smras pa/rgya mtsho chu sbyin gnas de ni//dus las gal to yol yang srid//gdul bar bya ba'i bu rnams
434a2('dul ba): la/sangs rgyas dus las 'da' mi mdzad//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzum pa mdzad pa dang /chos nyid kyis nam gyi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
434a3('dul ba): der 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/zhal nus 'od zer sngon po dang ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po rnams 'byung ste/kha cig ni 'og tu dong /kha cig ni steng du
434a4('dul ba): dong ngo //gang 'og tu dong pa de dag gis ni yang sos dang /thig nag po dang /'joms pa dang /'o do de 'bod pa dang /'o dod cher 'bod pa dang /tsha ba dang /rab
434a5('dul ba): tu tsha ba dang /mnar med pa dang /chu bur can dang /shin tu chu bur can dang /a ha ha dang /ha hwe ba dang /hu hu bA dang /ud pa la lta bu dang /pad+mo lta bu dang /pad+mo
434a6('dul ba): chen po lta bu dag gi sems can dmyal bar song nas/gang tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba der bab na ni bsil bar gyur/gang grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba
434a7('dul ba): der bab ni ni dro bar gyur te/des sems can de dag ni sdug bsngal gyi khyad par slar bde bar gyur nas/de dag 'di snyam du sems so//kye ma'o bdag cag 'di nas
434b1('dul ba): shi 'phos sam/'on te gzhan zhig tu skyes snyam mo//de dag dang ba skyed pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa der btang ngo //de dag sprul pa de mthong nas//
434b2('dul ba): de dag 'di snyam du sems so//kye bdag cag ni tshe 'di nas shi 'phos pa 'o ma/gzhon du skyes pa ni ma yin mod kyi/sngon chad ma mthong ba'i sems can 'di
434b3('dul ba): mthus na/bdag cag gi sdug bsngal gyi khyad par bde gyur to snyam nus/de dag sprul pa la mngon par dad pa las de dag sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi las
434b4('dul ba): zad nas/gang du bden pa rna mas kyi snod du 'gyur ba de'i lha dang /mi'i phyir nyingad me tshams lan to//gang steng gi phyogasu dong pa des ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ros dang /sum
434b5('dul ba): cu rtsa gsum dang /mtshe me'i dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs ris dang /tshangs lha nye phran dang /tshangs chen dang /'od chung
434b6('dul ba): dwed/tshad med 'od dang /'od snang dang /dge chung gnas dang /tshad med dge gnas dang /dgra rgyas dang /sprin med dang /bsod nams 'phel dang /'bras bu che ba dang
434b7('dul ba): mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /shin tu snang dang /gya nom mthong dang /'og min gnas kyi lha dag gi drung du song nas/mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /stong pa dang //

435a2('dul ba): tan gyis//'chi bdag sde rnams gzhom pa ni//ba glang gis ni rtswa khyim bzhin//chos kyi 'dul ba 'di la gang //bag yod pa rung su spyod pa//skye ba'i 'khor//
435a3('dul ba): ba spong ba ste//sdug bsngal ba yi mthar byed 'gyur//de nas 'od zer de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/bcom ldan 'das
435a4('dul ba): kyi snum gyi phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'ong ngo //de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa lung bstan par bzhed na ni/bcom ldan 'das kyi snum logs su mi snang bar
435a5('dul ba): 'gyur ro//ma 'ongs pa lung bstan par bzhed na ni/mdun du mi snang bar 'gyur ro//sems can dmyal bar lung bstan par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthil du

435b1('dul ba): rgyurgyal por lung bskrun par bzhed na ni/phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro//'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyug
435b2('dul ba): gaugayas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro//lhur skye bar lung sten pa ri bzhed na ni/lte bar mi snang ba ra 'gyur ro//nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni//
435b3('dul ba): ga byin du mi snang bar 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed nA ni/mdzod spyir mi snang bar 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
435b4('dul ba): byang chub tu ling ston par bzhed na ni/gtsug tor gyi nang du mi snang bar 'gyur ro//de nas 'od zer de dag bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas te/
435b5('dul ba): ljon 'das kyi zhal du mi snang bar gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/rnam pa sna tshogs kha dog stong gis
435b6('dul ba): brgyan//zhal gyi nang nas ming po 'byung ba dag/thams cad phyog su gang gis snang mdzad po//snang byed shar bar ji ltar de bzhin no//yang tshigasu bcad de smras pa
435b7('dul ba): 'byor ba med cing mi dga' dregs spangs pa/sangs rgyas skye bo mchog gi rgyu gyur te//rgyu ma mchis par dung dkar pad+ma'i rtsa//'dzum pa mi ston rgyal ba dgra phan
436a1('dul ba): mdzad//de tshe nyid kyi rtogs pa bstan pa'i blo//nyan pa rgyal dbang la ni thos par 'tshal//thub pa khyu mchog gtan tshigs dam pas ni//
436a2('dul ba): the tshom skyes pa mchog gis gsal bar mdzod//mgon po brtan pa rgya mtsho'i ri bo bzhin//rgyu med par ni sangs rgyas gzhed mi mdzad//brtan pas gang gi
436a3('dul ba): phyir ni 'dzum bstan pa//skye bo mang po 'di dag thos par 'tshal//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de bzhin no//kun dga' bo de bzhin te/kun
436a4('dul ba): dga' bo rgyu med rkyen med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag ni mdzum pa mi mdzad do//kun dga' bo khyod kyis
436a5('dul ba): bu mo chos sbyin mo la dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dang /nga'i bkas dge slong ma ud pa la'i kha dog ma phrin par btang ste/skyabasu 'gro ba gsum nas rims
436a6('dul ba): bzhin du rab tu phyung ba la lo gnyis kyi bar du cho sa drag dang /rjes su 'brang ba'i chos drug gi bslab pa'i sdom pa yang byin no//de ni sang bag med gtong ste/de'i phyir
436a7('dul ba): skye bo mang po 'dus pa rnams mthong ngam/btsun pa mthong ngo //kun dga' bo bu mo de slar khyim du khyim mi mor gnas pa'i skabs ma yin/gnas ma yin te/dga'
436b1('dul ba): bar bya ba'i phyir 'dod pa'i longs spyod la longs spyad pa'i gnas su 'di mi 'gyur gyi/'di ni de phyir mi ldog pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/dgra bcom pa mngon du byed par
436b2('dul ba): 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo song ste/dge slong ma rnams la 'di ltar chos sbyin ma ni lo gnyis kyi bar du chos drug dang //rjes su 'brang ba'i chos drug gi bslab pa la bslabs
436b3('dul ba): zin gyis/de la ud pa la'i khwa dog ma phrin par thod la tshangs par spyod pa skyed pa'i sdom pa byin par bsgo shig/btsun pa de bzhin du 'tshal lo//tshe dang ldan pa

437b1('dul ba): ma rig pa'i sgo de'i sbubs btsam/rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /so sor rig pa rnams thob pa/srid pa'i 'dod chags la chags pa dang /bkur bsti la rgyud kyi/

440a2('dul ba): slong ma nyan thos chos kyi gtam smra ba'i nang na dge slong ma chos sbyin mi 'di ni mchog yin no//dge slong dgra the tshom skyes nas/the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs

440a7('dul ba): pa ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par mi smin/chu'i khams la ma yin/me'i khams la ma yin/rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi zin pa'i phung po dang /khams dang /
440b1('dul ba): skye mched 'di nyid la dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las byas pa rnam par smin par 'gyur ro//las rnams stor bar mi 'gyur bya/bskal pa dag ni brgya lon kyang //dus dang

440b3('dul ba): srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'dig rten pa
440b4('dul ba): pabla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba lha dang mi rnams kyis ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul 'khor mo 'jig gi grong khyer na bzhugs shing /drang
440b5('dul ba): srong gnas kyi ri dwags kyi tshal na bzhug so//de'i dus na yul 'khor mo 'jig nA khyim bdag gzhan zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/de de dang //

440b7('dul ba): bu mo zhig byung ste/de zhag bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du btsas pa'i bcos sngon chen po rgya cher byas te/rigs dang 'thun pa'i ming btags nas/de nas lus cher gyur
441a1('dul ba): pa de na rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pas de'i pha ma dag gis rab tu 'byung tu mi sbyor ro//khyim don dge sbyong ma rgan mo gzhan zhig rigs pa ston par byed cing //
441a2('dul ba): de'i khyim du dus dus su 'ang ngo //dri mo des dge sbyong ma rgan mo de la 'bugs mi badrug ni legs pa de bshud pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bstan par rdzogs
441a3('dul ba): nas dge slong ma'i dngos por 'tshal na/bdag gis pha mas myi gnang zhing khyim las phyir 'byung du yang mi ster na/gnas 'di nyid du rab tu da byud par nus so zhes smras pa
441a4('dul ba): dang /des bu mo bcom ldan 'das la bya'o zhes smras nas/bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la zhus pa dang /de nyid phrin pa btang ste/de
441a5('dul ba): khyim de na 'dug bzhin du rab tu phyung nas/dge slong ma'i sdom pa yang gnang nas/dge 'dun sde gnyis kyis bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te/dge slong ma rgan mo des de
441a6('dul ba): la chos bshad pa dang /de khyim ni 'dug bzhin du dgra bcom pa mngon du byas//de nas dge slong me rgan mos bsams pa bu mo 'dis khyim na 'dug bzhin du phrin gyis rab
441a7('dul ba): tu byung slob pa'i sdom pa dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa thob/khyim na 'dug bzhin du dgra bcom pa mngon du byas pa de thams cad kyang bdag las gyur te/bdag gis
441b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstun pal tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa dang /dge ba ci spyad pa'i rtsa bas bcom ldan 'das yang dag
441b2('dul ba): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bram ze'i bu bla ma la//bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu lo brgya thub pa'i tshe/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
441b3('dul ba): sangs rgyus shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa la 'dri ltar khyim na 'dug bzhin du phrin gyis rab tu byung /bslab pa'i sdom pa dang /dge slong
441b4('dul ba): ma'i dngos po thob cing khyim ni 'dug bzhin du dgra bcom pa mngon du byed pa dang /ji ltar bdag gi mkhan po bcom ldan 'das yi de dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od
441b5('dul ba): srung gis chos kyi gtam smra ba'i nang na mchog tu bsngags de bzhin du bdag kyang shAkya thub pa/bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i rgyal pos tshwa kyi gtam smra ba'i nang na mchog tu bsngags/
441b6('dul ba): paper shog shig ces smraso//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/dge slong ma rgan mo de ni da ltar gyi dge slong ma chos sbyin me 'di nyid yin no//bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogro
441b7('dul ba): pa'i sangs rgyas 'a'odi srung gi drung na/'dis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyad pa spyod do//smon lam gyi mthus na/khyim no 'dug bzhin du phrin pas rab tu phyung /bslab pa'i sdom pa
442a1('dul ba): dang /bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong ma'i dngos po yang thob/khyim nu 'dug bzhin du des nyon mongs pa thams cad sbyangs te/drugra bcom pa
442a2('dul ba): mngon du byas/de bzhin gshegs pas kyang chos kyi gtam smra ba'i nang na mchog tu bsngags so//de lta bas ni dge slong dag las gcig tu gnag pa ni rnam par smin
442a3('dul ba): pa yang gcig tu gnag go/dkar ba ni gcig tu dkar ro//'dres pas ni gcig tu 'dris pa'o//de lta bus na dge slong dag gcig tu gnas pa dang 'dres pa'i las
442a4('dul ba): spongs la/gcig tu dkar ba'i las nyid la bsgrub par bya ste/dge slong dag de lta bur bslab par byos shig/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
442a5('dul ba): dge slong de dgra bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa li yi rangs te/mngon par dga'o//phyi rol dge slong bzod mi gsol/gcig pu 'dregs mkhan gyis mi breg/dbyar ma
442a6('dul ba): khang nI slar mi btud//phe gus yang ni lus mi phyi//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na 'dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
442a7('dul ba): te/dge slong ma cig cig dge slong la klog slob pa dang /de nas dus phyi zhig ne/de nyes pa zhig byas nas/des spyos pa dang /de dbyar mo khang du song ste/'phres te 'dug//
442b1('dul ba): de mkhan mos mthong nas/gzhon+da nu ma khyod ci zhig nyes na 'phres te 'dug ces smras pa dang /des mkhan mo slob dpon gyis spyos na du ji ltar bya mi sh+los so zhes
442b2('dul ba): smras so//bu mo de la gzhan ci zhig bya ro yod slob dpon dang mkhan po ni bstan pa gnas par bya ba'i phyir sbyor zad kyis song la bzod par gsol cig ces smras
442b3('dul ba): pa dang /des legs kyis de ltar byas bzod pa gsol du 'gro'o zhes zer te/'dzi ta'i tshal du song ste mi snang ba dang /des de btsal nas ji tsam zhig na/de gtsug lag
442b4('dul ba): khang gi phyi rol gyi 'chag sa na 'chag cing 'dug pa dang /des de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal ba dang /dge slong des ma gus par byas te song ngo //byis pa dag gis mthong
442b5('dul ba): nas de dag nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis gzir te/'phags ma khyod kyis don ci'i phyir khyod kyis bzod pa byas pa bdag cag gis shes shes te/des ni mi bzod na tshung
442b6('dul ba): shog bdag cag gis khyod kyi don bsgrub po zhes smras pa dang /de ngo tshwa nas cang mi smyo bar song ngo //de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis mthong nas/bcom ldan 'das
442b7('dul ba): la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/nyes pa'i dmig su gyur pa ni dge slong mas spyos nas bzod pa gsol na yang rim gro mi byed par 'gro sti/byis
443a1('dul ba): pa dag gis kyang phyi phyir dge ba gzhan du rtog gis de lta bas nA dge slong mas dge slong la gtsug la khang gi phyi rol tu bzod pa mi gsol
443a2('dul ba): zhing /dge slong phas dge slong ma la ma gus pa bzhin du 'gro bar mi bya bar dgongs shing mkhyen nas bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag byis pa rnams phyi phyir mi dge ba
443a3('dul ba): la rtogs par 'gyur gyis/de lta bas na dge slong mas dge slong khros pa la gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu bzod pa ma gsol cig/de ste yang dge slong mas dge slong
443a4('dul ba): pa la bzod pa gsol na/ma gus par byas te ma 'gro shig/dge slong mas dge slong pha la gtsug log khang gi phyi rol tu bzod pa gsol lam/dge slong phas dge
443a5('dul ba): slong ma bzod pa gsol ba la ma gus pa byas te song na gnyis ka la 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro//gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/dge slong sma ga
443a6('dul ba): 'dreg mkhan gyis skra bregs pa dang /de na 'dreg mkhan gzhon nur gyur pas/dran pa nye bar mi 'dzeg go/des de dag mthong ba dang /chags par gyur to//rnam pa
443a7('dul ba): de lta bur gyur pa dge slong dag gis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag sems ni dgod do//dran pa
443b1('dul ba): nye bar ma bzhag pas bslus par 'gyur na/bud med ni phal cher 'dod chags rab tu che ste/de lta bas na dge slong ma dag gcig pu 'dreg mkhan gyi drung du skra 'dreg par ma
443b2('dul ba): byed/de'i drung du dge slong ma gzhan zhig zhog la de ste 'dreg mkhan de chags par gyur ni de'i drung na dge slong ma 'dug pas 'di skad smros shig/de zhin bzangs dge
443b3('dul ba): slong ma 'di'i lus ni rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor 'di ni rgyan med la lus dri ma can/'di ni rab tu byung ba yin gyis de lta bu'i sems zlag shig/sems rbat+saM dmyal
443b4('dul ba): bar ltung bar gyur ta re/de ste dge slong ma chags par gyur na yang /'di skad du smros shig/phu nu mo khyim pa'i las ni khyod kyis sungs na ci khyod kyis bsten byer
443b5('dul ba): rdzogs pa'i tshe/dge 'dun sde gnyis la khyod kyis khwas blangs pa de sems shig/'dod pa ni bde ba chung sdug bsngal mang la nyes pa'i dmigs mang bar ni bcom
443b6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal gyis/tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa spongs la/rab tu byung ba'i sems yid la nye bar zhog shig/des de la 'di skad du smran
443b7('dul ba): ni legs//de ste ma smras na drung na 'dug pa'i dge slong ma la 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro//gleng bzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/dge slong ma sbom dga' mos khyim bdag
444a1('dul ba): gzhan zhig dad par byas te/dbyar mo khang brtsig tu bcug nas/de na dge slong ma mang zhig gnas par gyur to//ji tsam zhig na/lho
444a2('dul ba): phyogs nas tshod pa lnga brgya tsam zhig zong khyer te/mnyen du yod par lhags so//chung pA de dag nor gzhag pa'i nor khang pa glas btsal ba dang ma rnyed de de nas deng
444a3('dul ba): gogis mnyan du yod par kun tu btsal kyang mi rnyed do//tshong dus dang /srang dang lam gyi bzhi mdor nor rnams spungs te 'khor ni 'brug kyang zer nyi ma yang nub tu nye
444a4('dul ba): nas/de'i tshe char pa cung zad cig bab pa dang /de dag lag pas 'gram pa la brten nas rab tu sems shing 'khod pa dag/sbom dga' mos mthong ste/
444a5('dul ba): smras pa//bzhin bzangs char pa yang 'bab na/srang du 'khod de ci byed nor rnams gnas shig tu gzung na ci nyes/de dag gis 'phags ma bdag cag gis mnyan du yod/
444a6('dul ba): par khyab par btsal te/'jig rten pa mi srun pas khyad pa glur yang ma rnyed na/ji ltar bgyi zhes smras pa dang /des bu rnams mtshan mo'i tshe ci 'dra bar shes par byos
444a7('dul ba): la/glo yang lhag par byin te khyim tshol cig/'di ni zong mi rung bar gyur pa dang /char pas gshor nas su zhig nyo ba yod ces smras pa dang /des 'phags ma 'dziH/
444b1('dul ba): rten 'di dag mi srun te/de dag la bdag cag gis khyim gyi glo nyi rim du byin yang ma sbyar to//bdag gri wa 'byung ba lha ste/ji lta bur yang rung ste zhag gcig lon
444b2('dul ba): nas gzhan du 'dod ngo zhebyas pa dang de smras pa/bu de ltar khang pa'i gla lhag par byin na bdag gi dbyar mo khang gi nang du skyos shig/de dag gis 'phags ma legs kyis deng
444b3('dul ba): mchi'o zhes smras pa dang /de nas sbom dga' mos dge slong ma dag nub mo dbyar mo khang nas bskyod de dbyar mo khang de tshong pa de dag la glar btung ngo //dge slong ma de dag char
444b4('dul ba): babs chos gos gsher bzhin du dbyar mo khang gzhan du song /de'i dge slong ma dag gis che zhe khyed cag nub mo chos gos gsher bzhin du 'dir ci la 'ongs shes dris pa dang //
444b5('dul ba): de dag gis zhib tu smras so//don nyung ngu ma'i dge slong ma dag gis 'phya zhing smod la ngan du 'dzer ba ni//sbyin bdag gis dge slong ma'i dbyar mo khang byas pa'i khang pa glar
444b6('dul ba): gtang bar ga la rigs/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis thos nas/bcom ldan 'das la gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa na dge slong dag dge
444b7('dul ba): slong ma dag 'phya ba ni gnas yin te/de bas na dge slong ma dag dbyar mo khade slar ma gtang shig/dge slong mas dbyar mo khang glar gtang na/'das pa dang bcas par
445a1('dul ba): 'gyur ro//gleng gzhi ni gzhan du yod pa nA s+ye/dge slong mA sbom dga' mos byis pa gzhon nu dgra lus 'khru ba'i nang du zhugs te/so
445a2('dul ba): phag gis lus drud cing khrus byas pa dang /de dag chags par gyur te/kun tu blta zhing gtam 'dzer ba ni kye ltos shig/dge sbyong ma me go reg ma pho gi ba gyad chen
445a3('dul ba): po go char bgos pa dang 'dra ba zhig lus pa gus phyi zhing phyis nas phyi zhing 'dug go/de dag de la 'phya bar gyur to//de la 'phye ba dang /de la de dag rab tu dgod do//
445a4('dul ba): de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis thos nas/be com ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/byis pa gzhon nu de dag 'phya ba'i gnas
445a5('dul ba): yin te/mi rigs pa'i las byas par mkhyen nas bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag dge slong ma sbom dga' mos mi mdzes shing las ngan pa byas pa de/byis pa gzhon nu de
445a6('dul ba): dag 'phya ba ni gnas yin te/de lta ba nu dge slong ma dag lus pha gus ma phyi zhig/dge slong ma dag lus pha gus phyis na 'dra ba dang bcas pa 'gyur ro//sdom ni/lus la phra
445a7('dul ba): gus phyi mi bya//rdo leb dag kyang de bzhin te//gos bkris dang ni khu tshur gyis//ci dang cis kyang mi phyi'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na 'dze b+ha'i
445b1('dul ba): tshul/mgron med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma dag lus pha gus ma phyi zhig ces bka' sprul pa dang /rdo leb kyis
445b2('dul ba): phyis te/de yang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo leb kyis ma phyi zhig ces bka' stsal po dang /de dag gis gos bkris pas phyis so//
445b3('dul ba): de yang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyisna gos bAkris pas ma phyi shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /de dag gis khu tshur gyis phyis nas/de yang
445b4('dul ba): nyes pa'i dmig su gyur te/bcom ldan 'das kyis khu tshur gyis mu phyi shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /de dag gis ci dang nIs kyang phyis pa dang /de yang nyes pa'i dmi/
445b5('dul ba): su gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lag pa gcig pu ma gtogs par gzhan ci dang cis kyang rung ste/ma phyi shig byis na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur
445b6('dul ba): ri/'dul ba phra mo'i dngos po sgo bdun pa rdzog s+ho////'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzho//bam po zhe bzhi pa//spyi sdom la/dge slong ma yi bkur bsti bri/
445b7('dul ba): sgo ba dang ni lcags kyi snod//bud med gnyis kyis blta ba dang //de bzhin nag mo u Di ka/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mo nyan yod na/rgyal byed gyi kun dga' ra ba na
446a1('dul ba): bzhugs so//gang gi tshe/tshe dang ldan pa gro las skyes dus las 'das pa de'i tshe/dge slong ma bcu gnyis sngos/de'i rus pa rnams
446a2('dul ba): bsdus nas/bkur bsti chen pos sa phyogs yangs par mchod rten brtsigs te/de la gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag kyang btags/dri dang me
446a3('dul ba): tog gis brgyan te/snyan par smra ba'i dge slong ma gnyis kyang bskos nas/der nyin cig bzhin du sa dang /chu dang gdug pa dang /me tog dag 'jog par byed do//
446a4('dul ba): de nas dge slong dag yul gzhan nas 'ongs pa de dag la/lag pa bkru ba byin te/me tog dang /bdug pa dang /tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis mchod rten la
446a5('dul ba): phyag 'tshal bar byed do//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na tshe dang ldan pa chu 'thung 'khor lnga brgya dang ljongs rgyu zhing mnyan yod du phyin to//dgra bcom pa rnams ni ma
446a6('dul ba): dgongs par ye shes mthong ba mi 'jug pas/des mchod rten de rgyung ring po nas mthong ba dang /r-i di nI bcom ldan 'odas kyi sgra dang /sen mo'i mchod rten
446a7('dul ba): sar pa yin pas song la phyag bya'o snyam du bsams te/de dag der song ba dang /dge slong ma de gnyis kyis/de dge la lag pa dang /rkang pa bkru ba'i sa dang
446b1('dul ba): chu dag byin no//de nus me tog dang bdug pa byin pa dang /tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyi sku mchod rten la phyag byas so//de 'khor lnga brgya dang phyag byas nas song ngo //mchod
446b2('dul ba): rten de dong ha cang mi ring ba zhig na/tshe dang ldan ma ud pa la'i mdog shing drung zhig na nyin par gnas po'i phyir 'dug pa des de dge mthong nos spros pa/tshe dang ldan pa chu
446b3('dul ba): 'thung khyod kyis su'i mchod rten la phyag bgyis pa dgongs shig/des bsams pa/ci'i phyir tshe dang ldan ma ud po la'i mdog can 'di skad ces/tshe dang ldan pa chu
446b4('dul ba): 'thung khyod kyis su'i mchod rten la phyag bgyis pa dgongs shig ces smras snyam nas/des smras pa re shig bsam par bya'o//re shig sems pa la zhugs pa zhugs pa
446b5('dul ba): na/dge slong gre las skyes kyi rus pa'i mchod rten yin par mthong nas de rgyu zhe sdang gis kun nas dkris pa'i bag chags kyis bsgos pas slar log ste/tshe dang ldan pa
446b6('dul ba): ud pa la'i mdog can la smras pa/bstan pa la chu bur byung na khyod 'o do na 'dug bzhin du yul bar por ro zhes byas pa dang /de cang mi zer bar 'dug go/dIs
446b7('dul ba): slob ma dang nye gnas de dag la smras pa//tshe dang ldan pa dag ston po la sdug pa dang phangs par byed pa gang yin pa de dag gis/de'i phyir rus pa dang /rus gong gi
447a1('dul ba): rgya/phung po 'dri las sau drug r-i ro phyung la sgrol cig/de'i 'khor mang po yin pas de dag gis rus pa dang /rus grong gi phung po las so dag
447a2('dul ba): re re phyung ste bor nas skad cig nyid la bshig go/da ge slong ma de gnyis ngus nas/rings pa rings par dbyung khang mor song ste/dge slong ma rnams la smras pa dang //
447a3('dul ba): dge slong mi bcu gnyis sde dang /de la yid gzhol zhing mdza' ba 'dod chags dang bral ba gzhan dag gis thos nas/bdag cag gi mang po dang gidong shi ba
447a4('dul ba): lha zhes ngu zhing 'khod pa las/sbom dga' mos smras pa/phu nu mo dag de la su zhig gis bstan/de dag gis smras pa/de ni glo bur du 'ongs pas snying nas
447a5('dul ba): mi shes kyi/'phags ma ud pa la'i mdog can phyogs de nA 'dug pa des de dag la smras yang dag go/sbom dga' mos smras pa/phu nu mo dag de ni
447a6('dul ba): 'dreg mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin la/de yang do rang bzhin nyims pa yin pas/de'i las yin par bdag gis ni smras pa tsamra kho nas shes so//
447a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor sun 'byin par byed pa/'gor gyi nang du gzhag par mi bya'o zhes legs par gsungs pa yin pas/de'i phyir de la btsal du
447b1('dul ba): yod kyis tshur shog gdong bar bya'o//de dag khro bas kun nas dkris pas de dag de bsad pa'i phyir mtshon cha dang /khab dang /slong ldeng gi phur bu dag blangs nas
447b2('dul ba): dong /des de dag rgyang ring po nas rings pa rings par 'ong ba mthong nas bsdams pa/de dag shugs de lta bus 'ong ba las gdon mi zla bar de dag gdon mi za bar de//
447b3('dul ba): dag bdag la gnod pa byed par 'gyur ro//'on kyang de dag bsam pa ji lta bu zhig gis 'ongs pa bsam par bya'o snyam nas/re shig bsam pa la zhugs na//
447b4('dul ba): gsad pa'i bsam pa can du mthong nas/des snam sbyar byin gyis brlabs te/'grog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms pa la zhugs so//de dag gi de'i snum
447b5('dul ba): sbyar la mtshon cha dang /khab dang /seng ldeng gi phur bu dag gis bsnun pa na/ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis shi ba bzhin du dbugs phyi nang du mi rgyu bar 'dug go///
447b6('dul ba): de dag gis smras pa/phu nu myi spyod pa dran+de pa spu 'tsho ba 'di gsad pas shwa ldon zin gyis tshu re shog/'dod do zhes smras na skye dong ngo //de dag dong pa de
447b7('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa ud pa la'i me dog can ting nge 'dzin de las langs pa dang /shig ni de dag gis bdag la gnod par byas pa mthong ngo //de gnas skabs de bzhin
448a1('dul ba): du ba tsug lag khang du song ba dang /dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas/de dag gis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa ud bA la'i madrug can gyi
448a2('dul ba): 'di ltar gyur/des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong ma rnams kyis bdag do bsad pa la gzigasu gsil/de dag gis smras pa/ci'i phyir/de ji ltar gyur pa rnam
448a3('dul ba): rgyas par smras pa dang /don nyung ba'i dge slong rnams khros nas/gnas dang gnas dge btsun pa dag dge slong ma ni shin tu khros par gyur kyang de la phyag mi bya bo tsam du
448a4('dul ba): bya'o//'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa ud pa la'i mdog can gsad par byas pa ni mtshan gyi gzu lums byed do//zhes 'phye bar byed do//de las cig gis smras pa/kye shes ldan
448a5('dul ba): dag de ltar der zad na/'di la ji ltar bsgrub pa dpyad par bya'o//cig gis smras pa/bsgrub tu ci yod/bcom ldan 'das la gsol du zad mod/cig gis smras pa//
448a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol ci dgos/bdag cag 'dus las ji ltar dge slong mi 'ga' yang rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'ong du mi gzhug par khrims bya'o//de dag 'dus nas
448a7('dul ba): dge slong ma rnams gtsug lag khang du 'ong du mi gzhug par de lta bu khrim su byas so//dge slong ma rnams gcig la'i khang du song du mi gzhug par brtsams pa dang /
448b1('dul ba): bkaR+Sha bsti bri bar gyur to//skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta ma'i kun tu spyod pa ni/nyin cig bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mngon par phyag 'tshul du 'ong
448b2('dul ba): bAb yin pa las/de las dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/go'u ta ma dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis/dge slong ma rnams gtsug lag khang du 'od du mi gzhugs par khrims byas
448b3('dul ba): kyis ma 'gro bar sdod cig/des smras pa/'phags pa dag de dag gis nongs pa bgyis pa bzhin du bdag gis kyang bgyis sam ci/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/dge
448b4('dul ba): 'dun rnams de ltar bzhed pa la kho bo cag gis ci byer yod/de slar log nas dbyar mo khang du song ngo //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du 'dri bar
448b5('dul ba): mdzad pa yin pas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la gun dga' bo skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo nad kyis thibs sam ci/btsun pa ma lags so//
448b6('dul ba): 'on ci'i phyir mi 'ong /des bcom ldan 'das la skabs de dag rgyas par gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo dge slong gis khrims su byas pa
448b7('dul ba): thog tu bab bo//'on kyang dge slong ma rnams ni/dge slong rnams la rag lus pa mang ba yin zhing /gal te de dag 'ong du ma bcug ni bkur bsti med par 'gyur ro//de'i phyir du//
449a1('dul ba): skyong mas/dge sbyong spro ba la dris te 'od du bcug la/phyu mas dag mi sbyin no//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong mus dge slong slong
449a2('dul ba): la dris nas/gtsug lag khang du 'ong du bcug laM/gdams ngag ni bkyig par bya'o zhes bka' stsa ya pa dang /dge slong ma rnams kyis ji skad du dris nas
449a3('dul ba): ngan du 'jug pa mi shes pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong mas gtsug log khang du mi 'jug par 'di skad ces/dmigs pa dag bde
449a4('dul ba): cag gtsug lag khang du 'jug gis mkhyen par mdzod cig ces smros shig/dge slong gis kyang sring mo dag kho na can mchin cha dang /khab ngag 'chad pa ma yin nam
449a5('dul ba): zhes dris shig/dge slong mas ma dris por zhugs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//dge slong gis ma smras na yang 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//bcom ldan
449a6('dul ba): 'das kyis gdams dge bkyig par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /drug sde rnams kyis ma bgyigs so//becom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong ma nyes pa dang /
449a7('dul ba): bcas pa la/dge slong gi dge 'dun mi bzod bzhin du dge slong gis gdams ngag brjod par mi bya'o//dge slong ma nyes pa dang bcas pa la/dge slong gi dge 'dun mi bzod/
449b1('dul ba): bzhin du/dge slong gis gdams ngagra brjod par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//gdams ngag la ji lta bya bzhin du gso sbyong dang dgag dbye la yang de bzhin no/
449b2('dul ba): sdom la/dge slong mas ni bzod gsol dang /dgog daphye smras ni gso sbyong mini/cig la cig kyang bzod pa gsol//gi nyis ni rgan rims ji bzhin no//sangs rgyas
449b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal byed kyi tshal mgo ma de zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//dge slongs gzhan zhig dge slong zhig las klog par byed
449b4('dul ba): do//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na de la nyes pa zhig byung dang na/des de spyod pa dang /de dbyar khang du song nas/glos phab ste 'dug go//de nas mkhan mos mthong nas smras pa
449b5('dul ba): gzhon nu ma khyod ci'i phyir glos phag ste 'dug/des smras pa/mkhan mo slob dpon gyis bdag la spyos na/ji ltar bgyi ma 'tshal to//bu mo mkhan mo dang /slob dpon
