458a3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis yongasu dag pa len pa'i dge slong ma dag gis/lung 'bogs pa'i dge slong de'i ming dri bar bya'o zhes gsunges pa dang /de dag gis yang lung 'bogs
458a4('dul ba): pa'i dge slong de'i ming shes bzhin du yang dris pa de'i skabs/dge slong rnams kyis/bcom ldan 'das la gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de dag gis
458a5('dul ba): de'i ming shes na/de dag gis dI bar mi bya'o//de dag gis ming mi shes na dri bar bya'o//gleng bzhi mnyan yod na'o//skye dgu'i bdag mo go'u ta mi na zhing 'dug pa de'i drung du/
458a6('dul ba): dge slong ma rnams 'ongs nas dris pa/'phyags mu ji lta zhing bzhugs des smra pa/bu mo bdag bro 'tshalo//de rnams kyis smras pa/'phags ma khyod kyis ci zhig bcing
458a7('dul ba): des smras pa/bu mo bdag sngon khyim pa mo che/khyim gyi nad gyi nang na gnas shing zhwa bcang so//'phags med ltar ci'i srad du mi bcang /bu mo nga ltar bdag rab tu byung ste/
458b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su ma gnang na/ji ltar bcang bar bya zhes pa'i skabs de/dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong la bzlaso//dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la'o bco
458b2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta bas na rje su gnang ste dge slong ma dag gis dbyar khang du zhwa bcang bar bya'o//gleng gzhi ni rgyal po li 'ab na'o//rgyal po'i khab kyi bram
458b3('dul ba): ze slongs mo ba gzhan zhig 'khyam zhing /khyim gzhan zhig tu zhugs nas smras pa/ba~M de legasu gyur cig/slongs mo byin cig/khyim bdag mosu smras pa/bram ze chung zad
458b4('dul ba): kyang med kyis song shig ces byas pa dang /de'i phyir byung ste song ngo //skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi yang khyim der bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugaso//bram ze des bsams pa
458b5('dul ba): dge sbyong mgo reg ma 'di yang zhugs ne re shi ga 'di la yang mi ster ram/bdag gcig pu la yin blta bar bya'o snyam ste/de de la skabs tshol zhing yud tsam zhig de na sdong ngo //
458b6('dul ba): des sangs rgyas kyi yum gshegaso zhes/rings pa rings par langs nas bstan bting ste rab tu dga' nas song ste/gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bas lhung bzed
458b7('dul ba): bkang ste phu lo/bram ze de ser sna dang mi bzod pa skyes nas song ste smras pa/'phags ma des re shig lhung bzed du phun sum tshogs pa ci mchis blta'o//de yang drangs pas nges nye nga
459a1('dul ba): /bstan to//bram zes lhung bzed der mchis ma blug so//skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis smras pa/bu ci'i phyir khyod kyis bsod snyoms ma rang bar byas
459a2('dul ba): gal te khyod kyis gsol ba btab par gyur na/des de bzhin du byin par gyur pa zhig nA/bram ze spobs pa med de cang mi smra bar 'dug go de'i skabs dge slong ma rnams kyis/dge
459a3('dul ba): slong dag la bzlaso//dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/bud med kyi rang bzhin la ni skyes pa phal pa gzhan yang 'tshe ste/ji ltar skyes
459a4('dul ba): bu bram ze gti mug nges kyang 'di bzhin du bsod nams ma yin pa mang du bskyed//de lta bas na dge slong ma dag gis lhung bzed kha yogs bcang bar bya bar mkhyen nas gsungs
459a5('dul ba): pa dge slong dag bud myed kyi rang bzhin la ni skyes pa phal ba gzhan yang 'o cha ste/skyes bu bram ze ga ti mug des kyang 'di bzhin du bsod nams ma yin pa mang du bskyed do//de lta bas///
459a6('dul ba): mamedzesu gnang ste/dge slong ma dag gis lhung bzed kyi kha logs bcang bar bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma dag gis lhung bzed kyi kha yogs bcang bar bgyi'o zhes gsu
459a7('dul ba): bdang /dge slong ma dag gis lhung bzed kyi kha yogs ci 'dra ba de ma shes te/de'i skabs dge slong dag la bzlas//dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la'o//bcom ldan 'das
459b1('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/lhung bzed kyi kha yogs ni lhung bzed kyi sgo dang /der lbu bzod bcug nas/dge slong ma dag bsod snyoms la 'gro bar bya'o//gleng gzho ni mnyan yod na'o//shar phyog/
459b2('dul ba): kyi mi mang po rnams bskyed mos tshal la dga'o//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig ni mnyan yod dus ston la bab ste/de rnams gtsang zhing bsong ba'i bza' ba dang /bca' ba dag khyer te bskyed
459b3('dul ba): mos tshal du song //de rnams kyis chung ma dag la me tog gi phreng ba rgyus la skur cig ces spring pa dang /de rnams kyi ra ba na me tog bzang po sna tshogs pa dag skyes te/de dag kyang
459b4('dul ba): rnams kyis spring ngo snyams nas/rings par me tog gi ra ba dag nas me tog btus na brgyad ma she so//de dag gis me tog phreng rgyud mA li me tog brgyus ra shog cesma spring na/
459b5('dul ba): de dag de'i nyin par me tog nyo ba yod de/de dag ma 'ongs pa dang /de rnams sems khongasu chud cing 'dug ste/de dag gis bdag cag la me tog phreng ba ba rgyus la skur cig ces spring
459b6('dul ba): na de bdag cag gis ni brgyud mi shes/phreng rgyud ma bos na yang 'ongs du mi btub ste ji ltar bsgrub skum//sbom dga' mo yang bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu zhing khyim gzhan zhig tu/
459b7('dul ba): zhugs te/mtshan bzangs me bsod snyoms bslang zhes smras pa dang /des smras pa/'phags ma ji bzhud cig/bdag cag ni sems khongasu chud cing mchis te/bsod snyoms dang /
460a1('dul ba): tshig gra lA zhig ster tre su yang ma mchiso//des smras pa/ci 'di skad smra 'am/ngas cung zad ci nyes des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par brjod do//sbom dga'
460a2('dul ba): mos smras pa/khyed nyid ci'i phyir mi brgyud des smras pa/'phags ma bi dag cag ni ma 'tshul na/mkhyen pa lta mchis sam/sbom dga' mos smras pa/mtshan bzang ma
460a3('dul ba): de shes te/de'i dus las 'das pas/ba zo'i gnas dang /las kyi gnas nges pa rangs mi shes pa med do//de dag gis 'phags ma de bzhin du baMrgyus twa spel bar ci
460a4('dul ba): gnang /des smras pa/mtshan bzangs ma gal te bza' ba'i rin sbyin nam/des smras pa/'phags ma lags par dbulo//shin tu dbul gyis brgyus shig/des lhung
460a5('dul ba): bzed bzhag ste/rkang pa brgyad nas 'dug ste/myur bar de bzhin du brgyus pa khyim bdag gi chung ma de dag gis de mthong ste/ngo mtshar skyes nas de dag yongasu mgu
460a6('dul ba): ste sbom dga' mo la bzal ba'i rin mang du byin//sbom dga' myo des mgran pas/khyim gzhan du yang phreng pa brgyus te/der yang bza' ba'i rin byin pa dang //
460a7('dul ba): sbom dga' mo rnyed pa mang du snyed de thob nas byung ste/dbyar khang du song ngo //ji tsam na phreng rgyud ma 'ongs te smras pa/me tog de dag 'on cig brgyu'o//des smras pa/khyed
460b1('dul ba): ga du bzod gla shAng nas 'ongs kyi swA/phreng ba de dag brgya swA tA bskyed mos tshul du bsgyur zin to//de dag gis sbas pa//'phyags su sbrum+b+ha dka' mas//de dag stong
460b2('dul ba): shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams ni tshig pa/tshangs par spyod pa ni tshig pa yin te/gang gi phyir de ltar gzhan dag gi 'tsho ba 'phrog go zhes 'phya bar byed/spyod par byed//
460b3('dul ba): kha zer bar bye zhes dge slong rnams kyis thos nas skabaso dA bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/phrang rgyud mo rnam so kha zir ba
460b4('dul ba): nyes dmigaso gang ci byung ba ni/dge slong maphreng ba brgyud pa'i gzhi las byur pa yin gyis/de lta bas na dge slong ma rnams kyis phreng ba brgya bIr mi bya'o snyam du dgongs
460b5('dul ba): nas bka' sprul pa/dge slong dag phyeng rgyud ma rnams phya ba'i gzhir gyur gyis/de lta bas na dge slong ma rnams kyis phreng ba brgyu bar mi bya'o//dge slong ma dag
460b6('dul ba): phreng ba rgyud na 'grel tshabs can du 'gyuro//ba com ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams kyis phreng ba brgyu bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /gtsug pud kyi dus ston dang /
460b7('dul ba): dus ston chen po dang /lo lnga'i dus ston dag byung bar gyur te/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang /rgyal rigs dbyar byed dang /khyim
461a1('dul ba): bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang /ri dgas 'dzin gyi mas g+ha dang /zhal tu brgan rabs dang /dge bsnye na ma rdzu 'phrus tsun b+hI ma dang //khyim bdag brtsa
461a2('dul ba): po dang /shAkya ming chen dang /gzhan yang dad pa can mang po dag gong nas gong du mchog khyad par can gtsug pung la sogs pa dus ston chen po dang /dga' ston
461a3('dul ba): dag byed do//yul tha dad pa na gnas pa'i skye bo dang //dge slong dang dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma dag 'dus par gyur te/me tog mang du brngas pa dang
461a4('dul ba): phreng rgyud ma rnams kyis phreng ba legs par rgyud ma nus te/bram ze dang khyimu bdag dang pa can gzhan dag tu phyin tshun bskor kyang me tog dag legs par brgyud ma
461a5('dul ba): nus so//de dag gis dge slong ma rnams lce smras pa/kye ma bdag cag ni me tog brgyud ma 'tshal na/e ma'o 'phags ma dag ni mkhyen te/khyed cag ston pa mchod
461a6('dul ba): cing phreng ba brgyu ba'i dus la bab bo//de dag gis smras pa/shes ldan dag khyed cag mi shes sam/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis//dge slong ma rnams phreng
461a7('dul ba): pa mi brgyu'o zhes bslab pa'i gzhi bcas na/de ji ltar brgyu zhes pa de'i skabs dge slong rnams kyis/bcom ldan 'das la gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
461b1('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta bas na rje su gnang ste/sangs rgyasna dang /chos dang /dge 'dun gyi ched du dge slong ma rnams kyis phreng ba brgyu bar bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyus/
461b2('dul ba): dang /chos dang /dge 'dun gyi ched du dge slong ma rnams kyis phreng ba brgyu bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /de rnams sgo khang dang /khyams dag tu rkang pa brkyang nas 'dug ste/
461b3('dul ba): me tog brgyu bar brtsams pa ma dad pa dag gis mthong ste/kye ma 'phags ma dag khyed cag kun phreng rgyud ma kho na las rab tu byung ngam zhes dpyas pa dang /de dag spa go pA ste
461b4('dul ba): cad mi smra bar 'dug pa de'i skabs dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lnga pa/dge slong dag ma dad pa rnams 'phya ba
461b5('dul ba): gzhi ni tshul ma yin pa de dag ste/de lta bas na dge slong ma rnams kyis/sgo khang dang khyam su 'dug ste/me tog brgya bar mi bya'o//dge slong ma dag sgo khang dang khyam su
461b6('dul ba): 'dug ste/phreng ba brgyud na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//gzhan yang shes pa yod na/dben pa'i phyogasu brgyu bar bya'o//dge slong ma dag sgo khang dang /khyam su 'dug
461b7('dul ba): skyed me tog brgyud na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro//sdom ni/lcags kyi snod dang chang gi las//khyim gyi gzhi rnams 'tshe ba dang //de bzhin tshong khang gzhi dag dang //lha 'a
462a1('dul ba): gzugs ni mi bca //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod pa rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgron tung+ka zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug s+ho///
462a2('dul ba): sbom dga' mo//khar ba mkhan gyi drung du song ste/smras pa/bzhin bzangs khar bral ltu bzod byed nus samA/des smras pa/'phags ma de bzhin shes na tshod ji
462a3('dul ba): tsam du bgyi/chen po zhig bya'o//'phags ma la khar bA'i lhung bzed chen po cir dogs/bkren pa khyod la rin med par ni byud du mi 'jug na/rin chang bar sbyin
462a4('dul ba): gyis byas shes/dus bsams pa bdag las 'god pa ni ci yang med na bya'o snyam nas/des khar ba'i lhung bzed chen po zhig byas so//des smras pa/'dir gzhug
462a5('dul ba): tu rung ba gzhan cig kyang byos shig/des gzhan zhig kyang byas te/de bzhin du gzhan bdun gyi bAr du byaso//sbom dga' mos de dag dge slong ma rnams la byi
462a6('dul ba): dor byung du btsug nas/tshon sna lnga'i skud pa'i dra bar dris de r-i masna bzhin bcug ste/dge sbyong ma'i mgo la bkur nus/gang du mgron du bos pa der song ste phye ni
462a7('dul ba): nas/de dag bkram ste 'dug pa dang /bram ze dang khyim bdag gis smras pa/'phags ma khyod khar ba mkhan gyi tshong khang 'grims sam ci/des smras pa//
462b1('dul ba): bkren pa khyad cag ni shes re shig 'dir na zan blang //'dir ni khur ba'o//'drir ni 'bras can no//'dir ni tshod ma blung //'phags ma de bzhin du gzhan dag
462b2('dul ba): kyang zho ba dang /gal te na tshad ma mang du rnyed kyang srid do zhes smras pa dang /de na du mi sme bAr 'dug go//de'i skyebs dge slong rnams kyis thos te/bcom ldan 'das
462b3('dul ba): la gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/nyes dmigs gang dag yin pa ni dge slong ma ma khar ba'i snod bcangs pa yin+da tA/de lta bas ni dge slong
462b4('dul ba): ma rnams kyis khur ba'i snod bcang par mi bya'o snyam du mkhyen nas bka' sprul pa/dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong ma rnams kyis khar bA'i snod bcang
462b5('dul ba): bar mi bya'o//dge slong ma dge khar ba'i snod 'chung na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro//yang gzhan kha gzar dang /tshe snod dang /phul ba'i btung ba'i dge ni bcang
462b6('dul ba): par bya'o////bam po zhe lnga pa//gling gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//mnyan yod na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gnas pa 'dis/rigs mnyam pa las chung ma
462b7('dul ba): rlungs te/de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dge' bar byed/dga'i dgur spyod par byed do//de rje bar byed/dga' bar byed cing /dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/
463a1('dul ba): bu mo g.yas zhar mra zhig bcas te/g.yas zhar ma de bkra mri shis pas sus kyang ma bslangaso//mnyan yod na khyim bdag gzhun zhig gis
463a2('dul ba): chung ma gcig pa blangs pa dang /de rang gi lus kyis dus las 'das so//de bzhin du gnyis pa nas gsum pa dang /bdun pa'i bar du blangs na/de dag kyang
463a3('dul ba): rang gi las kyis dus las 'das te/de'i ming chung ma gsod pa chung ma gsod pa zhes kun tu gragaso//des gzhan zhig gi bu mo zhig blangs pa dang /des smras
463a4('dul ba): pad ci bdag cag gi bu mo yang yongasu gtang ngam/yugs sa mo zhig blangs pa dang /ci bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid yongasu gtang ngam zhes smra so//des rang nyid khyim
463a5('dul ba): gyi 'tsho chis ngag bya bar brtsams pa dag dang /de'i sten grogs shig khyim du 'ongs te/de'i ming nyid nas ga re zhes dris pa dang /de dag gis smras pa/de nang du zhugs
463a6('dul ba): te khyim gyi 'tsho tshes dag byed do//sten grogs kyis smras pa/khyod kyi chung ma dag bza' ba dang /bgo ba sbyar zhing las byed du gzhug mi nus sam/gang gi phyir
463a7('dul ba): rang nyid khyim gyi 'tsho tshis ngag byed/nges smras pa/ste ni grogs bdag gis nus mod kyi/'on kyang bdag gis chung ma gcig blangs na/de rang gi las kyis dus lnga
463b1('dul ba): 'das so//de bzhin du gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang /bdun gyi bar chung ma blangs nu/de dag kyang rang gi las kyis dus las 'das te/gang dag bdag gli mang chung ma gas/
463b2('dul ba): pa chung ma gsod pa zhes kun tu grag so//des ci gzhan yang mi bslang ngam/bdag gis bslangs na/de dag bdag cag gi bu mo yang yongasu gtang ngam ci zhes zer ro//ci
463b3('dul ba): yugs snga mo myi slang dram/de yang bdag gis byas mod kyi/ci bdagu nyid yongasu gtang ngam zhes zer ro//stan grogs de lta nA/g.yas zhar ma cig ste mi bslang/
463b4('dul ba): de dag gi bu mo de yang mi ster//sten grogs song dang /khyim bdag de kun tu skyo bas ste ro//des de bskul nas khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ste/des bde legs shes
463b5('dul ba): smras pa dang /nang mi dag gis smras pa/ci slong /bu mo slong ngo //bu mo gang yin/g.yas zhar ma'o//de bzhin du sbyin par bya'o//blang bya'i dus bya'o//de bzhin du dus byas so//
463b6('dul ba): gang gi nyin par bzang ba de la'o zhes smras nas song ngo //de nas khyim bdag gi chung ma de/bu mo bag ma ra gtang ngo snyam ste/chang btsos so//tsho ba'i dus la bab ste ngo dros nas
463b7('dul ba): ma rung bar gyur to//de nas khyim bdag gi chung ma nges chang 'tshong ma la/bdag gi bu mo bag mar gtong ste chang 'di tsam zhig dgos kyis sbyor cig ces smras pa dang /de dag gis
464a1('dul ba): legs kyis dbul lo zhes smra so//des re shig chang dag sta gon byas pa dang /ji tsam na sbom dga' mo bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu zhing de'i khyim zhig tu zhugs
464a2('dul ba): te/mtshan bzangs ma bsod snyoms byin cig/khyim bdag gi chung ma de yang yang dang yang du chang dag lta ste/brel nas smras pa/'phags ma ji bzhud cig/bdag ni sems
464a3('dul ba): khongs su chung ni mchis te/bsod snyoms lta ga la zhig su yang mi 'bul lo//des smras pa/ci 'di skad zer ba las ngas cung zad ma nyes sam/des 'di ltar rgyas
464a4('dul ba): phar bshad pa dang /sbom dga' mos smras pa/mtshan bzangs ma de lta na/ci'i phyir slar mi bcos/des smras pa/'phags ma bdag ni ma 'tshal na/mkhyen pa lta mchis
464a5('dul ba): sam/sbom dga' mo smras pa/mtshan bzangs ma shes te/de'i dus las 'das pas/gzo'i gnas dang /las kyi gnas gang yin pa nges par ngas mi shes pa med do//
464a6('dul ba): 'phags ma slar bcos te/stsal par TI gnang /des smras pa/mtshan bzangs ma ngas slar bcos na/gal te bza' ba'i rin sbyin nam/des sman pa/'phags ma
464a7('dul ba): legs par 'bulo//shin tu dbul gyis slar chos shig/sbom dga' mos smras pa/khyer te shog blta'o//des tshang gi rdzi ma dag bstan pa dang /sbom dga'
464b1('dul ba): mos 'di ji ltar ma rung /chang rdzu dag la phan tshun brtags nu dro ba las ma rung bar mthong nas/des skar khung dag phye na snga chang rdza'i 'og tu byom mang du bting ste/ngos
464b2('dul ba): la chu bteb nas nya lcibs kyis kun tu dkris te/des bsil yab dag blangs nas g.yab par brtsams pa dang /bsil ba'i khyad par gyi sbyor bas chang slar rung
464b3('dul ba): bar gyur to//bag mu len par yang nye nas grogs po dang /'dzal ba shes dang /nye du dang /skye bo drug 'dus pa dang /chang 'tshong ba de yang chang dog sta gon byas te
464b4('dul ba): 'dug nas/gang gi tshe sbron pa gang dag 'ongs na sbyin no snyam pa dang /khyim bdag des kyang chad de nyid kyis bag ma gtang ba sgrub par byaso//de nas chang 'tshong ba de 'ongs
464b5('dul ba): nas smras pa/khyim bdag chang long shig/des smras pa/shes ldan chog ste/chang de nyid slar bcos nas/chad de nyid kyis bag ma btang ba grub par byaso//smras
464b6('dul ba): pa/khyim badrag de ni der zang na/de slar sus bcos shes dri so//des de 'phags ma sbom dga' mos slar bcos te/de deng la phan 'dogs pa'o zhes bAshad pa dang
464b7('dul ba): dge sbyong shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni tshig pa'o//tshangs par spyod pa tshig pa ste/gang gi phyir da ltar gzhan gyi 'tsho ba 'phrog pa'o zhes 'phya bar byed/smod par byed/
465a1('dul ba): kha zor bar dpyod pa'i skabs so//dge slong rnams kyis thos te/bcom ldan 'das la ga sol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/dge slong
465a2('dul ba): ma sbrum dga' mo'i spyod pa ninr-i dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa byed//de lta bas na dge slong mas cheng gi las mi bya'o snyam du mkhyen nas bka' stsal pa/dge slong dang
465a3('dul ba): dge slong ma sbom dag 'o mo'i spyod pa ni dge sbyong gi ma se no te/de lta bas na dge slong ma dag gis chung gi las mi bya'o//dge slong mas chang gi las byed na ltung
465a4('dul ba): ba sbom por 'gyuraro//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//mnyan yod na khyim bdag sbyin pa la dga' ba zhig gnas pa do//dus gzhan zhig na nad kyis thebs par gyur
465a5('dul ba): te de'i dus kyi tshe yongasu chad cing ji ltar bdag ni 'chi'o snyam ste/des gang cung zad bdag dbang zhing /khyim na yod pa de thams cad dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /
465a6('dul ba): gzhan yang grogs po dang /'dza' bshis dang /nye du dag la byin te/khyim gcig pu lus pa sbom dga' mos thos nas/de rings par song ste brgyus nas der 'ongs
465a7('dul ba): te phyin pa dang /des khyim bdag de la/khyim bdag bud med ni rnying pa nyung ba'o zhes mtshan ma zhig nye bar bstan pa dang /khyim bdag des kyang rig ni sa smras pa
465b1('dul ba): 'phrugs ma khyod 'phyi ste 'ongs pas/gang chung zad ci yod pa de thams cad dras byin te khyim gcig pu las ma lus par cung zad sbyin du yang medo//des smras pa/
465b2('dul ba): khyim bdag glad po che'i spu ltar 'phang bstod de/khyod kyi drung du 'ong na/ji ltar re thag chung de 'gro/des smras pa/'phags ma khyim gcig pu las ma lus shes
465b3('dul ba): mu smras sam/gel te de bzhi na khyim de snoms shig/des smras pa/khyim bdag de bzhin du blang bar bya'o//nad med par gyur cig ces smras nas byung ste sod///
465b4('dul ba): ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/khyim bdag dro dus las 'das te/de'i nye du dag gis/ras sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dag gIs khyogs brgyan
465b5('dul ba): nas dur khrod du khyer ta song ngo //ji ltar khyim bdag de dus las 'das pa sbom dga' mos thos nas/de rings pa rings par 'ongs te/des de'i khyim sgo bcad nas
465b6('dul ba): rgyas btub ste/de nas phyogs gcig tu gnas te 'dug/ji tsam na de dag gis bsregs te 'ongs nas/de dag gis smras pa/khyim 'di su sde rgyas btab/sbom
465b7('dul ba): dga' mos smras pa/gang dbang ba des rgyas btab po//de dag gis nus pa/su la byin/des smras pa/sbom dga' mo ba dag la'o//de dag gis smras pa/'phags
466a1('dul ba): ma gal te de lta na 'on kyang glu dbul gyis 'jug/ngos smras pa/sbyin+da nam+b+ha/sbyin no zhes nges rgya bcug ste de dag zhugs//zhugs te 'khong pa dang /
466a2('dul ba): drar bram ze dang /khyim bdag dag 'ongs te/de dag de dag tu 'dus nas dge sbyong shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni tshig pa'o//tshungs par spyod po tshig pa ste/gang gi
466a3('dul ba): phyir da ltar khyim glar gtong zhing len pa'o zhes 'phya bar byed/smod par byed/kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de/dge sbyong dag gis thos te/bcom ldan 'das la
466a4('dul ba): gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag bram ze dang khyim bdog rnams 'phya ba'i gzhir gyur gyis/de lta bas na dge slong ma rnams kyi

466a6('dul ba): gzhan zhig gnas pa de/dus gzhan zhig na nad kyis thebs pa gyur te/de'i lus kyi tshe yongasu 'chang cing ji ltar bdag ni 'chi'o snyam ste/des gang nung
466a7('dul ba): zad bdag dbang zhing /khyim na yod pa de thams cad dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /gzhan yang grogs po dang /mdza' bshes dang /nye du dag la byin te/tsheng
466b1('dul ba): khang gcig pu lus pa sbom dga' mos thos nas/de rings par song ste rgyu zhing der 'ongs te son nas/tshong pa de la sbyin bdag bud med ni rnyed pakung ba'i shes
466b2('dul ba): mA tshan pa zhig nye bar bstan pa dang /khyim bdag nges kyang rig nus skyes pa/'phags ma khyod 'phyas te 'ongs pa so//gang cung zad ci yod pa dri thams cad ngas
466b3('dul ba): byin te/tshong khang gcig pu las ma lus pas cung ni dkyang sbyin du ming ngo //des smras pa/sbyin bdag glang po che'i sna ltar 'phang bstod de khyod kyi drung du 'ongs
466b4('dul ba): nor ji ltar re thag chang de 'gro/des smras pa/'phags mtshong khong gcig pu las ma lus so zhes mya smras sam/gal te de bzhin nu khyam de snoms shig
466b5('dul ba): rjes smras pa/khyim bdag de bzhin du byung byar bya'o//nud med par gyur cig ces smras nas byung ste song ngo //ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag de dus las
466b6('dul ba): 'angs te/de r-i hr-i du rnams kyis ras sngon po dang //ser blo dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dgra gis kyang khyogs brgyan te dur khrod du khye'o//sbom dga' mos
466b7('dul ba): khyim bdag de ji ltar dus las 'das pa thos nas/de rings pa rings par song ste/des de'i tshong khang gi skyo bcad nga rgyas btab nas/nges nas lcogs gcig
467a1('dul ba): tu song ste 'dug/rdo tsum na bsregs te slar log nas/grogs po dang /mdza' bshes dang /ts+tshe du dag lhan cig mya ngan sangs nas cung zad cig
467a2('dul ba): 'dug pa dang /skyes bu gAM zhan zhig tshong 'dus su 'gro bar byas te/de khyim du phyin nas/des de dag la tshang khang ni sbom dga' mos rgyas btab po zhes smras

467a4('dul ba): gis smras pa/su la byin/des smras pa/sbom dga' ma b.rAg la'o//de dag gis smras pa/'phags ma gal te de lta na ljon kyang glo dbul gyis bdag cag gi zong

467a7('dul ba): byed//smod par byed/kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis thos te/bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/dge
467b1('dul ba): slong dag bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba'i bzhir gyur gyis/de lta bus na dge slong ma rnams kyis tshong khang glar gtang zhing blang bar mi bya'o//dge slong nas/

467b3('dul ba): thogs te/mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang /ltos ma mo zhig dril bu thog sA te 'gro ba des mthong ste/des bsams pa/thabs de ni bezang po

468a1('dul ba): bar song ste/smras pa/g+hator ma dang lung bstan par byaro zhes gang dang gang gi khyim du nye bar song ba dang /de dang de dag gis smras pa/bdag cag
468a2('dul ba): gr-i g+ha tor n+ya dang lung bstan pa bye sa zin te//sus lung bstan//de dag gis 'phags me sbom dga' mas so zhes smras pa dang /dge sbyong shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams
468a3('dul ba): ni tshig pa'o//tshangs par spyod pa ni tshig pa ste/gang gi phyir gzhan dag gi 'tsho ba 'phrogs pa'o zhes de dag 'phya bar byed smod par byed//kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs
468a4('dul ba): de dge slong dag gis thos to//bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/nyes dmigs gang yin pa de ni/dge slong mas lha'i gzugs
468a5('dul ba): bcangs pa las gyur te/de lta bas ni/dge sbyong mas lha'i gzugs bcang bar mi bya bar mkhyen nas bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ltas ma mo de dag 'phya ba'i gzhi
468a6('dul ba): ni sbom dga' mo'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i spyod pa ste/nyes dmigs gang yin pa ni dge slong mas lha'i gzugs 'tshang ba yin pas ni/dge slong ma rnams kyis lha
468a7('dul ba): gzugs bcang bar mi bya'o//dge slong mas lho'i gzugs bcangs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro//sdom ni/bud med chu 'gram phye mas min/rgyun la btsal bar mi
468b1('dul ba): bya dang //lhung bzed ldan pa gnyis pa dang //mchong bu'i snod ni mi bcang //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/brgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshol mgon med zas sbyin gyi

468b4('dul ba): te bsams pa/'di ltar bu zan mo'i bu mos bdag la mgran te/skra 'chad cing 'dug pa ji ltar sems/ci sbom dga' mo sngon sgra yod ma myong ngam/de mi dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /
468b5('dul ba): de bzhin du phyis kyang bdag mthong na sras mgran par mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam ste/des de'i phyi bzhin du song ste/skyu ru ra'i phye mas skra la gtor to//des smras pa/'phags ma bdag

469a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa/dge slong dag bud med 'phya ba'i gzhir gyur gyis/de bas na dge slong ma
469a2('dul ba): rnams kyis bud med khrus byes zin pa la yang khrus kyi phye ma mgo la gtor bar mi bya'o//dge slong mas bud med khrus byas pa la khrus kyi phye ma mgo la ga tAr na

471b1('dul ba): bdag d+hA smad de/bskyod snyoms pa zhig mthong nas//des dge slong khyod glang nas 'dir 'ongs shes dris pa dang /bsoHsnyoms pang 'drar zhing sta gong nas ldan sngon yang ma/

471b7('dul ba): kyis thong shig/des de'i mgo dang lhung bzed kyang bcag/chos gos kyang dral nas/de de bzhin du tshul mi sdug par mig mchi mis gang zhing /ring gi las la dmigs
472a1('dul ba): nas/rgyal byed kyi cha lnga du song ba dang /de dge slong dag gis mthong ste/tshe dang ldan pa ci 'di 'dra ba'i gnasu sus bzhag ces dris pa dang /des

472a4('dul ba): mkhyen nas bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas na/de'i phyir dge slong dag gis khyim gyi sgo mang por bab bab tu 'gro bar mi bya'o//'on kyang sngar khyim gzhan

472a6('dul ba): mA bzhag ste khyim gyi sgo mang por 'gro bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /dge slong dag gis sgra drung du mtshan ma bzhag ste mA s+thanA par song ba dang /skyes pa bud med
472a7('dul ba): yid btsugs pa dag/smad g.yogs dang stong g.yogs la/shing dang /mang kun dag thu/lus dge 'a phye zhing 'dug pa'i bud med kyis de mthong ste brtobs nas/shin
472b1('dul ba): tu sgren mo dang /skyon car du gyur te/de dag 'phya ba'i gzhan do da slong dag gis thos nas/bcom ldan 'das la gastsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
472b2('dul ba): stsol pa/dge slong dag bud med rnams 'phyo ba'i gzhir gyur gyis/de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis de bzhin du glo bur du 'gro bar mi bya'o//'on kyang sgra byas
472b3('dul ba): te nang du 'gro bar bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis sgra byas te 'gro bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /de drag gis a lA la zhes byas nas song ba dang /nang mi dge gris
472b4('dul ba): smras pa/'phags pa khyed cag ci khye'u byis pa bzhin du a la la zhes zer zhing 'ong dram/de dag gis smras pa/sring mo bcom ldan 'das kyis sgra byos la slong shig

472b6('dul ba): med de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang /de'i skabs dge slong de ga gis thos te/bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dag
472b7('dul ba): slong dag gis a la la zhes zer zhing khyim du 'gro bar mi byi'o//'on kyang sgra gzhan bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis sgra gzhan bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /de dag 'gro ba'i tshe sgo
473a1('dul ba): 'phar la brdungs pa dang /nang mI dag gis smras pa/'phags ba che sa sgo la la la bA dzag/de dag gis smras pa/sgyu byed do// khyod cag gis sgro'aphar gcag
473a2('dul ba): gam zhes pa dang /de dag spobs pa med de/cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang /de'i ska sa dge slong dag gis thos te/bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis
473a3('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/sgo 'phar la brdeg par mi bya'o//'on kyang dbyug pas sgra dbyung bar bya'o//dge slong dag gis sgra dbyung ba'i dbyug pa de ci 'dra ma shes nas/bcom ldan 'das
473a4('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/khar sil bcad par bya ste/des sgra byas nas 'jug par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis khar sal gyis sgra byas te 'jug par bya'o zhes gsungs nas/dge
473a5('dul ba): slong dag gis khar sil gyis ska byas nas song ba dang /de dag la khyi dag gis gnos par byas pa dang /kha cig gis ma btags par kha ra sil gyis mang du brdeg pa dang /bcom
473a6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de la kha ra sil gyis brdeg par ni mi bya mod kyi/bsdigs par ni bya'o//byi kha cig la bsdigs pa dang /slar shin tu zla bar gyur te/bcom ldan
473a7('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de la bsod snyoms las kham cig tsam sbyin par bya'o//ma dad pa gzhan zhig gi khyim du de dag sod nas/dge slong dag gis kha ra sil dkrol ba dang /
473b1('dul ba): mi dga' bar gyur te sus kyang ma dris so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yang dang yang du dkrol ba'i mi bya ste/'on kyang lan gnyis lan gsum du dkrol par bya'o//gleng
473b2('dul ba): gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//mnyan yod na khyim bdag gzhan zhig 'dug pa de'i khyim du/sangs rgyas la sogs pa/dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa dang /dge slong
473b3('dul ba): gi dge 'dun ni dong ngo //bcom ldan 'das ni rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms kyang len to//rgyu rnam pa lngas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rdzas kyis bskur
473b4('dul ba): pa ni bzhugs shing bsod snyoms kyang len te/rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/nang du yang dag 'jog par bzhed pa dang /lho rnams la chos 'chang bar bzhed pa dang /nad pa rnams la gzigs
473b5('dul ba): par bzhed pa dang /mal bstan rnams la bsla brtan par bzhed pa dang /nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bsrab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa yin/'di'i skyab su bcom ldan 'das kyis
473b6('dul ba): nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed de/rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms kyang len to//khyim bdag nges lo ma'i bkang sa bzhi byas te/
473b7('dul ba): de'i 'og tu dge slong gi dge 'dun bzhugs pa dang /lhas char dbab par brtsams so//dkun gyi dus shig pa pa ste/khyim bdag des dge slong gi 'dun la thug pa dang /khur ba dang /'bras
474a1('dul ba): khur dang /la phug dag brims pa dang /de la dge slong kha cig ni thug pa 'thung ba nA hu ba dub ces sgra byed do//kha cig ni 'bras khur za ba na/khrum/khya ma zhes
474a2('dul ba): sgra byed//kha cig ni la phug za ba na/sol sol zhes sgra byed//thigs pa dka da sar zags te/sgra thigs thigs shos zer ro//dge slong bum par chu 'thud na sgra brubA ces zer
474a3('dul ba): ba dang /de la rol mo mkhan las rab tu byung ba zhig dran pa nye bar mi 'jog ste/ston byas pa rje su dran nas/rnam par rtog pa'i dbang rgyas te/kun tu rtog pa'i shugs kyis langs
474a4('dul ba): te sgra grags pa de dang /'thun par sbyar nas gar byas te/btsun pa sol sol/btsun pa khrum khu ma/btsun pa chomachom/btsun ba ba lcug ba lcug/btsun pa blug blug ces zer te/
474a5('dul ba): de la dge slong gang dran pa nye bar ma bzhag pa de yid dga' bar gyur te dgod do//gang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa de dag ni skyod la ma las ma 'khrugs te de nyid na 'dug/zhal ta pa
474a6('dul ba): kha cig ni gang mo dgod par brtso mo//kha cig ni 'phya bar gyur to//khyim bdug kyang ma dang par gyur to//de nas bsod snyoms len pa'i dge slong yang ma dad pa skyes par gyur te
474a7('dul ba): bsod snyoms blangs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bsod snyoms phyogs gcig tu bzhag ste/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyi sa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
474b1('dul ba): te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug//chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsod snyoms len pa'i dge slong la yang rab tu dga' bas dga' bar bya ba'i gtam mdzad de/
474b2('dul ba): ci dge slong gi dge 'dun dag kha zas bsod pas tshim par byas sam zhes rab tu dga' ba'i gtam mdzad/bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod snyoms len pa'i dge slong la/dge slong dag
474b3('dul ba): kye mabo//dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams kha zas bsod pas tshim par gyur ta ma/de dag gis gsol pa/btsun pa de bzhin de/dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la kha zas bsong bas
474b4('dul ba): tshim mod kyi//khyim bdag ni ma dad par gyur to//ci byas/de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par gsol ba dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zas kyi bye ba mdzad nas gtsug lag khang
474b5('dul ba): gi phyi rol tu zhabs bkrus te/gtsug lag khang du gshegs nas/nang du yang dag 'jog la zhug so//de nas bcom ldan 'das phyi dro nang du yang dog 'jog la sa bzhengs nas//
474b6('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du gang na bshams pa la bzhugaso//bzhugs nas dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//dge slong khyod rnams kyis ci la bsams te
474b7('dul ba): 'di lta bu byas/de dag gis gsol pa/btsun pa chung mang 'phya ba'i bsam pa dang /chung zad dgod pa'i bsam par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la 'di
475a1('dul ba): skud ces bka' stsal to//dge slong gang 'dri rgod pa'i bsam pas dri bzhin du byas pa ni de la 'gul tshabs n+dan du 'gyuraro//gal te 'phya bar bsams
475a2('dul ba): pa ni ltung ba med do//'on kyang dge slong dag nyi dmigs gang yin pa ni/dge slong dag gis sgra dang bcas te kha zas zos pa yino//de lta bas nA dge slong dag gis sgra dang
475a3('dul ba): bcas te kha zas bza' bar mi bya'o//dge slong gis sgra dang bcas te kha zas zos na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams sgra dang
475a4('dul ba): bcas te kha zas bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis dge slong dag la rgyal mo ga gon dang /'bras khur dang /mar
475a5('dul ba): khur dang /la phug dang /bu ram shri do dag phul ba dang /dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas ma blangaso//de dag gis smras pa/'phags pa gal te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan
475a6('dul ba): 'das 'jig rten du ma byung ba'i tshe ni/bdug cag gi sbyin gnas mu stegs can ljags la/da ltar bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/de ni khyed rnams sbyin
475a7('dul ba): gnas lags na/gal te khyed rnams kyis ma blangs par gyur na/bdag cag 'jig rten pha rol gyi lam brgyags dang bral bar 'gyur la/bcom ldan 'das kyis kya
475b1('dul ba): dus su sbyin pa'i mdo las/dAng lo tog sar pa dang 'bras bu sar pa gang yin pa de dag dus su/dang por tshul khrims dang ldan pa la byin la/de nas phyis bdag gir yongasu
475b2('dul ba): spyod cig ces gsungs te/'di ni dus su sbyin pa yin pas/de bas na rje su thugs brtse bar dgongs te bzhes shig ces smras pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta
475b3('dul ba): bos na rje su gnang ste/byin pa ldong la/'bras khur ni 'bras can dang /phye dang lhan cig gyis la bza' bar bya'o//la phug dang /rgyal mo ga gon dang /mAr khur dag ni dum bur byas
475b4('dul ba): bza' bar bya'o//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//mnyan yod na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa/dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du gdugs chod la spyan
475b5('dul ba): drangaso//der dge slong dag bzhan la ma bsdad par sde sder chad de 'ongs nas/de dag gis smras pa/khyim bdag bdag cag la rims shig bdag cag gis bza' bar bgyi'o/
475b6('dul ba): de dag gis zos nas song ba dang /gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du gyur nas/khyi ma bdag de 'drim pas brel par gyur te/mi dga' ba skyes nas kye ma'o khyed cag thams
475b7('dul ba): cad lhan cig tshogs te brim par bya'o zhes smras pa de'i skabs/dge slong dag gis thos te/bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/
476a1('dul ba): de lta bas na dag khyim brel bar bzla' bar ma bya ste/sngar song ba de dag sgo drung du bsdad par bya zhing /ji tsam thams cad tshogs te zhugs nas 'tha' bar/
476a2('dul ba): bya'o//brel pa'i der zlas na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag bral po'i der bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /dge slong gzhan
476a3('dul ba): zhig na bar gyur te/de'i g.yog po zan nod du song pa dang /ring zhig tu ma 'ongs te/de 'gyod par gyur pa de'i skabs dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol
476a4('dul ba): dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/de lta bas na 'dug cing bsod snyoms za bar rje su gnang ba rnam pa lnga ste/glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /'gro ba dang /nad pa dang /
476a5('dul ba): nad g.yog dang las byed pa dag ste de dag la sbyi no//glang gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//mnyan yod na khyim bdag phyug pa/nor mang ga longs spyod che ba zhig gnas pa de dus
476a6('dul ba): gzhan zhig ni/sangs rgyas lnga mngon par dang //rgyus dang /dge 'dun la mngon par dad de/des sangs rgyas mi sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du gdugs tshod la
476a7('dul ba): spyan drangs pa dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun ni dong ngo //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni rjes kyis bsgrubs pa du bzhugs te/bsod snyoms kyang lon te//rgyu rnam pa rdzas/
476b1('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms kyang len to zhes bya ba nas/'di'i skabasu/bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos
476b2('dul ba): rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar ba zhed de/rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa ni bzhugs shing /bsod snyoms kyang len to zhes bya ba grong ma bzhi no//dge slong de dag zan
476b3('dul ba): zos nas de bzhin du dong ba dang /khyim bdag de chos nyan par 'dod de blta sa pa dang /dge slong dgra gcig kyang med de/de 'phya bar gyur de'i skabs dge slong dag gis thos
476b4('dul ba): te/bcom ldan 'das la gsol po dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khyim bdag de 'phya ba'i gzhir gyur kyis/de lta bas na dge slong dag gis
476b5('dul ba): zan zos nas de bzhin du 'gro bar mi bya ste/sbyin bdag chos 'dod pa la bshad par bya'o//ma bshad par song na 'gol tshabs can du 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin
476b6('dul ba): bdag chos 'dod pa la chos bshad par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /dge slong dog gis grang gis bshad pa ma shes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/
476b7('dul ba): dge slong gi gnas brtan gyis bshad par bya'o//gal te des mi nus par gyu na gnas brtan gnyis paso//des kyang ma nus na dge slong dag gis rims bzhin bsgo bar bya'o//
477a1('dul ba): yang na gzhan nus pa yod na de la gsol ba gdab par bya'o//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//mnyan yod na khyim bdag phyug pa nor mang ba/
477a2('dul ba): longs spyod che ba zhig gnas pa de yang /dad pa can bsam pa bzang zhing dge ba zhig ste/dus du su rgyal byed tshal du song ste/sangs rgyas kyi gsung nyan to//des dus
477a3('dul ba): gzhan zhig na sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan dngas pa dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun ni dong ngo //bcom ldan 'das ni rdzas
477a4('dul ba): kyis bsgrubs pa nu bzhugs shing /bsod snyoms kyang len to//rgyu rnam pa lnga zhes bya ba nas 'di'i skab su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs
477a5('dul ba): shing /bsod snyoms kyang len to zhes bya ba gong ma bzhin//bcom ldan 'das kyis gal te sprin bdag chos nyan par 'dod na/de la bskos pa'i dge slong gis
477a6('dul ba): chos bshad par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang //dge slong dag gis dge slong bskos pa gcig bu ga zhag ste dong ba dang /khyim bdag de'i mdza' bo dang /nye du dang /gnyen
477a7('dul ba): mdab dbang che dbang che ba bdag kyang zan la bos te/de dag kyang chung ma ngag dang lhan cig dge slong de bskor te 'dug nas/'phags chos bshad du gsol zhes smras pa dang
477b1('dul ba): des dbang che ba'i 'khor de dgra 'dug pa mthong ste/skra gong bar gyur dam/cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang /khyim bdag des bsdam pa bdug dang 'khor dbang che ba dag gis 'phams
477b2('dul ba): pade spa gong bar gyur pa lta zhig ste/bdag gis chos bshad par bya'o snyam nas/'phags pa bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin pas ni longs spyong che bar 'gyur/tshul khrims
477b3('dul ba): kyis na mtho ris skye bar 'gyuraro//bsgom pas ni 'bral bar 'gyu ro zhes gsungs te/chos 'di lags kyis bzhud cig ces spros pa dang /de slob so pa med par gyur te/cang mi smra bar
477b4('dul ba): song nas/de gtsug lag khang du phyin pa dang dge slong rnams kyis dris pa/tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis sbyin badzag de la chos bshid dam/des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag ji ltar bshad
477b5('dul ba): khyed rnams kyis bdag gcig pu bzhag ste/khyim bdag de'i 'khor de dag mthing nas bdug gcig pu spa gong par gyur te/don du na de nyid kyis bdag la chos bshad
477b6('dul ba): zhes/de'i skabs dge sbyong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/dge slong des ni bzang po zhigs smra so//dge slong bsgos pa
477b7('dul ba): gyur pa de'i grogs dge slong bzhi bsko bar bya'o////bam po zhe drug pa//sdom ni/brtags nupa 'gro bar bya ba dang /bram ze'i rigs kyi dge slong dang /bzhi yis
478a1('dul ba): bri bar bya ba dang /po shor dag kyang bkru dar bya//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba'i khab bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhug so//bcom ldan 'das
478a2('dul ba): kyis chos ston pa'i dge slong gi grogs dge slong bzhi bskor bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /dge slong dag gang du mgron du bos shing 'gro ba dar /chos ston pa'i dge slong
478a3('dul ba): gsol ba btab ste/grogs dge slong bzhi bskos pa dang /de dag gis ma brtags par bshang ba dang /gci ba dang /rigs kyi khyim dag tu song ste/de nyes dmig su gyur
478a4('dul ba): nas/de'i skabs dge slong dag gis/bcom ldan 'das la gsol to//bcom ldani 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang chos ston pa'i dge slong gi grogasu bskos pa de dag gis
478a5('dul ba): de la ma brtags par gzhan du 'dong bar mi bya'o//song na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//mnyan yod na bram ze zhig gis/des rigs mnyam
478a6('dul ba): ba las chung ma blangs te/de de dang lhan cig rtsi bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur skyong par byed//de rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/chung
478a7('dul ba): ma sems can dang ldan par gyur te/de zla ba dgu nas khyo'u zhig bcas so//de btsas nas btsas ston rgya tshar byas te/rigs dang 'thun par ming btag so//de dus gnan
478b1('dul ba): zhig na legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /de'i khams ma snyoms pas na bar gyur te/de sman pa'i drung du song nas smras pa/bzhin bzangs bdag gos
478b2('dul ba): lus kyi gnas skabs 'di 'dra bar gyur na/sman dpyang ston cig/des smras pa/'phags pa 'di dang 'di lta bu'i de ska ba byos dang sas par 'gyur//des bslu ba byas pa dang /ji tsam
478b3('dul ba): na lanA cig 'khrus nas des rgyu glang mas khrus byis pa dang cha dang//sman pas smras pa/'phags pa bskabs legs par gyur tam/des smras pa/bzhin bzangs ma legs
478b4('dul ba): lan cig kho na las ma 'khrus//des smras pa/'phags pa khyod kyis chu grang mos khrus ma byas sam/des smras pa/bzhin bzangs ji ltar khyod kyis smras pa de bzhin ngas smras pa la
478b5('dul ba): pam legs pa zhig byas te chu grang mos chang na ji ltar 'khru bar 'gyur/de ni der zad kyis yang 'di ltar bska ba de nyid byos la sngar khrus mi byed par 'khru ba mthar phyin nas khrus
478b6('dul ba): rgyu shig/des smras pa/bzhin pang bcom ldan dus kyis mi gan //des smras pa 'phags pade lta na/ba po'i tshig ris ji skar bya zhes pa de'i rnapas dag rnam kyi
478b7('dul ba): bcom ldan ngas mi gsas pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sa pas na u gan phye ba dag gnag par byad /'chu ba mtha phyem nas khrus bya/ma
479a1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis 'phyi ba drug gzhag par byar zhes gsungs pa dang /dge slong dag gis ji lta bu dag gis phye ba ma shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa
479a2('dul ba): pakhong ba 'am/lo ma 'am/ras ma dag gis phyi bar bya zhing 'khru ba mthar phyin nas/chu dron mos bkru bar bya'o//gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//de nas yang de'i tshe nags na sbrul
479a3('dul ba): gdug pa zhig gnas te/ji tsam na nags der ba lang rdzas me btang ba dang /sbrul gdug pa de mes bsregs nas phan tshun du song na yang me'i 'od kyis bskor bas ma shi
479a4('dul ba): tsam du 'dug ste/mes bsregs pa las mchongs te shing zhig gi drung du bskyil nas dkris te 'dugo/ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ljongs rgyu zhing phyogs deng nye bar 'ongs
479a5('dul ba): te/des shing drung du song ste bltas na sbrul gdug pa zhig mes chog ste/rab tu tshig nas sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyam thag par mthong ste/mthong nas kyang de'i rgyud la ci dge
479a6('dul ba): ba'i rtsa ba chung zad yod dam med brta gas ni yod par gyur te/gang gi dbang du 'gyur ba brtags pa na/yang bdag nyid kyis te/des de la chus gtor nas chos tshig gsum
479a7('dul ba): zhig bshad pa/bzhin bzangs 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pa'o//chos thams cad bdag med pa'o//mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba ste/nga la sems rab tu dang bar gyis
479b1('dul ba): shig dang /'di ltar dud 'gro'i 'dod chags dang bral nas/bde 'gror skye bar 'gyur zhes smras nas spong ba dang /de ma thag tu bya khra zhig gis khyero//de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la/
479b2('dul ba): sems mngon par dad nas dus las 'das te/mnyan yod na bram ze los drug dang ldan pa zhig gi rig su skye so//tshe dang ldan po shA ri'i bus bsams pa/sbrul gdug pa de gang/
479b3('dul ba): ma chag par dus las 'das na gang du skyes par gyur ces tha ga zad cig brtags ni/mnyan yod na bram ze la sa drug dang ldan pa zhig gi rig su skyes par mthong ngo //mthong nas
479b4('dul ba): kyang de gdul bar bya ba'i phyir/de'i khyim du 'gro bar brtsams te/der song nas bram ze dang /chung mar bcas pa skyab su 'gro ba dang /bslab pa'i gzhi la rab tu dkod de/de dus gzhan
479b5('dul ba): zhig na/gcig pu de'i khyim du song ba dang /de la bram zes smras pa/'phags pa ci phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong 'ga' yang ma mchis sam/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa//
479b6('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa ci bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong rtsa kur sha 'am/ka sha lta bur gzhan nas skye ba ri mo 'gyur gyis/gang khyed lta bu las thob pa de bdag gi phye bzhin
479b7('dul ba): 'drang ba'i dge sbyong du 'gyur ro//des smras pa/'phags pa bdag la 'phags pa'i phyi bzhin 'brang po'i dge sbyong du 'os pa'i khye'u su yang ma mchis te/bdag gi mchis brang sems
480a1('dul ba): can dang ldan pa la/gal te khye'u zhig bcos par gyur na/de bdag gis 'phags pa'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge byung du dbu'o//des smras pa/nad med
480a2('dul ba): bar gyur cig/blang bar bya'o zhes smras nas songango //ci tsam na bram ze mo de zla ba dgu 'das nas khye'u zhig btsa so//btsas nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig gi byur
480a3('dul ba): dru btsos pa'i btsas ston rgya che ri byas te/rigs dang 'thun pa'i ming btag so//de 'o ma dang /zho dang /mar sar dang /zhun mar dang /mar gyi snying khu dang /gzhan yang yo bya
480a4('dul ba): kyi bye brag gtso bo go tso dag gis sring bar byed/skyed par byed de/rdzi ngan gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin du myur du skyed par bya //de ma'i rum 'thung ba na/gal te bag med pas
480a5('dul ba): so 'am/sen mos nu ma la reg na skrang bar 'gyur ro//de chen por gyur nas glang gi tshe khye'u dang /bu mo dag dang lhan cig rtse ba de'i tshe/de rnams gal te khro ba'i kun
480a6('dul ba): nas dkris pa la gnas pa ni/so 'am sen mos btab na phyogs de ring po mi thegs par skrang bar 'gyuraro//ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus//de rab tu dbyung ba'i dus
480a7('dul ba): shes nas/khyim der song ste/des bram ze de'i chung ma la chos bshad/khye'u 'di ni bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong yi no zhes mtshan ma zhig bstan pa dang /bram ze
480b1('dul ba): des smras pa/bu khyod ni ma skyes pa nyid nas ngas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong du phul gyis song shig/srid pa tha ma pa'i sems can de/tshe dang ldan pa shA
480b2('dul ba): rI'i bu li gdong du ring zhig brtags nas/de'i rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'brangs pa dang /de tshe dang ljon pa shA ri'i bus/rab tu byung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par byaso//des so shing /
480b3('dul ba): zhig zos te/lce bzhar nas ma bkrus pa bzhag pa dang /de la sbrang ma zhig gis zos te/de dus las 'daso//de nas srog chag sa khyim sbyong gis cung zad zos pa dang /de yang
480b4('dul ba): dus las 'das//de nas yang bya sna tshogs kyis zos pa dang /de yang dus las 'ang so//de la byi las zos pa dang /de yang dus las 'daso//gang sbrang mas zos pa dang //de yang
480b5('dul ba): dus las 'das so//grog ma mang po dag gis zos nas/de dag thams cad kyang dus las 'das so//de bzhin du ji ltar srog chags mang po dag dus las 'das pa dag dang cing
480b6('dul ba): 'dug pa dang /ci tsam na phyi de nyin par dge slong dag phyogs der sro shing bza' bar brtsams pa dang /de dag gis srog chags dus las 'das pa ngag mthong nas/de la cig gis/
480b7('dul ba): smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dge srog chags mang po 'di dag ci'i phyir dus las 'das gzhan dag gis smras pa/mi sheso zhes de dag de bzhin du dpyod pa dang /dge slong gzhon nu
481a1('dul ba): gzhan zhig 'ongs te//des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag phyogs 'dir bram ze lngas rab tu byung ba/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang lhan cig glanas bdes so
481a2('dul ba): shing zos te/lte gzhar nas ma bkrus par bzhag pa de la/sreg chagaso mang pos zos te/'di ltar lce'o dri ma zos pas dusI las 'das zhes pa'i skabs de da
481a3('dul ba): spyo rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag skyes bu gdug pa 'di lta bu kha cig yod de de lta bas rangadag
481a4('dul ba): slong dag gis so shing ma bkrus par de bzhin du dor bar mi bya'o//bor na 'gral tshabs can du 'gyuraro//bcom ldan 'das kyis so shing zos nas bkru bar bya'o zhes
481a5('dul ba): gsungs pa dang /dge sbyong gzhan dag gis rje nyung bar gyur to//de dag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba ma shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gangal
481a6('dul ba): rgyunyung bar gyur na des re shig sa la brung nas lho'i dri ma med par bya'o//ngas dus gzhan zhag na bortse blag bya bar brtsams te/nges gos drug tshon du bac+doMs te bzlog
481a7('dul ba): co skems pa dang /ji tsam na phyogs der tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' nye bar 'ongs te/des de mthong nas des smras pa tshe dang ldan pa bdag gis grogs bgyi'o//des smras pa/
481b1('dul ba): gnas btan logs kyis mdzod n+tag/ dga' rang bzhin gyis gnas ngan lan kun tu spyod pas//des gos sar pa rnams ni grib sa sna ba rnams/gang rnyed pa rnams na nya ma/
481b2('dul ba): bskams/gang ba shar ba rnams ni grib ma la bzhag pa dang /des gnas brtan du wA ra~M mya mdzad cig/des yang dang yang du byas te ldog tu ma btub bo//de kun nas bkris bla
481b3('dul ba): nI dga' steng du rgyags pa dang /des 'bros par brtsam so//ji tsam na tshwa dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu phyogs der 'ongs te/des tshe dang ldan pa ci byed/ci byed ces smras na yang /de kun nas
481b4('dul ba): dkris pa khri ba 'phel bar gyur nas sdong du ma gtub ste/nye dga'i bzhin 'brang //nye dga'i n+ya g+ho d+ha'i shing gis brdegs par brtsoms ni yang sdod du ma btub ste/de la
481b5('dul ba): yang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/bzhams te bzung nas/nye dga' 'bo su btang ba dang /des 'on kyang n+ya gro d+ha'i shing la so//sa btabs na se//des n+ya gro d+hA'i shing gi
481b6('dul ba): mdab ma thams cad lhagasaso//de'i skabs drag slong gis thos te/bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta bur khros par mi bya'o
481b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin du khro bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/nye dga' la dge skos bab ste/de de'i drung du sod nas/des smras pa/tshe dang
482a1('dul ba): ldan pa las 'di lta bu zhig bab skyes byas shog ces bsgo ba dang /ras de mthong ma thag tu de bzhin du kun tu dkris pa de'i skabs dge slong rnams kyis//bcom
482a2('dul ba): ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang 'di 'dra ba'i khro ba kho na yod pa ni/rang gis mngon sum du las bsko bar mi bya'o//'on kyang de'i
482a3('dul ba): drung na 'dug pa'i dge slong gis bsgo bar bya ste/des de la khyod kyis las 'di lta bu byos shig ces smra bar bya'o//des kyang de la bzhams te las 'di lta bu byos shig ces brjod par
482a4('dul ba): bya'o//des kyang nan tan dang /brtson 'grus drag pos 'bod pa de bzhin du 'khor ba'i 'khor lo che lnga pa g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste/'dus byas su gyur pa thams cad
482a5('dul ba): 'jig pa dang /ltung ba dang /gyes pa dang /'jig pa'i chos can du khong du chud cing /nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/dgra bcom pa mngon sum du gyur te//khams gsum pa las
482a6('dul ba): 'dod chags dang bral ba bod pa dang gser du mnyam pa na mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/tsan dAn dang /ste 'ur mi rtog cing /rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs
482a7('dul ba): dral cing rig pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/srid pa dang /'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang /bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/dbang po dang /nyi dbang dang

482b3('dul ba): slong dag the tsom skyes te/the tsom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa dge slong 'dis las gang ci zhig bgyis na/de sbrul gdugs par skyes par
482b4('dul ba): gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag dge slong 'dis las tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongasu sgyur pa/'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur
482b5('dul ba): pa'i las dge byas shing bstsags pas/dge slong 'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa gzhan du ga gis so so myong bar 'gyur te/dge slong dag las byas shi bsags pa dag
482b6('dul ba): ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/me'i khams la mi 'gyur/rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/'di ltar zin pa'i phung po dang /khams
482b7('dul ba): dang /skye mched rnams la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/las rnams bskal pa rgyar yang ni/chung mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba/
483a1('dul ba): nyid//dge slong dag sngon bud ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo nyi khru thub pa na/ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa//
483a2('dul ba): bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/bla na med pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ongs 'jig rten du byung ste/grong
483a3('dul ba): khyer bA ra na si'i drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na nye bar rton cing bzhug so//de de'i bstan pa rab tu byung ste/dge slong byams pa la gnas pa zhes bya bar gyur to//de la dge
483a4('dul ba): slong rnams kyis byams pa la gnas pa byams pa gnas pa zhes rab tu 'god de smras pa dang /des de dag la lta kag na yang 'dug tu ma btub pa dang /de khro ba drag pos kun tu
483a5('dul ba): dkris pas/de dag la dran sems kyis da ni byams pa la gnas pa yin gyi khyed cag ni skyes bu gdug pa'o zhes dag gi las drag po brjod//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
483a6('dul ba): pa/dge slong dag 'di ji snyam du sems yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la khyams pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa ni/dge slong 'di nyid yin
483a7('dul ba): te/de'i tshe de'i dus na 'di ltar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi nyan thos rnams la skyes bu bdug pa'o zhes smras shing /kun tu spyad pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin
483b1('dul ba): bya/tsho rabs lha brgya'i bar du sbrul gdug par skyes te/de da ltar yid ltas de nyid kyi lhag mas sbru la gdug pa 'dir skye so//gang de nyid du lung 'bog pa dang /grags pa da /kha ton/
483b2('dul ba): bton pa dang /phung pi la mkhas pa de nga /khams la mkhas pa dang /skye mched la mkhas pa dang /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /gnas dang gnas pa ma yin pa
483b3('dul ba): mkhas pa dag byas te/des nA da'i bstun pa la rab tu byung nas/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byaso//de lta bas na dge slong dag las gcig du
483b4('dul ba): brtag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnog pa yin/gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu dka ba yin/'dran ma rnams kyi ni len ma yin te/dge

483b6('dul ba): /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dgu yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod//sdom ni/snam sbyar drag nA ci rigs bya
483b7('dul ba): dkon pa dang dang 'tsho ba can//khur ba sgra dang bcas mi bza'//bA rA na ser spyod yul min//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/dze ta'i tshil mgon mid dzas sbyin gyi kun dga'
484a1('dul ba): /ba na bzhug so//dge slong rnams snum sbyor ba zlos nas/chag chug dag 'debs shing /ba'i lci ba 'jam po dag gis nyug par byed//bshangs dag tu bshad pa dang //
484a2('dul ba): gci bar byed cing //gzhan yang gtso blag gi lasi dge byed cing /der de bzhin du stod g.yogs dang /smang g.yogs dag kyang gyon no//dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/tshe dang
484a3('dul ba): ldan pa dge slong 'di dag chos gos dag la bye brag med par yongasu spyong /bcom ldan 'das kyis ni snam sbyar chos gos kyi mchogo zhes gsungs na/de ji ltar snam sbyar chos

484a5('dul ba): skabs//dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag dge slong rnams 'di skad smra ba'i gzhir gyur gyis//
484a6('dul ba): dge slong dag snam sbyar ni rgyal po lta bu yin te/de lta bas na sna sbyar gyon to//les thams cad mi bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis snam sbyar gyon ti las thams cad mi bya'o zhes
484a7('dul ba): gsungs pa dang /dge slong rnams kyis snam sbyar bgos te ji ltar bya ba dang /ji ltar mi bya ba ma shes te de'i skabs dge slong rnams kyis/bcom ldan 'das la gsol
484b1('dul ba): bu da p+tAHm+b+ha ny+dzan dus kyis bka' stsal pa//dge slong dag s+yA yul du 'gro ba dang //zlas pa thog sa la 'jug pa dang /mchod rten drug la phyug byung po dang /smyon par lung nad
484b2('dul ba): cing so sor go ber bya ba dang /nyin par chos nyan pa dang /mtshan me chos nyon pa dang /bral du 'dug ste za pa byed/mkhan po dang sle'i dben la phyog byed pa / na yang chung sa
484b3('dul ba): par sbed pa dang ldan cig 'dug pa'i tshe//snam sbyar bgo bar b+haro//snod gsogs ni phyogs gcing mar bgro zhing las thams cad bya'o//sreng go yogs ni ci bude yongs spyod cig
484b4('dul ba): gleng bloni ni mnyan yod na'o//de nas byAN+Di ma sbyin 'das kyisu dge slong rnams la b+ha2sprul pa/dge slong dag nyi ma ni shar to//khyu ga ni TI//zhing dag ni rnyed//rlom sbyin pa
484b5('dul ba): dag ni //dge slong dag kyi ma sher te/zlas bye d+hen+te/de bzhin gshegs pa dag ba com pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya sa shes bya'i tshig zla dregaso//khyi ga po pos
484b6('dul ba): bya ba ni chos smra ba rnams kyi gang zag gis chog bla dag so//zhing pa dag ni zhing rme dro zhes bya ba ni/sbyin bdag dang sbyin pa po zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgi ste/cho mo dun pa dag du
484b7('dul ba): zhes bya ba ni bdud kyi 'khor ces bya ba'i tshig bla dag so//dge slong dag ston pa gang yin pa de ni nyan thos rnams la thugs brtse ba can/thugs rje'i don du phan par mdzad
485a1('dul ba): par dgyes pas khyed rnams langs thugs rjes gzigs te/khyod rnams kyis du bya ba ni dgon pa dang /shing drung dang //khang stong dang /r-i dngar 'dang /

485a3('dul ba): pa dang /phyis 'gyod par ma byed cig/'di ni nga'i bstan pa yino//bcom ldan 'das kyis/dge slong rnams bag yod par gnas mal de lta bur bsam gtan byos shig
485a4('dul ba): ces gsungs pa dang /dge slong rnams kyis ji skad bstan pa'i gnas mel du bsam gtan bya bar brtsams pa dang /ji tsam na dge slong thos pa nyung ngu zhig de
