544b6('dul ba): pa yang dag bshad//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo dmar bu can gyi grong gang na ba dang 'dong ngo //btsun pa
544b7('dul ba): bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to//de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu yul
545a1('dul ba): mag d+hA nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/dmang bu can gyi grong dang /rgyal po'i khab kyi bar gyi dbus na/rgyal po'i gnas 'od ma'i dbyug pa can na man+dan//
545a2('dul ba): ma nye bar rten cing bzhugaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag nga dang khyed cag kho nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag mi
545a3('dul ba): shes shing /ma mthong la khong du ma chud cing /so sor ma rtogs pas lam ring po 'dir rgyug cing 'khor bar gyur te//bden pa bzhi po de dag gang zhe na/nga dang khyed cag
545a4('dul ba): kho nas sdug bsngal dang /kun 'byung ba dang /sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mi shes shing ma mthong la/khod du ma chud cing /so sor
545a5('dul ba): rnyortogs bas lam ring po 'dir rgyug cing 'khor bar gyur to//sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa de rje su rtogs shing /so sor rtog pas srid pa'i sred pa bcad pas 'khor
545a6('dul ba): ba'i skye ba zad de/da ni srid pa gzhan med do//sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang //sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang//sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa de
545a7('dul ba): rjesu rtogs shing /so sor rtogs pas srid pa'i srid pa bcas pas 'khor ba'i skye ba zad de/da ni srid pa gzhan med do//bcom ldan 'das kyis da skad ces bka'
545b1('dul ba): grol nas/bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs te//ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//nga dang khyed cag kho na yis//'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag/ji/
545b2('dul ba): lta ba bzhin ma mthong bas//lam ring du ni 'khor bar gyur//bden pa de dag mthong nas ni//srid pa'i sred pa btsod nas su//'khor ba'i skye ba zad pa ni//da ni sbrid pa gzhan
545b3('dul ba): med do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo dmar bu can gyi grong gang na ba der 'dong ngo //btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhe
545b4('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to//de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/dmar bu can gyi grong du byon te/dmed/
545b5('dul ba): bu can gyi grong gi dmar bu can gyi mchod rten na bzhugs so//dam cu can gyi grong gi bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+hA nas ljongs rgyu zhing ga sh+ye
545b6('dul ba): te/dmar bu can gyi grong du byon nas/dmar bu can gyi mchod rten gyi drung na bzhugaso zhes thos so//thos nas kyang tshogs nas tshogs dang /khyu nas khyur phrad cing 'dug nas/
545b7('dul ba): dmar bu can gyi grong nas byung ste/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug/
546a1('dul ba): phyogs kATIg tu 'dug nas/dam du btsun+da b+h+rUM klong gi zlum T+wAM dang khyim bdag rnams la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces+yA bka' stsol to//zlum zla dang
546a2('dul ba): khyim bdag dag lnga po 'di dag ni bag med pa'i nyes dmigs dag yin te/lnga gang zhe na/bram ze dang khyim bdag drag 'di la bge med pa dang ldan zhing /byug med pa la gnas pa'i
546a3('dul ba): rgyus longs spyod chen po las nyams par 'gyur te/bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams bag med pa dang ldan zhing /bag med pa la gnas de gyung longs spyod chen po las nyams par
546a4('dul ba): 'gyur bu gangang+gA yin pa 'di ni bag med pa'i nyes dmigs dang po yin no//gzhan yang bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag med pa dang ldan zhing /bgo med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus
546a5('dul ba): rgyal rigs kyi 'khor du yang rung /bram ze'i 'khor du yang rung /khyim dag gi 'khod du yang rlu /dge sbyong gi 'khong du yang ru /'khor gang dang gang du 'gro ba de
546a6('dul ba): de dag tu zhum zhum por gyur nas/dga' ba med pa dang /bag rgyu bso 'gro bar 'gyur te/bram ze dang khyim po dgu dag bag med pa dung ldan zhing bag med pa la gnas pa'i
546a7('dul ba): rgyus gang dang gang du zhes bya ba nas bag tsha ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//'di ni bag med pa'o nyes dmigs gnyis pa yin no//gzhan yang bram ze dang khyim bdag
546b1('dul ba): dag bag med pa dang ldan zhing /bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnamasu bsdigs pa dang /bsngags pa ma yin pa dang grags pa ma yin pa'i sgra dang /tshigasu bcad
546b2('dul ba): pa grags par 'gyur te/bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams bag med pa dang ljon zhing /bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su bsdigs pa dang /bsngags pa ma
546b3('dul ba): yin pa dang /grags pa ma yin pa'i sgra dang /tshigasu bcad pa grags par 'gyur te/'di ni bag med pa'i nyes dmi gso gsum pa yin no//gzhan yang bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag
546b4('dul ba): med pa dang ldan zhing /bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/yid la gcags bzhin du dus byed par 'gyur te/bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams bag med pa dang ldan zhing /bag med pa la
546b5('dul ba): gnas pa'i rgyus yid la bcags bzhin du dus byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni bag med pa'i nyes dmigs bzhi pa yino//gzhan yang bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams bag med pa dang
546b6('dul ba): ldan zhing /bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnamasu skye bar 'gyur te/bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams
546b7('dul ba): bag med pa dang ldan zhing /bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'i gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur gA yin pa'i
547a1('dul ba): na/bag med pa'i nyes dmyigs lnga pa yin na/bram ze dang khyim bdag dag lnga po 'di dag ni bag yod pa'i phan yon yin te/lnga gang zhe na/bram ze dang
547a2('dul ba): dAg dag pag yod pa dang ldan zhing /byug yod pa le gnas pa'i rgyuH/mongs spyod rten po la ma nyams par mi gyu te/bram ze da khyim+b+ha bdag dge bag yod pa dang ldan nang
547a3('dul ba): bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyas 'ongs spyod chen po las nyams par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni/bag yod pa'i bu yon dang po yin no//gzhan yang bram ze dang
547a4('dul ba): bdags g.yod pa dang ldan zhing /bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/rgyal rigs kyi 'khor du yang rung /thab ze'i 'khor du yang rung /khyim bdag gi 'khor du yang rung
547a5('dul ba): dge sbyong gi 'khor du yang rung /'khor gang dang gang du 'gro ba'i 'khor de dang der zhum zhum pa ma yin pa dang /dga' ba dang /bag che ba maud pas 'gro bar 'gyur te/blam
547a6('dul ba): nidang khyim bdab dag drug yod pa dang ldan zhing /bag yod pa 'ablanas pa'i rgyas zhes bye bya nas/dag chu ba med pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du gang yin pa 'di ni
547a7('dul ba): yod pa'i phan yin gnyis pa yin no//gzhan yang bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bzhi yod pa dang ldan nang /bag yod po la gnas pa'i rgyus phyi des dang phyogs mtshams
547b1('dul ba): /rnams su dag pa dang /grags pa dang /sgra dang /tshigasu bcad pa rgya chen por grags par 'gyur te/bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag yod pa dang ldan zhing /byug yod pa la granas pa'i rgyu
547b2('dul ba): phyogs dang phyogs mtsham su dge ba dang /grags pa dang /sgyu dang /tshig su bcad pa rgya chen por grags par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni bag yod pa'i phan yon gsum pa yin no//gzhan
547b3('dul ba): yang bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams bag yod pa dang ldan zhing /bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/yid la gtsigs pa med par dus byed par 'gyur te/bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams//
547b4('dul ba): 'og yod pa dang ljon zhing bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/yid la gcags pa med par dus byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni bag yod pa'i phan yon bzhi pa yin no//gzhan
547b5('dul ba): yang bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams bag yod pa dang ldan zhing /bag yod pa dang ldan pa'i rgyu sa lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnamasu skye bar 'gyur te/bram ze
547b6('dul ba): dang khyim bdag rnams bag yod pa dang ldan zhing /bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyu ste/lus zhig na bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di
547b7('dul ba): ni/bag yod pa'i phan yon lnga pa yid no//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dmar bu can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par
548a1('dul ba): /mdzang /yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par ma dang /yang dag par gzeng ba spyod par mdzad yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do//rnam grangs du mang chos dang ldan/
548a2('dul ba): pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/cang mi gsung ngo //de nas
548a3('dul ba): dmar bu can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan
548a4('dul ba): 'das gang na ba deng logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi gnas 'dir do mod bzhugs su
548a5('dul ba): gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis dmar bu con gyi grong ga bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ba mdzad do//de nas dmar bu can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag/
548a6('dul ba): rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rje su yi rung ste/mngon par bstod nas/bcom ldan 'das
548a7('dul ba): kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dmar bu can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdage rnams do//
548b1('dul ba): nas ring po ma ljon par mkhyen te/'dug gnas gang na bu der gshegs te byon pa dang /'dug gnas kyi phyi rol tu zhabs gnyis bkrus te/nang du yang drag 'jog gi phyir//
548b2('dul ba): 'dug gnas kyi nang du gshegs so//de nas yang de'i tshe yul ma gA d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed yul spong byed pa rnams gzhom pa'i phyir/dmar bu can
548b3('dul ba): gi grong khyer rtsig par brtson par gyur pa dang /de'i tshe dmar bu can gyi grong ni/mthu che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams 'di lta ste/gnas kyi sa 'dra bar gyur to//bcom ldan 'das
548b4('dul ba): 'dug gnas na nyin mo spyod par bzhugs pa na/lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas/dmar bu can gyi grong na mthu che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams kyi gnas kyis 'dre bar
548b5('dul ba): gzig so//gzigs nas kyang dgongs ka rang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs te/'dug gnas nas byung nas/'dug gnas kyi grib ma la/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la
548b6('dul ba): gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs//bdugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshwa dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo dmar bu tsun+da gyi grong gi grong khyer
548b7('dul ba): par brtson pa dri su yin ci thos/btsug pa bdag gis yul ma ge d+hA'i sna chen//gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed yul spong byed pa rnams gnom pa'i phyir/dmar bu can gyi rmi
549a1('dul ba): gi grong khyer rtsig par rtsom par thos lag so//kun dga' bo leg so leg so//kun dga' bo yul mA ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed
549a2('dul ba): mkhas pa yin te/'di ltar sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig bgros pa lta zhig/kun dga' bo de 'drin nyin mo spyod pas bzhugs pa na/lha'i spyan rnam
549a3('dul ba): pabapar dag pa mi los 'das pas/dmyur bu can gyi grong ni mthu che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams gnas kyi sa 'dre bar gzig so//kun dga' bo phyogs gang du mthu che ba mthu che ba'i//
549a4('dul ba): lha rnams kyis gnas kyi sa bres pa'i phyogs der 'di lta ste/mthu che ba mthu che ba'i mi rnams kyi sems gzhol bar 'gyur ro//phyogs gang du lta bar ma dang /phal bas
549a5('dul ba): gnas kyis bres pa'i phyogs der ni 'di lta ste/gnas kyi phyir mi bar ma dang /phal pa rnams kyi sems gzhol bar 'gyur//kun dga' bo dmar bu can gyi grong
549a6('dul ba): 'dir mthu che ba mthu che bo'i lha rnams kyi gnas kyi sku bres pa sl-i/phyogs 'dir 'di lta ste/gnas kyi phyir mthu che ba mthu che ba'i mi rnams kyi sems gzhol bar 'gyuraro//
549a7('dul ba): kun dga' bo ya rabs kyi gnas dang /ya rabs kyi tha snyad ji snyed po dang /tshong pa yi rabs rnams kyi lom dang /zong ba gram par yang 'gyur te/'di lta ste/dper bu
549b1('dul ba): can gyi grong khyer 'di mchog tu 'gyur ro//'di la bar chad gsum 'byung bar rig par bya ste/me dang /chu dang /nang 'khrug gis so//de nas yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs
549b2('dul ba): pa bram ze dobyar byed kyis/dge sbyong go'u ma yul ma ga d+ha nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs nas/dmar bu can gyi grong du byen te/dmar bu can gyi grong gi dmar bu can gyi mchod
549b3('dul ba): rten gyi drung na bzhugos te/de la dmar bu can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bso zhes thos so//thos nas kyang dmar bu can gyi grong nas byang su/bcom
549b4('dul ba): ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang /yang dag par mgu ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas/
549b5('dul ba): phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed la chos dang ldan pa'i gtamo gyis yang
549b6('dul ba): dog par ston par mdzad/yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/yang dag par gzeng stong par mdzad/yang dag par rab tu dgo' bor mdzad de/rnam grangs du mar chos
549b7('dul ba): dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cad mi gsungango //de nas yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gto/
550a1('dul ba): padz+rAmra Te dbyung byed spyan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gtsun tu gzar nas/thul myo smad ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
550a2('dul ba): shes ldan go'u ta ma dge sbyong go dge 'dun rnams dang thabs gcig tu snang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzod du gsol/bcom ldan 'das
550a3('dul ba): kyis yul ma gau d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed la cang mi gsung bas gan ///'dul ba phra mo'i dngos po//bam po nga gcig pa/
550a4('dul ba): de nas mul ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyis/bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa
550a5('dul ba): la rje su yi rang nas mngon par bstod de/stan las longs te song ngo //de nas yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo
550a6('dul ba): gtsang ni du sod pa'i bza' ba dang /bca' ba ste gon byas nus/nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams nas chu snod nor bu can bzhag ste/bcom ldan 'das la spyan
550a7('dul ba): 'dren gyis gdugs tshod gsol pa/kye go'u ta ma gdugs tshad lags te/da de'i dus la bab na shes ldan ge'u ti mas dus la bab par dgongasu gsol/de nas
550b1('dul ba): ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe na bza' sham thabs banabs/chos gos dang /lhung bzed thogs nas/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du byas te/yul ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po
550b2('dul ba): la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyi bka sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so//de nas yul ma ga
550b3('dul ba): d+ha'i sna chen po gtogs po bram ze dbyar byed kyis bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang
550b4('dul ba): bca'i ba rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshimau par byed de/rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bzang ba dang bca' bas rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byaso//bcom
550b5('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis gdugs tshod gsol nas/phyag gnyis bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas gser gyi bya ma bum thogs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad
550b6('dul ba): ces gsol to//kye go'u ta ma sbyin pa 'di las bsod nams kyi rgyu 'thun pa dang /dge ba'i rgyu 'thun po dang /bde ba'i gzhi gang legs pa de/dmar bu can gyi grong na gan
550b7('dul ba): pa'i lha rnams kyi yun ring po'i don dang /phan pa dang bde bar gyur cig ces de nyid la yon sngo ba mdzad du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po
551a1('dul ba): la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyi sbyin pa de la rje su yi rang bas rdo pu yi rang ngo //skyes bu gang zag las can la//gang zhig lha rnams mchod byed pa//
551a2('dul ba): sangs rgyas bka' bzhin byed gyur pas//de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsags//mkhas shing yid ni gzhungs pa yis//gang gi phyogasu gnas 'cha' ba//tshul khrims/
551a3('dul ba): ldan la bshos gsol nas//de yi 'og tu yon bsngo byas//de rnams rjed pas rjes 'gyur zhing //mchod pas yang ni mchod par 'gyur//de nas lho nas byung ba yi//bu la
551a4('dul ba): ma bzhin 'di la brtse//lha rnams brtse ba'i skyes bu do//bde ba bzang po mthong bar 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze
551a5('dul ba): dbyar byed la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/snyan
551a6('dul ba): los bzhengs te gshegs so//dri nas yul ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyis der rgyu lhag gang dag yin pa de thams cad sbyin par btang nas/bcom
551a7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi rjes bzhin du 'breng zhing 'di snyam du sems la mngon par 'du byed de/dge sbyong go'u ta ma dmar bu can gyi grong gi sgo gang nas phyir gshegs pa de ni/bdag gis
551b1('dul ba): go'u ta mra'i sgo zhes gdags so//chu bo gang ga'i 'jug ngogs gang nas rgal ba de yang go'u ta ma'i 'jug ngogs zhes gdag so snyamo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis yul
551b2('dul ba): ma gu d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyis bsam pa mkhyen nas dmar bu can gyi grong gi dbus thog thag tu gshegs nas/nub phyogs kyi sgor byung ste/byang phyogasu gyur nA
551b3('dul ba): chu bo gang gi gang na ba der gshegaso//de nas de'i tshe yul ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams chu bo gang ga la phan tshun rgal bar byed de/kha cig nA shing shal ma la'i spang leb/kha cig ni sku ba'i
551b4('dul ba): gru zab/kha cig ni sngas nang tshangs can/kha cig ni ra rkyal gyiso//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ci chu bo gang ga'i rgyun nas bzlog ste 'gro 'am/'on te tshu ril gyi
551b5('dul ba): 'gram nas mi snang zhing pha rol gyi 'gram du zhugs par bya snyamo//de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu tshu rol gyi 'gram nas mi snang zhing pha rol gyi
551b6('dul ba): 'gram na bzhugs par bya ba de lta bu'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag pa dang /de nas dge slong gzhan zhig gis de'i tshe tshig su bcad de smras
551b7('dul ba): pa/kha cig zam pa btsugs nas chu bran bor te rgya mtsho rgal/skye bo rnams ni gzings 'cha' mkhas pa'i skye bo rnams chu rgal/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bram ze rgal bar
552a1('dul ba): gyur nas skam la bzhugs/dge slong dag 'dir khrus byed nyan thos rnams ni gzings 'cha'o//gal ta kun+da na chu yod na/khron pa'i chus ni ci zhig bya//sdud pa'o//
552a2('dul ba): rtsa ba bcad nas ni//su zhig sbyong ba tshol bar byed//de nas yul ma go d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyang byed kyis/bcom ldan 'das dmar bu can gyi grong gi sgog
552a3('dul ba): nas byung ba dang /ko'u ta ma'i sgo zhes btags so//chu bo gang gA'i 'jug rigs gang nas rgal ba de yang ga'u ta mi'i 'jub ngogs zhes btag so//de nas bcom ldan 'das
552a4('dul ba): kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo grong khyer spyil po can du 'dong ngo //btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/
552a5('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/bcom ldan 'das yul spang byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs nas/grong khyer spyil po can du byon te/grong khyer spyil po can gyi grong gi byang phyogs
552a6('dul ba): shing sha pa'i tshal na bzhugaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag tshul khrims ni 'di lta bu'o//ting 'dzin ni 'di lta bu'o//shwe
552a7('dul ba): rab ni 'di lta bu ste/tshul khrims gams par byas pas/ting 'dzin ring du gnas par 'gyur//ting 'dzin ring du gnas pas/shes rab gon ba phya pa 'gyuraro//shes //
552b1('dul ba): bems par byas pas 'di lta ste/'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug las yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur//dge slong dag 'phags pa'i nyan tho
552b2('dul ba): rnams 'di ltar sems yang dag par grol te/bdag gi skye ba zad do//tshangs par spyad pa la bsten to//bya ba byas so//'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes yang dag pa ji lta
552b3('dul ba): ba bzhin rab tu sheso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bko' stsal pa/kun dga' bo grong khyer sgra can gang na ba der 'dong ngo //btsun pa bka' bzhin
552b4('dul ba): 'tshal zhes cha dang ldan pa kun dka' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi lhar mnyan te/bcom ldan 'das dang yul spang byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na sgra can du byon te/sgra gcan
552b5('dul ba): gyi kun dzi ka'i gnas na bzhugaso//de nas de'i tshe sgra can gyi skye po phal po che la mi ngas byung bar gyur te/'di lhor dge bsnyen kar ka ta yang dus las 'das par gyur/dge bsnyen
552b6('dul ba): nye ba dang /ka de'i khyu mchog dang /mdzes pa dang /nye mdzes dang /'chi lhas dang /nye ba'i 'chi ltas dang /bzang po dang /shin tu bzang pa dang /grags pa dang /grags byin
552b7('dul ba): dang /grags mchog dag kyang dus las 'das par gyur to//de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs bgos/chos gos dang lhung bzed blangs nas/sgo
553a1('dul ba): can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhug so//dge slong rab tu mang po sgra can du bsod snyoms la rgyu ba dang /sgra can 'dir skya bo phal po chu shi bar gyur te/'di ltar
553a2('dul ba): dge bsnyen kar ka Ta yang dus las 'das/dge bsnyen nye ba dang /rab brtson dang /ka ti khyu mchog dang /mdzes pa dang /nye mdzes dang /'chi ltas dang /nye ba'i 'chi ltas
553a3('dul ba): dang /bzang po dang /shin tu bzang po dang /grags pa dang /grags sbyin dang /grags mchog dag kyang dus las 'das so zhes thos so//thos nas kyang sgra can du bsod
553a4('dul ba): snyoms brgyus te/zas kyi bya ba byas nas/zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms sbyangs te/lhung bzed dang /chos gos 'khos su phab nas/rkang pa gnyis bkrus te/bcom ldan
553a5('dul ba): 'das gang na ba der song ste lhogs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/dge

553a7('dul ba): chos gos blangs te/sgra can 'dir bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs te/btsun pa bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po sgra can du bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na/sgra can 'dir skye bo pha
553b1('dul ba): po che bum par gyur te/'dri ltar dge bsnyen ud ka da yang dus las 'das/dge bsnyen nye ba dang /rab brtson dang /ka ti khyu mchog dang /mdzes pa dang /nye mdzes dang
553b2('dul ba): 'chi ltas dang /nye ba'i 'chi ltas dang /bzang po dang /shin tu bzang po dang /grags pa dang /grags sbyin dang /grags mchog dag dus las 'das par thos lags na//btsun
553b3('dul ba): pa de dag gar mchis lags/'jig rten pha rol gyi gnas gang du skyes lags/dge slong dag dge bsnyen ud ka ta ni gong ma'i cha dang 'thun pa ma yin pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga
553b4('dul ba): spangs te/de nyid du brdzus te skyes nas yongasu mya ngan las 'das te/'jig rten 'dir slar mi 'ong zhing mi 'byung ba'i chos nyid du 'gyur ro//dge bsnyen nye ba dang /ra
553b5('dul ba): brtson dang /ka ti khyu mchog dang /mdzes pa dang /nye mdzes dang /'tsha ltas dang /nye ba'i 'chi lhas dang /bzang po dang /shin tu bzang po dang /grags pa dang /glags sbyin

553b7('dul ba): ba'i chos nyid du 'gyuraro//dge slong dag sgra can 'dir dge bsnyen nyis brgya lnga bcu lnga bcu lhag cig dus las 'das pa gang yin pa dag kyang /gong ma'i cha dang 'thun pa ma yin
554a1('dul ba): pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs te/de nyid du brdzus te skyes nas/yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas 'jig rten 'dir slar mi 'ong zhing mi 'byung ba'i rdos/

554a3('dul ba): mug bsrabs nas/lan cig phyir 'ong ste/'jig rten 'dir lan cig phyir 'ongs nas/sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed par 'gyur ro//dge slong dag sgra can 'dir dge bsnyen/

554a5('dul ba): yeng dge pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur te/de ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun las mi 'da' ste/lha 'am mi rnams kyi nang du srid pa lan bdun du nying mtshams sbyang nas

554b1('dul ba): bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /ma byung yang rung chos kyi tshul ni gnas/chos kyi dbyings 'di dag ni chos nyid kyis gnas pa ste/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis

554b3('dul ba): par mdzad/rab tu ston par mdzad pa ni/'di lta ste/'di yod pas ni 'di 'byung la/'di skyes pas 'di skye ste/'di ltar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/'du byed kyi/

555a5('dul ba): chos kyi rnam grangs ngas bshad par byas/de re ba tu nyin la yid la zung zhig dang bshad do//chos kyi me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/sangs rgyas la shes
555a6('dul ba): nas dad pa ni chos kyi me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs so//chos dang /dge 'dun dang /'phags pa dgos pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas dud pa ni chos kyi mu long gi chos
555a7('dul ba): kyi rnam grangs yin no//dge slong dag ngas khyed la chos kyi me long ga chos kyi rnam grangs bshad do zhes gsungs pa de ni bshad pa de yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'dra/
555b1('dul ba): kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo yangs pa can du 'drong ngo //btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshul zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ste/bcom ldan

555b5('dul ba): la blta ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/des ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du zhon te song nas/bzhon pa las babs te rkang kho nas
555b6('dul ba): kun dga' ra bar songango //de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dge slong brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor gyi gung la chos ston cing bzhugs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis a mra skyong ma rgyang ring po nas
555b7('dul ba): 'ong ba gzig so//gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag a mra skyong ma 'dir 'ong gis/brtson pa dang /shes bzhin dang /dran pas gnas par
556a1('dul ba): gyis shig/dge slong dag ngas de skad du rjesu bstan pa'i brtson pa la gnas pa gang zhe na/dge slong dag 'di la sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang
556a2('dul ba): pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed do//'bod do//brtson 'grus rtsom mo//sems rab tu 'dzin to//rab tu 'jog go/sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi dza skyed pa'i phyir 'dun
556a3('dul ba): pa bskyod do//'bod do//brtson 'grus rtsomo//sems rab tu 'dzin to//rab tu 'jug/dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do//'byed do//brten
556a4('dul ba): 'grus rtsom mo//sems rab tu 'dzin to//rab tu 'jog go/dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang /phyir zhing 'byung po dang /nyams par mi 'byung ba dang /gongs

556a6('dul ba): dge slong dag shes bzhin du gyur cing 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i tshe shes bzhin du gnas pa gang zhe na/lta ba dang /rnam par lta ba dang /bskum pa dang /brkyang ba dang /chos gos
556a7('dul ba): rnams sbyar gon pa dang /lhung bzed thogs pa dang /'gro ba dang /'greng ba dang /'dug pa dang /nyal ba dang /langs pa dang /smra ba dang /mi smra ba dang /gnyid dang /
556b1('dul ba): ba dang /ngal so ba'i tshe shes bzhin du gyur pa ste/dge slong dag 'di ni shes bzhin du gnas par gyur pa yin no//dge slong dag ji ltar dran par gyur pa yin zhe na/dge slong //
556b2('dul ba): dag 'di la nang gi lus la lus kyi rje suM lta zhing /brtson 'grus dang /shes bzhin dang /dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la gnod sems dang /yid mi badri ba spangs nas
556b3('dul ba): gnas so//phyi'i lus dang /nang gi lus dang /phyi nang gi lus dang /phyi'i dUr ba dang /rlung gi tsher ba dang sgyid nang gi tshor ba dang /phyi'i sems dang /nang gi sems dang /na
556b4('dul ba): gi sems dang /phyi'i chos dang /nang gi chos dang //phyidang nang gi chos la chos kyi rjesu lta zhing /brtson 'grus dang /shes bzhin dang /dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la gnod

556b6('dul ba): dang /dran pas gnas par gyis shig/ces ngas gang gsungs pa ni de yin no//de nas a mra skyong ma bcom ldan 'das gong na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das

557a1('dul ba): gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/yang dag par gzang stong par mdzad/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad/

557a3('dul ba): cing mi gsungango //de nas a m+bi skyong ma stan las langs te/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lcog su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
557a4('dul ba): bcom ldan las dge slong gi dge /'dun dang thabs gcig tu spang bdag gi sdib par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsal/bcom ldan 'das cung mi
557a5('dul ba): gsung bse gnang bas e mra sbyong ma laM gnang bar mdzad do//de nas a mr-i skyong ma bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsum byas gnang bar rig ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung
557a6('dul ba): pa lnga rje smra yi rang ste mngon par bstod nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //yangs pa can

557b2('dul ba): dza yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang /gos dang /rgyan dang /byug pa sngor po dang /'khor sngon par/kha cig ni rta ser po/shid d+ha ser po/srab sgyogs dang /lcag ser po/thong
557b3('dul ba): drugs dang /gdugs ser po//rAm gyi shubs sid bi/ji yab no ng+ge'i yu bcan+da dang /gos dang /d+hunA dang /rtsub pa ser po//'khor song pong /kha cig ni rta dam ga
557b4('dul ba): slob sgrogs dang /lhag dbang po/tha~Mng cugs dang /gdugs dmar po/ral gri'i shubs dang /r+d+ha ya'i nir bu'i yu ba can dang /gos dang /rgyun dang /byug pa dbang po/
