629a1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi zhal mtho bang 'ardzis nA/bdag gi blon kun tu smin te/de bzhin du khyad par rtogs par bgyi'o//de nas lhas bcom ldan 'das//
629a2('dul ba): kyi spyan sngar mya ngan med rdzu 'phrul gyis khrid de/des bcom ldan 'das mthong nas dad pa skyes so//dod pa skyes nas kyang /bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis chos
629a3('dul ba): rnam po 'di lta bu dag bshad de/de thos ma thag tu dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas te/dang por tshe dang ldan po mya ngan med mya ngan las 'das so//de nas lha des
629a4('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa mya ngan med mya ngan las 'das par mthong ste/dga' ba skyes nas/des bsams pa/tshe dang ldan pas gong chung zad khyad par rtogs pa de thams cad ni//bdag/
629a5('dul ba): las brten pa yin gyis/bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang bram ze'i khye'u bla ma/bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgya thug
629a6('dul ba): pa na/smyon pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung ba ston pa de/tha ma'i gzims
629a7('dul ba): mal du gshegs pa na/bdag de'i nyan thos rnams kyi tha mar mngon sum du byas nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon la su mya ngan las 'das te/de nas bcom ldan
629b1('dul ba): phru m+b+ha sa na / na/rgyun lda gAg+sa / A sa klu / m+b+ha hA/ na mangs su sgyu
629b2('dul ba): yid pa de ni rig parjong 'di nyid yin no//dge slong dag de lta'i sbyin/'di ltung bsgrub par byiste/nga bye b+h+rir dag ba ba shes nyan la bas pa da /de
629b3('dul ba): gnas pa dang /dge pa la bsnyen par bya zhing sdig pa'i thugs po la mi bstan/sdig pa dod lhan cig mi gnas/sdig pa la mi bsnyen par/dge slong rnams kyis de
629b4('dul ba): skyi par dbye'o// rgyu dang ldan kyi kun dog sa btsas sna 'angs lnga 'odi skad ces gastsol to//btsun pa bdag gcig ba dban pa zhig tu ma nus te/nang du ma
629b5('dul ba): 'ag la gangs /skyes hrI wA ts+tsha/ drug pa'i gas nyi kun pa dang / nga na smrig gas pa da
629b6('dul ba): sbyin nas sgrig pa'i grags pal mo bskyed/sdi po dang ldan nag mi nas/sdi/blam bsnyen na/'di na sa spyod pa byud ste//bla na dga' di
629b7('dul ba): na shes pa la bas nga/rig pa da sbyin cigag / sa'i /sdig pa'i thangs pa nga sa
630a1('dul ba): sdig pa la ma bsten na/'di ni tshangs par spyod pa'i phyed yin na zhes de skad ma zer cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dga' bo de ni tshangs par spyod pa/
630a2('dul ba): kun tu mthar phyin pa/ma 'dres pa/yongasu rdzogs pa/yongasu dag po/yongasu byang ba yin no//'di lta ste/dge pa'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa dang /dge
630a3('dul ba): dang lhan cig gonas pa/dge ba la bsten nas sdig pa'i grogs po la mi bsnyen/sdig pa'i gegs po dang lhan cig mi gnas/sdig pa'i grogs po la bsten par mi
630a4('dul ba): bya'o//kun dga' bo de ci'i phyir zhe na/dge ba'i bshes gnyen nga la bsten pas/sems can skye ba'i chos dang ldan pa rnams/skye ba'i chos las rnam par grol bar
630a5('dul ba): gyur to//rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /sems can 'khrug pa'i chos dang ldan pa rnams
630a6('dul ba): 'khrug pa'i chos las rnam par grol bar gyur to//kun dga' bo rnam grangs de lta bu de shes par bya'o//gang tshangs par spyod pa mthar phyin pa dang /mi 'dres pa
630a7('dul ba): dang /yongasu rdzogs pa dang /yongasu byung ba ni 'di lta ste/dge ba'i bshAs gnyen la bsten pa dang /dge ba dang lhan cig gnas pa dang /dge ba la bsten nas/
630b1('dul ba): sdig pa'i grogs po la mi bsten/sdig pa dang lhan cig mi gnas/sdig pa la bstan par mi bya ste/kun dga' bo khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan
630b2('dul ba): 'das kyis/dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//dge slong dag de lta bas na/ngad phan chad nye du shAkya dang /ma~M ba ral pa can ma gtogs pa/mu stegs
630b3('dul ba): kun tu rgyu gzhan rnams rab tu dbyung bar mi bya/bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya'o//nye du shAkya rnams mu stegs kyi rgyal mtshan thogs te 'ongs nas/gal te legs par
630b4('dul ba): gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs te/dge slong gi dngos po thob par 'dod na/dge slong rnams kyis de rab tu dbyung bar bya/bsnyen
630b5('dul ba): par rdzogs par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/dge slong dag de ni bdag cag gi nye du rnams la nye du'i gnang ba yin pa'i phyir ro//mu stegs kun tu rgyu gzhan dge 'od nas//
630b6('dul ba): gal te legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsten par rdzogs te/dge slong gi dngos po thob por 'dod na/de la dge slong rnams kyis mkhan pa
630b7('dul ba): gos sbyin zhing zla ba bzhi'i bar du gzhag par bya'o//de bsnyen bskur byed cing /dge slong rnams kyis sems mgu bar byed nus na/dge slong rnams kyis rab tu dbyung
631a1('dul ba): zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par bya'o//dge slong dag me ba ral pa can yang rab tu dbyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par bya'o//dge slong dag de ci'i phyi/
631a2('dul ba): zhe na/me ba ral pa can ni las su smras pa yin no//dge slong dag me ba ralA pa can ni byed par smra ba rgyur smra ba/brtson 'grus su smra ba yin ni//de lta bas na
631a3('dul ba): dge slong dag gis 'di ltar bslab par bya steng las su smra ba dang /byed par smra ba dang /rgyur smra ba dang /brtson 'grus smra bar 'gyur ba de ltar dge
631a4('dul ba): slong khyed kyis kyang bslab par bya'o//de lta bas na dge slong khyod kyis chos gang zhig mthong ba'i chos 'di la phan pa dang /bde bar 'gyur ba dang /tshe rabus
631a5('dul ba): gzhan du phan pa dang /bde bror 'gyur ba de dge slong rnams kyi bzung bar bya/kun chub par bya'o//ji lta ji ltar bzung zhing bcad pa dang /klag pa do/
631a6('dul ba): ltar tshangs par spyod pa yun rnying du granas par 'gyur zhing /skye blo mang po lo phran pa dang /spyi mang po la do ba dang 'an la skying brtse ba dang /lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang /
631a7('dul ba): bde ba'i don du 'gyur ro//'di lta ste/mdo'i sde dang /dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /lung du btan pa'i sde dang /tshig su bcad pa'i s+t+waM dang /ched du brje
631b1('dul ba): pa'i sde dang /gleng gzhi'i sde dang /rtog pa brjod pa'i sde dang /de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang /skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde drung /shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang /rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sngo/
631b2('dul ba): dang /gtan la phab par bsten pa'i sde 'di dag ni/dge slong mthong ba'i chos 'di la phan pa dang /mthong ba'i chos 'dri la bde bar 'gyur ba dang /tshe rabs gzhan du phani
631b3('dul ba): pa dang /bde bar 'gyur ba dag ste/dge slong dag gis gzung bar bya/kun chub par bya'o//ji lta ji ltar bzung zhing bcangs pa dang /klags pa de lta de ltar tshangs
631b4('dul ba): par spyod pa yun ring du gnas par 'gyur zhing /kye bo mang po la phan pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /lha dang mi rnams la
631b5('dul ba): paphan po dang /bde ba'i don du 'gyuraro//dge slong dag khyed kyis ston pa nga yongs mya ngon las 'das temed pa'i 'og tu bdag cag gi ston pa dang /ston pa med do snyam
631b6('dul ba): du de ltar blta bur m+b+hi bya ste/gang gi phyir ras zla ba phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mad+mo gdon par byastan po de/deng phyin chad khyed kyi ston pa dang /ston pa yin no//dge slong
631b7('dul ba): dge bsgrub pa'i gzhi phro me dang /phrin tshigs gang yon pa de dag ni dge 'dun tshogs nas sma dr-i dri bye zhing ba 'a lo rig pa dri gnas par bya'o//dge slong dag de lta bas
632a1('dul ba): dang phyin chad/dge slong gsar bu dag gis dge slong rgan rlabs rnams la ming nas bod par mi bya/rus nas bod par mi bya ste/btsun pa zhes
632a2('dul ba): brjod pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa zhes brjod pa ma gtogs par kun tu spyad par mi bya'i//dge slong rgan rabs rnams kyis/dge slong gsar bu rnams la lhung bzed
632a3('dul ba): dang /chos gos dang /dra ba dang /phur bu dang /ska rAgs dag gis/bstud par bya/nye bar gnas par bya/klag pa dang /kha ton+da dang /lung bsgo nas rnal 'byor
632a4('dul ba): yid la byed du gzhugs par bya'o//dge slong dag gis sa phyogs 'di bzhi rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can rnams ji srid 'tsho'i bar du/rje su dran
632a5('dul ba): par 'gyur bar bya'o//bzhi gong zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'dir ni 'khrung so//bcom ldan 'das 'dir ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
632a6('dul ba): rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//bcom ldan 'das kyos 'dir ni lan gsum du bzlas te/chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor to//bcom ldan 'das 'di
632a7('dul ba): ni phung po lhag ma ma lus dri mya ngan spa byingasu yong su mya ngan las 'das pa ste/dge slong dag nga 'das pa'i 'og tu 'dir mchod rten bskor ba dang /mchod rten la phyag 'tshal
632b1('dul ba): ba 'od gis/de dag la 'di skad cesu brjod par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das 'dir ni 'khrungs so//bcom ldan 'das 'di na ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
632b2('dul ba): mngon par rdzogs par spangs rgyas so//bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dir ni lan gsum du bzlas te/chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyi su bskor to//bcom ldan 'das 'dor
632b3('dul ba): ni phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las 'das so zhes bya ba'i bar dag yin te/kha cig de la sems dad pas dus byas pa de thams cad
632b4('dul ba): mtho ris su 'gro'o//kha cig ni phung po lhag ma dang bcas par ro//dge slong dag sa phyogs 'di bzhi rigs kyi bu bAm/rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can rnams kyis ji srid
632b5('dul ba): tsho'i bar du 'gro bar 'gyur bar bya'o//bzhi gang zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'dir ni 'khrungs so//bcom ldan 'das 'dir ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
632b6('dul ba): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dir ni lan gsum bzlas te/chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor to//bcom ldan 'ongs
632b7('dul ba): 'dir ni phung po lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa ste/dge slong dag nga 'das pa'i 'og tu mchod rten bskor ba dang /mchod
633a1('dul ba): rten la phyag 'tshal du 'ongs pa rnams la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das 'dir ni 'khrungaso//bcom ldan 'das 'dir ni bla
633a2('dul ba): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dir ni lan gsum bzlas te/chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa
633a3('dul ba): bcu gnyis su bskor to//bcom ldan 'das 'dir ni phung po lhag ma ma lus pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las 'das so zhes bya ba'i byar dag yin te/kha cig ni nga
633a4('dul ba): la sems dad pas dus byas te/de thams cad mtho ris su 'gro'o//kha cig ni phung po lhag ma dang bcas par ro//ji ltar mngon du 'gro bar bya ba de ltar rje su dran par
633a5('dul ba): bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//dge slong dag sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun dang /sdug bsngal
633a6('dul ba): dang /kun 'byung dang /'gog pa dang /lam rnams la gang som nyi dang /yid gnyis yod pa ma dgag par zhus shig dang /dris pa ngas lung bstan par bya'o//
633a7('dul ba): khyed kyis 'di ji ltar bdag cag gi ston pa'i spyan sdang mngon sum du lan gdab par ni mi spobs so snyam du blta bar mi bya ste/dge slong dag gis dge slong dag la/
633b1('dul ba): rigs dag gis rogs dag la smra bar bya zhing /dris na de lung bstan par bya'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dgang pos bcom ldan 'dus la 'di skad ces gsol to//'di ltar/
633b2('dul ba): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba lhor ni/dge slong gi 'khor ji snyed 'dus shing nin be 'di rnams las gang dge slong gcig
633b3('dul ba): sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun dang /sdug bsngal dang /kun 'byung dang /'gon pa dang /lam rnams la gang som nyid du yid gnyi su gyur pa ma margyas lags so//
633b4('dul ba): kun dpo' po legs legs so//kun dga' ba khyod ni dad pas 'di skad sgra med kyi/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis gamig pa ni bla na med par 'jug pa yin te/dge rlung
633b5('dul ba): gi 'khor ji snyed 'dus shing 'khod pa rnams la ni/gang dge slong gcig la yang sdug bsngal dang /kun 'byung dang /'gog pa dang /lam rnams la som nyi dang /yid
633b6('dul ba): gnyis med med kyi/'on kyang 'di'i dgos pa ni/dus phyi ma'i sems can rnams la/de bzhin gshegs pa thugs brtse ba'i phyir ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
633b7('dul ba): gi sbru las spyod pa/yogs bsas te/dge slong rnamasal po' stsam pa/dani slong ngan de bzhin gi shenas pa'i spru la stos shig/dge slong dge de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyu
634a1('dul ba): rnam par ltos sheg/da ci'i phyir na nA/de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa lta bA ni rnyed par dka' ste/dpar/
634a2('dul ba): namye tog u dum bI ra bzhin no//dge slong dag re shig cang ma smra shig dang /'di ltar 'dus byas thams cad ni 'jig pa'i chos can yin te/de la 'di ni de
634a3('dul ba): bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung tha ma'o zhes gsung na/bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhug so//bsam gtan dang po las bzhengs nas/bsam
634a4('dul ba): gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par zhug so//bsam gtan gnyis pa las bzhengs nas/bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs so//bsam gsum pa las
634a5('dul ba): bzhongs nas/bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par zhugs so//bsam gtan bzhi pa las bzhengs nas/na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par zhugs
634a6('dul ba): namakha' mtha' yas skye mched las bzhengs nas/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par zhugs so//rnam shes mtha' yos skye mched las bzhengs na
634a7('dul ba): ci yang med pa'i skye mchod la snyoms par zhug so//ci yang med pa'i skye mched las bzhengs nas/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mchod la snyoms par zhug
634b1('dul ba): /med 'du shes mod min skye mchod las bzhengs nas/'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dka' ba ste/tshe dang ldan pa ma//
634b2('dul ba): 'gegs pa la 'di skad ces smraso//tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gag pa/bcom ldan 'das yong su mya ngan las 'das sam/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ma yin te/sangs rgyas
634b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das ni 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugaso//tshe dang ldan pa mi 'gag pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms
634b4('dul ba): par zhugs te/zhi ba mi g.yo ba'i spyan dang ldan pa bsnyes nas yongasu mya ngan las 'da'o zhes/bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las mngon sum du thos shing mngon du
634b5('dul ba): bzung ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das 'du shes dang /tshor ba 'gog pa las bzhengs te/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par zhug so//'du shes ma
634b6('dul ba): 'du shes med min skye mched les bzhengs nas/ci yang med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par zhug so//ci yang med pa'i skye mched las bzhengs nas/rnam shes mtha'
634b7('dul ba): yas skye mched la snyoms par zhugaso//rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las bzhengs nas/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par zhugaso//nam mkha' mtha'
635a1('dul ba): yas skye mched las bzhengs nas/bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par zhun pa/bsum gtan bzhi pa las bzhengs nas/bsam gtan da
635a2('dul ba): pa la snyoms par zhugaso//bsam gtan gsum pa las bzhengs nas/bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par zhug so//bsam gtan gnyis pa las bzhengs nas/
635a3('dul ba): bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugaso//bsam gtan dang po las bzhengs nas/bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par zhugs so//bsam gtan gnyis pa
635a4('dul ba): las bzhengs nas/bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugaso//bsam gtan gsum pa las bzhengs nas/bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par zhugs te/sangs
635a5('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par zhugs nas/zhi ba mi g.yo ba'i sman dang ldan pa brnyes te yongs mya ngan las 'daso//sangs rgyas
635a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'das ma thag tu/sa chen po yang g.yos par gyur/skar mda' yang lhung phyogs kyang tshig/bar snang las lha dag gi sgo rje'i
635a7('dul ba): sgra yang bsgragaso//de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po//rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ka gnas pa ni 'dug pa de/sa g.yos pas sad da 'di ni
635b1('dul ba): zhig ces bsams na/bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'das par mthong ngo //des 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad ni de 'dra'o zhes chos nyid la brten nas/des pasasmra///
635b2('dul ba): pa/'di ltar lus 'phags mi'i bu/rgyal po mo skyes dgra rtsa ba med pa'i dad pa dang ldan pa dus/bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa de thos par gyur na//khrag
635b3('dul ba): dron por skyugs nas 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'i gnas su 'gyur bar rig nas/de la thabs shig bsgrub par bya'o snyam du bsam nas/yul ma ga d+ha'i sA chen po la gtogs pa
635b4('dul ba): bram ze de byar byed la 'di skad ces smras so//dbyar byed shes par gyis shig/bcom ldan 'das ni yong su mya ngan las 'das par gyur te/gal te lus 'phags ma'i
635b5('dul ba): bu/rgyal po mo skyes dgra rtsa ba med pa'i dad pa dang ldan pa des/bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'ongs pa thos na/de khrag dron po skyugs nas 'chi ba'i dus
635b6('dul ba): byed par 'gyur na/de la khyod kyis thabs bsgrub par rig par gyis shig/des smras pa/phogs pa thabs gang lags pa rims bzhin du ga sung shig/des smras pa/
635b7('dul ba): dbyar byed tshur shog/khyod myur ba myur bar rgyal po'i skyed mos tshal du song la/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyis gnas na bzhug shing //
636a1('dul ba): gzigs pa lngas gzigs te/'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug la lan gsum du snang ba mdzad nas/glang po che ra bstan te yum gyi lhums su
636a2('dul ba): gshegs pa dang /gshegs nas ji ltar byang chub kyi shing drung du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas po dang /
636a3('dul ba): lta bcom ldan 'das yul ba ran ser lon gsum du bzlas tAM/chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyisu bskor ba dang /ji ltar mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po
636a4('dul ba): ston pa dang /ji ltar sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas su sbyin pa'i yum gyi thad du gshegs nas rgyas bshad de/grong khyer sgra can du bab pa dang /ji ltar phyogs
636a5('dul ba): gang dang gang na gdul ba de dang de dag btul nus/sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mthar phyin te/grong khyer rtswa can du tha mo'i gzims mal du gshegs pa de lta bu'i
636a6('dul ba): ri mo dag d+hi bar bya zhing /khyod kyis gzhing rings bdun/mar gyi myur sar gyis brgyad pa ni can don 'gro shir shes bkang ste/bskyed mes tshal gyi phyogs dang
636a7('dul ba): bzhag go//ji tsam na rgyal po sgor byung bar gyur pa dang /de la lha re shig bskyed mos tshol gzigasu gsol zhes smras nas/gal te ri mo mthong nas/dbyar byed
636b1('dul ba): 'dri ci yin zhes 'dri ba dang /rgya cheru bshad par bya ste/lha 'dri ni grong khyer ser skya can lags te/phyogs 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das 'khrungaso//'di ni chu bo na ra dzaM
636b2('dul ba): na'i 'gram lags te/phyogs 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i gdan lo bzhugs nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
636b3('dul ba): rgyas so//'di ni yul bo ra na se'i grong khyer lags te/phyogs 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gsum du bzlas te/chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyi su bskor to//
636b4('dul ba): 'di ni mnyan yod kyi grong khyer lags te/phyogs 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe 'phrul chen po bstan te//'di ni grong khyer sgra can lags te/phyogs 'dir ni bcom
636b5('dul ba): ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi gnas nas brab so//'di ni grong khyer rtsa can lags te/phyogs 'dir ni phyogs gang dang gang na 'dul po de dang de dag btul
636b6('dul ba): nas/sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mthar phyin te/tha ma'i gzims mal du gshegs so zhes gyis dang /thos nas thos ma thag tu lha rgyal te/sa la lhung bar 'gyur gyis/de la
636b7('dul ba): khyod kyis gzhong rings mar sar gyis bkang ba'i nang du gzhug par bya'o//gang gi tshe mar sar de zhu bar gyur pa dang /de gnyis po nas bdun pa'i bar du gzhugs par bya'o//
637a1('dul ba): de nas byung ste/tsan ngan 'gro shing shas bkang ba'i gzhod rnyings su chug shig dang /dau smos par 'gyur ro//zhes smras nus/tshe dang ldan pa'o//
637a2('dul ba): sru chen po grong khyer rtse tson du song ngo //dbyar byed kyang myur ba myur bar ri mo'i las thams cad rgya tshar bris te//bris nas rgyal po'i phyi rol tu byung bye dang /
637a3('dul ba): lho skyed mos tshal du gshegs shes smras te/de skyes mos tshul du zhugs pa dang ri mo dag mthong nas/dbyar byed 'di ci yin zhes dris tau des 'di ni grong khyer rtsa
637a4('dul ba): can legs te/phyogs 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das tha ma'i gzims mal du gsheg so zhes bya ba'i bar snga mo bzhin du rgyas par bshad do//des smras pa/dbyar
637a5('dul ba): byed ci zer/ci bo tsam ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'das sam zhes smras pa dang de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra brgyal te sa la lhung
637a6('dul ba): ba~M dang /dbyar byed kyis gzhod rings mor gyis bkang ba'i nang du lan ba dun gyi bar du bcug nas/de nas phyung ste/tson ngan 'go shrir shas bkang pa'i gzhong
637a7('dul ba): rings kyi nang du bcug pa dang /de sos par gyur te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das ma thag tu shing sa la zung gnyis kyi tshal sa la'i ljon
637b1('dul ba): shid man b+ha las me tog thar ba'i drung du/bcom ldan 'das song go lta bu gnoms pa dang /de'i tshe dge slong gzhan zhog gis tshogasu bcad do smras pa/sa la cu
637b2('dul ba): ni rab mdzes pa'o//na shing mchog gi tshul bu 'di //stod pa mya dan 'das pa la//me tog dag gsu rab tu ga d+ha //sangs r+b+ba saM bcom ldani 'dus mya ngan la
637b3('dul ba): 'das ma thag tu/sgra'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshig su bcad de smras pa/kye ma 'du byed mi rtag ste//skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin//skyes nas 'jig par gyu
637b4('dul ba): bya ste//de dag nye ltar bri ba bde//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das ma thog tu//mi mdzod ky-i dag po tshangs pas tshigs bcad du smras pa/'byung po kun
637b5('dul ba): kyis 'jig rten 'dir ni bsags pa'i mtha'//'dod 'gyur 'jig rten 'dir ni gang zag zla med cing //de bzhin gshegs pa stobs rnams brnyes pa spyan ldan pa//ston
637b6('dul ba): pa 'di lta bu yang yongasu mya ngan 'das//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das ma thag tu/tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas tshigasu bcad de smras
637b7('dul ba): pa/brtan pa'i thugs kyis skyobs mdzad cing //mi g.yo zhi ba bsres gyur pa//dbugs dbyung ba dang rngub 'gags nas//spyan ldan yong su mya ngan 'das//rnam pa sa
638a1('dul ba): cad mchog ldan ga/rang spyan bu dus m+b+ha da//chorab tu sbyangs kyi nga // yang langs par gyur//zhum pa med pa'i thugs rgyas
638a2('dul ba): ni//tshor ba drug las lhag par gnas//de'i thug ste ni rnam 'grol ba//snron mya de 'dra mye ngan 'das//sangs rgyas bcom ldan su mya ngan las 'das mi thug tu
638a3('dul ba): dge sbyong kha cig ni sa la 'gre ldog/kha cig ni dpung pa lnga bzung nas ku co 'don/khaT+wA~M ga ni drug bsngal gyis sems gzir cing 'dog/kha cig ni chos nyid la
638a4('dul ba): na nas gang 'di ltar bdag cag la bcom ldan 'das kyis zhib tu ston to//thams cad kyi snying du sdug cing blangs la dga' bru yid du 'ong ba dang bral nas/myed pa
638a5('dul ba): dang /zhig pa dang /bye bar gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas/tshe dang ldan pa kun da'i bo la 'di skad ces smraso//kye tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo//dge
638a6('dul ba): slong rnams rim gyis drol bu del bus zil gyis mu men na/tshe bsgral pa brgya phrag mje po thub pa'i lha rnams 'di ltar labs par ga sungs pa'i chos 'dul
638a7('dul ba): le rab tu byung ba 'i dge slong rnams so sor mi rtog par mang du dmas po nim 'phya bar byed/sbrid par byed/kha zer bar byed//tshe dang ldan pa
638b1('dul ba): 'ga' pa la/spu ji snyed yod pa shes sam zhes dris pa dang /kun dga' rdo dzi num gleng khyer rtswa can gyis par nas/chu bo dbyig ldan gyi bar dang /
638b2('dul ba): tsam shing sa la zung gnyis kyi tshal gyi bar nas rgyud kyis dbu rgyun btugs pa'i mchod rten gyi bar dpag tshad bcu gnyis khe ra khor yu ge hU~M/dbang che ba dang
638b3('dul ba): che bar grags pa'i lha rnams kyis ma khyab cing ma gang ba chung zad kyang med de/chung ngu na khar bu gzugs pa'i khyod tsam yang med par lha kha cig ni sa la 'gro
638b4('dul ba): ldog/kha cig ni dpung pa nas bzung nas ku cho 'don/kha cig ni sdug bsngal gyis sems gzir cing 'dug/kha cig ni chos nyid la brten nas gang 'di ltang
638b5('dul ba): bdag cag lnga bcom ldan 'das kyi rnam grangs du ma kun tu bstan to/thams cad kyi snying du sdug cing phangs pa dga' ba/yid du 'ong ba dang bral nas/maud
638b6('dul ba): pa dang /zhig pa dang /gyes par gyur to//de'i nub mo tshe dang ldan bya ma 'gags pas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rnam par nges po'i chos kyi gtam smras nas
638b7('dul ba): 'phags pa'i ngo bor cang mi smra bar 'dug go//de nas de'i tshe mchen mo nam nangs nas/tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras
639a1('dul ba): tshwa dang ldan pa kun dga' bo se lu/zang khyung rtswa can gyi rgyun rnams lha 'di skad ces gnas 'jog dag/dang glu mtshan mo'i zung rdzun la//
639a2('dul ba): ston pa phung pa lhag ma myed pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las 'das kyis khyed kyi bya ba dang bsgrub pa dag der byas la//de phyin che de 'di//
639a3('dul ba): snyid ces grong gi nyi 'khor ba dag bdag cag gi ston pa phung po lcug mo med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/bdag
639a4('dul ba): cag gis de la mchod par bya zhing brtson par bya ma nus so zhes yid la gcags par ma byed cig ces smros shig/tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas de skad
639a5('dul ba): smras nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos//tshe dang ldan pa mA 'gags pa'i ltar mnyan nas snam sbyar blangs te/dge slong gzhan dag dang //phyi bzhin
639a6('dul ba): 'brang ba'i dge sbyong dge dang /grong khyer rtsa n+dan gyi gyad rnams kyi mdun khang gal bar song ste phyin po dang /de'i tshe grong rtsa can gyi byad rnams kyi mdun
639a7('dul ba): khang na gyad lnga brgya tsam zhig bya ba dag cig gi phyir 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/grong khyer rtse can gyi gyad
639b1('dul ba): rnams la 'di skad ces smras so//grong khyer rtsa can gyi gyad kyi 'khor mang po tshog shing 'dus pa shes ldan gnas 'jog dag nyon cig/deng gi mtshan mo'i
639b2('dul ba): gung thun la ston pa phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya dran las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyis/gang khyed kyis bya ba dang /bsgrub
639b3('dul ba): pa dag der byos la phyin chad 'di skad ces grong gi nye 'khor ba dag/bdag cag gi ston pa phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan la so 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs
639b4('dul ba): su mya ngan las 'das te/bdag cag gis de la mchod cing brtson par byed ma nus so zhes yid la gcig par ma byed cig ces smras nas/glong khyer rtswa can gyi
639b5('dul ba): gyad kha cig ni sa la 'gre ldog/kha cig ni dpung pa nas bzung ste ku co 'don//kha cig ni sdug bsngal gyis sems gzir cing 'dug/kha cig ni chos nyid la
639b6('dul ba): brten nas gadra 'di ltar bdag cag la/bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar kun tu bstan te/thams cad kyi snying du sdug cing phams pa/dga'
639b7('dul ba): ba dang /yid du 'ong ba dang bral nas med pa dang /zhig pa dang /bye bar gyur to//de nas grong khyer rtse can gyi gyad rnams ji tsam du grong khyer rtsa can nas mi
640a1('dul ba): tog dang /phreng ba dang /bdug spos dang /bye ma dang /ral mo'i cha byad dag thogs te/de dag gi bu dung /chung ma dang /bran bya dang /
640a2('dul ba): bran mo dang /las byed pa dang /zho shas 'tsho ba dang /de dag gi mdza' bshes dang /nyo du dang /blon po dang /snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams grong
640a3('dul ba): khyed rtsa can nas byung ste/shing sa la zung gnyis kyi tshal ga la bla der gshegs te phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das seng ge lta bur gzims pa la/dri dang /phreng
640a4('dul ba): bo dang /bdug spros dang /phye ma dang /rol mos bkur bstir byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byasamachod par byas so//de nas gzhan yang grong khyer rtsa
640a5('dul ba): can gyi gyad gtso bo gtso bo rnams kyis/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la/bdag
640a6('dul ba): cag rnams kyis mchod par bgyi ba dang /btsun pa ji lta bur bsgrub par bgyi lags/gnas 'jog dag 'di lta ste/'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po lnga bya ba
640a7('dul ba): bzhin no//btsun pa kun dga' bo 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i la ji ltar bgyid lagasaganas 'jog dag 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po la ni//lus
640b1('dul ba): shing bal gyi 'da' bas dkri shing /shing bal gyi 'dal bas bkris nas//ras zung lnga brgyas bkri bar bya'o//ras zung lnga brgyus bkris nus lcags kyi sbrum du/
640b2('dul ba): bcug ste/'bru mar gyis bkang ste steng nas lcags kyi kha ga ba gnyis kyis bkab ste/dri zhim po'i shing thams cad spungs ste/des bsregs nas me de dga'i//
640b3('dul ba): mas pasad de/de'i rus pa gser gyi bum pa'i nang du bcug nas/lam po che'i bzhi mdor rus pa'i mchod rten brtsigs nas/gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /bang
640b4('dul ba): btsugs te/dri dang /phreng ba dang /bdug pa dang /phye ma dang /rol mo'i sgras bkur stir byed/bla mar byed/ri mor byed/mchod par byed cing /dus ston chen po
640b5('dul ba): yang byed do//gnas 'jog dag 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po la bya ba de bzhin du/de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la de bas
640b6('dul ba): kyang ldog par bya'o//btsun pa kun dga' bo sa gsungs pa'i don bdag cag gis 'tshal ba ltar nu/gang gi phyir bdag cag gis gdugs gcig gam/gnyis sam/
640b7('dul ba): gsum gyis mo tshogs te/sbyang bar dka' na zhag bdun tshun ched kyis bdag cag gis de bzhin du sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri la gzims pa la
641a1('dul ba): d+hI dang /phreng ba dang /bdug pa dang /phyi ma dang /rol mo'i sgras bkur bsnor bgyi/bla mar bag+h+nAM/ri mor bgyi/mtsho//
641a2('dul ba): ra bgyi'o//de bzhin du gyis shig ces tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo las thos nas/grong khyer rtse can gyi gyad rnams kyis nyi ma bdun pa nyid la
641a3('dul ba): shing bal gyi 'da' ba dge bstsags te/shing bil gyi 'da' ba dag bsags nas/ram+bu zung lnga brgya yang bsags/ras zung lnga ba rgyu ya
641a4('dul ba): bsngags nas/lcags kyi sgrom yang bshams/lcags kyi sgom pa shams nas/dri zhim po'i shing thams cad kyang spungs dri zhim po'i
641a5('dul ba): shing thams cad spungs nasagaser gyi bum pa yang sta gon byas/gser gyi bum pa ste don byas nas/gser gyi khyogs drug kyang bshams
641a6('dul ba): /ster TI Sh+yA gas pa shams nas/grong Sh+yar rgyu can nas chung dbyig lhun gyi bar dang shing sa la zung gi tshal naso rgyud kyis dbu rgyun
641a7('dul ba): btugs pa'i mchod rten gyi bar dang zhi chad bcu nyis thaM dz+dza/ji tsam dri dang /phreng ba dang /bdun pa dang /khyi mo dang
641b1('dul ba): da mya byud dag gasman su/da rgyu can nus bru m+b+ha/dus rlung sh+tha rnal nAng rung rgyun du na m+b+ha sa sa sa b+hA/d+hA da /
641b2('dul ba): phreng brjo /bdug pa dang / mo da /ma'i sgras/kur smai byas/zlu mar b+h+yas/ri mo byasamachod par byas so//ni nan
641b3('dul ba): snyed grong khyer rtsa can gyi gyad gtso bo gtso bo dag gis/grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyod rnams la 'di skad ces smras so//grong khyer rta can gyi gyad kyi 'khor ma
641b4('dul ba): po tshogs shing 'dus pashes ldan gnas 'jog dag nyon cig/g+hAd myi chung ma dang /gyad kyi bu mo dag gis ni/bcom ldan
641b5('dul ba): 'das la gos kyi bla re dag bris shig/gyad kyi chung ma dang /gyang gzhon nu dag gis ni/bcom ldan 'das kyi khyogs zung shig
641b6('dul ba): dad cig gis ni hUM dang /phreng ba dang /bdug pa dang /bye ma dang ril min skyes bkur bstir bya/b+h+ra me byA/ri mo hUM/mchod par bya
641b7('dul ba): grong khyer rtse can gyi nub sgo nas/dbus thog thag tu zhugs nas grong khyer rtsa can gyi shar sgor byung ste/chu bo dbyig ldan rga po nas
642a1('dul ba): /gyad kyis dbu rgyun btags pa'i chod rten gyi drung du bzhugasu bla sol pa/zhugs la bzhin par bya'o//de nas grang khyer rtsa can gyi gyad rnams
642a2('dul ba): kyi de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes mnyan nas/gyad kyi chung ma dang /gyad kyi bu mo dag gis ni bcom ldan 'das la gos kyi gdug dag bris/byed kyi chung ma dang /gyad gzhon /
642a3('dul ba): nu dag gis na bcom ldan 'das kyi khyogs gdog par 'dod na/bcom ldan 'das kyi khyogs gdeg par mu nus pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gag pas/tshe dang
642a4('dul ba): ldan pa kun dga' bo le 'di skad ces smraso//tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo grong khyer rtsa can gyi gyad rnams kyis/bcom ldan 'das kyi khyogs gdag par ma nuso//
642a5('dul ba): de ci'i phyir zhe na/lha rnams kyi bya sam+ba pa yin no//tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa lha rnams kyis bsams pa ji ltar bu yIn/lha rnams kyis ni gyad kyi chung
642a6('dul ba): ma dang /byad kyi bu mo dag gis ni bcom ldan 'das la gos kyi bla re bre zhing /gyad rnams dang /gyad gzhon nu dag gis ni/bcom ldan 'das kyi khyogs la
642a7('dul ba): bzung nas/bdag cag gis lha'i dri dang /phreng ba dang /bdug pa dang /bye ma dang //dri mo'i sgras bkur btir bya/bla mar bya/ri mor bya/mchod pa byas te/grong
642b1('dul ba): rtswa can gyi nub phyogs kyi sgo nas/dbus zag thag tu zhugs la/grong khyer rtsa can gyi shAr sgo nas byung ste/chu bo dbyig ldan rgal nas/g+hAng+ga gyis dbu rgyun btags
642b2('dul ba): pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du bzhugasu gsol la/zhugs la gzhan par bya'o//zhes bsamaso//tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa/lha rnams kyis ji ltar bsams pa de
642b3('dul ba): bzhin du bya'o//de nas tshwa dang ldan pa kun dga' bos//grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams la 'di skad ce smraso//shes ldan gnas 'jog dag/bcom ldan 'das kyis khyog
642b4('dul ba): 'degs mo nus pa de ci'i phyi na ni/lha rnams kyis bsams pa yin no//btsun pa kun dga' bo lha rnams kyis ji ltar bsams lags/lha rnams kyis ni gyad kyi rlung
642b5('dul ba): ma dang /gyad gyi bu mo dag gis/bcom ldan 'das la gos kyi bla re bre zhing /gyad rnams dang /gyang gzhon nu dag gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi khyogs btegra ste/bdag
642b6('dul ba): cag gis lha'i dri dang /phreng ba dang /bdug pa dang /phye ma dang /rol mi'i skyes bkur bitir bya/bla mar bya/ri mor bya/mchod par byas nas/grong khyer rtsa can gyi nub phyogs kyi
642b7('dul ba): sgo nas dbus thog theg zhugs la/grong khyer rtse can gyi shar skong byung ste/chu bo dbyig ldan rgal nas byed kyis dbu rgyan btogs pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du bzhug su gsol/zhugs la gnon
643a1('dul ba): bar bya'o zhes pas mo//btsun pa kun dga' bo ji ltar lha rnams kyis bdams pa de bzhin du bgyi'o//de nas gyad kyi chung ma dang /gyad kyi bu mo dag gros ni/bcom ldan 'das
643a2('dul ba): la gos kyi bla re bres/gyad rnams dang /gyad gzhan nu dag gis ni/bcom ldan 'das kyi khyogs btag ste/khyogs bteg ma thag tu bar snang la gnas pa'i lha dag gis/lha'i me
643a3('dul ba): tog ud pa la dang /pad ma dang /pad ma dkar po dang /ku mu da dang /a ka ru'i phye ma dang /ta mya la'i phyi ma dang /lha'i me tog mAn da ra ka la sogs pa dag gis ni gtor/lha'i rol
643a4('dul ba): mo'i sgra dag ni blangs/gos mang po dag ni bor ro//gzhan yang grong khyer rtsa can gyi gyad gtso bo dag gis/grong khyer rtsa can gyi gyad rnams la 'di skad ces smras so//shes ldan
643a5('dul ba): gnas 'jog dag bdag cag gi mi'i rol mo'i sgra'i cha byad dag bair la/bdag cag gis lha'i dri dang /phreng ba dang /bdug pa dang /phye ma dang /rol ma'i sgras bkur bting
643a6('dul ba): bya bla mar bya/ri mor bya/mchod pa byas la/grong khyer rtsa can gyi nub phyogs kyi sgo nas/grong khyer rtsa can gyi shar sgor byung la/chu bo dbyig ldan rgal nas gyad kyis dbu
643a7('dul ba): rgyan btags pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du bzhugasu gsol la zhugs la bzhin par bya'o zhes smras so////bam po nga bdun pa//de nas grong khyer rtsa can gyi gyad rnams kyis
643b1('dul ba): mi'i rol mo'i tshe byad dag bor te/lha'i dri dang /phreng ba dang /bdug pa dang /phye ma dang /rol mo'i sgras bkur btir byas/bla mar byas/ri mong byas/mchod pa byas te/grong khyer rtsa can
643b2('dul ba): gyi nub sgo nas/dbus thag tu zhugs te/grong khyer rtsa can gyi shar sgor byung nas/chu bo dbyig ldan rgal te/gyad kyis dbu rgyan btags pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du zhugasu gsolo//de'i
643b3('dul ba): tshe grang khyer rtsa can du lha'i me tog man da ra ba mang po pus mo nub tsam du bab par gyur to//de'i tshe 'tshe ba can gzhan zhig gis lha'i me tog man da ra ka de las mang du blangs te/yul sdig
643b4('dul ba): pa can du bya ba zhig gi ched du song ba dang /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 'khor lnga brgya dang chas te/yul sdig can gyi bar nas grong khyer rtsa can gyi bar du lam du zhugs te/bcom
643b5('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi sku gdung ma nyams pa la phyag 'tshal ba re 'dod pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'cha can de la ma kar mthong ngo //mthong nas 'tsho ba can de la 'di skad ces smras//
643b6('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa 'tshe ba can khyod gang nas 'dir 'ongs gang du 'gro/btsun pa 'od srung chen po bdag ni grong khyer rtsa can nas 'dir mchis te/bgyi ba zhig gi ched la yul sdig pa can du
643b7('dul ba): mchi'o//tshe dang ldan pa 'tsho ba can khyod kyis nga'i ston pa shes sam/'phags pa 'tshal lags te/dge sbyong go'u ta ma lags//'phags pa 'od srung chen po sten pa de yongasu
644a1('dul ba): mya dran las 'das nas/deng du dgung bdun lags te/de'i sku gdung la mchod pa bgyis pa'i lha'i me tog man da ra ka bdag gis blangs pa 'di lagaso//de'i
644a2('dul ba): tshe rgan+da zhug gzhan zhig tshul ma yin pa'i tshig 'di skad du smai ste/'di ltar ba dag ni 'gyod pa dang /rgan zhugs kyis 'di ltar/kye dge slong dag 'di ni bya'o//'di ni bya ba
644a3('dul ba): ma yin zhes smra ba las thar par gyur to//da ni bdag cag gis gang nus pa de ni bya/gang mi nus pa de ni mi bya'o zhes de skad du mi rig par smra ba dang /bar snang la gnas
644a4('dul ba): pa'i lha dag gis bsgribs te/ji ltar tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po ma btogs pa/dge slong gi 'khor dro gcig gis kyang thos par ma gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa
644a5('dul ba): 'od srung chen pos tshul ma yin pa'i tshig de lta bu smra ba gdul ba'i don du lam las gyur ste/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/
644a6('dul ba): 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dus byas thams cad ni mi rtag pa/mi brtan pa/yid brtan
644a7('dul ba): du mi rung ba/'gyur ba'i chos can yin te/ji srid du 'di ltar 'dus byasakyi chos thams cad la yid byung bar bya/rnam par grol bar bya'o//kye tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag
644b1('dul ba): ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung ma nyams pa blta bar rings pa rings par gro'o//de nas grong khyer rtsa can gyi gyad rnams kyis/bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung shing bal rgya
644b2('dul ba): 'da' bas dkris so//shing bal gyi 'da' bas dkris nas/ras zung lnga brgyas dkriso//ras zung lnga brgyas dkris nas/lcags kyi sgrom du bcug ste/'bru mar
644b3('dul ba): gyis bkangango //lcags kyi sgom du bcug ste/'bru mar gyis bkang nas steng nas lcags kyi kha gab gnyis kyis bkab ste/dri zhim po'i shing thams cad srungs nas/zhugs
644b4('dul ba): la bzhin par 'dod na/me sbar bar mi nus so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smraso//tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo grang
644b5('dul ba): khyer rtsa can gyi gyad rnams kyis/bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung zhugs la bzhin par mi nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/lha rnams kyis bsam pa bzhin no//tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags
644b6('dul ba): pa lha rnams kyis ji ltar bsams pa 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 'khor lnga brgya dang ches te/yul sdig pa tsan gyi bar nas//grong khyer rtsa can gyi bur du lam du zhugs
644b7('dul ba): ste/bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung ma nyams pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'dod pa yin no//tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa ji ltar lha rnams kyis bsams pa de bzhin du bya'o//de nas
645a1('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams la 'di skad ces smras so//grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad kyi 'khor mang po tshogs shring 'dus pa/shes
645a2('dul ba): ldan gnas 'jog dge nyon cig/bcom ldan 'od kyi sku gdung zhugs la bzhen par ma nus pa/de ci'i phyir zhe na/lha rnams kyis bsams pa yin no//tshe dang ldan pa
645a3('dul ba): kun dga' bo lha rnams kyi ji ltar bsams legs/de ni tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 'khor lnga brgya dang /yulA sdig can gyi bar nas/grong khyer rtsa can gyi bar
645a4('dul ba): du lam du zhugs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung ma nyams pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'dod pa yin no//de dag gis smras pa/btsun pa kun dga' bo ji ltar lha
645a5('dul ba): rnams kyis bsams pa de bzhin du bgyi'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po grong khyer rtsa can du phyin pa dang /'khor dge gis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po
645a6('dul ba): rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang dri dang /phreng ba dang /bdug pa dang /phye ma dang /rol mo'i cha byad dag thogs te/tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po ga la ba
645a7('dul ba): der song ste phyin nas/tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po phyi bzhin du rje su 'brang zhing song ngo //de nA
645b1('dul ba): rgyurlung ldan pa 'ad srung chen po 'khor bArgya p+lag+sa m+b+ha dang /'khor stong phrag du ma dang /'khor brgya stong phrag du m+b+ha dang /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dar song ste phyin pa dang /
645b2('dul ba): dri zhim po'i shing thams cad bsol to//dri zhim po'i shing thams cad bsal na/lcags kyi sgrog ma kha phye'o//lcags kyi sgrog ma kha phye nas/ras zung lnga brgya bshus
645b3('dul ba): so//ras zung lnga brgya ba shus nas/shing bal gyi 'da' ba yang ba shuso//shing bal gyi 'da' ba yang po shus nas//bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung ma nyams pa la
645b4('dul ba): phyag byas so//de'i tshe na sa chen po 'di'i steng na nyan thos chen po bzhi yod do//tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya dang /tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen po dang /tshe dang ldan pa
645b5('dul ba): stobs bcu 'od srung dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po'o//de dag gi nang na tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po ye shes dang ldan pa/bsod nams che ba/chos gos dang /
645b6('dul ba): bsod snyoms dang /mal stan dang /na ba'i rkyen sman dang /yo byad dag rnyed pa yin no//de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po de 'di snyam du sems te/ma la bdag nyid kyis
645b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya'o snyam du spro ba bskyed nas//tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos/shing bal gyi 'da' ba gzhan dag sta gon byas te/shing ba la
646a1('dul ba): gyi 'da' ba gzhan dag sta glon byas nas/gzhan yang ras zung lnga brgya sta gon byas so//ras zung lnga brgya gzhan dag sta gon byas nas/bcom ldan 'dra
646a2('dul ba): kyi sku gdung la shing bal gyi 'da' bas bkri sau//shring bal gyi 'da' bus bkris naso/ras zung lnga brgyas bkres so//ras zung lnga brgyas bkris nas/lcags kyi
646a3('dul ba): sgom du bcug ste/'bru mar gyis bkangango //lcags kyi skyem du bcug ste/'bra mar gyis bkang nas/steng du lags kyi kha ga ba gnyis kyis bka'i ste/shing dri zhim po
646a4('dul ba): thams cad srung so//spungs nas/phyogs gcig tu song ba dang /ji ltar de sangs rgyas rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus de rang 'bar gyur to//
646a5('dul ba): de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo//bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung spungs pa de dag la bskor ba byas nas/de'i tshe tshigasu bcad de smras pa/rnam par 'dren pa rin chen sku mnga' ba//rdzu
646a6('dul ba): 'phrul chen po tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gshegs//sangs rgyas sku la ras zung lnga brgya dang //chos gos stong snyed kun tu dkris gyur pa//nyid kyi gzi brjid kyis ni sku gdung dang //shin tu
646a7('dul ba): bkris par rab tu tshig par gyur//de la chos gos gnyis ni mchog po//nang rim dang ni phyir mi 'di rnam gnyis//de nas grong khyer rtsa can gyi gyad rnams kyis//me de dag 'o mas bsad pa dang //
646b1('dul ba): de nas 'o ma lus shing bzhi skyes par gyur te/'di lta ste/gser n+dan dang /sder skya dang /rta don dang /u dum bar zhes bya ba yin no//de nas grong khyer rtsa can gyi gyad rnams kyis/de'i sku
646b2('dul ba): gdung gser gyi bum pa'i nang du bcug ste/gser las byas pa'i khyogs kyi steng du bzhag nas/dri dang /phreng ba dang /bdug pa dang /phye ma dang /rol mo sgras bkur bstir byas/blo
646b3('dul ba): mar byas/ri mor byas/mchod pa byas te/grong khyer rtsa can du phyin nas/der grong khyer mchog gi dbus su gsol nas/dri dang /phreng ba dang /bdug pa dang /phye ma dang /rol mo'i
646b4('dul ba): sgras bkur bstir byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas/mchod po byas so//de nas yul sdig pa can gyi gyad rnams kyis grong khyer rtsa can du bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'das
646b5('dul ba): nas deng du zhag bdun lon nas/sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byed do zhes thos so//thos nas kyang spung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa/glang po che'i tshogs dang /rta'i tshogs dang //
646b6('dul ba): shing rta'i tshigs dang /dpung pu chung gi tsho gas go bskon te/grong khyer rtsa can gyi gyad ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/grong khyer rtsa can gyi gyad rnams la 'di skad ces smraso//grong
646b7('dul ba): khyer rtsa can gyi gyad kyi 'khor mang po tshogs shing 'dus pa/shes ldan dag nyon cig/bcom ldan 'das ni nged la yun ring po nas pangs shing sdug pa yin te/de khyod kyi grong gi
647a1('dul ba): /nyan 'khor du rten pa las yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas/bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung sha ri ram gyi skul ba deng+ga la byin cig dang /de nged kyis yul sdig
647a2('dul ba): pa can du/bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs la/gdugs dang /rgyal ma tshan dang /ba dan gzugs shing /dri dang /phreng ba dang /bdug pa dang /
647a3('dul ba): phye ma dang /rol mo'i sgras bkur bstir bya//bla mar bya/ri mor bya/mchod pa bya ste/mchod pa byas nas/dus ston chen po yang bya'o//gnas 'jog dag bcom ldan 'das
647a4('dul ba): de ni ded la yang phangs shing sdug pa yin la/nged kyi grong gi nye 'khor du rten pa las yang su mya lhas 'das par gyur pas/bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung sha ri ram gyi skal
647a5('dul ba): ba nged kyis sbyin par mi bya'o//gal te byin na de lta na ni legs/ji ste ma byin par gyur na/dmag gris dbrog/grong khyer rtsa can gyi gyad rnams kyis de bzhini du bya'o zhes mnyan
647a6('dul ba): to/yul rtogs pa g.yo ba na gnas pa'i rgyal rigs bu lu ka dang /grong khyer sgra sgrogs na gnas pa'i rgyal rigs krod d+ya dang /khyab 'jug gling na gnas pa'i bram ze dang /grong khyer
647a7('dul ba): ser skya na gnas pa'i rgyal rigs shAkya dang /yul yangs pa can na gnas pa'i rgyal rigs li tsa byi rnams kyis kyang thos te/yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po lus 'phags ma'i bu ma skyes
647b1('dul ba): rdzogs kyang /bcom ldan 'das yangs mya ngan las 'das te/yul sdig pa n+dan gyi rgyud+ma rnams dang /yul rtag pa gam pa'i rgyal rigs bu l+lA ka dang /grong khyer sgyu skyugs kyis rgyal
647b2('dul ba): rigs kr-id T+ya dang /khyab 'jug gling gi bram ze dang /yul ser skya na gnas pa'i rgyal rigs shAkya dang /yul yangs pa can gyi rgyal rigs la tsa byi rnams dpung gi tshogs yan lag
647b3('dul ba): bzhi pa go bston te/grong khyer rtsa can du sku gdung la mchod pa byed cing /der sku gdung gi skal ba len du song du zhes thos so//thos nas kyang yul ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa/bram
647b4('dul ba): ze dbyar byed la 'di skad ces smras so//dbyer byed ngas ni bcom ldan 'das yong su mya ngan las 'das nas/sdig pa can gyi gyad rnams dang /yul rtog pa g.yo ba'i rgyal rigs bu lu
647b5('dul ba): ka dang /grong khyer sgra sgrogs kyi rgyal rigs grong n+ya dang /khyab 'jug gling gi bram ze dang /yul ser skya ni gnas pa'i rgyal rigs shAkya dang /yul yangs pa can gyi rgyal rigs
647b6('dul ba): l-i tse byi rnams/dpung gi tshogs yan lag pi ni pogo bskon te/grong khyer rtsa can du sku gdung la mchod pa byed cing /dUr sku gdung gi/la ba len du song nga zhes thos na//khyod
647b7('dul ba): kyis shes sam/de bas na bdag cag kyang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon te/bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gdung gi skul ba blang bar bya'o//des lha de bzhin du go bsku
648a1('dul ba): par bgyi'o zhes smras nas/des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa gau bskon to/rgyal ba ma skyes dgra yang glang po che la zhon pa dang /des bcom ldan 'das
648a2('dul ba): kyis yon tan rje su dran pas ba rgyal bar gyur to//de nas glang po che las phab ste/rta la bskrun pa dang /der yong brgyal bar gyur te/des smras pa/dbyar byed ngas ni mi nus
648a3('dul ba): kyis khyod nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag gzhi pa go bskon te song lnga/grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams la nga'i bklas/gnod pa chung ngam/nyam nga ba nyung ngam//bskyod pa yang
648a4('dul ba): ngangam/'chog stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes nad dris la 'di ska ces/shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das ni nga la yun ring po nas phrangs shing sdug pa/b+h+ra mar
648a5('dul ba): gyur pa yin te/de khyod kyi grong gi nyen 'khor du yongasu mya ngan las 'das par gyur na/shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung sha ri ram gyi ska lnga ba da la byin cig
648a6('dul ba): dang /des na ngas rgyal po'i khab tu bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs la/gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan gzugs shing d+hi dang /phrad pa dang /
648a7('dul ba): bdug pa dang /bye ma dang /rol mo'i sgras bkur bstir bya/bla mar bya/ri mor bya/mchod pa bya ta/mchod pa byas nas/dus ston chen po yang bya'o zhes
648b1('dul ba): bsgo shig/lha de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes yul ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyis/rgyal po ma skyes dgra la mnyan nas dpung gi cho gas yan lag
648b2('dul ba): bzhi pa go bsgron te/grong khyer rtsa can ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /grong khyer rtsa can gyi gyad rnams la 'di skad ces smras so//grong khyer rtsa can gyi gyad kyi 'khor mang
648b3('dul ba): po tshogs shing 'dus pa/shes ldan dag nyon cig/shes ldan dag la yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po lus 'phags mi'i bu/rgyal po ma skyes dgra gnod pa chung ngam/
648b4('dul ba): nyam nga ba chung ngam/bskyod pa yang nge ma/'tsho 'am/stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes nad 'dre zhing /la di skad ce she ldan dag/bcom
648b5('dul ba): ldan 'das de ni nga la yun ring po nas phangs shing sdug pa bla mar gyur pa yin te/de khyad kyi grong gi nyi 'khor du yongs su mya ngan las 'das na/
648b6('dul ba): be tsam ldan 'das de'i sku gdung sha rI ram gyi skal ba nga la byin cig dang /des na ngas rgyal po'i khyab tu/bcom ldan
648b7('dul ba): 'das de'i sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsegs la gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /bo dan gzugs shing /dri dang /phreng
649a1('dul ba): dang /bdug pa dang /b+h+yA ma dang /rolha mo'i sgras bkur bya sti ma dbyar mo glur chad nga byung //mchod ba byas nas/dus spyo rgyu nA blo yang bya/
649a2('dul ba): sa bka' stsal to//dbyu da tshim ldan 'das dan+de dang la yang yun ring po nas phongs shing sdug pa/bla mar gyur pa yin te/de kyi grong gi hUM 'khor
649a3('dul ba): yongasu mya ngan las 'das pos ngad kyis dri'i skye gdung sha ri ram gyi sprul pa sbyin par mi bya'o//de nas lul ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed
649a4('dul ba): kyis grong khyer rtsa can gyi gyang rnams la 'di skad ces smraso//gal te byin na de lta na ni legs/ji ste ma byin par gyur na/dri mag gis dbrog par bya'o//grong khyer
649a5('dul ba): rtsa can gyi gyad rnams kyi de bzhin du bya'o zhes mnyan nas de dag gis rgyal po'i 'khor mang po 'a dus pa mthong nas gyad kyi chung ma dang /gyang gzhon nu dag kyang
649a6('dul ba): mnga' 'phong bslab so//ji tsam ni yul sdig pa can gyi gyang rnams dang /yul rtog pa g.yo ba'i rgyal rigs bu lu ka dang /grong khyer sgra sgrogs kyi rgyal rigs krod
649a7('dul ba): dang /khyab 'jug gling gi bram ze dang /yul ser spyan gnas pa'i rgyal rigs shAkya dang /yul yangs pa can gyi rgyal rigs li tsaM byo dang /yul ma ga d+ha'i sna chen
649b1('dul ba): bo gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed rnams kyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang /rta pa'i tshogs dang /shing rta'i tshogs dang /dpung bu chung gi tshogs
649b2('dul ba): go bskon te/grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams kyi drung du dmag brgal ba'i phyir lhagaso//de nas grong khyer rtsa can gyi gyang rnams kyis/gyad kyi chung ma dang /gyad gzhon nu
649b3('dul ba): dag grong khyer gyi phyir bkod de/dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang /rta pa'i tshogs dang /shing rta'i tshogs dang /dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon/
649b4('dul ba): te/pha rol po'i dmag gi tshogs bdun po dag gi drung du dmag brgal ba'i phyir byung ngo //de'i tshe bram ze'i rigs bre bo dang mnyam pa 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du 'ongs te/de nas
649b5('dul ba): bram ze'i rigs bru bo dang mnyam pa/phan tshun gnyis ka nas g.yul mang po bshams pa 'thabs par gyur na/ring por mi thogs par cig 'chi bar 'gyur par rig nas
649b6('dul ba): g.yang gzhi bskon+da te/grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyang kA la ba deng skyong ste phyin nas/grong khyer rtsa naR+sha gyi glang rnams la 'di skad ces smra so//grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad kyi khyor
649b7('dul ba): mang po tshogs shing 'dus pa shos ldan dag nyon cig/bcom ldan 'das go'u ta mdo ni yun ring po nas bzod pa dang ldan pa/bzod pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa yin
650a1('dul ba): shrIs ldan dag bcom ldan 'das glo'u ta ma de bzod pa dang ldan zhing bzod pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa yin na/sku gdung gi phyir cig la cig gsod par mi
650a2('dul ba): rigs pas/kho bos bcom ldan 'das go'u ta ma'i sku gdung cha brgya du bgo bar spro bar byas/gleng gi phyir bum par sku gdung bcug pa'i bum pa de kho bo la byin cig
650a3('dul ba): dang /des na kho bos bre bo'i grong khyer du bcom ldan 'das go'u ta ma de'i sku gdung gi mchod rten rtsigs la/gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan gzugs shing
650a4('dul ba): dri dang /phreng ba dang /bdug pa dang /phyi ma dang /rol mo'i sgra sa bkur bsgyur bya'o//bla mar bya'o//rI mor bya'o//mchod par bya'o//mchod pa byas nas/dus skyon
650a5('dul ba): chen po yang bya'o//grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams kyis bram ze'i rigs hU~M bo dang mnyam pa la/de bzhin du d+haro//zhes mnyan to//de nas bram ze'i rigs dro
650a6('dul ba): drudang mnyam po/yul sdig pa can gyi gyad rnams dang /yul rtog pa g.yo ba'i rgyal rigs bu lu ka dang /grong khyer sgra sgrogs kyi rgyal rig grod T+ya dang /khyab 'jug
650a7('dul ba): gling gi bram ze dang /yul ser skyan gnas pa'i rgyal rigs shAkya dang /yul yangs pa can gyi rgyal rigs li tse byi dang /yul mo ga d+ha'i sna tshon bro la gtogs
650b1('dul ba): 'bram ze dbyar byed ga la ba dang spong ste phyin nas/yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa/bram ze dbyung byed la 'di skad ces smras//dbyung byed shes par gyis shig/
650b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das go'u ta mA de ni yun ring po nus bzod pa dang lda ni zhing /bzod pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa yino//bcom ldan 'das go'u ti ma de bzod pa dang ldan
650b3('dul ba): bzod pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa yin na/shes ldan dbyur byed su gdung gi phyir/phan tshun cig la cig gsod par byed pa ni m+b+hi rigs pas/kho bos ban+d+ho mye ldan
650b4('dul ba): 'das go'u ta ma de'i sku gdung de chu brgyad du bgro b.re spro bor byos/gang gi phyir bum par sku gdung bcug pa'i bum pa de kho bo la byin cig dang /des na kho bo'i grong khyer
650b5('dul ba): dubacom ldan 'das gi'u ta ma de'i sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs la/gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan gzugs shing /dri dang /phreng ba dang /bdug po
650b6('dul ba): dang /phye me dang /rol mo'i sgras bkur bstir bya'o//bla mar bya'o//ri mor bya'o//mchod par bya'o//dus ston chen po yang bya'o//yul mya ge d+ha'i sde chen po la
650b7('dul ba): gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed la sogs pas bram ze'i rigs bro ba dang mnyam pa la de bzhin du bya'o zhes mnyan to//de nas bram ze'i rigs bre bo dang mnyam pas/bcom
651a1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi sku gdung chu brgya du bgos te/cha gcig grong khyor rtswa can gyi gyang rnams la byino//de nas grong khyer rtsa can gyi gyad rnam kyis/bcom
651a2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsegs nas/gdugs dang /rgyal mtshon dang /ba dan btsugs nas/dri dang /phreng ba dang /bdug pa dang /bye ma dang /rol
651a3('dul ba): mo'i sgras bkur bstir byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas/mchod pa byas te/dus skyon chen po yang byaso//cha gnyis pa ni yul sdig pa can gyi gyad rnams la/
651a4('dul ba): cha gsum pa ni yul rtog pa g.yo ba'i rgyal rigs bu lu ka la/cha bzhi pa ni grong khyer sgra sgrogs kyi rgyal rigs krod n+ya la/cha lnga pa nA khyab 'jug gling gi bram ze
651a5('dul ba): la/cha drug pa ni yul ser skya na gnas pa'i rgyal rigs shAkya rnams lA/cha bdun pa ni yul yangs pa can nu gnas pa'i rgyal rigs l-i tsa byi rnams la/cha brgyad/
651a6('dul ba): pa ni yul mA ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa/bram ze dbyer byed la byin te/des na yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po lus 'phags ma'i bu ma skyes dgras/bcom
651a7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs te/gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan btsugs nas/dri dang /phreng ba dang /bdug pa dang /phye ma
651b1('dul ba): dang /rol mo'i sgras bkur bstir byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas/mchod pa byas te/dus ston chen po yang byaso//de nas grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams kyis gang gi
651b2('dul ba): phyir/bum par sku gdung bcug po'i bum pa de/bram ze'i rigs bre bo dang mnyam pa la byin no//de nas bram ze'i rigs bre bos/bre bo dang mnyam pa'i grong khyer du
651b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs te/gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan btsugs nas/dri dang /phreng ba dang /bdug pa dang /phye ma dang /rol
651b4('dul ba): mo'i sgras bkur bstir byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas/mchod pa byas te/dus ston chen po yang byas//de nas de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u n+ya gro d+ha skyes 'khor 'dus pa de
651b5('dul ba): nyid du 'ongs te/de nas bram ze'i khye'u n+ya gro d+has grong khyer rtsa can gyi gyangad rnams la 'di skad ces smras so//grong khyer rtsa can gyi gyad kyi 'khor mang po tshogs shing
651b6('dul ba): 'dus pa shes ldan dag nyon cig/bcom ldan 'das go'u ta ma de ni ring po nas bdag la phangs shing sdug pa yin te/de khyed kyi grong khyer du yongasu mya ngan las 'das
651b7('dul ba): nas/shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung zhugs la bzhin pa'i sol ba de bdag la byan ci ge dang /des na bdag gis yul n+ya gro d+hi can du/bcom
652a1('dul ba): ldan 'das g+hoSh+Ta tA ma de'i so lnga ba'i mchod rten baN+Di ga sa l+yA/gdugs dang /rgyul mtshan dang /byA dan gzugs shing /dri dang /phreng ba dang //
652a2('dul ba): bdug pa dang /phye ma dang /rol mo'i sgras bkur bstir bya'o//bla mar bya'o//ri mor bya'o//mchod par bya'o//dus ston chen po yang bya'o//grong khyer rtswa n+dan gyi gyad rnams
652a3('dul ba): kyis/bram ze'i khye'u n+ya gr-i d+ha la sku gdung gi sol ba byin te/bram ze'i khye'u n+ya gro d+has/yul n+ya kro d+hA nAn du/bcom ldan 'das kyi sol ba'i mchod rten brtsigs te/gdugs
652a4('dul ba): dang /rgyal mtshan dang /bdun btsugs nas/dri dang /phreng ba dang /bdug pa dang /phywa mA dang /rol mo'i sgras bkur bstir byas/bla mar byas/ri mur byas/mchod pa byes
652a5('dul ba): te/dus ston chen po yang byas//de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling du bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung gi mchod rten brgyud dang /bum pa'i mchod rten dang dgu/stsol ba'i mchod rten
652a6('dul ba): dang bcur gyur to//spyan ldan sku gdung bre bro brgyad dag lngas//bdun ni 'dzam bu'i gling ba'i mchod par thob//skyes bu mchog de'i blo bo gang zhig ni//grong khyer sgra sgrogs
652a7('dul ba): klu yi rgyal pos mchod//skye mchog de'i yi mche ba bzhi dag las//mche ba gcig ni rtse gsum 'jig rten mchod//gnyis pa tshig 'dzin grong khyer yid 'ong ni gsum
652b1('dul ba): pA/'di rnal po stsal na ste//sgyu ma ga de'i mchog zhi na//maung b+h+yo /skyugs smra sorgyal bas mchod//myu na mod rgyal sgyu myur du gnas pas//mnad rten bdun ba rgya
652b2('dul ba): la byas te//das mirna mas /'dzin de yang ni//blan ma dngas pas mengon par brgyun gyur / sman ldan smrig dung de yini//ltung bung byu dbang mi yid pa dbyung
652b3('dul ba): mau da kru dang gnod sbyin padag pa sa/ na ma ste ma chod pa byas//rab sa sbyin thugs rje ldan pa stongs ma sa ga/shAkya'i khungs mA prArtA ni byi chub ste//shi
652b4('dul ba): chos kyi khor lo poskor gyur //glong khyer rtse chen brten nas mya ngan 'das//gang tshe dang ldan pa sh+tsar+ya'i bu yongs mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe/dge slong ba rgyad khri yongasu
652b5('dul ba): mya ngan las 'daso//gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgul gyi bu chen po yongasu mya ngan las 'dres pa ni tshe/dge slong bdun khri yongasu mya ngan las 'das//gang gi
652b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das yongs mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe/dge slong khri brgyad spyod yongs mya ngan las 'das te/lha'i rgyu bskul ba bair+N+Na phyug mang po thob pa dag ci bcom
652b7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi gsungs rib ni drid pa tsam du gyur te/dge slong dbang ying po drug kyang ying su mya ngan las 'dres nasu/bcom ldan 'das kyi mad sde dang /'dul ba dang /
653a1('dul ba): mdag sanags nas 'phya bar byed//spyod par byed//bzer bar byed do//de nas cha dang ldan pa'od spyad chen pos//dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces smras// dang /
653a2('dul ba): ldan pa dag shes par gyis shig/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe dge slong brgyad khri yongasu mya ngan las 'das//tshe dang ldan pa ne'u dgal gyi gyi
653a3('dul ba): chen po yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe/dge slong bdun khri yongasu mya ngan las 'das so//da 'dir bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe yang /dge
653a4('dul ba): slong khri brgyad stong yongasu mya ngan lus 'das te/dge slong de snyed cig yongasu mya las 'das pas/lha'i tshe bskal pa brgya phrag mang po thub pa dag/ci bcom ldan 'das
653a5('dul ba): kyi gsung rab ni dud pa tsam du gyur te/dge slong dbang yod pa dag kyang yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde dang /'dul ba dang /ma mo dag kyang
653a6('dul ba): mi sgrogaso zhes 'phya bar byed/smod par byed/kha zer bar byed pas de lta bas na/'dir shog la 'dus shig/dge slong dag gis legs kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o zhe/
653a7('dul ba): smras so//dge 'dun gyi dge skos gang yin/tshe dang ldan pa gang po lag so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos/tshe dang ldan pa gang po la 'di skad ces smra so//gang
653b1('dul ba): po tshur shog/khyod kyis gauN+DI brdungs la/dge slong gi dge 'dun dgu bsdus shig/tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos de sbyang bsgo ba dang /tshe dang ldan pa gang pos/tshe dang ldan pa 'od
653b2('dul ba): srung gi ltar mnyan nas/rab kyi mthar phyin pa'i bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par zhugs nas/ji tsam ye shes mthong ba la zhugs pa de tsame du/rnam par bltas nus/de nas
653b3('dul ba): ting 'dzin de las langs nas gaN+DI brdung bar brtsamaso//des gaN+DI brdungs pa dang /gcig ma rtogs pa yul tha dad na gnas pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun nga gra bcom pa lnga
653b4('dul ba): brgya 'dus nas/dge slong 'dus shing 'dug pa la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces smraso//tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong gi dge 'dun bdus pa las/gang dge
653b5('dul ba): ma 'ongs pa rtogs shig/dge slong dag gis yul tha dad pa na gla nas pa'i dge slong dag la/phan tshun rnam par bltas nas/tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la tshe dang ldan
653b6('dul ba): pa ba lang bdug ma gtogs pa/dge slong mang po thaMd 'dus shing mchis lags zhes smraso//de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag shing shi ri sha ka'i gzhal med khang stong
653b7('dul ba): pa na 'dug go/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos tshe dang ldan pa gang po la 'di skad ces smraso//gang po tshur shog/tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag ga la ba der song la
654a1('dul ba): phyin nas/tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag la 'di skad ces smros shig/'od srung la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams 'di skad nad med par gyur cig/
654a2('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi bya ba cung zad cig yod pas myur du bos shig ces byas shig tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung gIs de skad smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa gang byos/tshe dang ldan pa 'od+ma srung
654a3('dul ba): lus mnyan nas ji ltar sems mnyam por bzhag na/grong khyer rtswa can nas mi snang zhing /shing shI rI shrI ka'i gzhal med khang stong pa na 'dug bye de lta bu'i ting
654a4('dul ba): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso//de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po che dang ldan pa ba lang bdag ga la ba der song ste phyin nas//tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag gi rkang pa gnyis
654a5('dul ba): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/tshe dang ldan pa ba leng bdag la 'di skad ces smraso//'od srung la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams/tshe dang ldan pa ba ldang bdag/
654a6('dul ba): nud med par gyur cig/dge 'dun gyi bya ba cung zad yod kyis myur du byos shig ces de skad zero//de 'dod chags dang bral ba yin yang /byams pa'i bag chags
654a7('dul ba): kyis bsgos pas/tshe dang ldan pa gang po bcom ldan 'das gdul ba'i don du 'jig rten gzhan du ma gshegs sam/dge slong gi dge 'dun 'thab pa dang /rtsong
654b1('dul ba): ba dang /'gyed pa dang /mtshang mi 'dra 'am/de bzhin gshe bas pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mu stegs kyis kun tu ma bzlog gram/de dag 'dus nas de bzhin gshegs
654b2('dul ba): pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun lnga gnod pa ma byas sam/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma dang 'dra ba la/nyon mongs pas dkris pa'i dbang du gyur pa/dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang //
654b3('dul ba): spyod pa dang /kun tu rgyu dag gis brnyas par mgyur te/ma rig pa'i mun pas yog pa'i blo gros can dag gis dge 'dun 'dus pa'i dbyen ma byas sam/gang de bzhin
654b4('dul ba): gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos dang /'dul ba la/chos dang 'dra ba'i tshig dang /yi ge dang lta ba'i dra ba ma byung dam/tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag/klog pa dang
654b5('dul ba): 'don pa dang /yid la byed pa dag la blo bsgyur nas/'dus shing bre mo'i gtam byed par ma gyur tam/gang+ga the tsom dang /yid gnyis la zhugs pa'i sems kyis//
654b6('dul ba): chos ma yin pa la ni cho su/chos la ni cho sa ma yin para'adul ba ma yin pa la 'dul b+har/'dul ba la ni 'dul ba ma yin par ma bshad dam/dge slong drug ser
654b7('dul ba): sna'i dri mas yog pas/tshangs pa mtshungs pa glo bur du 'ongs pa rnams la/kun tu dga' bar bya ba'i chos drug la sogs pa mi byed cing /khyad gsod par mi byed dam/
655a1('dul ba): gyang rab tu byung ba ngan pa dag gis/bram ze dang /khyim bdag dang pa can dag bstan pa la ma dad par byas nas/mu sngags can la rten byar ma gyur tam/gang
655a2('dul ba): dag log par 'tsho ba kun tu spyod pa zhing rmo ba dang /nyo tshang byed pa dang /rgyal po la rten cing 'tsho ba ltos par ma gyur tam/gang dag sbyangs pa'i yon tan yang dag par
655a3('dul ba): blangs nas/bas mtha'i gnas mal du rten pa las/sbyangs pa'i yon tan de dag bor bar ma gyur tamya/dge sbyong ma yin pa dge sbyong du khas mchis nas/tshangs pa
655a4('dul ba): tshungs par spyod pa 'khrug par mi byed dam/de lta mod kyi ji co gang po sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhes smra ba'i rigs na/'od srung la sogs pa
655a5('dul ba): zhes smra 'am/thugs rje chen po la goms par gnas pa/kun tu spyod pa la zhugs pa'i ston pa phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbying su yongasu mya
655a6('dul ba): ngadran las 'das pa la ma zhugs sam/'gro ba'i ru sgyu 'dzin pa mngo nas 'jig rten 'khrugs par ma gyur tam/stobs bcu dang ldan pa mi rtag po'i stobs kyis
655a7('dul ba): non par ma gyur tam/sems can thams cad kyi ston pa bdag cig sod par byed pa'i mgon po ma gzims sam/sangs rgyas nyin byed ma nub pami/thub pa'i
655b1('dul ba): dradabang po'i zla ba sgra gcan gyis bcom nas snang ba med par ma gyur tam/sum cu rtsa gsum na dbang phyug dpag bsam gyi shing dris zhim po byang chub kyi yan lag gri me tog
655b2('dul ba): gis mdzes par byas pa/dge sbyong gi'i 'bras bu bzang po bzhi dang ldan pa/mi rtag pa'i glang po che skyon pas ma bcom mam/ye shes kyi sgron ma mi rtag pa'i rlung gis
655b3('dul ba): 'das nus yongasu mya ngan lnga ma 'das sam zhes smras so//de nas de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa gang pos tshig su bcad smras pa/blo ldan bstan pa gnas bya'i phyir//nyan thos dge
655b4('dul ba): 'dun tshogs nas ni//de dag der ni 'dus gyur te//khyod la sdod cing de brtson byed//gru tshan rgyal ba de zhig ste//ye shes ri yang rnam par rnyil//bstan pa rab mchog
655b5('dul ba): ldan pa yi//dge slong mang po rnam par zhi//gyi na ma lags legs pa ni//bdag ni pho nyar 'dir 'ongs nas//bstan pa gnas par bya ba'i phyir/de bas khyod ni
655b6('dul ba): dris par bzhud//de nas tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag gis/tshe dang ldan pa gang po la 'di skad ces smraso//gang po cho ga gis de skad ma sgra shig/'gro ba'i dus ma yin//
655b7('dul ba): 'on kyang jo co gang po//'gro ba'i sgron ma mgon po bzhugs pa der/bdag ni 'gro bar bya ba'i blo yod kyang //de nas pha rol rab zhi gshegs gyur na//blo ldan gang
656a1('dul ba): zhig 'jig rten de dag 'gro/lhung bzed chos gos rnam gsum mchog 'di dag/khyod kyis dge 'dun dgu la dbul bar gyis//bdag ni zhi ba yang
656a2('dul ba): srid med par 'gros//bdag gis bsams pa 'phags la bzod par gsol//de nas tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag gis sbar ba dang /dro ba dang /tshar dbab pa
656a3('dul ba): dang /gsal ba mchog gi cho 'phrul chen po bstan te/phung po lhag ma med pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya dran las 'daso//de'i lus rang las byung ba'i me'i khams kyis
656a4('dul ba): rnam par tshig ste/de las chu'i rgyun rnam pa bzhi bab po//chu'i rgyun gcig las sgra bsgrags pa'i dbyangs kyis rje su bstan pa/da ltar dus rnams ngan gyur te//
656a5('dul ba): sems can rang gi las la rten//'gro ba'i sgron ma de 'das pa ste//thams cad 'gro bar 'jug pa rtogs//gnyis pas smras pa/'dus byas bsags pa
656a6('dul ba): skad cig 'jig 'gyur te//skye la sogs pa sdug bsngal nyon mongs ldan//so so'i skye bo bdag tu nga rgyal te//de dag byed pa med par rig par bya//gsum
656a7('dul ba): pas smras pa/mkhas pas rtog tu dgongs pa bag yod cing //bsod nams yid la bya ba de brtson bya/'byung po'i tshogs kun song zhing 'jig 'gyur te//srog
656b1('dul ba): dang bcas pa'i dang ldan g.yo bar gyur//bzhi pas smras pa/thub pa de la sgo mchog yang dag btud//rang gi dgos pa ma lu.A thams cad byas//gus shing rab tu dang
656b2('dul ba): pas bla ma de'i//phyi bzhin pa lang bdag kyang de ltar song //de nas tshe dang ldan pa glang pos/tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag gi rus pa la/rus po'i mchod pa byas nas/
656b3('dul ba): lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te/ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag nas/shIng sha ri sha ka'i gzhil myed khang nas mi snang zhing /grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams
656b4('dul ba): nye bar rten pa dang /shing sa la zung gis tshul du gnas par bya ba de lta bu'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso//de nas tshe dang ldan pa glang po 'od srung la sogs pa dge slong
656b5('dul ba): lnga brgya gal ba der song ste phyin nas/ji ltar rgan rims la phyag 'tshal te/lhung bzed dang chos gos rgan pa la byin nas 'di skad ces smra so//mgon po'i sku ni med
656b6('dul ba): per dos thos nas//bsod nams lus kyis rab tu zhi bar song //de yi lhung bzed chos gos 'di yin te//des bsdams dge 'dun dag la bzod par gsol//
656b7('dul ba): de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos dge slong dag la 'di skad ces smras//kye tsha sams tshungs par spyod pa dag nyon cig/ji ltar de ni 'phags pa'i tshul gyis 'das
657a1('dul ba): gzhan gyis de bzhin rab zhir 'gro mi bya//de bas ji srid dgos pa'i don bya zhing //dbang can tshogs nas de srid 'gro bar bya//de nas yang tshe dang ldan
657a2('dul ba): pa'od srung chen pos/dge slong de dag brtun par bya ba'i phyir smras pa/ji ltar bsod nams las kyis ni gyur pa//shi ri sha ka'i sems mchog pa lang bdagra/de
657a3('dul ba): ltar khyod kyis de bzhin myi bsam ste//'gro don dgos phyir tshogs nas blo gros bya//de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos/dge slong lnga brgya po de dag la khrims
657a4('dul ba): bcas nas smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag ji skad smra bo gson cig/ji ltar bdag cag gis chos kyi tshul ji lta ba bzhin bshad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dang
657a5('dul ba): rnam par bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyi dge slong phyogs dang ljongs gang dang gang na/nas pa de dang de dag gis thos nas 'dir 'ongs te/de dag gis bdag cag gi sems g.yeng bar
657a6('dul ba): byed mod kyi/'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis yul mu gA d+har byang chub cing /gang du bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi sku brnyes pa der chos kyi tshul bgro bar bya'o//de na
657a7('dul ba): dge slong gcig gi legs kyis de bzhin du 'gyi'o zhes smros//gzhan zhig gis kyang tshe dang ldan pa ci byang chub kyi shing drung du 'dong ngam/tshe dang ldan pa'ang srung
657b1('dul ba): rgyan pos smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po lus 'phags m+b+ha'i bu mo skyes dgra rtsu ba med pa'i dad pa dang ldan pa de dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'tshe ba'i yo byad dang /
657b2('dul ba): chos kyi tshul rab tu sbyor bar byed cing //zhalA~M ta yang byed byas rgyal po'i rab tu 'dong ngo //de dag gis smras pa/legs kyis de bzhin du bgyi ni de lta na yang tshe dang ldan pa kun
657b3('dul ba): dka' bo ni slob pa'i bya ba dang bcas pa yang yin na/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang mdo sde 'di mtha' dag gtad na/de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/de nas tshe dang ldan pa
657b4('dul ba): 'od srung chen pos smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag gal te de lta na slob pa'i bya ba dang bcas pa'i dge slong gzhan 'khod pa de dag kyang /'khrug par 'gyur bas/de la thibs kyi
657b5('dul ba): rnam pa zhig byas la 'di chu'i zhal te bar bsgo ba'i spro bas bsgre sra la/lhag mu ni bzlog par bgyi'o//de dag gis smras pa/lags kyis dri bzhin du bgyi'o//de nas tshe
657b6('dul ba): dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smra so//tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo khyod/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi chu'i zhal ta byed par spro'am
657b7('dul ba): des skyes pa/tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po spyir//de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'di srung chen pos gsol pa dang gnyis kyi las bye bar brtsams nas/dge 'dun btsun pa rnam
658a1('dul ba): gsan du gsol/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhul tra pa/bcom ldan 'das kyi nyo ba na 'dug cing /dro la bcom ldan 'das
658a2('dul ba): kyis kyang mdo sde mtha' dag gtad de/de lte bas na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dge 'dun gyi chu'i zhal tA pAr bsko ste/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo chu'i zhal te par bsko na//
658a3('dul ba): gal te dge 'dren gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/cang ma ga sung shig/'di ni glasel ba'o//lus ni 'di ltar bya ste/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/
658a4('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa ku ni dga' bo ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal ta pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nye ba na 'dug cing /de la bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde mtha' drug gtad de/de
658a5('dul ba): pas na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dge 'dun gyis dge 'dun la chu 'drim par bsgo ste/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bi dge 'dun la chu 'dri mA na/tshe dang ldan pa kun dag
658a6('dul ba): bo dge 'dun le chu 'drim par bsko zhing /tshe dang ldan pa kun+da dga' bo dge 'dun la chu 'drim par/tshe dang ldan pa gang dag bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig/glang
658a7('dul ba): dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dge 'dun la chu 'drim par bskos lags te/'di
658b1('dul ba): tsad mi g+ha sbyang bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to////bad+ma po dra brgyad pa//de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen byos/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo l+ya 'di skad ces smraso//
658b2('dul ba): kun dga' rlur shog/dge slong gi dge 'dun dang sbyin cig ci dga'i phrer ljongs rgyus lin+te lnga po'i khyeb du stong shig/de ni lam dung po nas 'gro'o//rten pa
658b3('dul ba): dunan bgyi'o zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /ci dga' bar ljongs rgyu zhing song ngo //tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po yang snga ma bzhin/lam dang
658b4('dul ba): po nas rgyal po'i khab tu song //yul m+me gad+hA'i rgyal po lus 'phags rtswa'i bum skyes dgra'i spyod pa ni gang du glang po che la zhen te/bcom ldan 'daste mthong na de ma byug
658b5('dul ba): rlung lhung nas/de bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus mo nyams par sa la 'jug/yu~M ma~M mya gA d+hid+hi lci bla ma skye sa dkyus/tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po mthong ste/mthong na
658b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das rjes dran pas/de bzhin du rangs la ltung ba dang /de tshe dang ldan pa 'od sang chen po rdzu 'phrul gyis bzung nas skyes pa/rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas bcom
658b7('dul ba): ldan 'das dag ni rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa lags la/nyan thos dgu ni mnyam par lazhag par mi shes mthong ba mo 'jug ste/de ris 'ga' ni de bzhin du mnyam
659a1('dul ba): par bzhag nas gnas res 'ga' ni mnyam par mi bzhag par gnas pas de phyin chad khyod kyis/bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos mthong na/glang po che
659a2('dul ba): dang /rta las rang lhung bar ma byed cig ces der khrims bcas//des smras pa/'phags pa ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du bgyi'o//'phags pa 'on kyang gang gi tshe
659a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa de'i tshe/bdag bcom ldan 'das la bkur bstir bgyid na/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das ni yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas/da bdag
659a4('dul ba): gis gang zhig la bkur bsti bgyi lags/de lta bas ne bdag la bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa gto do zhes smras nas/blon po la
659a5('dul ba): shes ldan 'phags pa 'od srung chen po'i dgos pa thad sbyor cig ces bsgo'o//tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos smras pa/rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das ni yul
659a6('dul ba): ma ga d+har byang chub ste/der bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi sku brnyes pas/dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams lam du zhugs te/lha'i gnas 'di re chos kyi tshul 'di
659a7('dul ba): 'gro bar 'tshal lag so//des smras pa/'phags pa legs kyis bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun la yo byad thams cad bstabs par bgyi'o//de nas tshe dang ldan
659b1('dul ba): ba'od srung la sogs pa dgra bcom pa lnga brgya po rnams//mdo sde dang /'dul ba dang /chos mngon par bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir/rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa dang /yul ma ga d+ha'o//
659b2('dul ba): rgyal po lus 'phags ma'i bu ma skyes dgros/dge bcom pa ldi de rgyu rgyal po'i khab tu phyin par thos//thos nas kyang grong khyer dgro byi dor byas te/lam dag bstar nas/
659b3('dul ba): btsun mo dang /gzhon nu dang /blon po dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams kyis bsu'o//de nas skyes bu bzang po steng gis zhom 'bring byas nas/rab tu mdzes par byas te/
659b4('dul ba): slong gi dge 'dun rnams grong khyer du b+hin nas/yo byad tha~Md kyis bstab so//de nas rgan rims kyis 'dug pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so//
659b5('dul ba): 'phags pa phyogs gang du bgro bar bgyi/des smras pa/rgyal po chen po 'od ma'i cha la byA ka lAn da ka gnas pa 'dir yang dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dang bra
659b6('dul ba): te/sdug bsnol skyes pas phyogs dang ljongs gang dang gang na gnas pa de dang de dag 'dir mchis te/dus bdag cag gi sems gu yeng ba'i skyon mchis//bya rgod kyi
659b7('dul ba): phrephung po'i ri la yang de bzhin du nyes dmigs mchis te/shing n+ya gro d+ha'i phug 'di ni rab tu dben nod kyi 'on kyang mal stan ma mchis lags//rgyal pos spros pa/
660a1('dul ba): 'phags pa khyod kyis sems bskyed cig dang /mal stan mchis//tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag rgyal po ni 'di
660a2('dul ba): skad ces/shing n+ya gro d+hA'i phug 'dir 'gro bar bya'o zhes ze ro//dgra bcom pa lnga brgya po rnams kyung cang myi gsung bas gnang ngo //rgyal pos smras pa/'phags
660a3('dul ba): pa 'od srung chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /bdag la ma sbyin pa kho nar yongasu mya ngan 'daso//khyod kyis kyang ma brtags par yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar
660a4('dul ba): ma mdzad cig/tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos kyang de bzhin du gan //de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos/je dang por dbyar sbyor ba ral ba dang /'drums
660a5('dul ba): pa dag bcos nas/phyir dbyar gnas par khas blangs te/chos bgro bar bya'o snyam du bsems nas/des dang por dbyar sbyor ba rol po dang /'drums pa dge
660a6('dul ba): bcos nas/phyis dbyar gronas par khasu blangaso//de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i sems la kun du bltas nas/tshe dang
660a7('dul ba): ldan pa ma 'gags pa la 'di skad ces smras//tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gegs pa dgongs shig/'khor 'di de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu bsdigs pa'i nang
660b1('dul ba): nu/dge slong 'dod chags dang bcas pa/zhe sdang dang bAn+d+haswa pa/gA ti myug dang bcas pa dang /sred pa dang bcas pa/len pa dang blun+d+has pa slob bya dag yod do//de nas
660b2('dul ba): dang ldan pa ma 'gagru pas/bsam gtan bzhi le snyoms par zhugs te/rnam par brtags ni/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gcig pu 'dod chags dang bcas/zhes
660b3('dul ba): sdang dang bcas/gauti mug dang bcas sred pa dang bcas len pa dang bcas te slob pa yin par mthong ngo //mthing nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces
660b4('dul ba): skyeso//tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po mkhyen par mdzod cig/dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams ni snying po med pa dang bral/dag pa gtsang ba/snying po can/bla na med pa/
660b5('dul ba): bsod nams kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas yin mod kyi tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ni 'dod chags dang bcas/zhe sdang dang bcas/gti mug dang bcas/sred pa
660b6('dul ba): dang bcas/len pa dang bcas pa yin te/slob pa yin no//de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo lnga ci spro ba byas pas 'dul bar
660b7('dul ba): 'gyur ram/'on te spyo bas 'dul bar 'gyur ba rnam par brtags na/ji tsam skyo bas 'dul bar mthong nas des de la nged ni 'dus pa'i mchog yin la/kun dga' bo///
661a1('dul ba): khyod dang nged lhan cig chos bgro bur mi byas/khyod song shig ces smras pa dang /de gnad du phog pa bzhin du rab tu g.yos nas smras pa/
661a2('dul ba): dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po che go/bdag gis tshul khrims nyams par ma byas/lta ba nyams par ma byas/spyod pa nyams par ma byas/'tshe ba nyams par ma
